src_text: Ndangulo ya tshiwo nga murahu ha miḓalo.
tgt_text: Ukuphathwa kwenhlekelele emuva kokuhlasela kwezikhukhula.

src_text: Khabinethe yo swikisa maipfi ndiliso kha vhathu vhoṱhe vhe vha ṱutshelwa nga  vhafunwa vhavho kha miḓalo ye ya vhanga tshinyalelo khulwane ine ya kha ḓi tou bva vha hone zwenezwino kha zwipiḓa zwo fhambanaho zwa shango ḽashu, nga maanḓa ngei KwaZulu-Natal..     Zwa ḓivhadzwa ha Tshiimo tsha Tshiwo tsha Lushaka na maga thuso ya ṱhaḓulo kha zwa ikonomi na matshilisano zwe zwa itwa nga Phresidennde Vho Cyril Ramaphosa, zwo livhiswa kha vhona uri hu khou vha na maga khwaṱhaho nahone tshimbidzwaho zwavhuḓi vhukati ha masia oṱhe muvhuso hu tshi shumiswa  Senthara ya Ndangulo ya Tshiwo ya Lushaka.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lidlulise amazwi enduduzo kubo bonke abantu abashonelwe ngabathandiweyo babo ezikhukhuleni zakamuva ezidale umonakalo owesabekayo ezihlasele izingxenye eziningana zezwe lethu, ikakhulukazi isifundazwe saKwaZulu-Natali..     Ukumenyezelwa kweSimo Senhlekelele Sikazwelonke kanye nezinhlelo zosizo lokungenelela eziphathelene nenhlalo-mnotho yabantu ezimenyezelwe nguMongameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa kamuva nje, bekuhloswe ngakho ukuqinisekisa ukuthathwa kwezinyathelo ezisebenza kahle futhi ezihambelanayo kuzo zonke izinhlaka zikahulumeni, ngokusebenzisa iSizinda Sikazwelonke Sokuphathwa Kwenhlekelele..     Imali eyisigidigidi esisodwa samarandi ehlinzekwe nguhulumeni isetshenziselwa ukulekelela imizamo yokweseka nokuvuselela, ukubuyisela ukuhlinzekwa kwezidingo-ngqangi kanye nokuhlinzeka ngosizo lokunciphisa usizi nenhlupheko kubantu okusho ukuhlinzeka ngokudla, amanzi, indawo yokuhlala, ukuthuthwa kwendle kanye nezingubo zokugqoka..     Seyiqalisiwe kakade inqubo yokwakha kabusha izindawo ezikhahlamezekile njengoba abantu bezwe lakithi bebambene ngezandla ekuzimiseleni kwabo ukulekelela labo abalahlekelwe ngamakhaya abo kanye nempahla yabo.

src_text: Masheleni linganaho R1 biḽioni a ṋetshedzwa nga muvhuso khou shumiswa kha tikedza ndingedzo dza mvusuluso na ṱhaḓulo vhuedzedza tshumelo dza mutheo khathihi na ṋetshedza thuso ya zwa vhuthu nga vha ṋea zwiḽiwa, maḓi, vhudzulo, tshumelo dza vhuthathazwitzhili na zwiambaro..     Mushumo wa dovha fhaṱa hafhu nga huswa fhethu ho tshinyadzwaho nga miḓalo kati, ngeno vhathu vha shango ḽashu vha tshi khou farana vha vha ṅanda nthihi kha vhuḓiimiseli havho ha thusa avho vho tshinyalelwaho nga mahaya na thundu dzavho.
tgt_text: Ezakamuva ngeSifo Segciwane le-Corona (i-COVID-19).

src_text: Mafhungo maswa nga ha Vhulwadze ha Khoronavairasi (COVID-19).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lizwakalise ukukhathazeka kwalo ngokudlondlobala kwenani labantu abasuleleka nge-COVID-19 kamuva nje ezingxenyeni ezithile zezwe futhi linxuse abantu bonke ukuba bathathe izinyathelo zokuzinakekela nokuqikelela impilo yabo ukuze bazivikele kuleli gciwane elibulalayo, ikakhulukazi esikhathini sasebusika.

src_text: Khabinethe yo dzhiela nṱha khathihi na vhilaedzwa nga engedzea ha zwenezwino  ha tshivhalo tsha zwiwo zwa kavhiwa nga vairasi ya COVID-19 kha zwiṅwe zwipiḓa zwa  shango nahone khou  ṱuṱuwedza vhathu vhoṱhe uri vha dzhie maga tsireledzo itela ḓitsireledza kha vairasi iyi re khombo ngaurali, nga maanḓa nga tshifhinga tsha vhuriha.
tgt_text: Igciwane liselokhu liyingozi esihleli nayo ngaso sonke isikhathi phakathi kwethu futhi ukugonywa kusalokhu kuyisona sikhali sokuzivikela esisebenza kahle kakhulu.

src_text: Vairasi iyi khou bvela phanḓa na vha khombo tshifhinga tshoṱhe nahone muhaelo ndi wone une swika zwino wa vha tshone tshiṱhavhane tsha vhuhali tsha ḓitsireledza.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liyakuthokozela ukukhula kwesibalo sabantu abaqoka ukugonywa njengendlela yokuqala yokuzivikela ku-COVID-19 emuva kokuthi izibalo zakamuva zibonise ukuthi isibalo sabantu abadala asebegonyiwe ezifundazweni ezinhlanu sesikhule saze sayofinyelela enanini eliyingqophamlando elingaphezu kwamaphesenti angama-.

src_text: Khabinethe khou takadzwa nga fhungo ḽa uri vhunzhi ha vhathu vha khou bvela phanḓa na nanga muhaelo sa tshone tshipileli tshavho tsha thoma kha COVID-19 nga murahu ha musi mbalombalo dza zwenezwino dzo sumbedza uri ro swika kha ḽiga ḽa nṱhesa ḽa fhirisa phesenthe dza 50 dza vhaaluwa vho haelwaho kha mavunḓu maṱanu.

tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liyabanxusa labo abangakagonywa ukuthi nabo benze kanjalo ukuze bazivikele futhi bavikele nabathandiweyo babo.

src_text: Khabinethe khou ita khuwelelo kha avho vhane vha athu haelwa uri vha ite ngauralo itela uri vha kone ḓitsireledza khathihi na tsireledza vhafunwa vhavho.
tgt_text: Kumele futhi siqhubeke nokulandela yonke imigomo yokuzivikela kwi-COVID-19, kubandakanya ukugqoka isifonyo esimboza kokubili ikhala nomlomo, ukugeza izandla ngamanzi nensipho, noma sisebenzise isibulali-magciwane sezandla esiqukethe i-alcohol engama-70%, futhi sigcine ibanga eliphephile okungenani eliyimitha elilodwa lokuqhelelana phakathi kwethu nabanye abantu emphakathini..     Isibonelelo Sosizo Olubhekiswe Kubantu Abagajwe Wusizi Nenhlupheko (i-SRD).

src_text: Ri tea dovha hafhu ra bvela phanḓa na tevhedza milayo yoṱhe ya thivhela dwadze ḽa COVID-19, hu tshi katelwa na zwa ambara maski une wa thivhedza mulomo na ningo ṱamba zwanḓa nga maḓi na tshisibe kana shumisa sanithaiza ya zwanḓa re na aḽikhohoḽi linganaho 70%, khathihi na sia tshikhala tshi linganaho mithara muthihi vhukati hau na muṅwe muthu..     Magavhelo Ṱhaḓulo ya Thambulo  kha Vhadzulapo (SRD) .
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likhuthaze izakhamuzi ezithola iSibonelelo se-SRD esingama-R350 ukuba zifake izicelo zazo kabusha, kulandela ukwethulwa kwemithethonqubo emisha elawula izicelo kanye nemibandela yokufaneleka kwabantu ukuthola lesi sibonelelo.

src_text: Khabinethe khou ṱuṱuwedza vhadzulapo vha wanaho Magavhelo masheleni linganaho R350 SRD uri vha dovhe vha ite khumbelo hafhu nga huswa nga murahu ha musi ho thoma shumiswa milayo miswa langaho zwa itwa ha khumbelo idzi khathihi na zwa vha muthu tewaho nga wana magavhelo aya.
tgt_text: Izicelo zingafakwa kwiwebhusayithi yoPhiko LweziMpesheni Nezibonelelo Zikahulumeni lwaseNingizimu Afrika (i-SASSA): https://srd.sassa.gov.za/.

src_text: Khumbelo dzi nga itwa kha webusaithi ya Zhendedzi ḽa Thuso ya zwa Masheleni kha Vhadzulao ḽa Afrika Tshipembe (SASSA) ine ya vha https://srd.sassa.gov.za/.
tgt_text: Uhlelo lokufaka izicelo lwavulwa mhla zingama-23 kuMbasa 2022 futhi luwuhlelo oluqhutshwa ngobuchwepheshe bedijithali ngokuphelele ukuze kusheshe ukucutshungulwa nokuphothulwa kwezicelo..     Isibonelelo sokuhlinzeka ngosizo siyisibonelelo esisemqoka kakhulu sokubhekelela imindeni entulayo obekungenzeka izithole seyibhuqabhuqwa yisihlava sobubha nokuntuleka kwamathuba omsebenzi.

src_text: Sisiṱeme ya ita khumbelo yo vula nga ḽa 23 Lambamai 2022 nahone khumbelo  dzenedzo dzi itwa nga nḓila yo fhelelaho ya didzhithaḽa hu tshi itelwa uri hu kone  wanala phindulo nga ṱavhanya..     Magavhelo ṱhaḓulo tshikwama tsha ndeme tsha thuso ya zwa masheleni kha miṱa shayaho ye ya vha tshi ḓo vha kha nyimele konḓaho vhukuma nga mulandu wa vhushai na shayea ha mishumo.
tgt_text: Uhulumeni uzibophezele ekuhlinzekeni ngezibonelelo kulabo bantu abadla imbuya ngothi abangenawo amandla okuzibhekelela ngokwabo ukuze bakwazi ukuhlangabezana nezidingo zabo eziyisisekelo.

src_text: Muvhuso wo ḓiimisela ṋetshedza thuso ya zwa matshilisano kha avho vha sa koni ḓiitela uri na vhone vha kone swikela ṱhoḓea dzavho dza mutheo.
tgt_text: Ezokuphepha nokuvikeleka.

src_text: Tsireledzo na Vhutsireledzi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liyaqhubeka nokugxeka izenzo zokubulawa kwabantu besifazane ezingenangqondo futhi lisithokozele isenzo sabomthetho sokubabopha ngokushesha okukhulu abasolwa abayamaniswa nokufa kuka-Nks Hillary Gardee (28), obehlala endaweni yaKamagugu eMpumalanga.

src_text: Khabinethe khou bvela phanḓa na sasaladza zwa vhulawa ha vhafumakadzi nga nḓila ya tshiṱuhu nahone khou dovha hafhu ya ṱanganedza vhukando ho dzhiwaho nga ṱavhanya nga vhaofisiri vha zwa mulayo ha fara vhahumbulelwa malugana na lufu lwa Mufumakadzi Vho Hillary Gardee (28), vha fhaḽa Kamagugu kha ḽa Mpumalanga.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liphinde futhi lagxeka nesenzo sokubulawa kwabantu abayisithupha eKhayelitsha, eKapa.

src_text: Khabinethe khou dovha hafhu ya sasaladza mabulayo vhathu vha rathi ngei Khayelitsha, hune ha vha fhaḽa Cape Town.
tgt_text: Lokhu kubulawa kwabantu okungenangqondo kuyisikhumbuzo sokuthi kusekuningi okumele sikwenze njengomphakathi ukuqeda udlame kanye nodlame olweyamene nobulili kanye nokubulawa kwabantu besifazane (i-GBVF)..     IKhabhinethi linxuse abantu bonke kuleli ukuthi basebenzisane nohulumeni empini yokulwisana nobugebengu kanye ne-GBVF.

src_text: Mabulayo aya tshiṱuhu ngaurali tou vha tshihumbudzi tsha uri hu kha ḓi vha na zwinzhi zwine ra kha ḓi tea ita sa vhadzulapo itela fhelisa zwiito zwa dzikhakhathi khathihi na khakhathi dzo ḓitikaho nga mbeu hu tshi katelwa na mabulayo vhathu vha tshifumakadzi (GBVF)..     Khabinethe khou ṱuṱuwedza vhathu vhoṱhe fhano shangoni uri vha shumisane na muvhuso kha lwa na zwiito zwa vhugevhenga na GBVF.
tgt_text: Uma sibambisene singaqinisekisa ukuthi imiphakathi yethu kanye nezitaladi zethu kuphephile kubantu bonke, kubandakanya nabantu esebekhulile ngokweminyaka, abesifazane kanye nezingane..     Ezomnotho.

src_text: Nga tshumisano, ri nga ita uri zwitshavha zwashu khathihi na magondo ashu vhe tsireledzeaho kha vhathu vhoṱhe, hu tshi katelwa vhaaluwa, vhafumakadzi na vhana..     Ikonomi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likwamukele ngezandla ezimhlophe ukuvulwa ngokusemthethweni kwefemu eyakha izitini yakwa-Corobrik, i-Kwastina e-Driefontein e-Gauteng okwenziwe nguMongameli u-Ramaphosa ngoLwesithathu mhla zizi-4 kuNhlaba.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza vulwa lwa tshiofisi ha ḽimaga ḽa foroma zwidina ḽa Corobrik Kwastina ngei Driefontein kha vunḓu ḽa Gauteng nga Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa nga Ḽavhuraru, ḽa 4 Shundunthule.
tgt_text: Le femu kanokusho yohlobo lwesimanjemanje iyingxenye yotshalomali oluyizigidi ezingama-800 zamarandi, oluhambisana nolunye futhi utshalomali olwengeziwe oluyizigidi ezingama-200 zamarandi olwabelwe umsebenzi wokwelulwa kwemisebenzi kakhonkolo yakwa-Corobrik KwaZulu-Natali.

src_text: Ḽimaga iḽi ḽa maimo nṱha ḽi vhumba tshipiḓa tsha vhubindudzi ha masheleni linganaho R800 miḽioni, zwine hezwi zwa khou tshimbila khathihi na maṅwe masheleni linganaho R200 miḽioni ane khou lavhelelwa ḓo engedza mishumo ya khonkhirithi ya vha ha Corobrik ngei KwaZulu-Natal.
tgt_text: Abakwa-Corobrik bangelinye lamabhizinisi akuleli asabelile kwikhwelo likaMongameli u-Ramaphosa lapho enxusa amabhizinisi aseNingizimu Afrika kanye namabhizinisi amazwe ngamazwe ukuba atshale izimali emnothweni wezwe lethu.

src_text: Corobrik ndi ḽiṅwe ḽa mabindu fhano hayani a fhindula khuwelelo ya Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa ye vha ita kha mabindu fhano Afrika Tshipembe na dzitshaka uri bindudze kha ikonomi ya ḽino shango.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likuphawulile ukuthi umnotho wegesi ihayidrojini osafufusa uthole ukwesekwa nokufukulwa njengoba abakwa-Anglo American sebethule iloli elisebenza ngegesi yehayidrojini.

src_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya dzhiela nṱha zwa uri ikonomi ya gesemaḓi ine ya khou  aluwa yo wana thikhedzo khulwane nga rwelwa ṱari ha tshiendedzi tsha ṱhiraka shumisaho gesemaḓi nga vha ha Anglo American.
tgt_text: Leli loli – eliguquliwe ebelisebenza ngodizili manje eselisebenza ngehayidrojini, futhi elinengxenye ethile yalo esebenza ngamabhethri ohlobo lwe-lithium-ion – lingelokuqala ngqa ukubonakala emhlabeni wonke jikelele.

src_text: Tshiendedzi itshi tsha ṱhiraka, tshe tsha shandukiswa bva kha tsha shumisa diziḽi ya kha tsha gesemaḓi, nahone tshi shumisa na beṱiri dza lithium-ion, tshi tou vha tshone tsha thoma ḽifhasini ḽoṱhe.
tgt_text: Umnotho wehayidrojini usuhlonzwe njengento esemqoka kakhulu okumele ibekwe eqhulwini kuhlobo lomnotho wethu olungayinukubezi imvelo, futhi ukuze kukhuthazwe ukukhula komnotho kanye nokuvulwa kwamathuba omsebenzi..     IKhabhinethi liluthokozele futhi nolunye utshalomali olwengeziwe olufakwe yinkampani ekhiqiza ukudla yase-Ireland, i-Kerry Group, esivule ifemu entsha edle izigidi ezingama-650 zamarandi e-Hammarsdale, KwaZulu-Natali, okuhloswe ngayo ukukhiqizela leli zwekazi ukudla ngokuqhubekayo.

src_text: Ikonomi ya gesemaḓi yo ṱaluswa sa tshithu tsha ndeme kha ikonomi sa tshikafhadzi mupo wa shango ḽashu khathihi na kha ṱuṱuwedza nyaluwo ya ikonomi na sika mishumo..     Khabinethe yo dovha hafu ya ṱanganedza vhuṅwe vhubindudzi kha ikonomi yashu bva kha khamphani ya zwiḽiwa ya Ireland ine ya ḓivhiwa sa The Kerry Group ye ya vula ḽimaga ḽiswa ḽi ḓuraho masheleni swikaho R650-miḽioni ngei Hammarsdale, KwaZulu-Natal ḽiṋe ḽa ḓo bveledza zwiḽiwa zwine zwa nga shumiswa lwa tshifhinga tshilapfu kha dzhango ḽa Afrika.
tgt_text: Le femu iyifemu eyingqayizivele, futhi engafani neze namanye, njengoba inezinsiza-kusebenza eziningana eziyoyilekelela ukuthi iqhubeke isikhathi eside yenza umsebenzi wayo ngendlela esimeme, kubandakanya imishini engadli ugesi omningi, ukusetshenziswa kukagesi welanga ukuze kuncishiswe umthamo kagesi osuka esikhungweni sikagesi sikazwelonke, ukuqoqwa kwamandla kagesi nokushisa emithonjeni yamandla kagesi esisetshenzisiwe, kanye nokuqoqwa nokugcinwa kwamanzi ngobunyoninco, nokusebenzisa izinto kabusha kanye nokuncishiswa kwemfucuza ekhiqizwayo.

src_text: Heḽi ndi ḽimaga ḽo khetheaho ngauri ḽi na zwishumiswa zwinzhi zwo khwaṱhaho zwine zwa katela na zwishumiswa zwi shumisaho fulufulu ḽiṱuku, vhubveledzi ha fulufulu ḽi bvaho kha masana ḓuvha itela fhungudza shumiswa ha muḓagasi bvaho kha netiweke ya nḓisedzo ya muḓagasi ya henefho fhethu kuvhanganywa ha mufhiso wo no shumaho kuvhanganywa ha maḓi nga nḓila yavhuḓi shumisa hafhu na phungudzo.
tgt_text: Inkampani i-Kerry Group seyisebenze eNingizimu Afrika kusukela ngowezi-2011, futhi lolu tshalomali olwengeziwe luyinkomba yokuthi iNingizimu Afrika iyizwe eliyintandokazi kubatshalizimali.

src_text: Ḽimaga ḽa The Kerry Group ḽo vha hone fhano Afrika Tshipembe bva nga ṅwaha wa 2011, nahone vhubindudzi vhuṅwe na vhuṅwe vhuswa vhune ḽa vhu ita ndi tshiga tsha uri Afrika Tshipembe ḽi kha ḓi vha fhethu havhuḓi ha ita zwa vhubindudzi.
tgt_text: Lolu tshalomali lulandela ezinyathelweni zokwethulwa kweveni yohlobo lwe-Isuzu D-Max eyakhiwa kuleli e-Gqeberha eMpumalanga Kapa ngenyanga edlule.

src_text: Hovhu vhubindudzi vhu khou vha hone nga murahu ha rwelwa ṱari zwa magwa ha tshiendedzi tsha luṱanḓala tsha Isuzu D-Max ngei Gqeberha kha ḽa Kapa Vhubvaḓuvha ṅwedzi wo fhelaho.
tgt_text: I-D-MAX entsha yohlobo lwesimanjemanje iwuphawu olucace bha lokuzibophezela kwenkampani yakwa-Isuzu eNingizimu Afrika futhi ingenye yezimpumelelo ezizuzwe ngaphansi koHlelo Lokuthuthukisa Ukwakhiwa Nokukhiqizwa Kwezimoto (i-APDP).

src_text: Lushaka luswa lwa D-Max lu khwaṱhisedza vhuḓiimiseli ha vha ha Isuzu kha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe nahone ndi iṅwe ya mvelaphanḓa ye ya swikelwa nga fhasi ha Mbekanyamushumo ya Mveledziso ya Vhubveledzi ha Mimoḓoro (APDP).
tgt_text: I-APDP iwuhlelo lokukhuthaza umkhiqizo oluqondiswe embonini yezimoto okuhloswe ngalo ukugqugquzela nokukhulisa inani lezimoto ezikhiqizwa yile mboni yezimoto, ukugqugquzela ukwakhiwa nokulungiswa kwezingxenye zezimoto embonini yakuleli futhi ngalokho-ke kuvuleke amathuba omsebenzi ochungechungeni lonkana lwemisebenzi yokwakhiwa nokukhiqizwa kwezimoto.

src_text: APDP ndi tshikimu tsha magavhelo vhubveledzi kha nḓowetshumo ya mimoḓoro tsho livhiswaho kha ṱuṱuwedza vhubveledzi nga vhunzhi kha nḓowetshumo ya zwa mimoḓoro yo tiwaho ṱuṱuwedza nyengedzedzo ya ndeme kha tshipiḓa tsha nḓowetshumo ya zwa mimoḓoro  zwine hezwi zwa  fhedza nga sika mishumo kha nḓowetshumo ya zwa vhubveledzi ha mimoḓoro nga angaredza.
tgt_text: Lilinganiselwa kuma-R. 8 ezigidigidi inani lomkhiqizo wakuleli ozokhiqizwa esikhathini sonkana sokuqhubeka kwe-APDP.

src_text: Masheleni swikaho R2,8 biḽioni ḓo bveledzwa kha zwa vhubveledzi ha zwibveledzwa zwa fhano hayani nga tshifhinga tshenetsho tsha musi APDP tshi kha ḓi vha hone.
tgt_text: Lolu tshalomali luzovikela imisebenzi eyi-1 000 yabantu abaqashwe ngqo kulesi sikhungo futhi luvulele abantu abayizi-24 000 amathuba omsebenzi emisebenzini eminingana engaphandle ehlobene nomsebenzi owenziwa yile nkampani futhi ngalokho-ke lulekelele kakhulu ekuthuthukisweni nokufukulwa komphakathi kulesiya sifunda..     INgqungquthela Yezezimayini.

src_text: Vhubindudzi uvhu vhu ḓo sika mishumo ya vhukuma fhiraho 1 000 kha ḽimaga ḽeneḽo ya dovha hafhu ya thola vhathu vha linganaho 24 000 henefho nga thungo tsini na ḽimaga, zwine hezwi zwa ḓo vha shela mulenzhe zwihulwane kha bveledza zwitshavha henefho kha dzingu ḽeneḽo..     Indaba ya zwa Migodi.
tgt_text: INgqungquthela Yokutshalwa Kwezimali Ezimayini zase-Afrika yowezi-2022 ebibanjelwe e-Cape Town International Convention Centre kusukela mhla ziyisi-9 kuya kumhla ziyi-12 kuNhlaba 2022, ingesinye sezigcawu ezinkulukazi zokuxhumana nokusebenzisana phakathi kwabo bonke ababambiqhaza embonini yezimayini.

src_text: Indaba ya Bindudza kha Migodi ya Afrika ya ṅwaha wa 2022 ye ya farelwa fhaḽa  Cape Town International Convention Centre bva nga ḽa 9 swika nga ḽa 12 Shundunthule 2022, ndi tshiṅwe tsha tshikhala tshihulwane tsha nyambedzano na tshumisano vhukati ha vhashumisani vhoṱhe vha kwameaho zwa kha nḓowetshumo ya migodi.
tgt_text: Isiqubulo sale ngqungquthela sabe sithi: “Uguquko-simo Lwezezimayini e-Afrika: Sitshala Izimali Ekuguqulweni Kwamandla, i-ESG, kanye Neminotho”.

src_text: Thero ya vhuṱambo yo vha tshi ri: “Tshanduko kha zwa Migodi ya Afrika bindudza kha Tshanduko ya Fulufulu, ESG, na Dziikonomi”.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi linethemba elikhulu lokuthi iNgqungquthela Yezezimayini izolekelela ekuvezeni kanye nokukhangisa iNingizimu Afrika njengezwe eliyintandokazi kubatshalizimali.

src_text: Khabinethe na fulufhelo ḽa uri iyi Indaba ya zwa Migodi ḓo thusa kha ṱana bveledzisa Afrika Tshipembe sa fhethu ho teaho ita zwa vhubindudzi.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika ilwamukela ngezandla ezimhlophe utshalomali olungena kuleli futhi izibophezele ekwakheni izimo ezikahle futhi ezikulungele ukukhula komnotho okubandakanyayo kanye nokulethwa koguquko emnothweni.

src_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽi ṱanganedza vhubindudzi kha shango ḽashu nahone ḽo ḓiimisela bveledza nyimele dzavhuḓi hu tshi itelwa nyaluwo katelaho vhoṱhe khathihi na tshanduko ya ikonomi.
tgt_text: Ubudlelwane namazwe ngamazwe omhlaba kanye namazwe esifunda.

src_text: Vhushaka ha dzingu na ha dzitshaka.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likwamukelile futhi ukuxhumana nokufakana imilomo kwakamuva nje phakathi kukaMongameli  u-Ramaphosa noMongameli waseMelika u-Joe Biden, noMongameli wase-France u-Emmanuel Macron kanye noMongameli wase-Zambia u-Hakainde Hichilema ezigcawini zokuxhumana ezahlukene.

src_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ṱanganedza nyambedzano dza zwenezwino dza vhukati ha Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa na Phresidennde Vho Joe Biden vha shango ḽa Amerika, Phresidennde Vho Emmanuel Macron vha ḽa Fura khathihi na Phresidennde Vho Hakainde Hichilema vha ḽa Zambia kha miṱangano yavho yo fhambanaho.
tgt_text: Lokhu kuxhumana nokufakana imilomo kuhlinzeke uMongameli ngethuba elikahle lokuqinisa ubudlelwane kanye nobambiswano phakathi kweNingizimu Afrika namazwe ebambisene nawo ezindabeni ezisemqoka eziphathelene nesifunda kanye nalezo eziphathelene namazwe ngamazwe omhlaba, kubandakanya nokuthola isixazululo esinokuthula kwingxabano eqhubekayo e-Ukraine     Izinqumo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Hedzi nyambedzano dzo ita uri Phresidennde vha kone khwaṱhisa vhushaka ha mashango mavhili khathihi na tshumisano vhukati ha shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe na maṅwe mashango vhashumisani nga ha mafhungo ndeme dzitshaka na dzingu, hu tshi katelwa na wana thandululo ya mulalo kha nndwa ya fhaḽa Ukraine     Tsheo dza Khabinethe.
tgt_text: Amavoti Esabelomali.

src_text: Vouthu dza Mugaganyagwama.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi linxusa zonke izakhamuzi ukuba ziwalandele amaVoti Esabelomali ahlukahlukene ethulwa yiminyango kahulumeni kazwelonke kanye neHhovisi likaMongameli ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuthi uhulumeni uyaphendula ngemisebenzi yakhe..     Ngenkathi kwethulwa amaVoti Esabelomali, yonke iminyango ichaza kabanzi ngezinhlelo zayo kanye nezinto ezibekwe eqhulwini ezizokwenziwa kulo nyaka.

src_text: Khabinethe khou ita khuwelelo kha vhadzulapo vhoṱhe ya uri vha thetshelese Vouthu dza Mugaganyagwama nga mihasho ya muvhuso ya lushaka na Ofisi ya Phresidennde itela uri vha kone hwesa muvhuso vhuḓifhinduleli..     Nga tshifhinga tsha Vouthu dza Mugaganyagwama, mihasho yoṱhe ṋetshedza zwidodombedzwa nga vhuḓalo zwa puḽane na zwipikwa zwayo zwa ṅwaha.
tgt_text: Amavoti Esabelomali kuhloswe ngawo ukuqinisekisa ukuthi izimali zikahulumeni zisetshenziswa ngobunyoninco ekuhlangabezaneni nezidingo zomphakathi..     Ahlinzeka futhi ngesigcawu esihle kakhulu sokuba oNgqongqoshe bakwazi ukuchaza kabanzi ngomsebenzi kahulumeni, kubandakanya izimpumelelo kanye nezinselele..     Iqhingasu Lokuqaliswa Kokukhishwa  Kwesibaseli Esiyigesi Ewuketshezi (i-LPG) .

src_text: Hedzi Vouthu dza Mugaganyagwama ndi dzine dza lingedza vhona uri masheleni muvhuso khou shumiswa zwavhuḓi itela swikela ṱhoḓea dza vhadzulapo..     Dzi dovha hafhu dza ṋea tshikhala tsho teaho kha Dziminisṱa uri vha kone dodombedza nga vhuḓalo mushumo wa muvhuso, hu tshi katela na mvelaphanḓa yo swikelwaho khathihi na khaedu dzine dza vha hone..     Puḽane ya ṋetshedzwa ha Gese ya Peṱiroḽiamu yo Luḓifhadzwaho (LPG).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liligunyazile iQhingasu Lokukhishwa kwe-LPG ukuze liqale ukusebenza,  okuyiqhingasu elashicilelwa ngoNdasa 2022 ukuze kuboniswane nomphakathi ngalo.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Puḽane ya ṋetshedzwa ha LPG  ye ya anḓadzwa itela vhukwamani na tshitshavha nga ṅwedzi wa Ṱhafamuhwe 2022 uri thome shumiswa.
tgt_text: Leli qhingasu lihlose ukwelula nokunweba imboni ye-LPG ezweni.

src_text: Puḽane iyi ndi ine ya khou lingedza alusa nḓowetshumo iyi ya LPG kha shango.
tgt_text: I-LPG izolekelela kakhulu ekuqinisekiseni ukusetshenziswa kwemithombo yamandla ehlukahlukene.

src_text: LPG ḓo shela mulenzhe zwihulwane kha vha hone ha zwiko zwo fhambanaho zwa fulufulu..     Puḽane iyi, vhukati ha maṅwe maga u lugisa zwithu ḓo langa mitengo kha nḓowetshumo yoṱhe khathihi na tikedza vhubveledzi ha maboḓelo LPG kha shango ḓo dovha hafhu ya gudisa vhadzulapo nga ha mbuelo dza shumisa LPG sa luṅwe lushaka lwa fulufulu ḓo wanala nga murahu ha musi yo no anḓadzwa nga Muhasho wa Zwiko zwa Minerala na Fulufulu kha www.dmr.gov.za.
Muhanga wa Maano Lushaka nga ha Mafulo U tsivhudza Vhathu nga ha Pfanelo dza  Vhuholefhali hu tshi itelwa Vhathu vha re na Vhuholefhali.
tgt_text: Phakathi kwezinye izinhlelo zokungenelela, leli qhingasu lizolawula amanani entengo emsebenzini wonkana wokukhiqizwa kwegesi ewuketshezi futhi leseke nomsebenzi wokukhiqizwa kwamasilinda e-LPG ezweni.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Muhanga wa Maano Lushaka nga ha Mafulo U tsivhudza Vhathu nga ha Pfanelo dza Vhuholefhali hu tshi itelwa Vhathu vha re na Vhuholefhali.
tgt_text: Futhi lizofundisa umphakathi ngemihlomulo yokusebenzisa i-LPG njengolunye uhlobo lwamandla olwehlukile olungasetshenziswa..     Abantu bazokwazi ukufinyelela kulona emuva kokuba selishicileliwe nguMnyango Wezimbiwa Namandla ku-www.dmr.gov.za.

src_text: Muhanga uyu ndi une wa khou lingedza eletshedza sekhithara dzoṱhe ya muvhuso na ya phuraivethe kha vhona uri pfanelo dza vhathu vha re na vhuholefhali dzi khou tsireledzwa, sa zwe zwa sumbedziswa kha Mulayotewa wa Riphabuḽiki ya Afrika Tshipembe wa.
tgt_text: Uhlaka Lwamasu Lukazwelonke olumayelana Nemikhankaso Yokuqwashisa Ngamalungelo Abantu Abanokukhubazeka.
IKhabhinethi lilugunyazile uHlaka Lwamasu Lukazwelonke olumayelana Nemikhankaso Yokuqwashisa Ngamalungelo Abantu Abanokukhubazeka.

src_text: Muhanga uyu dovha hafhu wa ṋetshedza tshishumiswa tshine tsha ḓo thusa kha fheliswa ha zwikonḓisi zwa khethululo kha zwa dzhia tsheo, nga maanḓa idzo dzine dza elana na vhathu vha re na vhuholefhali dovha hafhu wa eletshedza vhathu vha re na vhuholefhali uri vha ḓivhe nga ha pfanelo dzavho sa zwe dza tsireledzwa nga Mulayotewa.
tgt_text: Uhlaka luhlose ukuhola nokuqondisa umkhakha ozimele ngokunjalo futhi nomkhakha kahulumeni ekuqinisekiseni ukuthi avikelekile amalungelo abantu abanokukhubazeka, njengoba lokhu kubekwe ngokucacile kuMthethosisekelo weRiphabhulikhi yaseNingizimu Afrika wonyaka we-.

src_text: Muhanga uyu dovha hafhu wa ṋetshedza vhupfumbudzi, mivhigo kha nyanḓadzamafhungo khathihi na tsivhudza vhathu tshitshavhani nga ha pfanelo dza vhathu vha re na vhuholefhali dovha wa ita uri Nḓivhadzamulayotibe ya nga ha Pfanelo dza Vhathu vha re na Vhuholefhali thome shuma.

Shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe na ḽone ndi ḽiṅwe ḽa mashango sainaho idzi Thendelano dza Mbumbano ya Dzitshaka (UN) dza nga ha Pfanelo dza Vhathu vha re na Vhuholefhali khathihi na Maitele UN kha Thendelanomviswa ya Afrika ya nga ha Pfanelo dza Vhuthu na Pfanelo dza Vhathu dza nga ha Pfanelo dza Vhathu vha re na Vhuholefhali (Maitele Pfanelo dza Vhuholefhali Afrika).
tgt_text: Uhlaka luhlinzeka ngeqoqwana lamathuluzi azolekelela ekususeni imigoqo ebandlululayo ekuthathweni kwezinqumo, ikakhulukazi lezo eziphathelene nabantu abanokukhubazeka.

src_text: Muhanga uyu wo vha hone nga murahu ha vhukwamani na vhathu vhoṱhe vha kwameaho, hu tshi katelwa na vha Khoro ya Mveledziso ya Ikonomi na Mafhungo zwa Vhashumi ya Lushaka.
tgt_text: Futhi luqwashisa abantu abanokukhubazeka ukuthi bawazi amalungelo abo njengoba evikelwe nguMthethosisekelo.

src_text: Muṱangano wa Ndaulo ya Mavu na Vhuṋe ha Mavu kha Vhupo ha Nnyi na nnyi.
tgt_text: Uhlaka luhlinzeka futhi ngokuqeqeshwa,  imibiko yabezindaba kanye nokuqwashisa emphakathini mayelana namalungelo abantu abanokukhubazeka.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza farwa ha Muṱangano wa Ndaulo ya Mavu na Vhuṋe ha Mavu kha Vhupo Nnyi na nnyi nga Ḽavhuṱanu, ḽa 27 na Mugivhela, wa ḽa 28 Shundunthule 2022 kha ḽa Gauteng.
tgt_text: Uhlaka luqalisa ukusebenza koMthetho Odingidwayo omayelana Nabantu Abanokukhubazeka.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Muvhigo wa Tsheo dza nga ha Ndaulo ya Mavu na Vhuṋe ha Mavu kha Vhupo ha Mavu Nnyi na nnyi nga ṅwedzi wa Ṱhafamuhwe.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika ingelinye lamazwe asayina iSivumelwano seNhlangano Yezizwe (i-UN) esiqondene Namalungelo Abantu Abanokukhubazeka kanye Nesivumelwano se-UN soMqulu wase-Afrika Wamalungelo Esintu kanye Namalungelo Abantu esiqondene Namalungelo Abantu Abanokukhubazeka (Isivumelwano Samalungelo Abantu Abanokukhubazeka base-Afrika).

src_text: Yo ṋea ndaela ya uri hu dovhe hu vhe na vhuṅwe vhukwamani hafhu na vhaṅwe vhathu vhoṱhe vha kwameaho.
tgt_text: Uhlaka kwaboniswana ngalo nabo bonke ababambiqhaza abafanelekile, kubandakanya noMkhandlu Kazwelonke Wokuthuthukiswa Komnotho Nabasebenzi.

src_text: Muṱangano uyu ḓo vha wone maṱhakheni  mushumo we wa itwa ṅwaha wo fhiraho, we wa ita khumbelo ya mahumbulwa bva kha vhathu vhoṱhe vha kwameaho vho fhambanaho     Vhuṱambo vhune ha khou ḓa.
tgt_text: INgqungquthela Yezokuphathwa Komhlaba kanye Namalungelo Obunikazi Nokusetshenziswa Komhlaba Ezindaweni Lapho Abantu Besebenzisa Khona Umhlaba Ngokuhlanganyela.

src_text: Muṱangano wa Ḽifhasi wa Vhuṱanu wa nga ha fhelisa zwa tholwa ha Vhana.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likugunyazile ukusingathwa kweNgqungquthela Yezokuphathwa Komhlaba kanye Namalungelo Obunikazi Nokusetshenziswa Komhlaba Ezindaweni Lapho Abantu Besebenzisa Khona Umhlaba Ngokuhlanganyela ngoLwesihlanu mhla zingama-27 kanye noMgqibelo mhla zingama-28 kuNhlaba 2022 e-Gauteng.

src_text: Afrika Tshipembe ndi ḽone ḽine ha ḓo farelwa Muṱangano wa Ḽifhasi ya Vhuṱanu wa nga ha fhelisa zwa tholwa ha Vhana fhaḽa Durban International Convention Centre kha ḽa KwaZulu-Natal bva nga Swondaha, ya ḽa 15 swika Ḽavhuṱanu, ḽa 20 Shundunthule.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lasemukela ngokusemthethweni ngoNdasa 2021 iSitatimende Esichaza Ngokucacileyo Umbono-simo Kahulumeni maqondana Nokuphathwa Komhlaba kanye Namalungelo Obunikazi Nokusetshenziswa Komhlaba Ezindaweni Lapho Abantu Besebenzisa Khona Umhlaba Ngokuhlanganyela.

src_text: Ndi lwa tou thoma musi Dzangano ḽa zwa Vhashumi ḽa Dzitshaka (ILO) ḽi tshi farela muṱangano uyu fhano kha ḽa Afrika.
tgt_text: Liyalele ukuthi kubanjwe ezinye izigcawu zokubonisana nabo bonke ababambiqhaza abafanelekile.

src_text: Vharangaphanḓa vha mashango, dziminisṱa vha swikaho 120, vhuimeli ha masia mararu ha mashango ane vha miraḓo ya ILO swikaho 187, mazhendedzi UN, zwiimiswa zwa pfunzo, madzangano vhadzulapo, madzangano ane sa vhe muvhuso, nyanḓadzamafhungo khathihi na vhadzulapo vha khou lavhelelwa vha hone kha muṱangano uyu.
tgt_text: Ingqungquthela izoba yisigcawu sokusonga nokuphothula umsebenzi osuwenziwe kusukela ngonyaka odlule kuze kube manje, lapho bekunxenxwa khona imibono evela kubabambiqhaza abahlukahlukene     Imicimbi Ezayo.

src_text: Vhuṱambo uvhu vhu ḓo dovha hafhu ha ṋea  Afrika Tshipembe tshikhala tsha bvisela khagala Mulayotewa wa shango sa izwi tshi tsireledza pfanelo dza vhana.
tgt_text: INgqungquthela Yesihlanu Yomhlaba Wonke Mayelana Nokuqedwa Kokusetshenziswa Kwezingane.

src_text: Shango ḽi ḓo dovha hafhu ḽa davhidzana na mashango fhambanaho ane no vha phanḓa fhirisa riṋe kha fhelisa zwa tholwa ha vhana hu itela uri ri kone vha na zwine ra nga guda bva kha mashango ayo.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika izosingatha iNgqungquthela Yesihlanu Yomhlaba Wonke Mayelana Nokuqedwa Kokusetshenziswa Kwezingane e-Durban International Convention Centre, KwaZulu-Natali, kusukela ngeSonto mhla ziyi-15 kuze kube nguLwesihlanu mhla zingama-20 kuNhlaba.

src_text: Imbizo ya Phresidennde ya Ḽiedza ḽa Mveledziso ya Tshiṱiriki (DDM).
tgt_text: Kuzobe kungokokuqala ngqa ukuthi iNhlangano Yezabasebenzi Yamazwe Ngamazwe (i-ILO) isingathe le ngqungquthela ezwekazini lase-Afrika..     Izinhloko zemibuso, ongqongqoshe abayi-120, umbimbi olumkhakha-mithathu lwamazwe ayi-187 angamalungu e-ILO, izikhungo ze-UN, izikhungo zezemfundo, izinhlangano zezinhlaka zomphakathi wonkana, izinhlangano ezingekho ngaphansi kukahulumeni, abezindaba kanye namaqembu omphakathi kulindeleke ukuthi bayethamele le ngqungquthela.

src_text: Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa vha ḓo fara Imbizo ya Phresidennde ya DDM ngei Mpumalanga nga Ḽavhuṱanu, ḽa 20 Shundunthule 2022 nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “A hu na ane tea sala murahu”.
tgt_text: Ingqungquthela izonikeza futhi iNingizimu Afrika ithuba lokuveza nokubonakalisa uMthethosisekelo wezwe njengoba uwavikela amalungelo ezingane.

src_text: Sa tshikhala tsha ndeme tsha shela mulenzhe ha vhadzulapo, Imbizo iyi ṋea tshikhala Phresidennde tsha amba na vhathu vhoṱhe vha kwameaho nga fhambana havho vho tou livhana navho, nga maanḓa zwitshavha zwa mahayani, khathihi na thetshelesa thaidzo dzavho na khaedu dzine vha vha nadzo itela uri dzi kone tandululwa.
tgt_text: Leli lizwe lizoxhumana futhi libonisane namazwe ahlukahlukene asekhathule indima ebanzi kakhulu kuneyethu ekuqedeni ukusetshenziswa kwezingane futhi lifunde kulawo mazwe..     Imbizo kaMongameli eqondene Nohlelo Lokuthuthukiswa Kwezifunda (i-DDM).

src_text: Imbizo ya Phresidennde ya DDM yo livhiswa kha vula zwikhukhulisi zwa nḓisedzo ya tshumelo yo ṱanganelaho khathihi na ṱuṱuwedza zwa shela mulenzhe ha vhadzulapo ya nga DDM.
tgt_text: UMongameli u-Ramaphosa uzobamba Imbizo kaMongameli eqondene ne-DDM eMpumalanga ngoLwesihlanu mhla zingama-20 kuNhlaba 2022 ngaphansi kwesiqubulo esithi: “Ungashiyi muntu ngemuva”.

src_text: MaAfrika Tshipembe vha nga tevhela na shela mulenzhe kha nyambedzano dza kha nyanḓadzamafhungo dza matshilisano nga fhasi ha hashtag #PresidentialImbizo.
tgt_text: Njengesigcawu esimqoka sokubamba iqhaza komphakathi, Imbizo izonikeza uMongameli ithuba lokuxhumana ngqo nababambiqhaza abahlukahlukene – ikakhulukazi imiphakathi yezindawo zasemakhaya – futhi uzolalela izinkinga nezinselele zabo ngenhloso yokuzixazulula.

src_text: Ṅwedzi wa Afrika.
tgt_text: Imbizo kaMongameli eqondene ne-DDM ihlose ukususa izithiyo ezivimbela ukuhlinzekwa kwezidingo-ngqangi ngendlela edidiyelwe futhi igqugquzele ukubamba iqhaza komphakathi ngokuhambisana ne-DDM.

src_text: Vhuṱambo ha tshihumbudzo tsha ṅwaha nga ṅwaha ha Ṅwedzi wa Afrika na Ḓuvha ḽa Afrika nga Ḽavhuraru, ḽa 25 Shundunthule vhu khou pembelelwa nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “Ṅwaha wa Pfushi khwaṱhisedza zwa konḓelela kha zwa pfushi na nḓisedzo ya zwiḽiwa na kha dzhango ḽa Afrika”..     Sa tshipiḓa tsha bono ḽa tshifhinga tshilapfu ḽe ḽa sumbedziswa kha Adzhenda ya 2063 (ine ya vha pulane ya mveledziso ya Afrika hu tshi itelwa swikela mveledziso ya ikonomi na matshilisano ine ya nga vha ya tshifhinga tshilapfu nahone katelaho vhathu vhoṱhe lwa miṅwaha fhiraho 50), thero iyi sedzesa kha vhukoni ha vhathu vha Afrika, nga maanḓa ho sedzeswa kha vhafumakadzi, vhatukana na vhasidzana khathihi na vhana.
tgt_text: Abantu baseNingizimu Afrika bangakulandela okuqhubekayo ezingxoxweni futhi babambe iqhaza kuzona ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ngaphansi kwe-hashtag ethi #PresidentialImbizo.

src_text: Hezwi ndi zwa ndeme kha mveledziso sa zwi zwi tshi livhisa kha khwinifhadzea ha matshilo vhathu, mbuelo dza nṱha na miholo yo khwinifhadzeaho ya mashango.
tgt_text: Inyanga ye-Afrika.

src_text: Tsha ndeme khulu nahone tshi vhonalesaho kha mabembela aya Ṅwedzi wa Afrika, ndi Vhege ya Vhudavhidzani ya Afrika, ine ya ḓo farelwa fhaḽa Constitutional Hill kha ḽa Johannesburg bva nga ḽa 23 swika ḽa 27 Shundunthule.
tgt_text: Umbungazo waminyaka yonke weNyanga ye-Afrika kanye noSuku lwe-Afrika oluzoba ngoLwesithathu mhla zingama-25 kuNhlaba uzogujwa ngaphansi kwesiqubulo esithi: “Unyaka Wokudla Okunomsoco: Siqinisa ikhono namandla okuzibamba ziqine ekuhlinzekeni ukudla okunomsoco kanye nokuqinisekisa ukutholakala kokudla okwanele ezwekazini lase-Afrika”.

Njengengxenye yenhloso-mbono yesikhathi eside ebekwe ngokucacileyo ku-Ajenda 2063 (ewumhlahlandlela wokuthuthukiswa kwe-Afrika ukuze izuze intutuko yenhlalo-mnotho ebandakanyayo futhi esimeme eminyakeni engama-50), isiqubulo sigxile kulokho abantu base-Afrika abangaba namandla okukufezekisa, ngokugcizelela ikakhulukazi kubantu besifazane, amabhungu namatshitshi kanye nezingane.

src_text: Ṅwedzi wa Afrika ndi tshikhala tsha ṱuṱuwedza vhuthihi ha Afrika khathihi na ṱhanganelo ya dzingu yo khwaṱhaho hu tshi katelwa na kumedzela hafhu Afrika kha vhuyo vhu fanaho.
tgt_text: Lokhu kuyinto esemqoka kakhulu ekuletheni intuthuko njengoba kuholela ekutheni abantu baphile impilo engcono futhi amazwe nawo athole ingenisomali ephakeme futhi engcono.

src_text: Khabinethe khou humbudza muthu muṅwe na muṅwe uri madzangalelo ashu lushaka ṱumana tshoṱhe na vhudziki ha Afrika, vhuthihi na mvelaphanḓa     Milaedza.
tgt_text: Umcimbi ophawulekayo nogqamile kule migubho yeNyanga ye-Afrika nguMcimbi WeViki Lezokuxhumana lase-Afrika, ozobanjelwa e-Constitutional Hill eGoli kusukela mhla zingama-23 kuze kube ngumhla zingama-27 kuNhlaba.

src_text: Ndiliso     Khabinethe yo livhisa maipfi ndiliso kha vha muṱa na dzikhonani dza: Mufumakadzi Vho Phindile Xaba (53), vhe vha shuma tshifhinga tshilapfu kha nḓowetshumo ya zwa nyanḓadzamafhungo fhano Afrika Tshipembe na kha mashango seli.
Vho shuma vha sa neti vha tshi itela khwinifhadza shango ḽashu.
tgt_text: Inyanga ye-Afrika iyithuba lokugqugquzela ubunye nobumbano e-Afrika kanye nokudidiyelwa kwesifunda ngokujulile, kanye nokubophezela i-Afrika kabusha ekushabashekeleni impokophelo efanayo.

src_text: Muambasada Vho Silumko Sokupa (74), vhe vha shuma kha Zhendedzi ḽa Vhutsireledzi ha Muvhuso kha maimo fhambanaho nga tshifhinga tshilapfu tsha musi vha tshi khou shuma kha Tshumelo ya Muvhuso.Phrofesa Vho Francis Wilson (83), raikonomi ḓivheaho na mutumbuli wa Yunithi ya Ṱhoḓisiso dza Mveledziso na zwa Vhashumi ya Tshipembe ha Afrika  tholwa tholwa hoṱhe hu fhira nga fhasi ha khwaṱhisedzo ya ndalukano na ṱanzwiwa dzina ho teaho.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likhumbuza wonke umuntu ukuthi izidingo nezintshisekelo zethu njengezwe zixhumene kakhulu nozinzo, ubumbano kanye nokuphumelela kwe-Afrika     Imiyalezo.

src_text: Dokotela Vho Kesavan Naidoo sa Tshanḓa tsha Mulangi Muhulwane (DDG): Mveledziso ya Tshiimiswa kha Muhasho wa Tshumisano ya Mavhusele (DCoG).
tgt_text: Amazwi enduduzo IKhabhinethi lidlulise amazwi enduduzo emindenini nabangani balaba abalandelayo: UNks Phindile Xaba (53), osebenze embonini yabezindaba isikhathi eside futhi lapho ezuze khona impumelelo enkulu, lapha ekhaya eNingizimu Afrika ngokunjalo futhi nasemazweni angaphandle.

src_text: Vho Siphosihle Emmanuel Hlomuka sa DDG: Thikhedzo ya Muvhuso Wapo na Ndangulo ya Thusedzo kha DCoG..     Vho Risimati Patrick Mathye sa DDG: Ndangulo ya zwa Maḓi Tshumelo dza Vhuthathazwitzhili kha Muhasho wa Maḓi na Vhuthathazwitzhili (DWS)..     Vho Collin Xolani Zwane sa DDG: Milayo, Vhutevhedza Milayo na Vhukombetshedzi kha DWS.
tgt_text: Usebenze ngokuzikhandla okukhulu ukwenza ngcono izwe lethu.

src_text: Vho Melanchton Makobe sa DDG: Khwaṱhisedzo ya Mavhusele na Mashumele  SOC kha Muhasho wa Mabindu Muvhuso     Khabinethe yo tendelana na Dziminisṱa nga ha tholwa hu tevhelaho:.
tgt_text: Inxusa uSilumko Sokupa (74), osebenzele uPhiko Lwezokuvikeleka Kombuso isikhathi eside futhi lapho enze khona umsebenzi oncomekayo impela ezikhundleni ezahlukahlukene aziphathile emkhakheni Wezemisebenzi Kahulumeni.USlz Francis Wilson (83), owabe eyisazi sezomnotho esihlonishwayo futhi engumsunguli wophiko lwezocwaningo i-Southern Africa Labour and Development Research Unit     Abaqashiwe Bonke abaqashiwe kumele kuqinisekiswe iziqu zabo futhi bahlolwe ngokufanele.

src_text: Vho Bhekuyise Mathews Khenisa sa Muofisiri Muhulwane wa Khorondangi (CEO) wa Zhendedzi ḽa Mveledziso ya zwa Dzinnḓu (HDA).
tgt_text: UDkt Kesavan Naidoo oqashwe njengoMqondisi-Jikelele (u-DDG): Wezokuthuthukiswa Kwesikhungo eMnyangweni Wezokubusa Ngokubambisana (i-DCoG).

src_text: Mufumakadzi Vho Joy Keledi Masemola sa Muofisiri Muhulwane wa  zwa Masheleni  kha HDA..     Dokotela Vho Cornelius Ruiters sa CEO ya Lepelle Northern Water.
tgt_text: UMnu Siphosihle Emmanuel Hlomuka oqashwe njengo-DDG: Wezokuphathwa Kwezinhlelo Zokweseka Nokungenelela Kohulumeni Basekhaya e-DCoG..     UMnu Risimati Patrick Mathye oqashwe njengo-DDG: Wezokuphathwa Kwezinsizakalo Zamanzi Nokuthuthwa Kwendle eMnyangweni Wezamanzi Nokuthuthwa Kwendle (i-DWS)..     UMnu Collin Xolani Zwane oqashwe njengo-DDG: Wezokulawula, Ukulandelwa Kwemithethonqubo Ebekiwe kanye Nokuphoqelela Ukuthotshelwa Kwayo e-DWS.

src_text: Ndingedzo dza vhuedzedza na dovha fhaṱa hafhu nga huswa nga murahu ha miḓalo .
tgt_text: Imizamo yokutakula nokukhuculula kanye nokwakha kabusha ngemuva kokuhlasela kwezikhukhula.

src_text: Khabinethe yo khoḓa na livhuwa vhathu vhoṱhe khathihi na madzangano ane khou ḓidzhenisa kha ndingedzo dza vhuedzedza na fhaṱa hafhu nga huswa nga murahu ha miḓalo ya zwenezwino ye ya vhanga tshinyalelo khulwane kha zwiṅwe zwipiḓa zwa shango, nga maanḓa ngei KwaZulu-Natal.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi izwakalise amazwi ayo okutusa kanye nokubonga kubo bonke abantu kanye nezinhlangano ezibandakanyekayo emizamweni yokutakula nokukhuculula kanye nokwakha kabusha kulandela ukuhlasela kwezikhukhula ezishiye kukhalwa kwezinye izingxenye zezwe, ikakhulukazi KwaZulu-Natali.

src_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya livhuwa madzangano oṱhe ane si vhe muvhuso, madzangano zwa vhurereli, vhadzulapo, vhoramabindu khathihi na madzangano ṱhaḓulo kha zwiimo zwi sa takadzi a ṋetshedza zwiḽiwa, zwiambaro, mabai, zwishumiswa zwa vhathu vha tshifumakadzi na yunifomo ya tshikolo kha miṱa yo kwameaho uri vha kone swikela ṱhoḓea dzavho dza nga misi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ibonge zonke izinhlangano ezingekho ngaphansi kukahulumeni, izinhlangano zamabandla ezenkolo, imiphakathi, osomabhizinisi kanye nezinhlangano zosizo ezihlinzeke ngokudla, izingubo zokugqoka, izingubo zokulala, izinsiza/izimpahla zokubuyisa isithunzi kanye nemifaniswano yesikole emindenini ehlwempu ukuze ikwazi ukuhlangabezana nezidingongqangi zayo.

Isikhungo Sikazwelonke Sokuphathwa Kwenhlekelele siyaqhubeka nokudidiyela zonke izinhlaka zikahulumeni emizamweni yaso yokuhlinzeka ngezinsiza ezikhombisa isihe nobubele kubantu kuyona yonke imizi ekhahlamezekile.

src_text: Senthara ya Ndangulo ya Zwiwo ya Lushaka khou bvela phanḓa na ṱanganya masia oṱhe muvhuso kha ndingedzo dzayo dza ṋetshedza thuso ya ṱhaḓulo ya zwa vhuthu kha miṱa yoṱhe yo kwameaho.
tgt_text: Izinsizakalo zokukhoselisa abantu zihlinzekiwe kubantu abangaphezu kwezi-7 000 kwizifunda okuyizona ezikhahlamezeke kakhulu KwaZulu-Natali..     Umsebenzi usuqalile maqondana nokwakhiwa kwezindawo zokuhlala zesikhashana zemindeni ekhahlamezekile ezindaweni zokwakha eziphethwe nguhulumeni ezihlonzwe KwaZulu-Natali ukuze abantu bakwazi ukuthuthelwa kuzona beyohlaliswa kabusha.

src_text: Tshumelo dza zwa vhudzulo dzi khou ṋetshedzwa kha vhathu vha fhiraho 7 000 kha zwiṱiriki zwiṋa zwo kwameseaho ngei KwaZulu-Natal..     Mushumo kati wa fhaṱa vhudzulo ha tshifhinganyana hu tshi itelwa miṱa yo kwameaho kha mavu ane vha muvhuso a ḓo wanala fhaḽa kha ḽa KwaZulu-Natal ane vhathu avho vha ḓo pfulutshela khao.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuqinisekisile ukuzibophezela kukahulumeni ekuphatheni izimali zokusiza nokutakula abakhahlanyezwe yizikhukhula ngobuhlakani nobuyoninco kanjalo nokusebenzela obala.

src_text: Khabinethe yo khwaṱhisedza vhuḓiimiseli ha muvhuso kha langa masheleni ṱhaḓulo ya tshiwo itshi tsha miḓalo nga nḓila ya fulufhedzea nahone re khagala.
tgt_text: UMcwaningimabhuku Jikelele waseNingizimu Afrika uhlinzeka ngensizakalo yokuqapha ngeso lokhozi eyengeziwe futhi ukubekwa kabusha eqhulwini kwezimali kuyahambelana nohlelo lukahulumeni lokwabiwa kwezimali..     Ezakamuva ngeSifo Segciwane le-Corona (i-COVID-19).

src_text: Muṱolambalelano wa Afrika Tshipembe vha khou ṋetshedza tshumelo dza vhulavhelesi dza ḓadzisa kha idzo dzi re hone nahone uhu kovhelwa hafhu ha masheleni ndi hune ha khou elana na sisṱeme ya muvhuso ya dzudzanya mugaganyagwama.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi inxuse bonke abantu abaseNingizimu Afrika ukuba bathathe izinyathelo zokuzivikela ukuze kunqandwe ukusabalala kwe-COVID-19 ngemuva kokuba izibalo zakamuva nje zibonise ukwenyuka okukhulu esilinganisweni sokuthelelana ngesifo kanye nokugula okuhlobene nesikhathi sasebusika lapha ezweni..     IKhabhinethi ikhumbuze bonke abantu ukuba baqhubeke nokuzigada bona uqobo kanye nabanye abantu ngokuhlanza njalo izandla noma ukusebenzisa isibulali-magciwane ezandleni zethu, ukugqoka isifonyo uma usendaweni evalelekile, ukugcina ibanga lokuqhelelana eliphephile, ukuvula amawindi ukuze kungene umoya kanye nokugoma..     Ukugoma kusalokhu kungukuzivikela okungungqa-phambili ukulwisana ne-COVID-19 njengoba kuvimbela ukugula okubi kakhulu, ukulaliswa esibhedlela ngisho nokufa imbala.
Awudingi ukuthi ube nekheli lasekhaya ukuze ugome.

src_text: Maswa nga ha Dwadze ḽa Khoronavairasi (COVID-19).
tgt_text: Noma ubani, onomazisi noma ongenawo umazisi, angagoma mahhala kuzona zonke izikhungo zokugoma zikahulumeni ezweni lonkana.

src_text: Khabinethe khou ṱuṱuwedza vhathu vhoṱhe vha fhano Afrika Tshipembe uri vha dzhie maga tsireledzo itela thivhela phaḓalala ha COVID-19 nga murahu ha mbalombalo dza zwenezwino dze dza sumbedza uri ho vha na engedzea vhukuma ha tshivhalo tsha kavhiwa nga malwadze ane vha na vhushaka na khalaṅwaha ya vhuriha fhano shangoni..     Khabinethe yo humbudza vhathu vhoṱhe uri vha bvele phanḓa na ḓitsireledza khathihi na vhaṅwe vhathu nga ṱamba zwanḓa kana zwi sanithaiza misi yoṱhe ambara maski musi nga ngomu ha tshifhaṱo sia tshikhala tsho tsireledzeaho vhukati hau na muṅwe muthu vula mafasiṱere itela uri hu dzhene muya khathihi na haelwa.
tgt_text: Nqanda ukucwasana ngokwebala!.

src_text: Muhaelo kha ḓi vha yone philelo ya khwinesa kha dwadze ḽa COVID-19 sa izwi tshi thivhela lwalesa valelwa vhuongeloni kana lufu vha tei thoma vha vha na ḓiresi ya vhudzulo uri vha kone haelwa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi izihlaba zonke izenzo zokucwasa ngokwebala ezweni, kubandakanya nezigameko ezibikiwe esikoleni i-Good Hope Seminary High School kanye naseNyuvesi yase-Stellenbosch eNtshonalanga Kapa.

src_text: Muthu muṅwe na muṅwe nga vha na ḽiṅwalo ḽa vhuṋe kana si na nga haelwa mahala kha vhupo vhuṅwe na vhuṅwe ha muhaelo ha nnyi na nnyi mona na shango ḽoṱhe.
tgt_text: Lezi zenzo ezithunazayo zilwisana namagugu esawathola ngokomthethosisekelo nokuyiwona esathola ngawo izwe lethu elibuswa ngentando yeningi labantu, abandakanya ukuhloniswa kwesithunzi somuntu, ukungacwasani ngokwebala, ukungacwasani ngokobulili, ubulungiswa bezenhlalakahle, ukulingana kanye nenhlonipho..     UMthethosisekelo weRiphabhulikhi yaseNingizimu Afrika we-1996 ungumhlahlandlela wethu esiwusebenzisayo maqondana nokuqeda ukuhlukana okwenyanyekayo kanye nokungabikhona kobulungiswa kwesikhathi esedlule.

Abazali bayanxuswa ukuba bafundise izingane ukuba zikwenqabe ukucwasana ngokwebala kodwa zamukele ukubumbana yize sihlukahlukene, njengengxenye yomkhankaso wethu oqinile wokukhuthaza ukwakhiwa kwesizwe kanye nokubumbana komphakathi.

src_text: Kha vha fhelise khethululo nga lukanda!.
tgt_text: Asisebenzisaneni ukuze siveze obala ukucwasana ngokwebala noma yikuphi lapho kuthathwa khona njengosikompilo futhi sithumele umyalezo ocacile wokuthi asinayo indawo yokucwasana ngokwebala ezweni lethu elibuswa ngentando yeningi labantu..     Ubudlelwano phakathi kweNingizimu Afrika – kanye neJalimane.

src_text: Khabinethe khou sasaladza tshoṱhe zwiito zwoṱhe zwa khethululo nga lukanda fhano shangoni, hu tshi katelwa na zwiwo zwo vhigwaho fhaḽa Tshikoloni tsha Nṱha tsha Good Hope Seminary na fhaḽa Yunivesithi ya Stellenbosch ngei kha vunḓu ḽa Kapa Vhukovhela.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ilwamukelile Uhambo Olusemthethweni olube yimpumelelo lukaShansela weRiphabhulikhi Yamazwe aseJalimane (i-Federal Republic of Germany), uMhlonishwa u-Olaf Scholz, ehambele lapha eNingizimu Afrika ngoLwesibili, mhla zingama-24 kuNhlaba.

src_text: Hezwi zwiito zwo vhifhaho ngaurali zwi lwa na mikhwa ine ya vha hone kha ndayotewa ye shango ḽashu ḽa dimokirasi ḽa ḓitika khayo ine ya katela tshirunzi tsha vhuthu sa vha na khethululo nga lukanda sa khethulula nga mbeu, vhulamukanyi kha zwa matshilisano, ndinganelo na ṱhonifho.

tgt_text: Uhambo Olusemthethweni lukaShansela u-Scholz lwenziwe ngesimemo sikaMongameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa, okunguyena ohola umkhankaso kahulumeni wokuqinisa amaxhama obudlelwano obuhle nezifunda kanye namazwe omhlaba, kanye nokuheha utshalomali oludingeka kakhulu.

src_text: Ndayotewa ya Riphabuḽiki ya Afrika Tshipembe ya ṅwaha wa 1996 ndi yone ndededzi yashu musi ro livha kha fhelisa zwiito zwi vhavhaho zwa khethululana na tshayavhulamukanyi zwa tshifhingani tsho fhelaho.
tgt_text: Laba baholi ababili badingide, phakathi kokunye, izindlela zokuthuthukisa ukusebenzisana emikhakheni enjengamandla kagesi kanye nokushintsha kwesimo sezulu, ukuhwebelana kanye notshalomali, kanye nokusabela kwi-COVID-19 kanye nesidingo esikhulu somgomo.

src_text: Vhabebi vha khou ṱuṱuwedzwa gudisa vhana vhavho uri vha hanedzane na zwiito zwa khethululo nga lukanda na ṱanganedza zwa fhambana ha vhathu ya nga mvelele dzavho, sa tshipiḓa tsha ndingedzo dzashu dzo khwaṱhaho dza lingedza ṱuṱuwedza zwa fhaṱa lushaka na vhuthihi..     Kha ri shumisane, ri bvisele khagala zwiito zwa khethululo nga lukanda afho hune zwa dzhiiwa sa vhuḓifari ho teaho nahone ri dovhe hafhu ri rumele mulaedza re khagala wa uri zwiito zwa khethululo nga lukanda zwi na vhudzulo kha shango ḽashu ḽa demokirasi.
tgt_text: Baphinde badlinza kabanzi ngentuthuko ekhona ezwenikazi lase-Afrika kanye nasemazweni omhlaba, kubandakanya nengxabano ese-Ukraine kanye nemithelela yayo eminothweni yamazwe omhlaba kanjalo nokutholakala kokudla kanye namandla kagesi okwanele..     IJalimane ayiyena nje kuphela umlingani wesibili ngobukhulu wokuhwebelana neNingizimu Afrika, kodwa iphinde ibe yisizinda sesithathu esikhulukazi sabavakashi baphesheya kwezilwandle, umtshalimali omkhulu kakhulu kanye nomlingani kwezentuthuko..     Ingqungquthela Yesihlanu Yamazwe Omhlaba Wonke maqondana Nokuqedwa Kokusetshenziswa Kwezingane.

src_text: Vhushaka ha Afrika Tshipembe na shango ḽa Dzheremane.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamukelile ukusongwa ngempumelelo kweNgqungquthela Yesihlanu Yamazwe Omhlaba Wonke maqondana Nokuqedwa Kokusetshenziswa Kwezingane ebibanjelwe eThekwini kusukela mhla ziyi-15 kuya kumhla zingama-20 kuNhlaba.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Madalo Tshiofisi a tshimbila zwavhuḓi Mutshantseḽara wa Riphabuḽiki ya Muvhuso wa Feḓeraḽa wa shango ḽa Dzheremane, Muhulisei Vho Olaf Scholz, fhano kha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe nga Ḽavhuvhili, ḽa 24 Shundunthule.
tgt_text: Ababambiqhaza abavela emhlabeni wonkana bebehambele le ngqungquthela, ebibanjwe ngokubambisana neNhlangano Yabasebenzi Yamazwe Omhlaba..     Ngemuva kokudingida imikhuba emihle yokusebenza eqaliswe ukusetshenziswa amazwe ahlukahlukene kanye nokuhlonza amagebe kanye nezinyathelo ezisheshayo ezidingekayo ukuze kusheshiswe ukuqedwa kwakho kokubili ukusetshenziswa kwezingane kanye nokusebenza ngempoqo, babe sebamukela isiqubulo esithi ‘Durban Call to Action’ ukuze kubhekwane nalesi sihlava esesiyinsakavukela sokusetshenziswa kwezingane.
Ukusetshenziswa kwezingane kumele umphakathi omubi kakhulu futhi kuvulela izingane ezimweni eziyingozi.

src_text: Madalo Tshiofisi Mutshantseḽara Vho Scholz’s vha hone nga murahu ha thambo ya Phresidennde Vho Cyril Ramaphosa, vhane vha khou ranga phanḓa fulo ḽa muvhuso ḽa fhaṱa vhushaka havhuḓi ha dzingu na ha dzitshaka, hu tshi katelwa na kunga vhubindudzi vhune ha ṱoḓea vhukuma.
tgt_text: Kuhambelana nokuhlukumeza futhi kuvimbela izingane ukuba zithole imfundo kanye namanye amathuba okuzithuthukisa.

src_text: Zwiṅwe zwe vharangaphanḓa avha vhavhili vha amba nga hazwo ho vha nḓila dza khwaṱhisa tshumisano kha masia fanaho na fulufulu khathihi na tshanduko ya kilima, mbambadzo na vhubindudzi hu tshi katelwa na maga u lwa na COVID-19 khathihi na ṱhoḓea ya khaelo.
tgt_text: Yonke ingane eNingizimu Afrika inelungelo elingenakuphikwa lokuvikelwa emikhubeni yokusetshenziswa ngokuxhashazwa.

src_text: Vho dovha hafhu vha sedza na kha zwine zwa khou bvelela kha dzhango ḽa Afrika khathihi na ḽifhasi nga angaredza, hu tshi katelwa na khuḓano ya ngei Ukraine khathihi na masiandaitwa ayo kha ikonomi ya ḽifhasi na wanala ha zwiḽiwa na fulufulu..     Shango ḽa Dzheremane ḽi tou vha fhedzi muvhambadzelani wa vhuvhili muhulwanesa na ḽino ḽashu ḽa Afrika Tshipembe, ḽi dovha hafhu ḽa vha tshiko tsha vhuraru tshihulwanesa tsha vhaendelamashango vha bvaho seli ha malwanzhe, mubindudzi muhulwanesa na mushumisani kha zwa mveledziso..     Muṱangano wa Ḽifhasi wa vhuṱanu wa nga ha Fheliswa ha zwiito zwa dzhia Vhana sa Vhashumi.

Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza zwa khunyeledzwa zwavhuḓi ha Muṱangano wa Ḽifhasi wa Vhuṱanu wa nga ha Fheliswa ha zwiito zwa dzhia Vhana sa Vhashumi we wa farelwa fhaḽa ḓoroboni ya Durban nga ḽa 15 swika 20 Shundunthule.
tgt_text: Ilungelo lokuthola imfundo eyisisekelo libhaliwe kuMthethosisekelo wethu futhi ngokoMthetho Wezikole ZaseNingizimu Afrika, we-1996 (uMthetho wama-84 we-1996), “wonke umzali kufanele enze ukuthi wonke umfundi anesibopho phezu kwakhe aye esikoleni kusukela ngosuku lokuqala lwesikole lonyaka nokufanele lowo mfundi abe neminyaka eyisikhombisa kuze kube wusuku lokugcina lesikole lonyaka nokuyilapho lowo mfundi eyobe eseneminyaka eyi-15 ubudala noma esefunda iBanga lesishiyagalolunye, noma yikuphi okufika kuqala”..     NgokoMthetho Wezingane, wezi-2005 (uMthetho wama-38 wezi-2005), “akekho umuntu ongasebenzisa, athenge noma aqashe ingane enzela ukusetshenziswa kwezingane”     Izinqumo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Vhathu vhoṱhe vha kwameaho mona na ḽifhasi vho dzhenela muṱangano uyu we wa fariwa nga tshumisano na Dzangano ḽa Vhashumi ḽa Ḽifhasi.
tgt_text: Ukungena Esivumelwaneni Samazwe Omhlaba Sokuvikelwa Kwabo Bonke Abantu Ekunyamalaleni Ngempoqo (i-ICPPED) .
IKhabhinethi igunyaze ukwethulwa kwe-ICPPED ePhalamende ukuze kucutshungulwe ukungena kweNingizimu Afrika esivumelwaneni.

src_text: Nga murahu ha ambedzana nga ha maitele avhuḓi ane shumiswa nga mashango fhambanaho bvisela khagala vhuṱudzeṱudze vhune ha vha hone khathihi na maga tshihaḓu ane ṱoḓea itela ṱavhanyedzisa zwa fheliswa ha zwiito zwa shumiswa ha vhana na shumiswa nga nḓila ya khombekhombe, ho swika he ha ṱanganedzwa thendelano dze dza ḓivhiwa sa ‘Durban Call to Action’ hu tshi itelwa lwa na samba heḽi ḽa dzhiiwa ha vhana vha tshi itwa vhashumi.
tgt_text: Le sivumelwano siyisibopho emhlabeni wonke jikelele seNhlangano Yezizwe Ezihlangene (i-UN) esibhekana nokwephulwa kwamalungelo abantu ngokunyamalaliswa kwabantu ngempoqo..     Isivumelwano sichaza ukunyamalaliswa ngempoqo ukuthi kubandakanye ukuthunjwa, ukuboshwa, ukuvalelwa noma yiluphi uhlobo okungaholela ekutheni umenzi wobubi anqabe ukuvuma noma afihle imbala lapho kukhona khona umgilwa..     Uma sesamukelwe ukuba sifakwe emithethweni yethu, iNingizimu Afrika kuzolindeleka ukuba ibike njalo ngemuva kweminyaka emibili kwi-UN mayelana nokuthi isisebenzisa kanjani isivumelwane lesi.

src_text: Zwa dzhiiwa ha vhana vha itwa vhashumi ndi zwiito zwi vhavhaho vhukuma kha tshitshavha nahone zwi vhea vhana kha nyimele dza khombo vhukuma.
tgt_text: Isivumelwano sihlinzeka ngezinyathelo zokuvikeleka okumele amazwe angamalungu aso azisebenzise ukuvimbela ukunyamalaliswa ngempoqo kwabantu emazweni awo ngokwehlukana kwawo..     Umbiko Wezwe wesine weNingizimu Afrika maqondana Nokuvikelwa kanye Nokukhuthazwa Kwamalungelo Abantu.

src_text: Zwi dzhiiwa sa zwiito zwa tambudza nahone zwi khakhisa vhana uri vha si kone wana pfunzo khathihi na zwiṅwe zwikhala zwa aluwa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi igunyaze ukwethulwa koMbiko Wezwe wesine maqondana Nokuvikelwa kanye Nokukhuthazwa Kwamalungelo Abantu eMkhandlwini Wamalungelo Abantu Wenhlangano Yezizwe Ezinhlangene.

src_text: Ṅwana muṅwe na muṅwe fhano Afrika Tshipembe na pfanelo dzine ha tei dzhielwa dzone dza tsireledzwa kha zwiito zwa shumiswa nga nḓila ya tambudzwa.
tgt_text: Ithimba le-UN Lokubuyekezwa Komhlaba Jikelele Ngezikhathi Ezithile elibizwa ngokuthi yi-UN Universal Periodic Review lizowubuyekeza umbiko ekuhambeni kwesikhathi kulo nyaka.

Selokhu yaqala ukuba ngelinye lamazwe asayinayo kwiSivumelwano se-UN Samalungelo Abantu, iNingizimu Afrika isibuyekezwe amahlandla amathathu, nalapho ubuyekezo lokugcina lwenziwa ngoMandulo wezi-..     Umbiko uhlinzeka ngokwazisa kwakamuva maqondana nezincomo eziyi-187 ezavunywayo ohlelweni lokubuyekezwa lowezi-.

src_text: Pfanelo ya wana pfunzo ya mutheo hone kha Ndayotewa yashu nahone ya nga Mulayo wa Zwikolo zwa Afrika Tshipembe, wa ṅwaha wa 1996 (Mulayo 84 wa 1996), “mubebi muṅwe na muṅwe tea ita uri mugudi muṅwe na muṅwe ane vha nga fhasi ha ndango yawe dzhene tshikolo tou bva kha ḓuvha ḽa thoma ḽa tshikolo kha ṅwaha wonoyo une mugudi  khou fara miṅwaha ya sumbe ngaḽo vhuya swikela ḓuvha ḽa tshikolo ḽa fhedzisela kha ṅwaha wonoyo une mugudi uyo khou fara miṅwaha ya 15 kana gireidi ya vhuṱahe, kana zwenezwo zwine zwa ḓa thoma” ya nga Mulayo wa Vhana, wa ṅwaha wa 2005 (Mulayo 38 wa 2005), “a hu na muthu ane tea shumisa wana ṋetshedza kana thola ṅwana tshi itela mu shumisa sa mushumi”     Tsheo dza Khabinethe ṱanganedza Thendelano dza Dzitshaka dza nga ha Tsireledzwa ha Vhathu vhoṱhe kha zwiito zwa Ngalangadzwa ha vhathu nga Khombekhombe nga vha mazhendedzi zwa mulayo (ICPPED) .
tgt_text: Ukuphawula nezincomo kwathathwa kwimininingo eqinisekisiwe, ulwazi oluvela eminyangweni efanelekile, izikhungo ezasungulwa ngaphansi kweSahluko sesi-9 soMthethosisekelo kanye nezinhlangano zomphakathi ezifanelekile..     IKhabhinethi ijabule kakhulu ngenqubekelaphambili esiyenziwe ukuqalisa ukusetshenziswa kwezincomo kanye nangalezo zindawo ezisasetshenzwa.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza ṋetshedzwa ha ICPPED kha Phaḽamennde uri hu sedzwe fhungo ḽa ṱanganedza thendelano dzenedzo nga shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe.
tgt_text: Umbiko uzotholakala emphakathini uma usuwethuliwe kwi-UN ngoNcwaba wezi-.

src_text: Hedzi ndi thendelano dza Dzangano ḽa Mbumbano ya Dzitshaka (UN) dzine dza tou vha mbofho ya ḽifhasi ḽoṱhe dzi sedzaho kha zwa kandekanywa ha pfanelo dza vhuthu nga zwiito zwa ngalangadzwa ha vhathu nga nḓila ya khombekhombe nga vha mazhendedzi zwa mulayo.
tgt_text: Inqubomgomo Yokuphathwa Kwamanzi Asezimayini yowezi-.
IKhabhinethi igunyaze inqubomgomo Yokuphathwa Kwamanzi Asezimayini yowezi-2022 ukuba iqaliswe ukusebenza.

src_text: Thendelano dzi ṱalutshedza zwa ngalangala nga nḓila ya khombekhombe sa zwithu zwi katelaho thubiwa fariwa hoṋelwa tshiṱokisini hu si na senga kana nḓila iṅwe na iṅwe ine ya nga ita uri avho vhaiti vha zwiito zwenezwo vha hane ṱanganedza kana vha dzumbe fhethuvhupo hune zwipondwa zwenezwo zwa zwiito zwenezwo zwa vha hone..     Musi zwo no tendelwa uri zwi vhe tshipiḓa tsha milayo yashu, Afrika Tshipembe ḽi ḓo lavhelelwa ṋetshedza muvhigo nga murahu ha miṅwaha mivhili kha vha UN sumbedzaho uri ndi zwifhio zwine ḽa khou ita nga ha thendelano dzenedzo..     Muvhigo wa Shango wa vhuṋa wa Afrika Tshipembe wa zwa Tsireledzwa na Ṱuṱuwedzwa ha Pfanelo dza Vhuthu.
tgt_text: Inqubomgomo ihlinzeka ngezindlela zokuvikela kanye nokulondoloza ukusetshenziswa kwamanzi.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza ṋetshedzwa ha Muvhigo wa Shango wa vhuṋa wa zwa Tsireledzwa na Ṱuṱuwedzwa ha Pfanelo dza Vhuthu kha vha Khoro ya Pfanelo dza Vhuthu ya Dzangano ḽa Vhuthihi ha Dzitshaka.
tgt_text: Yenza kube khona ukuhambelana phakathi kwemisebenzi yezomnotho eyenziwa ezimayini kanye nesibopho sokuhlinzeka ngokusetshenziswa kwamanzi okusimeme ezweni.

src_text: Tsenguluso ya Ḽifhasi ya nga murahu ha Tshifhinga ya vha ha UN ḓo sengulusa muvhigo ngavhuya ṅwaha uno tou bva tshe ḽa saina Thendelano dza Pfanelo dza Vhuthu dza UN, Afrika Tshipembe ḽo no senguluswa luraru, he tsenguluso ya fhedzisela ya itwa nga ṅwedzi wa Khubvumedzi..     Muvhigo uyu sumbedza zwiswa nga ha themendelo dza 187 dzo ṱanganedzwaho bva kha mushumo wa sengulusa wa ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: Phakathi kokunye ukungenelela, inqubomgomo icacisa ngemisebenzi kanye nezibopho ezikhona ezinhlakeni zontathu zikahulumeni mayelana nezindaba zamanzi asezimayini.

src_text: Ho dzhiiwa makumedzwa bva kha data dzi fulufhedzeaho, mafhungo bva kha mihasho yo teaho, zwiimiswa zwi tikedzaho demokirasi na ndayotewa ya shango khathihi na madzangano vhadzulapo teaho.
tgt_text: Izinguquko ezihlongozwayo zizoxazulula izingqinamba zokufakwa konswinyo kulabo abangcolisa imvelo futhi zizokwenza kube lula ukunxenxela ukusetshenziswa komgomo wokuthi lowo ongcolisile akhokhe.

src_text: Khabinethe yo fushea nga mvelaphanḓa yo swikelwaho kha zwa thoma shumiswa ha themendelo khathihi na kha ayo maṅwe masia ane khao mushumo wa kha ḓi bvela phanḓa.
tgt_text: Inqubomgomo isungulwe ngokuhambelana noMthetho Kazwelonke Wamanzi, we-1998 (uMthetho wama-36 we-1998).

src_text: Muvhigo ḓo anḓadzwa kha nnyi na nnyi zwenezwo musi wo no ḓivhadzwa kha vha UN nga ṅwedzi wa Ṱhangule.
tgt_text: Umbiko mayelana Nohlakakusebenza oluqondene Nokuhlela Okusabelayo Ezindabeni Zobulili, Ukwabiwa Kwezimali, Ukuhlolwa Kokuqapha kanye Nokucwaningwa Kwamabhuku.

src_text: Mbekanyamaitele ya Ndangulo ya Maḓi Migodini ya ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi yamukele umbiko wenqubekelaphambili esiyenziwe maqondana nokuqalisa ukusebenza koHlakakusebenza oluqondene Nokuhlela Okusabelayo Ezindabeni Zobulili, Ukwabiwa Kwezimali, Ukuhlolwa Kokuqapha kanye Nokucwaningwa Kwamabhuku.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Mbekanyamaitele ya Ndangulo ya Maḓi Migodini ya ṅwaha wa 2022 uri thome shumiswa.

Mbekanyamaitele iyi ṋetshedza nḓila dza tsireledza na vhulunga kushumisele kwa maḓi ita ndinganyelo vhukati ha mishumo ya zwa ikonomi henefho kha migodi na vhuḓifhinduleli ha ṋetshedza nḓila dza kushumisele kwa maḓi lwa tshifhinga tshilapfu fhano shangoni ḽashu..     Zwiṅwe zwa zwine mbekanyamaitele iyi ya ita, ndi bvisela khagala mishumo na vhuḓifhinduleli vhukati ha masia mararu muvhuso nga ha mafhungo kwamaho maḓi migodini.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyincomile inqubekelaphambili enkulu eyenziwe iningi leminyango kahulumeni ekufakeni ezinhlelweni zayo uhlakakusebenza olwamukelwa ngowezi-2019 ukuze luqale ukusebenza.

src_text: Tshanduko dzine dza khou dzinginywa dzi ḓo tandulula khaedu dza ṋetshedza ndaṱiso kha vhatshikafhadzi khathihi na ita uri zwi leluwe shumisa maitele uri mutshikafhadzi tea badela.
Mbekanyamaitele yo bveledzwa hu tshi tevhelwa Mulayo wa Maḓi wa Lushaka, wa 1998 (Mulayo 36 wa 1998).
tgt_text: Iminyango eminingi isiqalise ukusebenza izinto eziseqhulwini zenqubomgomo ezizoqondisa izinhlelo zokuhlukaniswa ngemikhakha ezisophe abantu besifazane, intsha kanye nabantu abaphila nokukhubazeka.

src_text: Muvhigo nga ha Muhanga wa Vhupuḽani vhune ha Dzhiela Nṱha zwa Mbeu, Mugaganyagwama, Vhulavhelesi na Vhusengulusi khathihi na Muvhalelano.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi isinxuse ukuba kube khona ukuqapha okuqinile kanye nokubika, ikakhulukazi kule eminye iminyango ebingakaqali ukubika.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza muvhigo wa mvelaphanḓa nga ha thoma shumiswa ha Muhanga wa Vhupuḽani vhune ha Dzhiela Nṱha zwa Mbeu, Vhupuḽani, Mugaganyagwama, Vhulavhelesi na Vhusengulusi khathihi na Muvhalelano.
tgt_text: Inkulumo-mpendulwano Yentsha ka-Nelson Mandela (i-NMYD).
IKhabhinethi ivumile ukuba i-NMYD yenzeke njalo ngonyaka kusuka ngowezi-.

src_text: Khabinethe yo takalela mvelaphanḓa khulwane ye ya itwa nga vhunzhi ha mihasho ya muvhuso kha zwa dzhia muhanga uyu we wa ṱanganedzwa nga ṅwaha wa 2019 hu tshi itelwa uri thome shumiswa wa vho vha tshipiḓa tshayo tsha mashumele.
tgt_text: I-NMYD yokuqala ngqa izobanjwa kusukela mhla ziyi-7 kuya mhla zingama-20 kuNtulikazi.
Lolu uhlelo oluphethwe yihhovisi likaMongameli elinikeza intsha yaseZwenikazi lethu inkundla yokuxoxisana ngezinkulumo-mpendulwano ezakhayo maqondana nezinkinga ebhekene nazo.

src_text: Vhunzhi ha mihasho swika zwino yo no thoma dzudzanya mbekanyamaitele dzayo dzine dza ḓo thusa kha ranga phanḓa mbekanyamushumo khulwane dzine dzo livhiswa kha vhafumakadzi, vhaswa na vhathu vha re na vhuholefhali.
Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ita khuwelelo ya uri hu vhe na vhulavhelesi na vhiga ho khwaṱhaho, nga maanḓa kha miṅwe ya mihasho ine i athu ṋetshedza mivhigo yayo.
tgt_text: Izinkulumo-mpendulwano – isisekelo sazo sizoba ngaphansi kwegama lengqalabutho yethu eyaziwa umhlaba wonke nowayenguMongameli waphambilini u-Nelson Rolihlahla Mandela – zizoqala izingxoxo ezizogxilisa usiko lobuholi obuqotho e-Afrika.

src_text: Fulo ḽa Nyambedzano dza vhukati ha Vhaswa ḽa Vho Nelson Mandela (NMYD).
tgt_text: Zizonikeza abantu abasha ithuba lokwabelana ngamagugu amasiko abo anothile.

src_text: Khabinethe yo khwaṱhisedza zwa uri NMYD vho ḓo vha hone ṅwaha muṅwe na muṅwe bva zwino nga ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: Lolu hlelo luzophinda luqinise ubudlelwano kumuntu nomuntu phakathi kwentsha yasezwenikazi lethu.

src_text: NMYD ya thoma ḓo vha hone bva nga ḽa 7 swika ḽa 20 Fulwana.
tgt_text: UMnyango Wabantu Besifazane, Intsha, Abantu Abaphila Nokukhubazeka uzohlinzeka ngemininingwane yohlelo lwemicimbi ekuhambeni kwesikhathi.

src_text: Hedzi ndi ndingedzo dza Phresidennde dza ṋea vhaswa vha Dzhango ḽino tshikhala tsha ḓidzhenisa kha nyambedzano dza fhaṱa dza nga ha mafhungo ane vha kwama.
tgt_text: Umbiko Wonyaka Wokuqapha Ukusebenza wezi-2021/2022 maqondana Nokusimamiswa Kwabantu Besifazane kanye Nokulingana Ngokobulili, Ukuthuthukiswa Kwentsha kanye Nokukhuthazwa Kwamalungelo Abantu Abaphila Nokukhubazeka.
IKhabhinethi yamukele umbiko wonyaka wokuqapha ukusebenza wezi-2021/22 maqondana nokusimamiswa kwabantu besifazane, intsha kanye nabantu abaphila nokukhubazeka.

src_text: Hedzi nyambedzano, dzine dza ḓo ḓitika kha ḽizhakanḓila ḽashu ḽi ḓivheaho ḽifhasini Phresidennde washu wa kale Vho Nelson Rolihlahla Mandela, dzi ḓo mbo ḓi thoma na zwenezwo hu tshi itelwa ṱuṱuwedza maitele vhurangaphanḓa vhu re na mikhwa fhano kha dzhango ḽa Afrika..     Dzi ḓo ṋea vhaswa tshikhala tsha kovhana nga ha vhufa ho ḓalaho zwinzhi vhukuma vhune ha sumbedza mvelele dzavho.
tgt_text: Umbiko ulandelela izinkomba ezisemqoka ekukhuthazweni kokulingana, izinga lokuqashwa kanye nobunikazi kanye nokubandakanywa kwalawa maqembu abantu emisebenzini yeminyango kanye nezikhungo eziphethwe nguhulumeni.

src_text: Hedzi ndingedzo dzi ḓo dovha hafhu dza khwaṱhisa vhushaka ha muthu nga muthu vhukati ha vhaswa vha ḽino dzhango.
tgt_text: Umbiko uhlanganiswe ngokuqhathaniswa nokuhlelwa kwesabiwomali esisabelayo ezindabeni zobulili, ukuqapha, ukulinganisa kanye nohlakakusebenza lokucwaningwa kwamabhuku olwamukelwa yiKhabhinethi ngowezi-     IMithethosivivinywa.

src_text: Muhasho wa Vhafumakadzi, Vhaswa na Vhathu vha re na Vhuholefhali ḓo ṋetshedza zwidodombedzwa zwa mbekanyamushumo ya vhuṱambo uvhu ngavhuya.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Wezempilo Ezimayini kanye Nezokuphepha.

src_text: Muvhigo wa Vhulavhelesi ha Mashumele nga Ṅwaha wa ṅwaha wa 2021/22 kha zwa Maanḓafhadza Vhafumakadzi na Ndinganyelo ya Mbeu, Mveledziso ya Vhaswa khathihi na Ṱhuṱhuwedzo ya Pfanelo dza Vhathu vha re na Vhuholefhali.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi igunyaze ukushicilelwa koMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Wezempilo Ezimayini kanye Nezokuphepha ukuze kutholwe imibono yomphakathi ngawo.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza muvhigo wa vhulavhelesi ha mashumele wa nga ṅwaha nga ha maanḓafhadzwa ha vhafumakadzi, vhaswa na vhathu vha re na vhuholefhali.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa uhlose ukwenza ngcono ezempilo kanye nezokuphepha kwabasebenzi basezimayini, kubandakanya nendawo lapho imisebenzi yasezimayini yenzelwa khona.

src_text: Muvhigo uyu sala murahu zwithu zwa ndeme kha ṱuṱuwedzwa ha ndinganyelo, maimo kha zwa mishumo khathihi na vhuṋe na shela mulenzhe ha zwigwada izwi kha mishumo ya mihasho na mabindu muvhuso.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa uchibiyela uMthetho wamanje Wezempilo Ezimayini kanye Nezokuphepha, we-1996 (uMthetho wama-29 we-1996).

Izichibiyelo ezibuyekeziwe zihlinzeka, phakathi kokunye, ukucacisa amanye amagama akhona kuMthetho, ziqinisa uhlakakusebenza lokulawula ezempilo kanye nezokuphepha futhi ziluhambelanise nezindlela zokusebenza ezingungqaphambili emazweni omhlaba mayelana nezokuphepha ezimayini..     UMthethosivivinywa Wokuchitshiyelwa KoMthethosisekelo Kweshumi Nesishiyagalombili wezi-2022 .

src_text: Muvhigo uyu wo dzudzanywa ho sedzwa zwa vhupuḽani ha mugaganyagwama une wa dzhiela nṱha zwa mbeu, zwa vhulavhelesi, vhusengulusi na muhanga wa Muvhalelano we wa ṱanganedzwa nga Khabinethe nga ṅwaha wa     Milayotibe.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi igunyaze ukushicilelwa koMthethosivivinywa Wokuchitshiyelwa KoMthethosisekelo Kweshumi Nesishiyagalombili wezi-2022 ukuze kutholwe imibono yomphakathi ngawo kanye nokuthi uNgqongqoshe Wezobulungiswa kanye Nezinsizakalo Zokuhlunyeleliswa Kwezimilo, uMnu Ronald Lamola, angasikhipha isaziso esinemininingwane yesichibiyelo esihlongozwayo kuMthethosisekelo..     UMthethosivivinywa uchibiyela iSigaba 6(1) soMthethosisekelo weRiphabhulikhi YaseNingizimu Afrika we-1996, esazisa ngokuthi izilimi eziyi-11 ezisemthethweni eNingizimu Afrika yiSepedi, Sesotho, Setswana, Siswati, Tshivenda, Xitsonga, isiBhunu, isiNgisi, isiNdebele, isiXhosa kanye nesiZulu..     Izichibiyelo zizokwazisa noma zizokwethula uLimi Lwezimpawu LwaseNingizimu Afrika (i-SASL) njengolimi lwe-12 olusemthethweni lakuleli lizwe futhi zizothuthukisa ukwamukelwa kwalo ngokwamasiko ziphinde ziqinisekise amalungelo alinganayo kubo bonke abantu baseNingizimu Afrika, kungakhathalekile ukukhubazeka kwabo abaphila nakho.

src_text: Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Mutakalo na Tsireledzo Migodini.
tgt_text: UMnyango Wemfundo Eyisisekelo usuvele uyayamukela i-SASL njengolimi lwasekhaya     Imicimbi Ezayo.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza zwa anḓadzwa ha Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Mutakalo na Tsireledzo Migodini hu tshi itelwa uri hu kone vha na vhupfiwa ha nnyi na nnyi.
tgt_text: Isonto Lokuvikelwa Kwabantwana.

src_text: Mulayotibe uyu ndi une wa khou lavhelelwa khwinisa mutakalo na tsireledzo ya vhashumi vha migodini, hu tshi katelwa na vhupo honoho vhune zwa migodi zwa khou bveledzwa khaho.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika izoqala iSonto Likazwelonke Lokuvikelwa Kwabantwana kusukela mhla zingama-29 kuNhlaba kuya mhla zi-4 kuNhlangulana 2022 ngaphansi kwendikimba ethi: “Asivikeleni Abantwana ngesikhathi se-COVID-19 Nangemuva Kwayo”..     Kuleli sonto, kuzogxilwa kakhulu odabeni oluthinta uzwelonke lokukhulelwa kwamatshitshi, okubonakale kudlondlobala ngesikhathi se-COVID-19 lapho kubonakale amatshitshi amaningi ethola izingane ubuthaphuthaphu ngowezi-..     IKhabhinethi inxenxe ukuba kube nomzamo ohlanganyelwe owenziwa ngabazali, izinhlangano zomphakathi, amaqoqo amabandla ahlukene kanye nomphakathi ngobubanzi ukusiza ukuguqula isimo sokudlondlobala kokukhulelwa kwamatshitshi.

src_text: Mulayotibe uyu khou khwinisa Mulayo wa Mutakalo na Tsireledzo ya Migodini, wa 1996 (Mulayo 29 wa 1996) une wa vha hone zwazwino.
tgt_text: Inkundla Yezomnotho Womhlaba (i-WEF).

INingizimu Afrika ibambe iqhaza kwi-WEF e-Davos-Klosters, e-Switzerland kusukela mhla zingama-22 kuya mhla zingama-26 kuNhlaba 2022, ngaphansi kwendikimba ethi: “Sisebenza Ndawonye, Sibuyisa Ithemba”..     INingizimu Afrika iyalazisa kakhulu ithuba lokuba yingxenye yesisombululo kanye nokwabelana ngezimo zethu esesike sabhekana nazo enkundleni yomhlaba wonke.

src_text: Khwiniso idzi dzo shandukiswaho ndi dzine dza bvisela khagala maṅwe maipfi kha Mulayo khwaṱhisa muhanga wa zwa milayo ya mutakalo na tsireledzo khathihi na ita uri elane na maitele khwinesa ḽifhasini ane elana na zwa tsireledzo migodini..     Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Ndayotewa ya Vhufumimalo wa ṅwaha wa 2022  .
tgt_text: Ukuba khona kwezwe lethu kwi-WEF kuphinde kube semqoka kakhulu ekukhuliseni isithunzi sethu njengendawo umhlaba wonke ongatshala kuyona izimali, ukwabelana nomhlaba wonke umbono wethu wekusasa kanye nokuqhakambisa intuthuko entsha eyenzeka ezweni lethu.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza anḓadzwa ha Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Ndayotewa ya Vhufumimalo ya ṅwaha wa 2022 hu tshi itelwa vhupfiwa ha nnyi na nnyi nahone Minisṱa wa Vhulamukanyi na Tshumelo dza Vhululamisi, Vho Ronald Lamola, vha nga ṋetshedza nḓivhadzo ine ya vha na zwidodombedzwa zwa khwiniso iyo ine ya khou dzinginywa kha Ndayotewa.
tgt_text: Inyanga Yentsha.
IKhabhinethi igunyaze Uhlelo Lwenyanga Yentsha yowezi-2022 ngaphansi kwendikimba ethi: “Ukukhuthaza ukuziphilisa okusimeme kanye nokuphikelela kwabantu abasha ukuze babe nekusasa elingcono”.

src_text: Mulayotibe uyu khou khwinisa Khethekanyo 6(1) ya Ndayotewa ya Riphabuḽiki ya Afrika Tshipembe ya ṅwaha wa 1996, ine ya sumbedza uri nyambo dza 11 dza tshiofisi dza fhano Afrika Tshipembe, ndi Tshibeli, Tshisuthu, Tshitswana, Tshiswati, Tshivenḓa, Tshitsonga, Tshivhuru, Luisimane, Tshindevhele, Tshithoza na Tshizulu..     Khwiniso iyi ndi ine ya ḓo ita uri hu vhe na ṱanganedzwa ha Luambo lwa Tswayo dza Zwanḓa lwa Afrika Tshipembe (SASL) sa luambo lwa tshiofisi lwa vhufumimbili (12) nahone ḓo dovha hafhu ya ṱuṱuwedza ṱanganedzea ha mvelele ya luambo lwonolwo khathihi na khwaṱhisa pfanelo dzi linganaho kha vhadzulapo vhoṱhe vha Afrika Tshipembe, hu sa sedzwi uri vha na vhuholefhali.
tgt_text: Usuku Lwentsha olusemthethweni luzogujelwa eMpumalanga Kapa.

src_text: Muhasho wa Pfunzo dza Mutheo wo no ḓi ṱanganedza SASL sa luambo lwa hayani     Vhuṱambo vhune ha khou ḓa.
Vhege ya Tsireledzo ya Vhana.
tgt_text: Lo nyaka uwunyaka wama-46 wokubungaza izibhelu zabafundi zangomhla ziyi-16 kuNhlangulana 1976 e-Soweto lapho abantu abasha babhikishela khona ukufakwa ngempoqo kwesiBhunu umbuso wobandlululo njengolimi lokufunda nokufundisa.

src_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽi ḓo fhululedza Vhege ya Tsiredzo ya Vhana bva nga ḽa 29 Shundunthule swika ḽa 4 Shundunthule 2022 nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “Kha ri Tsireledze Vhana nga tshino tshifhinga tsha dwadze ḽa COVID-19 na nga Murahu”..     Kha yeneyo vhege, hu ḓo lavheleswa nga maanḓa kha mafhungo kwamaho shango ḽoṱhe, ane vha vhifha muvhilini ha vhaswa, lwe ha wanala hu tshi vha na engedzea vhukuma ha tshivhalo tsha vhaswa vhe vha vha na vhana nga tshifhinga tshenetsho tsha musi dwadze ḽa COVID-19 ḽo ḓiṋea maanḓa nga ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: Ngokuvunguza komoya kaNhlangulana we-1976, iKhabhinethi inxuse intsha yakuleli lizwe ukuba ilwisane nenselelo yokwenyuka kokungasebenzi kwentsha ngokuthi ibambe iqhaza ezinhlelweni ezithuthukisayo ezinjengokufundela umsebenzi kanye nokufundela ukwenza umsebenzi ngaphakathi enkampanini..     Uhulumeni usesungule izinhlelo zokweseka ukuqashwa kwentsha kanye nokusungulwa kwemisebenzi yesikhathi esifushane.

Amabhizinisi nawo ayagqugquzelwa ukuba aqashe abantu abasha abaningi ngokusungula amathuba emisebenzi yentsha..     Uhlelo lwentsha lwenyanga yonke kaNhlangulana lubandakanya imisebenzi enhlobonhlobo kusukela ekwethulweni komkhankaso wamavulandlela amancane, ukwethulwa koHlelo Lwenxusa Le-NYDA kanye nokuvulwa kwamagatsha amaningi eNsizakalo Kazwelonke Yentsha ezweni lonkana..     UNgqongqoshe eHhovisi likaMongameli Wabantu Besifazane, Intsha kanye Nabantu Abaphila Nokukhubazeka uzothukulula maduze nje uhlelo lonke oluphelele.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ita khuwelelo ya uri hu vhe na ndingedzo dzo khwaṱhaho vhukati ha vhabebi, vhadzulapo, zwigwada zwa vhurereli khathihi na zwitshavha nga angaredza dza itela thusa shandukisa izwo zwa engedzea ha tshivhalo tsha vhaswa vhane vha khou vhifha mivhilini..     Muṱangano wa Ikonomi wa Ḽifhasi (WEF).
tgt_text: Yonke imisebenzi yentsha kuzolindeleka ukuba ithobele imigomo yezempilo ye-COVID-.

src_text: Shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe ḽi khou shela mulenzhe kha WEF ine ya khou ḓo farelwa fhaḽa Davos-Klosters, kha ḽa Switzerland bva nga ḽa 22 swika 26 Shundunthule 2022, nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “U shumisana vhuedzedza Fulufhelo”.
tgt_text: Inkomfa Yomhlaba Womphakathi.

Uhulumeni, ngokubambisana neNdlu Kazwelonke Yabaholi Bendabuko, uzobamba Inkomfa Yomhlaba Womphakathi ngoLwesihlanu, mhla zingama-27 kanye noMgqibelo, mhla zingama-28 kuNhlaba 2022 ukuzodingida izindaba eziphathelene nobunikazi bomhlaba..     Lezi zindaba zibandakanya nohlelo lokudluliswa komhlaba womphakathi ususwa kuMbuso unikezwa abanikazi bawo bangempela abafanelekile, okusemqoka kakhulu ukuze kusimamiswe imiphakathi yasezindaweni ezisemakhaya.

src_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽi dzhiela nṱha tshikhala tsha vha tshipiḓa tsha thandululo nahone ḽi kovhana nḓivho ine ḽa vha nayo kha muṱangano uyu wa ḽifhasi vha hone ha shango ḽashu kha muṱangano uyu wa WEF na zwone ndi zwa ndeme kha bveledza phanḓa dzina ḽa shango ḽashu sa hone fhethu havhuḓisa ha ita zwa vhubindudzi kovhana na ḽifhasi ḽoṱhe nga ha bono ḽa vhumatshelo hashu khathihi na bvisela khagala dziṅwe mveledziso dzine dza khou itea ngomu kha shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe.
tgt_text: Ukwentuleka kobunikazi obusemthethweni bomhlaba ezindaweni ezisetshenziswa imiphakathi ngokuhlanganyela akuthunazi kuphela amalungelo abantu okukwazi ukuba abanikazi bomhlaba abaphila kuwona kodwa kuphinde kunqinde amandla abo okuwusebenzisa ngendlela ezokwenza ngcono izimpilo zabo ngakwezomnotho     Imiyalezo.

src_text: Ṅwedzi wa Vhaswa.
tgt_text: SiyanihalaliselaIKhabhinethi idlulise amazwi ayo okuhalalisa kanye nezifiso ezinhle ku: Nksz Leanne Manas, Umethuli Wohlelo Lwasekuseni kwa-SABC, ohlonishwe ngendondo ye-Knight of the French National Order Merit ngoLwesibili, mhla ziyi-17 kuNhlaba wezi-2022, ngegalelo lakhe emsebenzini wobuntatheli, umthombo wezindaba kanye neminye imisebenzi enhlobonhlobo esemqoka yesihe nokunikela emphakathini..     Amazwi Enduduzo IKhabhinethi idlulise amazwi enduduzo nokuzwelana nomndeni kanye nabangani baka: Mnu Mpho Moerane (52), uSodolobha Omkhulu Wedolobha LaseGoli wangaphambilini, futhi obeyisishoshovu sezepolitiki impilo yakhe yonke kanye nomsebenzeli wabantu baseGoli.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Mbekanyamushumo ya Ṅwedzi wa Vhaswa ya ṅwaha wa 2022 nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “U ṱuṱuwedza nḓila dza ḓitshidza ngadzo dzine dza nga vha dza tshifhinga tshilapfu khathihi na konḓelela ha vhaswa hu tshi itelwa vhumatshelo ha khwine”.
tgt_text: Ngaphambi kokuba aqokwe njengoSodolobha Omkhulu, usebenze njengeLungu Lekomidi Lomkhandlu Elibhekelele Ezemvelo kanye Nezinsizakalo Zengqalasizinda.

src_text: Ḓuvha ḽa Vhaswa ḽa tshiofisi ḽi ḓo pembelelwa ngei kha vunḓu ḽa Kapa Vhubvaḓuvha.
tgt_text: Dkt Deborah Fraser (56), iciko lomculo wokholo eselinqobe izindondo ezehlukahlukene elisanda kuhlonishwa Ngeziqu Zobudokotela Benjulalwazi Yomculo Ongcwele ethweswa yi-Christian Leadership Academy.Dkt Namane Magau (70), isifundiswa esihloniphekile kanye nelungu elihlonishwayo leBhodi Labaphathiswa BoMkhandlu Kazwelonke WaseNingizimu Afrika We-AIDS.Mnu Mike Schüssler (60), usomnotho owaziwayo waseNingizimu Afrika owayeyiqhawe kule mboni futhi wayehlinzeka ngobuhlakani bakhe esimweni sezomnotho waseNingizimu Afrika.Mnu Jamie Bartlett (56), umlingisi waseNingizimu Afrika obatshazwayo nonqobe izindondo ezihlukahlukene zemidlalo yaseshashalazini kanye neyakumabonakude, obaziwa kakhulu ngezindawo azidlalile njengo-Mike O'Reilly emdlalweni Isidingo kanye no-David Genaro emdlalweni i-Rhythm City.IKhabhinethi iphinde yahlanganyela noMongameli u-Ramaphosa ngokwedlulisa amazwi enduduzo kuhulumeni kanye nabantu base-United Arab Emirates (e-UAE) kulandela ukudlula emhlabeni Komuntu Wakomkhulu u-Sheikh Khalifa bin Zayed Al Nahyan (73), uMongameli wase-UAE      AbaqashiweUkuqashwa kwabo bonke abalandelayo kuzokwamukelwa ngokusemthethweni kuphela uma sekuqinisekiswe ubufakazi beziqu zabo zemfundo futhi uma sebenikeziwe izimvume ezifanelekile.
Mnu Bongani Sinenhlanhla Dladla njengeSikhulu Esiphezulu seBhodi Lokuthuthukiswa Kwemboni Yezokwakha.

src_text: Houno ndi ṅwaha wa vhufuiṋarathi (46) wa pembelelwa ha ḓuvha ḽa mvutshelano ya matshudeni ye ya vha hone nga ḓuvha ḽa 16 Fulwi 1976 fhaḽa kha ḽa Soweto he vhaswa vha vha vha tshi khou gwalabela zwa kombetshedzwa guda nga luambo lwa Tshivhuru nga muvhuso wa khethululo nga lukanda..     Nga muya wonoyo muthihi fanaho na uḽa wa ṅwedzi wa Fulwi 1976, Khabinethe khou ita khuwelelo kha vhaswa vha shango ḽashu ya uri vha lwe na khaedu ine ya khou engedzea ya shayea ha mishumo kha vhaswa nga shela mulenzhe kha mbekanyamushumo dza mveledziso dzi fanaho na mbekanyamushumo dza vhugudisamishumo khathihi na dza ṋea vhagudi tshenzhemo.
tgt_text: Mnu Shabeer Hamid Khan njengoMgcinimabhuku Jikelele eHhovisi likaMgcinimafa Kazwelonke.
Nksz Mendoe Ntswahlana njengeSikhulu Sokuthengwa Kwempahla Nezinsizakalo eHhovisi likaMgcinimafa Kazwelonke.

src_text: Muvhuso wo bveledza mbekanyamushumo dza tikedza zwa tholiwa ha vhaswa khathihi na sikwa ha mishumo ya tshifhinga tshipfufhi.
tgt_text: IKhabinethi ivumelene ngokuqokwa kwalaba bantu abalandelayo ukuvala izikhala eBhodini Labaqondisi Besikhwama i-Central Energy Fund     Mnu Mosimaneotsile Jim Besnaar; (ii)    Nks Unati Nombakuse-Figlan.

src_text: Ikonomi.
tgt_text: Umnotho .

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza mveledziso dza zwezwino dzi vhuedzaho shango dzo tetshelwaho khwaṱhisa nyaluwo ya ikonomi ya nga figara dza vhushayamishumo dza zwezwino dzi bvaho kha Tshitatisitiki Afrika Tshipembe, vhushayamishumo ho tselafhasi bva kha.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi yamukele izingenelelo zezwe ezinhle zakamuva ezihlose ukufukula ukukhula komnotho.

src_text: 3 phesenthe kha kotara ya vhuṋa ya 2021 ya kha.
tgt_text: Ngokwezibalo zakamuva zabantu abangasebenzi ezibuya kwabeZezibalo eNingizimu Afrika, izinga labantu abangasebenzi lehle kusuka kumaphesenti angama-.

src_text: 5 phesenthe kha kotara ya thoma ya.
tgt_text: 3 kwikota yesine yangowezi-2021 laya kumaphesenti angama-.

src_text: Tshikalo tsha vhushayamishumo tshe tsha vha tsho gonyelanṱha tsho tselafhasi kha kotara ya vhuvhili nga tevhekanya.
tgt_text: 5 kwikota yokuqala yangowezi-.
