src_text: Mbuyelo khulwane ya mishumo yo vha kha tshitshavha na tshumelo dza matshilisano, mveledziso na mbambadzo..     Zwibveledzwaguṱe zwapo kha kotara ya thoma ya 2022 zwo engedzea nga.
tgt_text: Izinga lokungasebenzi lehlile kumakota amabili elandelana.

src_text: 9% zwa isa muelo wa ikonomi yashu kha tshiimo tsha musi hu saathu vha na dwadze ḽa Corona.
tgt_text: Imiphumela emihle yalo msebenzi ibonakale kwizinsizakalo zomphakathi nezenhlalo, ekukhiqizeni nasekuhwebeni..     Umkhiqizo wonyaka wezwe kwikota yokuqala yangowezi-2022 ukhule ngo-.

src_text: Kha kotara, sekhithara ya zwa mveledziso yo vha yone no khou shuma zwavhuḓi kha ikonomi nga gonyelanṱha ha zwibveledzwa zwa pheṱhiroḽiamu na dzikhemikhaḽa, zwiḽiwa na zwinwiwa, khathihi na metaḽa zwa mitshini..     Mbuelo hei yo gonyelaho nṱha nyana sumbedza uri ikonomi yashu tshe yo khwaṱha nahone shela mulenzhe ha Pulane ya Mvusuluso na Mbuyedzedzo ya Ikonomi zwi kho shuma zwavhuḓi.
tgt_text: 9% lokho okubeka isilinganiso somnotho wethu kumazinga ayeyiwo ngaphambi kokufika kobhubhane.

src_text: Khabinethe kho ita khuwelelo kha vhathu vhoṱhe uri vha tikedze mabindu po na nḓowetshupo nga renga zwibveledzwa na tshumelo dzapo.
tgt_text: Kwikota, umkhakha wezokukhiqiza wawungummongo wezomnotho ngenxa yokukhula ekukhiqizeni uwoyela namakhemikhali, ukudla neziphuzo, kanye nezinsimbi nemishini.

src_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ṱanganedza tsheo ya zhendedzi ḽa vhupimi ḽa S&P Global kha vusulusa mbonalo ya vhupimi ha tshikolodo Afrika Tshipembe - bva kha tshiimo tsha vhukati ya kha tshiomo tshi fulufhedzisaho.
tgt_text: Le mpumelelo emaphakathi ibonisa ukuthi umnotho wethu usalokhu uqinile futhi izingenelelo ezifana noHlelo Lokwakha Kabusha Nokuvuselela Umnotho zithola umfutho.

src_text: Zhendedzi ḽa vhupimi ḽo dovha hafhu ḽa khwaṱhisedza vhupimi ha zwikolodo ha tshifhinga tshilapfu kha kharentsi yapo na ya mashango nnḓa kha BB minas na BB respectively.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi icela wonke umuntu ukuthi aseke amabhizinisi alapha ekhaya kanye nezimboni ngokuthi bathenge imikhiqizo kanye nezinsizakalo zalapha ekhaya.

src_text: Tshiimo tsha kutshilele .
Dwadze ḽa Khoronavairasi (COVID-19) khathihi na nndwa dza ḽifhasi dzi no khou endelela zwo kwama tshiimo tsha kutshilele nga nḓila si yavhuḓi ḽifhasiḽoṱhe.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iphinde yamukela isinqumo se-ejensi ehlola isimo sezimali i-S&P Global sokubuyekeza isimo sezikweletu seNingizimu Afrika - kusuka kwesizinzile kuya kwesihle kakhulu.

src_text: Vhadzulapo vha Afrika Tshipembe na vhone vha khou farea zwavhuḓi nga gonya ha mitengo ya zwivhaswa, zwiḽiwa na zwishumiswa zwa vhuṱhogwa..     Roṱhe ri fanela shumisana, na thusana itela vhulunga zwiko zwashu kha tshifhinga tshino tshi konḓaho.
tgt_text: I-ejensi ehlola isimo sezimali iphinde yaqinisekisa ukuthi ukukwazi ukumelana nezikweletu kwesikhathi eside kume ku-BB minus naku-BB ngokulandelana.

src_text: Muvhuso khou lwa nga nḓila dzoṱhe tshi ṋetshedza muṅwe na muṅwe masheleni ndiliso, nga maanḓa vha shayaho..     Bannga ya Vhukati ya Afrika Tshipembe yo ḓiimisaho nga yoṱhe, yo khwaṱhaho nahone no khou shuma zwavhuḓi khou thusa nga pilela lushaka kha tshanduko ya mitengo si yavhuḓi nga ita uri vhe kha tshiimo tsho tendelwaho; ho sedzwa zwine maṅwe mashango khou ṱangana nazwo..     Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza tsheo yo dzhiwaho nga vha Vhufaragwama ha Lushaka tendelana na zwa fhungudzwa ha Mbadelo dza Zwivhaswa(GFL).
GFL yo fhungudzwa nga  50 kha litha bva vhukati ha Lambamai na Shundunthule ḓo dovha hafhu ya gonyelanṱha bva nga ḽa 1 Fulwi swika ḽa 6 Fulwana.
tgt_text: Izindleko zokuphila  .
Ubhubhane lweSifo Segciwane le-Corona (i-COVID-19) kanye nokungqubuzana emazweni omhlaba okuqhubekayo kube nomthelela omkhulu kakhulu ezindlekweni zokuphila emhlabeni jikelele.

src_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ṱanganedza tsheo ya Khomishini ya zwa Miṱaṱisano lavhelesa tshoṱhe mitengo ya zwiḽiwa zwa vhuṱhogwa, nga maanḓa ṋetshedzo ya uri mabindu tea imelela zwa gonyisa ha mitengo..     Foramu ya vhubindudzi ya Afrika Tshipembe na Japan.
tgt_text: Abantu baseNingizimu Afrika nabo badiniwe ukukhuphuka kwamanani ophethiloli, ukudla kanye nemikhiqizo ebalulekile..     Sonke kudingeka ukuthi sibambisane, sisizane futhi sigcine izinsiza zethu kulesi sikhathi esinzima.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza mvelelo dza zwezwino dza Foramu ya Vhubindudzi ya Afrika Tshipembe na Japan, he ha tendelanwa kha mbekanyamushumo dzi shumisanaho zwavhuḓi kha nḓowetshumo dzo vusuludzwaho, thekhinoḽodzhi dza zwiendedzi zwi shumisaho muḓagasi na gesemaḓi yo vusuludzwaho..     Foramu yo tendelana kha ita maṱano nga shumisa vhudavhidzani ha muyani hu nḓila ya sumbedza zwikhala zwi re Afrika Tshipembe kha mabindu manzhi Japan, mveledziso dza vhukoni kha nḓowetshumo dza zwa sikwa ha mimoḓoro yapo, zwikhala zwa mveledziso dzi bveledzaho mishumo khathini na fhana tshenzhemo dza zwa thekhinikhaḽa.
tgt_text: Uhulumeni wenza konke okusemandleni ukuhlinzeka ngosizo kuwo wonke umuntu, ikakhulukazi labo abadla imbuya ngothi.

src_text: Japan ndi ḽinwe ḽa mashango vhashumisani kha zwa mbambadzo nahone ndi ḽone ḽi re phanḓa kha zwa vhubindudzi kha sekithara dzi re na tshivhalo Afrika Tshipembe bva kha zwa mimoḓoro ya kha zwa mitshini ya migodini yo khwiniswaho, na bva kha vhubindudzi ha zwa vhulimi ya kha tshumelo dza zwa masheleni..     Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ṱanganedza thomiwa ha Nethiweke ya Zwivhambadzelwannḓa ya Vharema yo thomiwaho nga Muhasho wa Mbambadzo, Nḓowetshumo na Muṱaṱisano, hu itela ṱanganya mamaga ndangwa nga vharema ane zwa zwino khou vhambadzelannḓa zwibveledzwa zwapo kha zwiṅwe zwipiḓa zwa ḽifhasi.
tgt_text: IBhangengodla lethu laseNingizimu Afrika elisebenza kahle, eliqinile futhi elizimele lisiza ukuba yihawu lomphakathi ukuthi ungacekelwa phansi ukwehla kwamandla emali ngokuthi iyigcine isesilinganisweni esibekiwe; okungaphansi kwalokho okubhekane namanye amazwe amaningi njengamanje.

src_text: Nethiweke iyi ḓo bveledza khovhano ya mafhungo, tshenzhemo na nḓivho ya vhukoni, nahone bveledzea nga vhukoni ha Mbekanyamushumo ya vha nḓowetshumo dza Vharema..     Fulufulu tsireledzwa ha fulufulu lwa tshifhinga tshilapfu zwo maanḓafhadzwa vhukuma nga murahu ha ṋetshedzwa ha Yunithi 4 ya zwa vhubindudzi ngei Tshiṱitshini tsha Muḓagasi tsha Kusile vunḓuni ḽa Mpumalanga ṋetshedzwa uhu ho sumbedza swikelelwa ha tshipikwa tsha ndeme kha ndingedzo dza Eskom dza lingedza kwiṋisa sisiṱemu ya fulufulu nahone ḓo engedza maanḓa muḓagasi nga 800 megawadzi (MW) kha giridi ya fulufulu..     Khabinethe yo dzhiela nzhele uri fhaṱiwa ha yunithi nṋa kha dza rathi dzi khou fanelaho khunyeledzwa kha thandela ya Tshiṱitshi tsha Muḓagasi tsha Kusile..     Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza engedzwa ha dzhenerasheni ntswa kha giridi, zwo itwaho uri zwi swikelelwe nga murahu ha ṱanganedza tsheo ya tendela vhabveledzi vha fulufulu vho ḓiimisaho nga vhoṱhe uri na vhone vha bveledzise muḓagasi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi yamukele isinqumo somnyango weZamafa kuZwelonke ukwelula isikhathi sokuncishiswa kweNtela Kaphethiloli i-General Fuel Levy (i-GFL).

src_text: Muvhuso wo saina ḽińwalo ḽa thendelano ya ḓo renga 150 MW ya khaphasithi ya fulufulu bva kha vharengisi vha fulufulu ḽi konaho vusuludzwa nga huswa, vha Scatec ASA.
tgt_text: I-GFL yehliswa nge-R. 50 ilitha elilodwa ngoMbasa nangoNhlaba, futhi lizoqhubeka kusuka mhla lu-1 kuNhlangulana kuze kube umhla wesi-6 kuNtulikazi.

src_text: Khoro ya Vhutsivhudzi ya Broad-Based Economic Empowerment (B-BBEE).
Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Khoro ya Vhutsivhudzi ya B-BBEE ntswa kha ḽino shango yo khethwaho nga Phresidennde Vho Cyril Ramaphosa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iphinde yamukela isinqumo seKhomishini Yokuncintisana sokuqapha ngeso lokhozi amanani okudla okusemqoka, ikakhulukazi ukuthi amabhizinisi kumele abe nezizathu ezibonakalayo zokukhuphula amanani.

src_text: Khoro iyi yo vhumbwa nga zwigwada zwo fhambanaho zwa vhathu vha bvaho kha zwa vhubindudzi, yunioni dza mbambadzo, madzangano ḓitikaho nga lushaka khathihi na vha zwa pfunzo, Itsho tshigwada tshi ḓovha na vhuḓifhinduleli ha tsivhudza muvhuso kha maga u shandukisa ikonomi.
tgt_text: UMhlangano Wezamabhizinisi phakathi kweJalimani neNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Naho honovha na tshanduko khulwane kha shandukiswa ha maitele muvhuso wa tshiṱalula kha Ikonomi, hu tshe na zwinzhi zwine zwa khou fanela itwa siani ḽa zwa ndangulo khwinisa zwikili khathihi na vula zwiṅwe zwikhala zwa vhoramabindu vha mafumakadzi na vhaswa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi yamukele imiphumela yoMhlangano Wezamabhizinisi phakathi kweJalimani neNingizimu Afrika, ebivumelana nohlelo lomsebenzi obandakanya ukusebenzisana kwezimboni ezingangcolisi imvelo, ubuchwepheshe bezimoto ezihamba ngogesi kanye nehayidrojini engangcolisi imvelo..     Umhlangano uphinde wavumelana 'ngombukiso' ozokwenziwa ngobuchwepheshe be-inthanethi wokuqhakambisa amathuba eNingizimu Afrika kumabhizinisi amaningi aseJalimani, ukuthuthukiswa kwamakhono embonini eyakha izimoto yalapha ekhaya, izindlela zokusebenza ezehlukene kumathuba okukhiqiza kanye nokwabelana ngamakhono obuchwepheshe.

src_text: Miḓalo.
tgt_text: IJalimani ingomunye wabalingani bethu ababaluleke kakhulu kwezohwebo kanye nomtshalizimali ohamba phambili emikhakheni eminingi yaseNingizimu Afrika, kusuka emkhakheni wezimoto kuya emishinini yezimayini ephambili, kusuka kwezolimo kuya emkhakheni wezezimali.

src_text: Masheleni bvaho kha muvhuso u thusa kha mavunḓu kwameaho nga tshiwo tsha miḓalo khou thusa nga nḓila yavhudi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iphinde yamukela ukusungulwa kweNkundla Yabantu Abamnyama Yokuthunyelwa Kwempahla Kwamanye Amazwe i-Black Exporters Network nguMnyango Wezohwebo, Izimboni Nokuncintisana (i-DTIC), ukwakha ubumbano kumafemu abantu abamnyama njengamanje athumela izimpahla ezenziwe kuleli kwamanye amazwe omhlaba.

src_text: Muvhuso wo kona ṋetshedza tshumelo ya nḓisedzo ya zwiḽiwa, maḓi kunaho na madzulo kha vhathu vho xelelwaho nga mahaya khathihi na lugisa themamveledziso dzo vhaisalaho.
tgt_text: Le nkundla izovumela ukwabelana ngolwazi, isipiliyoni nendlela yokusebenza, futhi yakhela phezu kwempumelelo yoHlelo Losozimboni Abamnyama..     Ezamandla.

src_text: Mushumo muhulwane nḓilani wa vhuedzedza tshumelo dza fhasisa sa nḓisedzo ya maḓi, muḓagasi, mabunga khathihi na kulumaga mashika.
tgt_text: Ukutholakala kwezamandla kwesikhathi eside kukhuthazwe kakhulu kulandela ukuthengiswa kwe-Unit 4 eSiteshini Sikagesi saseKusile eMpumalanga.

src_text: Masheleni swikalo R189, 217 miḽioni khou shumiswa kha khwiṋisa Mbekanyamushumo ya Madzulo songo Tendelwaho zwi tshi khou itelwa khwiṋisa nzulelo dza vhadzulapo vha fhethu hu songo tendelwaho..     Masheleni mańwe hafhu swikaho R733, 086 miḽioni ṋetshedzwa nga vha Ndiliso ya Madzulo Vhathu hu itela thusa kha fhaṱiwa fhethu huswa ho tendelwaho dzula vhathu.
tgt_text: Lokhu kudluliswa kube ngenye yengqophamlando emizamweni ka-Eskom ukuletha uzinzo ohlelweni logesi futhi luzokwengeza ama-800 megawatt (ama-MW) kwisizinda sikagesi..     IKhabhinethi ikuphawulile ukuthi ukwakhiwa kwezingxenye zeziphehlimandla ezine kweziyisithupha sekuphothuliwe kumklamo weSiteshi Sikagesi eKusile..     IKhabhinethi yamukele ukwengezwa komthamo omusha wesiphehlimandla kwisizinda sogesi, lokhu okwaphunyeleliswa isinqumo sokuvumela abakhiqizi bogesi abazimele ukuthi bakhiqize ugesi.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza na livhuwa thikhedzo bvaho kha Shango ḽa Qatar zwine zwa vha zwiḽiwa, zwiambaro, dzidzhenereitha, zwikunakisi zwa maḓi, madennde khathihi na nḓisedzo ya mishonga ya alafha.
tgt_text: Uhulumeni usanda kusayina isivumelwano sokuthenga ama-150 MW omthamo wogesi kumkhiqizi wogesi ovuselelekayo, okuyi-Scatec ASA.

src_text: Ndambedzo iyi ḓo thusa vhadzulapo vha swikaho 4 000 vhane zwa zwino vhana madzulo vha khou dzula sentharani dza muvhuso.
tgt_text: UMkhandlu Oluleka Ngokuthuthukiswa Komnotho Wabantu Abamnyama (i-B-BBEE).

src_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ṱanganedza thuso ya zwa vhuthusavhathu bva kha shango ḽa United Arab Emirates (UAE) zwine zwa vha zwiḽiwa khathihi na maḓi kunaho zwi ḓo newa avho vho welwaho nga tshiwo tsha miḓalo Rwelwa ṱari ha Tshikwama tsha Mveledziso dza zwa Matshilisano.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi yamukele ukuqokwa okwenziwe nguMongameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa koMkhandlu omusha wezwe we-B-BBEE.

src_text: 1    Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Rwelwa ṱari ha Tshikwama tsha Mishumo ya Matshilisano tsho ṋetshedzwaho nga vha Tshumisano ya Mveledziso dza Nḓowetshumo (IDC) vho ṱangana na ofisi ya Presidennde khathihi na vha dtic.
tgt_text: Lo mkhandlu wakhiwe ngabantu abahlukahlukene abasuka kumabhizinisi, izinyonyana zohwebo, izinhlangano zomphakathi kanye nezifundiswa, umsebenzi wabo okuzoba ukuhlahlela indlela uhulumeni ngokuguqulwa kwesimo somnotho.

src_text: Thikhedzo iyi ḓo bveledzisa zwikhala zwa mishumo kha vhaswa vha swikaho 50 000 hune vha ḓovha vha khou shumela zwitshavhani zwa mahayani.. 2    Thikhedzo iyi ḓo ṋetshedza thusa ya ndondola mutakalo kha zwitshavha, zwiḽiwa na dzikhishi dzi ṋetshedzaho sobo dza pfushi ṱuṱuwedza zwa ńwala na vhala ṋetshedza dzi mbekanyamushumo dzi tsivhudzaho vhathu nga ha tsireledza mupo khathihi na ṱuṱuwedza vhaswa.
tgt_text: Ngesikhathi kube nenqubekelaphambili ebonakalayo ekubuyiseleni emuva ukuhlanekezelwa komnotho ngesikhathi sobandlululo, mningi umsebenzi okusamele wenziwe ekwenyuseni ukuphatha kwabantu abamnyama, ukuthuthukisa amakhono kanye nokusabalalisa amathuba okukhishwa kwemisebenzi ukuze kuzonikwa abesifazane abamnyama nentsha amathuba.

src_text: Tshikwama tsho tshi ḓo tikedza zwitshavha zwi swikaho 26 honeha hu si na ndavhelelo ya mbuyelo ya masheleni.
tgt_text: Izikhukhula.

src_text: Zwa Vhugevhenga na Tshanḓanguvhoni.
tgt_text: Imizamo eqhubekayo kahulumeni yokuxhasa izifundazwe ezikhahlanyezwe izikhukhula zakamuva yenza umehluko omkhulu.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza muvhigo wa fariwa ha vhathu vha tshivhalo vha khou ṱumanywaho na zwa tswa wanala na masheleni hombokiwaho khathihi na maitele tshanḓanguvhoni.
tgt_text: Uhulumeni ubeke eqhulwini ukuhlinzeka ngokudla, amanzi kanye nezindawo zokufihla ikhanda kubantu abalahlekelwa izindawo zokuhlala nokulungiswa kwengqalasizinda eyonakele.

src_text: Hu tshi katelwa na vhashumi vhakale vha muvhuso vhe vha vha vha kha vhuimo ha nṱha, vhańwe vha hone vho livhana na mulayo nga mulandu wa kandekanya Mulayo wa Vhulanguli ha Masheleni Lushaka, wa 1999 (Act 1 of 1999).
tgt_text: Umsebenzi omkhulu uyaqhubeka ukubuyisela izidingonqangi ezifana namanzi, ugesi, ukuthuthwa kwendle kanye nodoti.

src_text: Kha farwa ho hu katelwa na farwa ha mushumi wa Muhasho wa zwa Muno ngei sentharani ya dzula vhafhalali ya Desmond Tutu wanalaho Pitori nga murahu ha hweswa mulandu wa ṱanganedza masheleni tshanḓanguvhoni bva kha muṅwe wa vhabvannḓa - izwo zwi tou vha tsumbo ya uri huna muthu ane avha nṱha ha mulayo nahone huna tshikhala tsha vhashumi vha sa fulufhedzei kha ofisi dza muvhuso..     Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ṱanganedza muvhigo wa farwa ha vhanna vhavhili ri vha vhuye ngeno kha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe vha divhiwaho sa MaGupta, madzina avho ndi Rajesh na Atul.
tgt_text: Zibalelwa kwizigidi ezingama-R. 217 izimali ezisetshenziswa kuHlelo loKwakha Kabusha Izindawo Zasemijondolo okuhloswe ngalo ukwenza ngcono izinga lempilo kubahlali basemijondolo.

src_text: Izwi ndi nga murahu ha muvhigo wa zwezwino wo ṱahiswaho wa uri vho fariwa ngei Dubai kha ḽa UAE he zwa ḓivhadzwa nga Dzangano ḽa Mapholisa kha Vhugevhenga ḽa Dzitshaka (Interpol).
Avho murathu na mukomana vha khou ṱodiwa kha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe nga murahu ha ṱumanywa na vhugevhenga ha dzhia ndaulo ya muvhuso, vhufhura khathihi na vha na masheleni tshandanguvhoni.
tgt_text: Isamba esengeziwe sezigidi ezingama-R. 086 sibekelwe ukuthi sisize ekusunguleni izindawo zokuhlala zabantu ezisimeme nezihlanganisiwe ngohlelo lweSibonelelo Sokuthuthukiswa Kwezindawo Zokuhlalisa Abantu..     IKhabhinethi yamukele usizo lwesihe oluvela ezweni lase-Qatar lokudla okusemathinini, izingubo zokugqoka, ama-generator, okokuhlanza amanzi, okokungenisa umoya ohlanzekile, amathende kanye nemikhiqizo yokwelapha.

src_text: Nyambedzano vhukati ha mazhendezi mihasho mulayo vhukati ha shango ḽa UAE na ḽa Afrika Tshipembe dzi khou bvelaphanḓa farwa havho hu sumbedza vhuḓiimiseli ha muvhuso kha ulwa na vhugevhenga khathihi na tshanḓanguvhoni hu si na nyofho kana tshiḓivhano farwa ha avho vhanna zwi sumbedza ri nḓila dza kutshimbidzele kwa zwithu dzi khou shuma zwavhuḓi kha vhona ri vhakandekanyaho mulayo vha khou livhanyiswa na wo nahone huna muthu re nṱha ha mulayo..     Khabinethe yo sasaladza maitele mavhi u nyadza ikonomi na shango ḽashu nga murahu ha zwiito zwa tshinyadzwa ha thambo dza muḓagasi ngei kha Yunithi 1 ya Tshiṱitshi tsha Muḓagasi tsha Eskom vunḓuni ḽa Mpumalanga.
tgt_text: Lo mnikelo uzosiza izakhamuzi ezingaphezu kwezi-4 000 ezisahlaliswe okwesikhashana ezikhungweni zomphakathi.

src_text: Ndi lwa vhuṋa izwo zwiito zwa tshinyadzwa ha zwiṱitshi zwa muḓagasi zwi tshi khou bvelela nga murahu ha musi hu tshi khou tou bva vhigwa zwiṅwe zwiraru zwe zwa tshinyadzwa vhegeni dzo fhiraho.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iphinde yamukela usizo lwesihe oluvela e-United Arab Emirates (e-UAE) lokudla okusemathinini kanye namanzi ukusiza labo abakhahlanyezwe izikhukhula zakamuva.

src_text: Mbalombalo dza zwiito zwa vhugevhenga dza zwezwino dzi tou vha tsumbo ya ri hu tshe na mushumo muhulwane une lushaka lwa fanela ita ri lushaka lu kone tsireledzea.
tgt_text: Ukwethulwa kweSikhwama Sokusungula Imisebenzi Emphakathini.

src_text: Zwiito zwa vhugevhenga zwi khou bvelelaho zwi ri sumbedza ri nḓila ya fhungudza vhugevhenga ndi vhuḓifhinduleli hashu roṱhe sa lushaka - ri tshi katela mapholisa, vharangaphanḓa vha madzangano poḽotiki, vhorambindu, vhashumi khathihi na vhadzulapo - roṱhe nga tou angaredza ri fanela ulwa na zwiito zwa vhugevhenga..     Khabinethe khou fulufhela ri gwama ḽe ḽa ṋetshedzwa vha Minisiṱiri wa Mapholisa itela thusa zwiṱitshi zwa mapholisa zwine zwa vha na tshivhalo tsha nṱha kha milandu ingaho mabulayo tshipiwa khathihi na mińwe milandu zwi ḓo thusa ri zwitshavha zwa vhathu zwi tsireledzee.
tgt_text: 1    IKhabhinethi yamukele ukwethulwa kweSikhwama Sokusungula Imisebenzi Emphakathini sivulwa yiNhlangano Yokuthuthukiswa Kwezimboni (i-IDC) ngokubambisana neHhovisi likaMongameli ne-DTIC.

src_text: Maswamaswa nga ha dwadze ḽa COVID-.
tgt_text: Ukweseka lokhu kuzohlinzeka ngamathuba omsebenzi afinyelela kwizi-50 000 kubantu abasha emsebenzini odingwa umphakathi owenziwa emiphakathini yendawo.. 2    Lokhu kweseka kuzobandakanya ukunakekela ngokwezempilo nokomphakathi, usizo lokudla nesondlo olufana nokuphekela labo abaswele, ukugqugquzelwa kokufunda nokubhala, izinhlelo zokunakekelwa kwemvelo kanye nokuqedwa kokuguquguquka kwesimo sezulu kanye nemizamo yokweseka intsha.

src_text: Khabinethe yo humbudza lushaka zwauri dwadze ḽa COVID-19 ḽi tshe hone nahone ri fanela isa phanḓa na maitele oṱhe u ḓitsireledza na tsireledza vhańwe.
tgt_text: ISikhwama sizosiza amabhizinisi omphakathi futhi angabheke nzuzo angama-.

src_text: Maitele u ḓitsireledza katela ṱamba zwanḓa kana sanithaiza zwanḓa misi yoṱhe dzulela ambara masiki ri dzi pherani dzulela sia tshikhala tsho teaho vhukati ha muthu na muṅwe vula mafasiṱere ri hu dzhene muya khathihi na hayeliwa..     Guvhangano ḽa Mbumbano ya Afrika (AU).
tgt_text: Ubugebengu nenkohlakalo.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱangadzedza mulevho, muani na vhuḓikumedzeli zwo dzhiwaho kha Guvhangano ḽi lwaho na maitele zwa Vhuravhele na Dzitshandukiso dzi si ho Mulayoni kha dzhango ḽa Afrika wo farelwaho Malabo, kha Riphabuḽiki ya Equatorial Guinea, nga Mugivhela wa ḽa 28 Shundunthule.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamukele ukuboshwa kwabantu abaningi okuxhumene nokukhwabanisa, ukushushumbiswa kwemali kanye nenkohlakalo.

src_text: Vharangaphanḓa vha mashango ḽa Afrika vho lavhelesa zwiwo zwa shushedza, vha sedza nḓila ya khwine ya kufhindulele kha ayo maitele khathihi na ḓiimisela tsireledza mashango ane avha miraḓo ya dzangano ane khou ṱangana na khaedu dza zwa vhuravhele na maitele u vhaiswa..     Vhulwadze ha Monkeypox.
tgt_text: Lokhu kubandakanya abasebenzi baphambilini bakahulumeni ezikhundleni eziphezulu, abanye ababhekene namacala ahlobene nokuphula uMthetho Wokuphathwa Kwezimali Zikahulumeni, we-1999 (uMthetho woku-1 we-1999).

src_text: Khabinethe yo ḓivhadza vhadzulapo vha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe zwa ri vha zwa ndondolo ya mutakolo vho ḓiimisela tshothe kha lavhelesana na thivhela vhulwadze ha Monkeypox, zwi tshi tevhela dzhena haho kha mashango vhalaho songo ḓoweleaho kha zwa tshoṱelwa nga malwadze.
tgt_text: Lokhu kuboshwa - okubandakanya ukuboshwa kwalowo oyisikhulu soMnyango Wezasekhaya esikhungweni sokwamukela ababaleki i-Desmond Tutu Refugee Reception Centre ePitoli osolwa ngokwamukela intshontsho kowokufika kuleli - kuyisibonelo sokuthi akekho ongaphezu komthetho futhi abasebenzi abangathembekile ngeke babekezelelwe emkhakheni kahulumeni..     IKhabhinethi iphinde yamukela inqubekelaphambili eyenziwe ukubuyisa izelamani zakwa-Gupta, u-Rajesh no-Atul, eNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Ngeno kha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe hu saathu vha na muthu na muthihi no ṱolwaho kana kavhiwaho nga uvho vhulwadze, vha zwa ndondolo ya mutakalo kha ḽi no shango vha kati tshoṱhe na lavhelesana na uvho vhulwadze     Tsheo dza Khabinethe.
tgt_text: Lokhu kulandela ukuthi kamuva bekhalelwe ngamasongo kaSigonyela e-Dubai e-UAE emva kokuthi Inhlangano Yamazwe Yamaphoyisa (i-Interpol) iwuhlabe yawulawula.

src_text: Vhukwamani na Lushaka nga ha Maga ane nga Dzhiwa kha Ulwa na Zwiito zwi si ho Mulayoni zwa Rengisa Tsimbi dza Kale.
tgt_text: Lezi zelamani ziyafuneka eNingizimu Afrika ngezinsolo zokubandakanyeka ekuqhwagweni kwamandla ombuso, okufaka phakathi ukukhwabanisa kanye nokushushumbiswa kwemali.

src_text: Khabinethe yo tendelana na zwa ri huvhe na nyambedzano dzi katelaho lushaka nga ha khumbelo dzo ṱahisiwaho dza thivhela zwiito zwa rengiswa ha tsimbi dza kale na dza zwino.
tgt_text: Izingxoxo phakathi kwabomthetho e-UAE naseNingizimu Afrika ngokubuyiswa kwabo ziyaqhubeka.

src_text: Zwa tswiwa ha tsimbi dza kale na thambo dza khopha kha themamveledziso dza muvhuso zwi kwama nyaluwo ya ikonomi nga nḓila si yavhuḓi..     Khaedu dzine dza vha hone dzi katela kwamea ha nḓisedzo ya muḓagasi na tshumelo dza zwidimela nga murahu ha tshinyadzwa ha zwiporo.
tgt_text: Ukuboshwa kwabo kubonisa ukuzimisela kukahulumeni ukulwa nobugebengu nenkohlakalo ngaphandle kokwesaba ukwenzelela..     Lokhu kuboshwa kubonisa ukuthi inqubo nezindlela-kusebenza zisebenza ngempumelelo ukuthi ababhebhezeli bobugebengu babhekane namacala ezenzo zabo futhi kuqinisekisa ukuthi akekho ongaphezu komthetho..     IKhabhinethi iyawugxeka kakhulu umzamo osobala nje wokudicilela phansi umnotho wethu kanye nezwe lakithi kulandela ukonakaliswa okubi kwentambo kagesi kwi-Unit 1 eSiteshini Sogesi i-Matla sakwa-Eskom eMpumalanga.

src_text: Izwi zwi kwama vhaṋameli nga vha engedzela thaidzo ya masheleni u tshimbila nga murahu ha tshinyadzwa ha zwidimela.
tgt_text: Lesi bekuyisigameko sesine okusolwa ukuthi ngesokucekela phansi esiteshini sogesi emva kokuthi kube nezigameko ezifanayo ezibikiwe kwezinye iziteshi zogesi ezintathu emavikini ambalwa edlule.

src_text: Thambo dza muḓagasi dzo ṱhukhukanywaho dzi vhea lushaka kha tshiimo tsha khombo, nga maanḓa vhana vhaṱuku..     Khabinet yo ṋea maanḓa vha Muhasho wa dtic ri vha tshimbidze iyo miṱangano nga tshifhinga tshe vha ṋewa tshone, nahone vha fanela vhudzisa lushaka uri hu fanela itwa mini ri muvhuso kone fhelisa maitele mavhi u tshinyadzwa ha themamveledziso dza vhuṱhogwa kha khwaṱhisa ikonomi.
tgt_text: Izibalo zakamuva zobugebengu zibonisa ukuthi kumele sisebenze kakhudlwana njengomphakathi ukuze senze ukuthi imiphakathi yethu iphephe.

src_text: Zwezwo nga murahu, Khabinethe ḓo kona ṱahisa maga khethwaho kha ulwa na yo maitele     Vhuṱambo vhune ha khou ḓa.
tgt_text: Lokhu kusikhumbuza ukuthi ukunciphisa ubugebengu kungumsebenzi womphakathi wonke kanye nathi sonke - kubandakanya amaphoyisa, abaholi bezepolitiki, imiphakathi, imindeni, osomabhizinisi, abasebenzi nomphakathi - kumele sidlale indima yethu ekulweni nobugebengu..     IKhabhinethi inethemba lokuthi izimali ezengeziwe ezibekwe eqhulwini nguNgqongqoshe Wamaphoyisa ezizoya eziteshini zamaphoyisa ezinamanani aphezulu amacala okubulala, awokudlwengula kanye nobunye ubugebengu obunodlame zizosiza ukuguqula isimo futhi kubuyise nokuphepha emiphakathini kuwo wonke umuntu.

src_text: Tshumisano ya Mbumbano ya Dzitshaka (UN) kha zwa Thekhinoḽodzhi na Peacekeeping International Symposium (PTPS).
tgt_text: Ezakamuva nge-COVID-.

src_text: Shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe ḽi ḓo dovha hafhu ḽa fara muṱangano wa vhurathi wa zwa PTPS na vha Khoro ya Sainthifiki na Thoḓisiso ya Nḓowetshumo ngei Piṱori bva nga Ḽavhuvhili, ḽa 24 Fulwi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikhumbuze wonke umuntu ukuthi i-COVID-19 ayikapheli futhi ubungozi bokutheleleka okusha buzokhula ngesikhathi sobusika.

src_text: Muṱangano uyo khou lavhelelwa dzhenelwa nga vharangaphanḓa vha swikaho 300 vha bvaho kha mashango ane vha miraḓo swikaho.
tgt_text: Kumele siqhubeke nokuqaphela ukuze sizozivikela thina kanye nabanye abantu.

Lokhu kufaka phakathi ukuhlanza izandla noma ukusebenzisa isibulali-magciwane njalo nje, ukugqoka isifonyo uma ungaphakathi kwesakhiwo, ukugcina igebe elanele phakathi kwabanye abantu, ukuvula amafasitela ukuze kuzongena umoya ohlanzekile kanye nokugoma.

src_text: Muṱangano uyo ḓo dzhenelwa nga maswole, mapholisa, na vhathu vha bvaho kha mashango ane vha miraḓo ya UN vha tshiitela pfumbudzana nga ha thekhinoḽodzhi ya tshizwino, yo khwinifhadzwaho na mbekanyamaitele dza vhurangeli kha puḽane dza UN.
tgt_text: INgqungquthela YoBumbano Lwamazwe ase-Afrika (i-AU).

src_text: Muṱangano uyo ḓo shumiswa sa fhethu ha ṱahisa mafhungo fhambanaho khathihi na fha zwikhala miraḓo ya UN vhane vha vha tshipiḓa tsha zwa ḓisa mulalo hu tshi khou shumiswa thekhinoḽodzhi ya puḽane dza ḓisa mulalo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi yamukele isimemezelo, izethembiso kanye nezibopho ezithathwe kwiNgqungquthela Eyingqayizivele ye-AU ebimayelana noBuphekula Nezinguquko ezingalandeli Umthethosisekelo e-Afrika ebibanjwe e-Malabo, e-Riphabhulikhi yase-Equatorial Guinea, ngoMgqibelo, mhla wama-28 kuNhlaba..     Abaholi base-Afrika bahlolisise izinsongo ezilokhu zibelesele, bahlolisisa izindlela zamanje zokubhekana nalokhu futhi bazinikela ekuqiniseni ukuphepha ngokubambisana kwamazwe angamalungu abhekene nobuphekula namavukela-mbuso.

src_text: Muṱatisano wa Lushaka no Fariwa Ṅwaha Muṅwe na Muṅwe wa Vhuṋa wa ḽa Afrika Tshipembe wa nga ha Zwikili zwa Ḽifhasi (WSZA).
tgt_text: Isifo se-Monkeypox.

src_text: Muṱaṱisano wa lushaka farwaho ṅwaha muṅwe na muṅwe  4th  WSZA khou farelwa ngei Inkosi Albert Luthuli International Convention Centre kha ḽa KwaZulu-Natal bva nga ḽa 7 swika 10 Fulwi 2022 nga fhasi ha thero ya: “Ratcheting up the Production of 21st Century Artisans”..     Tshipikwa tsha farwa ha uyo muṱangano ndi ṱuṱuwedza zwikili zwa athizene sa izwi ḽi buḓo ḽi shumaho zwavhuḓi khathihi na vula zwikhala zwa vhushumisani kha iḽo buḓo dovha hafhu wa shumiswa sedzuluse zwikalo zwa vhane vho lugelwa nga guda khathihi na kona vhona uri ndi vhafhio vhane vha nga khwinifhadza nga kha tshikhala tsha ṱanganedza vhagudi vhane vha khou ṱoda dzhia athizene sa buḓo ḽavho     MilaedzaNdiliso Khabinethe yo tevhedza Phresindennde Vho Ramaphosa kha rumela ndiliso kha vha muṱa wa Vhuhosini na lushaka lwa vha amaMpondo Kingdom zwi tshi tevhela ri sia shango ha KhosiKhulu Vho Zanozuko Tyelovuyo Sigcau  tholwaU tholwa hoṱhe hu ḓo khunyeledzwa lwa tshoṱhe nga murahu ha senguluswa ha ndalukano khathihi na ṱanzwa madzina ho teaho.1)    Vho Jacob Ganny Mbele sa Muofisiri Mulanguli Muhulwane (DG) wa Muhasho wa Zwiko zwa Mineraḽa na Fulufulu2)    Mufumakadzi Vho Pumeza Nwabisa Nodada sa Tshanḓa tsha Muofisiri Mulanguli kha Muhasho wa zwa Mupo Vhusimamiri na Vhureakhovhe3)    Mufumakadzi Vho Susan Mafanedza Masapu sa Mutsivhudzi kha Mulayo Muhulwane kha Muhasho wa Vhulamukanyi na Mveledziso ya Mulayotewa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iqinisekise abantu baseNingizimu Afrika ukuthi iziphathimandla zethu zezempilo zimehlo mane ukuqapha ngeso lokhozi nokugwema isifo se-Monkeypox, kulandela ukuqubuka kwaso emazweni amaningi angajwayele ukuhlaselwa izifo.

src_text: 4)    Mufumakadzi Vho Doris Tshepe sa Mukhomishinari wa Khomishini ya zwa Vhuṱaṱisani.5)    Dokotela Vho Alex Mahapa sa Mueletshedzi wa tshifhinga tshoṱhe kha Minisiṱa Farelaho kha Muhasho wa Tshumelo ya Tshitshavha na Ndaulo.6)    Muimeleli Vho Rams Ramashia sa Mueletshedzi nga zwifhinga kha Minisiṱa Farelaho kha Muhasho wa Tshumelo ya Tshitshavha na Ndaulo.
tgt_text: Yize kungakatholakali noma kungakabikwa muntu onalesi sifo eNingizimu Afrika, iziphathimandla zezempilo kuleli lizwe ziyaqhubeka nokubeka iso isimo     Isinqumo seKhabhinethi.

src_text: Tshanduko ya Kilima.
tgt_text: Ukuguquguquka Kwesimo Sezulu.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza madalo kha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe Vho Alok Sharma, Phresidennde wa Muṱangano wa nga ha Tshanduko ya Kilima wa Dzangano ḽa Mbumbano ya Dzitshaka (UN) wa vhu 26 bva nga ḽa 19 swika ḽa 21 Fulwi 2022 khathihi na tsenguluso yavho ya uri Afrika Tshipembe ḽo sumbedza vhuḓikumedzeli vhu re khagala kha zwa shandukela kha fulufulu ḽo kunaho.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi yamukele uhambo lokuvakashela eNingizimu Afrika kuka-Mnu Alok Sharma, uMongameli wama-26 weNgqungquthela Yezokuguquguquka Kwesimo Sezulu yeNhlangano Yezizwe Ezibumbene (i-UN), kusuka mhla ziyi-19 kuya mhla zingama-21 kuNhlangulana 2022, kanye nokuhlola kwakhe isimo seNingizimu Afrika ukuthi ibonise ukuzinikela okucacile ekuqinisekiseni ukungangcoliswa kwemvelo..     Ngowezi-2021, uMongameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa wahlanganyela nabanye abaholi ekumemezeleni ingqophamlando yokusebenzisana nohulumeni base-France, e-Germany, e-United Kingdom kanye nowase-United States, kanjalo nowase-European Union, ukweseka ukuguqukela emnothweni onekhabhoni encane kanye nomphakathi omelana nesimo sezulu..     INingizimu Afrika ibilokhu isebenza kanzima ekulungiseleleni ukuguqukela nasekuyeni kwimithombo engangcolisi umkhathi ezifana nehayidrojini engangcolisi imvelo, i-biomass, amandla omoya, amandla adonswa elangeni kanye nasemanzini, phakathi kwezinye zamandla avuselelekayo.

src_text: Nga ṅwaha wa 2021, Phresidennde Vho Cyril Ramaphosa vho vha tshipiḓa tsha vhaṅwe vharangaphanḓa musi vha tshi ḓivhadza tshumisano ya ḓivhazwakale vhukati ha shango ḽashu na mivhuso ya mashango fanaho na ḽa France, Germany, United Kingdom, United States, hu tshi katelwa na European Union ya tikedza tshanduko pfadzaho ya ya kha ikonomi ine ya vha na muhasaladzo wa khaboni ya fhasi khathihi na tshitshavha tshi konḓelelaho tshanduko ya kilima.
tgt_text: Le nhlanganisela yamandla ivumela ukuhambisana phakathi kwemithombo yezamandla ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuthembeka kwamandla azohlangabezana nezidingo zamandla zezwe ezikhulayo.

src_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽo shuma vhukuma kha ita ndugiselo dza shandukela kha fulufulu ḽo kunaho khathihi na ya kha zwiko zwa fulufulu ḽo kunaho zwine zwa fana na haiḓirodzheni yo kunaho, bayomasi, fulufulu ḽi bvaho kha muya, fulufulu ḽa masana ḓuvha na fulufulu ḽi bvaho kha maḓi, na zwiṅwe zwinzhi zwi vusuludzeaho.
tgt_text: Ukugomela iSifo Segciwane le-Corona (i-COVID-19).

src_text: Izwo zwine zwa ḓivhiwa sa fulufulu ḽo vanganaho ndi zwone zwine zwa ita uri hu vhe na ndinganyiso vhukati ha zwiko zwa fulufulu hu tshi itelwa khwaṱhisedza nḓisedzo ya fulufulu ḽi fulufhedzeaho uri hu kone swikelwa ṱhoḓea dza fulufulu dzine dza khou engedzea nga luvhilo fhano shangoni shumiswa ha khaelo dza Dwadze ḽa Khoronavairasi (COVID-19).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi yamukele ukwehla okubonakalayo kwabantu abatheleleka nge-COVID-19 eNingizimu Afrika emavikini ambalwa edlule futhi igqugquzele bonke abantu abafanelekile ukuthi baqhubeke bagome, lokho okusiza ukugwema ukugula kakhulu, ukulaliswa esibhedlela kanye nokufa imbala..     Ingxenye yabo bonke abantu abadala eNingizimu Afrika sebethole okungenani umthamo owodwa womgomo we-COVID-19 kuze kube manje.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza tsela fhasi zwihulwane ha zwiwo zwa kavhiwa nga COVID-19 zwe zwa rekhodiwa kha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe kha vhege dzi si gathi dzo fhiraho nahone khou ṱuṱuwedza vhathu vhoṱhe vho teaho uri vha bvele phanḓa na haelwa, zwine hezwi zwa ḓo thusa kha thivhela lwala lwo kalulaho valelwa vhuongeloni na lufu.
tgt_text: Uhulumeni uhlose ukusebenzisa imali ebolekwe kamuva nje enenzalo ephansi esanda kugunyazwa yiBhange Lomhlaba ukuthenga eminye imigomo ye-COVID-19 ukuqinisekisa ukuthi isizwe sivikeleke ngokwanele egciwaneni.

src_text: Hafu ya vhadzulapo vhoṱhe vha vhaaluwa vha Afrika Tshipembe vho no wana phimamushonga ya khaelo nthihi ya COVID-19 swika zwino.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iphinde yacubungula udaba oluhlobene nokuqhubekayo ekulawulweni kobhubhane lwe-COVID-19, ikakhulukazi ngenqubekelaphambili eyenziwayo ukuthi sibuyele ngokuphelele emisebenzini yezenhlalo-mnotho eyejwayelekile.

src_text: Muvhuso khou dzudzanya shumisa masheleni khadzimiso ya nzwalelo dza fhasi ane kha ḓi tou bva tendelwa nga vha Bannga ya Ḽifhasi kha renga dziṅwe phimamushonga dza khaelo ya COVID-19 dza ḓadzisa khathihi na vhona uri lushaka lwo tsireledzwa nga nḓila yo teaho kha kavhiwa hune ha nga vha hone.
tgt_text: UNgqongqoshe Wezempilo, uDkt Joe Phaahla, uzohlinzeka ngeminye imininingwane.

src_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya dzhiela nṱha zwine zwa khou bvelela kha zwa ndangulo ya dwadze ḽa COVID-19, nga maanḓa mvelaphanḓa ine ya khou itwa musi ho sedzwa zwa vhuyela tshoṱhe kha maitele ḓoweleaho zwa ikonomi na matshilisano.
tgt_text: Usuku Lukazwelonke Lwentsha  .

src_text: Minisiṱa wa zwa Mutakalo, Dokotela Vho Joe Phaahla, vha ḓo netshedza zwiṅwe zwidodombedzwa zwa ḓadzisa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ibonge bonke abantu baseNingizimu Afrika ngokuhlanganyela emibungazweni yoSuku Lukazwelonke Lwentsha ngoLwesine, mhla we-16 kuNhlangulana 2022 ngaphansi kwesiqubulo esithi: "Sigqugquzela izindlela zokuphila ezisimeme kanye nokuzimelelela ingomuso elingcono kwabantu abasha."

src_text: Ḓuvha ḽa Vhaswa ḽa Lushaka.
tgt_text: Umoya wentshisekelo kanye nokuzimelela okuboniswe intsha kulolonke izwe nakanjani yikho okuyimbangela yokubungaza kanye nokuba nethemba lekusasa elingcono.

src_text: Khabinethe yo livhuwa vhadzulapo vhoṱhe vha Afrika Tshipembe nge vha dzhenela vhuṱambo ha tshihumbudzi tsha Ḓuvha ḽa Vhaswa ḽa Lushaka nga Ḽavhuṋa, 16 Fulwi 2022 nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “U bveledza mishumo ya tshifhinga tshilapfu khathihi na konḓelela ha vhaswa hu tshi itelwa vhumatshelo havhuḓi.” Muya wa mafulufulu na konḓelela we wa sumbedzwa nga vhaswa mona na shango ḽashu, nangoho ndi zwithu zwine zwa tea fhululedzwa na dzhiiwa sa fulufhelo ḽa vhumatshelo ha khwine.
tgt_text: Njengoba iNyanga Kazwelonke Yentsha iya ekupheleni, masiqinise imizamo yethu yokuqinisekisa ukuthi abantu abasha bayafinyelela ezinhlelweni zokubeseka eziningi ezihlinzekwa nguhulumeni futhi sibheke ukuzibandakanya kwabo emnothweni..     Ezemisebenzi Kahulumeni, njengomqashi omkhulukazi, usebhekane nale nselele ngokuvulela labo abaqede izifundo zabo ezikhungweni eziphakeme abangasebenzi ukuthi bafunde umsebenzi bathole isipiliyoni ngokusebenzisa uhlelo lwe-Public Service Graduate Internship and Learnership Programme.

src_text: Musi ṅwedzi wa Vhaswa wa Lushaka tshi khou swika magumoni, kha ri khwaṱhise nungo dzashu itela uri vhaswa vha kone swikela vhunzhi ha mbekanyamushumo dza thikhedzo dzine dza netshedzwa nga muvhuso khathihi na ṱuṱuwedza zwa dzhenela havho kha ikonomi nga nḓila yo fhelelaho..   Muvhuso, sa wone mutholi muhulwane, wo dzhenelela kha khaedu iyi nga ita uri matshudeni vho phasaho digirii dzavho vhane vha sa shume vha wane tshenzhemo nga kha Mbekanyamushumo dza Ngudo na Vhugudelamushumo dza Muvhuso dzo livhiswaho kha Vhagudiswa vho fhedzaho Digirii dzavho.
tgt_text: Uhulumeni uphinde waqalisa iSikhwama Sokusungula Imisebenzini Emiphakathini (i-SEF) futhi wavuselela imizamo yokusungulwa kwemisebenzi yoHlelo Lukazwelonke Lokusiza Intsha (i-NYS) ngayinye ezodonsela abantu abasha abayizi-50 000 emnothweni.

src_text: Muvhuso khou dovha hafhu wa shumisa Tshikwama Tsha sika Mishumo ya zwa Matshilisano (SEF) khathihi na vusuludza maga u sika mishumo vha tshiimiswa tsha Tshumelo ya Vhaswa ya Lushaka (NYS) lune tshiṅwe na tshiṅwe tsha zwiimiswa izwi tsha ḓo kunga vhaswa vha swikaho 50 000 kha ikonomi.
tgt_text: Le mizamo angeke nje kuphela isize ngesipiliyoni somsebenzi esidingekayo kodwa izogcizelela ukubaluleka kwezakhamuzi ezisebenzayo.

src_text: Haya maga ha nga ḓo tou ṋetshedza fhedzi tshenzhemo ya mushumo ine ya ṱoḓea ngaurali, fhedzi ḓo dovha hafhu khwaṱhisedza ndeme ya vha vhadzulapo vha re na ṱhogomelo.
tgt_text: I-SEF isebenzisana nezinhlangano ezingekho kuhulumeni (ama-NGO) ngesikhathi i-NYS ifaka ohlwini abantu abasha emisebenzini esiza imiphakathi kulolonke leli lizwe..     Ezokuthutha    .

src_text: Vha SEF vha shumisana na madzangano ane si vhe muvhuso (dzi NGO) ngeno vha NYS vha tshi shumisa vhaswa kha tshumelo dzi vhuedzaho tshitshavha mona na shango.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi yamukele iQhingasu Elinamaphuzu ayi-11 okubhekana nokuvalwa kwemigwaqo kanye nokuqashwa kwabantu bakwamanye amazwe njengabashayeli bamaloli.

src_text: Vhuendi.
tgt_text: Iqhingasu, elaqhamuka neKomidi Longqongqoshe Lezemigwaqo Nokuthuthwa Kwempahla (i-IMC) ngokubambisana nababambiqhaza embonini yezemigwaqo nokuthuthwa kwempahla, ligqugquzela phakathi kokunye ukuthotshelwa kwezidingo zezimvume zokuhamba kanye nokuthotshelwa kwemithetho yezabasebenzi.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Puḽane ya Shuma ya Nṱha dza 11 yo livhiswaho kha fhelisa thaidzo dza thivhiwa ha dzibada khathihi na tholwa ha vhadzulapo vha mashango nnḓa sa vhareili vha maṱiraka.
tgt_text: I-IMC yasungulelwa ukubhekana nokunyuka kwezinga lokuvalwa kwemigwaqo kanye nemibhikisho eyenziwa abashayeli bamaloli baseNingizimu Afrika abangeneme.

src_text: Puḽane iyi ye ya bveledzwa nga Komiti ya Vhukati ha Dziminisiṱa ya nga ha Vhuendi ha Badani na Vhuendedzathundu (IMC) vha tshi shumisana na vha nḓowetshumo ya zwa vhuendi ha badani na vhuendedzathundu ṱuṱuwedza zwa khwaṱhiswa ha ṱhoḓea dza visa khathihi na tevhedzwa ha milayo ya zwa vhashumi.
tgt_text: Imibhikisho nokuvalwa kwemigwaqo kuphazamisa kakhulu ukuhamba, kufake itwetwe kubatshalizimali bangaphandle futhi ikakhulukazi, kuthunaza umnotho kanye nokuthunyelwa kwempahla ebalulekile esebenzisa imigwaqo esuke ivaliwe.

src_text: IMC yo vhumbwa hu tshi itelwa tandulula thaidzo dza thivhiwa ha dzibada khathihi na migwalabo ya vhareili vha maṱiraka vha Afrika Tshipembe.
tgt_text: Ukuswelakala kwamanzi kuMkhandludolobha i-Nelson Mandela Bay (i-NMB).

src_text: Migwalabo na thivhiwa ha dzibada zwi kwama matshimbilele vhathu na thundu nga nḓila ine ya si vhe yavhuḓi, zwa tshuwisa vhabindudzi vha mashango nnḓa nahone zwa ndemesa, zwa kwama ikonomi na nḓila dza nḓisedzo dza thundu na tshumelo dza ndeme dzine dza shumisa magondo eneo kwameaho.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi yamukele ukungenelela koMnyango Wezamanzi Nokuthuthwa Kwendle (i-DWS) kuMkhandludodlobha i-NMB eMpumalanga Kapa ukugwema ukwehla kweZinga Lamanzi emadamini njengoba lesi sifundazwe sibhekene nokuswelakala kwamanzi okunzima okuqale ngowezi-.

src_text: Ṱhahelelo ya maḓi kha Masipala Muhulwane wa Nelson Mandela Bay (NMB).
tgt_text: I-DWS isebenzisana nesifundazwe ukuqalisa izinyathelo zesikhathi esifishane, esiphakathi neside ukubhekana nokuqeda umthelela wesomiso ongaba khona.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza maga vha Muhasho wa Maḓi na Vhuthathazwitzhili (DWS) fhaḽa kha Masipala Muhulwane wa NMB kha ḽa Kapa Vhubvaḓuvha u thivhela Ḓuvha ḽa sa vha na Shotha na Ḽithihi ḽa Maḓi sa izwi vunḓu ḽi tshi khou livhana na ṱhahelelo khulwane ya maḓi ye ya thoma bva nga ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iphinde yanxusa abahlali base-NMB ukuthi bathobele imithetho yamanzi ebekwe kumasipala wendawo ukuqinisekisa ukutholakala kwamanzi.

src_text: Vha DWS vha khou shumisana na vunḓu kha thoma shumisa maga tshifhinga tshipfufhi, tsha vhukati na tshilapfu itela tandulula na fhungudza thaidzo ya masiandaitwa gomelelo ane nga vha hone.
tgt_text: Phezu kwakho konke, ukusetshenziswa kwamanzi kufanele kuncishiswe ngamalitha ayizigidi ezingama-50 ngosuku, kusuka ezingeni lamanje elingamalitha ayizigidi ezingama-280 ngosuku kuye emalitheni ayizigidi ezingama-230 ngosuku.

src_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya kwengweledza vhadzulapo vha NMB uri vha tevhedze milayo yo vhewaho ya fhungudzwa ha maḓi nga masipala wapo itela vhona uri hu khou dzulela vha na nḓisedzo yo teaho ya maḓi.
tgt_text: Ubugebengu nenkohlakalo  .

src_text: Nga angaredza, kushumiselwe kwa maḓi ku tea fhungudzwa ya kha ḽithara dza 50 miḽioni nga ḓuvha bva kha tshikalo tsha zwino tsha ḽithara dza 280 miḽioni nga ḓuvha.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi yamukele ukuboshwa kwakamuva kwesikhulu soMnyango Wezasekhaya ehhovisi elise-Benoni ngokukhiphela owokufika wase-Bangladeshi iphasiphothi yomgunyathi.

src_text: Vhugevhenga na zwiito zwa vhuaḓa.
tgt_text: Isikhulu lesi, okunguSibongile Simelane, uthole ibheyili yezi-R5 000 eNkantolo kaMantshi yase-Benoni ngoLwesibili, mhla wama-21 kuNhlangulana.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza farwa ha zwenezwino ha muofisiri wa Muhasho wa Muno ane shuma fhaḽa kha ofisi ya Benoni nge wanala ṋetshedza phasipoto ya vhufhura kha mudzulapo wa shango ḽa Bangladesh.
tgt_text: Owokufika wase-Bangladeshi, uMnu Fahim Kazi, wakhalelwa ngamasongo kaSigonyela ngesikhathi ezama ukuphuma kuleli mhla we-12 kuNhlaba 2022 esebenzisa igama elithi, ‘u-Lebogang Ndlovu’.

src_text: Muofisiri, Mufumakadzi Vho Sibongile Simelane, vho ṋewa beiḽi ya masheleni linganaho R5 000 ngei Khothe ya Madzhisiṱiraṱa ya Benoni nga Ḽavhuvhili, ḽa 21 Fulwi.
tgt_text: UMnyango Wezasekhaya (i-DHA) isanda kuxosha umlingisi we-Lithuanian, uNks Ieva Andrejevaite, obefuna ukuhlukumeza abaphathi abalawula ababaleki eNingizimu Afrika ngesikhathi eziqambela udaba lokufuna ukufaka isicelo sokukhoseliswa ngenxa "yempi ese-Ukraine".

src_text: Mudzulapo wa Bangladesh, Vho Fahim Kazi, vho farwa musi vha tshi khou lingedza ṱuwa kha ḽino nga ḽa 12 Shundunthule 2022 vha tshi khou shumisa dzina ḽa, ‘Lebogang Ndlovu’.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyawuncoma kakhulu umsebenzi owenziwe uPhiko lwe-DHA Olulwisana Nenkohlakalo.

src_text: Muhasho wa zwa Muno (DHA) kha ḓi tou bva humisela murahu shangoni ḽawe mutambi wa matambwa bvaho kha ḽa Lithuania, Mufumakadzi Vho Ieva Andrejevaite vhe vha lingedza shumisa milayo nga nḓila ine ya si vhe yone ya ndangulo ya zwa vhufhalali ya shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe musi vha tshi luka mafhungo mazwifhi uri vha khou ṱoḓa ita khumbelo ya ṋewa vhudzumbamo nga mulandu wa “nndwa ine ya khou bvela phanḓa ngei kha ḽa Ukraine”.
tgt_text: Ishayela ihlombe futhi igqugquzela bonke abantu baseNingizimu Afrika ukuthi baqhubeke nokubika lezi zenzo zobugebengu.

src_text: Khabinethe yo fhululedza mushumo une wa khou itwa nga vha Yunithi ya lwa na Zwiito zwa Vhuaḓa ya DHA.
tgt_text: Izenzo ezingekho emthethweni zabantu baseNingizimu Afrika abadayisa ubunikazi babo zinomthelela omubi kakhulu ekuvikelekeni kwezwe kanye nesimo senhlalo-mnotho.

src_text: Yo khoḓa na ṱuṱuwedza vhadzulapo zwavho vha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe uri vha bvele phanḓa na vhiga zwiito zwenezwo zwa vhugevhenga.
tgt_text: Uhulumeni uzoqhubeka nokubhekana kanzima nanoma ngubani obandakanyeka ezenzweni ezingekho emthethweni ezibukela phansi imithetho yethu yokungena nokuphuma kuleli lizwe, ngaphandle kokusaba ukwenzelela.

src_text: Zwiito zwi siho mulayoni zwa vhadzulapo vha Afrika Tshipembe vhane vha rengisa ṱhalusavhuṋe dzavho zwi na masiandaitwa vhavhaho vhukuma kha tsireledzo ya shango na tshiimo tshaḽo tsha zwa ikonomi na matshilisano.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iphinde yamukela ukulahlwa yicala nokugwetshwa kothisha waseThekwini, uNks Nomusa Precious Gabuza (37) – owagwetshwa iminyaka emithathu azoyidonsa ngaphandle kanye neminyaka emine engaphakathi, kwalengiswa kuyoyonke emithathu, eNkantolo kaMantshi yaseMlazi KwaZulu Natali - ngokuphula uMthetho Wezokhetho Lohulumeni Basekhaya, wangowezi-2000 (UMthetho wama-27 wezi-2000).

src_text: Muvhuso ḓo bvela phanḓa na lwa nga nḓila yo fhelelaho na muthu muṅwe na muṅwe ane ḓidzhenisa kha zwiito zwi siho mulayoni zwine zwa fhedza zwi tshi nyadzisa milayo yashu ya zwa vhupfuluwi, hu si na nyofho kana dzhia sia.
tgt_text: Njengothisha wasesikoleni esasisetshenziswa njengesikhungo sokuvota ngesikhathi Sokhetho Lomasipala ngoMfumfu ngowezi-2021, uNks Gabuza uwavumile amacala okukhwabanisa amavoti angama-24, kufaka phakathi ayi-12 oKhetho Lomasipala namanye ayi-12 oKhetho Lwesigceme.

src_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ṱanganedza wanwa mulandu na gwevhiwa ha zwenezwino ha mudededzi wa fhaḽa ḓoroboni ya Durban Mufumakadzi Vho Nomusa Precious Gabuza (37), vhe vha gwevhiwa miṅwaha miraru vhe nga fhasi ha vhulavhelesi ha vhululamisi na miṅwaha miṋa vho valelwa dzhele, tshigwevho itshi tshoṱhe tshi tshi ḓo fhahewa lwa miṅwaha miraru, ngei Khothe ya Dzingu ya Umlazi kha ḽa KwaZulu-Natal nga mulandu wa pfuka Mulayo wa Khetho dza Masipala wa Muvhuso Wapo, wa ṅwaha wa 2000 (Mulayo 27 wa 2000).
tgt_text: Ukulahlwa yicala nokugwetshwa kubonisa ukuzinikela kweKhomishini Yezokhetho eNingizimu Afrika ukungenelela ngesikhathi kanye nokubhekana nemiphumela yesimo.

src_text: Sa mudededzi kha tshikolo tshe tsha vha tshi khou shumiswa sa tshiṱitshi tsha vhukhethelo nga tshifhinga tsha Khetho dza Masipala nga ṅwedzi wa Tshimedzi 2021, Mufumakadzi Vho Gabuza vho ḓivhona mulandu wa vhufhura ha khetha lwa tshivhalo tshi linganaho 24 kha Khetho dza Masipala ngeno huṅwe khetha ha tshiṅwe tshivhalo tshi linganaho 12 vho hu ita kha Khetho dza Wadi.
tgt_text: Lokhu futhi kuyisiqinisekiso sezindlela zokusebenza kwezokhetho, ezilokhu ziqinile selokhu kwethulwa i-Voter Management Device evimbela ukuthi umuntu avote kabili.

src_text: Uhu wanwa mulandu na gwevhiwa hu nyadzisa vhuḓikumedzeli ha Khomishini ya zwa Khetho ya Afrika Tshipembe ha dzhenelela nga tshifhinga khathihi na shumisa maitele ndangulo ya masiandaitwa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iqinisekise ukuthi ukhetho lungummongo wentando yeningi labantu futhi kumele luvikelwe ngazo zonke izindlela..      Ingqungquthela ye-12 YoNgqongqoshe (i-MC12) yeNhlangano Yezohwebo Yomhlaba (i-WTO).

src_text: Hezwi zwi dovha hafhu zwa vha khwaṱhisedzo khulwane ya sisiṱeme dza khetho, dzine bva zwenezwo dzo no mbo ḓi khwaṱhisedzwa nga ḓivhadzwa ha Tshishumiswa zwa Ndangulo ya Vhakhethi tshine tsha kona thivhela zwa voutha luvhili.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi yamukele imiphumela ye-WTO MC12 ebibanjwe e-Geneva, e-Switzerland kusuka mhla ziyi-12 kuya mhla ziyi-17 kuNhlangulana 2022, ikakhulukazi isinqumo sokuthi amazwe afanelekile angeqa ngaphezulu ilungelo lobunikazi bemigomo ye-COVID-19 kuze kube ngowezi-.

src_text: Khabinethe yo khwaṱhisedza uri khetho ndi dzone thikho ya dimokirasi yashu nahone dzi tea tsireledzwa nga nungo dzoṱhe.
tgt_text: Isinqumo sokudlulisela lokhu kwezokwelashwa nokuhlonzwa kwe-COVID-19 simiswe izinyanga eziyisithupha.

src_text: Muṱangano wa Dziminisṱa wa vhu 12 (MC12) wa Dzangano ḽa Mbambadzo ḽa Ḽifhasi (WTO).
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika beyilokhu ihamba phambili esicelweni sokuthi i-WTO isuse amalungelo obunikazi emigomweni ye-COVID-19 lokho okuzoqinisekisa ukufinyelela okulinganayo emigomweni futhi kuvumele namazwe anekhono lokuzikhiqizela imigomo ukuthi enze njalo.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza mvelelo dza WTO MC12 ye ya farelwa fhaḽa Geneva, kha ḽa Switzerland bva nga ḽa 12 swika ḽa 17 Fulwi 2022, nga maanḓa tsheo ya uri mashango teaho nga fhelisa ṱhanziela dza khaelo ya Covid-19 swika nga ṅwaha.
tgt_text: Ingqungquthela iphinde yazinikela kwinqubo evulelekile nebandakanya wonke umuntu ukuguqula yonke imisebenzi yayo futhi yavuma ukuhwebelana okuzobhekana nezinto ezifana nezempilo, ukubeka imikhawulo kuxhaso lwezokudoba, ukumiswa kwesikhashana kokuthengisa ngobuchwepheshe be-inthanethi kanye nokutholakala kokudla     Izinqumo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Tsheo nga ha uri hone izwi zwi nga vha zwo tea pfukiselwa kha dzilafho na vhuṱhaṱhuvhi ha COVID-19 yo humiselwa murahu lwa tshifhinga tsha miṅwedzi ya rathi.
tgt_text: Inqubekelaphambili oHlelweni Lokushintshela Ekusakazeni Ngedijithali (i-BDM).

src_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽo vha ḽone ḽe ḽa ranga phanḓa khuwelelo ya uri vha WTO vha fhelise zwa pfanelo dza ndaka dza vhubveledzi dzine dza vha hone kha khaelo dza COVID-19 lune hezwi zwa ḓo ita uri hu vhe na swikela khaelo nga nḓila linganaho khathihi na ita uri mashango re na vhukoni ha bveledza khaelo dzenedzi ite ngauralo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ibikelwe ngezakamuva oHlelweni lwe-BDM futhi yayiphawula inqubekelaphambili esiyenziwe ngokuxhunywa kwamabhokisi njengengxenye yokushintshela ekusakazeni ngedijithali kusukwa kwi-analogi.

src_text: Muṱangano wo dovha hafhu wa ḓikumedzela kha zwa maitele re khagala nahone katelaho vhoṱhe itela shandukisa mishumo yawo yoṱhe khathihi na tendelana kha nyanḓano dza zwa mbambadzelano hu tshi itelwa tandulula thaidzo dzi fanaho na dza mutakalo ta phimo ya sabusidi ya zwa vhureakhovhe imiswa ha mbambadzo ya zwa makwevho inthanethe na nḓisedzo ya zwiḽiwa  Tsheo dza Khabinethe.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iphinde yagcizelela ukuphuthuma kokuphothula i-BDM ukuze kuzovuleka amagagasi omoya adingwa omakhalekhukhwini, kanye neminye imisebenzi ehlobene nobunye ubuchwepheshe bolwazi nezokuxhumana..     UNgqongqoshe Wezokuxhumana Nobuchwepheshe Bedijithali uKhumbudzo Ntshavheni uzoba nesithangami sabezindaba kusasa (ngoLwesihlanu, mhla wama-24 kuNhlangulana) ukunikeza ngeminye imininingwane.

src_text: Mvelaphanḓa kha Mbekanyamushumo ya Mupfuluwo wa ya kha Khasho ya Didzhithala (BDM).
tgt_text: UMbiko Kazwelonke Wonyaka Ngesimo Samalungelo Ezingane.

src_text: Khabinethe kha ḓi tou bva wana maswamaswa nga ha Mbekanyamushumo ya BDM nahone yo dzhiela nṱha mvelaphanḓa yo no itwaho kha dzheniswa ha dzi- set-top box sa tshipiḓa tsha mupfuluwo wa bva kha anaḽogo ya kha khasho ya didzhithala.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi igunyaze uMbiko wesibili kazwelonke Wonyaka Ngesimo samalungelo Ezingane ukuthi ushicilelwe.

src_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya khwaṱhisedza nḓila ine izwi zwa khunyeledzwa ha BDM zwa vha zwa tshihaḓu ngayo itela vhofholola sipekithiramu tshine tsha ṱoḓea kha zwa vhudavhizani ha ṱhingokhwalwa khathihi na kha miṅwe mishumo elanaho na zwa thekhinoḽodzhi dza mafhungo na vhudavhidzani..  Minisṱa vha Muhasho wa Vhudavhidzani na Thekhinoḽodzhi dza Didzhithala Vho Khumbudzo Ntshavheni vha ḓo vha na muṱangano na vhoramafhungo matshelo nga Ḽavhuṱanu, ḽa 24 Fulwana itela ṋetshedza zwidodombedzwa nga vhuḓalo.
tgt_text: Umbiko lo uhlinzeka ngezakamuva ekuqalisweni kweQhingasu Likazwelonke Lezingane lesikhathi sangowezi-2019 kuya ngowezi-.

src_text: Muvhigo wa Ṅwaha nga Ṅwaha wa nga ha Tshiimo tsha Pfanelo dza Vhana wa Lushaka.
Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Muvhigo wa Ṅwaha nga Ṅwaha wa nga ha Tshiimo tsha Pfanelo dza Vhana wa Lushaka wa vhuvhili uri anḓadzwe.
tgt_text: Umbiko ugqamisa lokho okuzuzwe ngesikhathi sangowezi-2020 kuya kowezi-.

src_text: Muvhigo ṋetshedza maswamaswa nga ha thoma shumiswa ha Puḽane ya Mashumele ya Lushaka ya Vhana kha tshifhinga tsha miṅwaha ya bva 2019 swika.
tgt_text: Uphinde ugqamise izingxenye ezisenezinselele, kubandakanya ukuphepha kwezingane kanye negebe elikhona phakathi kwabadla imbuya ngothi kanye nalabo abadla izambane likapondo uma kubhekwa ezinganeni.

Umbiko uphinde ubonise ukuthi ubhubhane lwe-COVID-19 luzithinte kanjani izingane ngalesi sikhathi..     Izinyathelo zokungenelela eziqaliswa nguhulumeni sihlose ukugcina amalungelo ezingane, njengokubeka koMthethosisekelo weRiphabhulikhi yaseNingizimu Afrika wangowe-.

src_text: Muvhigo bvisela khagala mvelaphanḓa yo rekhodiwaho kha tshifhinga tsha miṅwaha ya bva 2020 swika dovha hafhu wa bvisela khagala masia ane kha ḓi vha na khaedu, ane ha katelwa tsireledzo ya vhana khathihi na tshayandingano ine ya khou endelela vhukati ha vhashai na vhapfumi kha vhenevha vhana.
tgt_text: Ziphinde zeseke izibopho zezwe kwiZivumelwano ze-UN ngaMalungelo Ezingane (i-UNCRC) kanye noSomqulu Wase-Afrika weNhlalakahle Yezingane (i-ACRWC).

src_text: Muvhigo dovha hafhu wa sumbedzisa nga ha uri dwadze ḽa COVID-19 ḽo kwama hani vhana nga tshenetsho tshifhinga..  Maga u dzhenelela ane khou thoma shumiswa nga muvhuso livhiswa kha bveledza pfanelo dza vhana sa zwe dza sumbedziswa zwone kha Ndayotewa ya Riphabuḽiki ya Afrika Tshipembe ya ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika yasayina kokubili i-UNCRC kanye ne-ACRWC..     Umbiko wahlanganiswa ngokuxoxisana neminyango kahulumeni kanye nababambiqhaza abaningi abafanelekile emazingeni kazwelonke nakwizifundazwe.

src_text: Maga aya dovha tikedza vhuḓifhinduleli ha shango kha Thendelano dza nga ha Pfanelo dza Ṅwana dza Dzangano ḽa Mbumbano ya Dzitshaka (UNCRC) khathihi na Thendelanomviswa ya Afrika ya nga ha Pfanelo na Mutakalo wa Ṅwana (ACRWC).
tgt_text: Umbiko ogcwele uzofakwa kwiwebhusayithi yoMnyango Wezokuthuthukiswa Komphakathi: www.dsd.gov.za.

src_text: Shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe ḽo saina thendelano idzi dza UNCRC na ACRWC vhuvhili hadzo..  Muvhigo wo dzudzanywa nga murahu ha vha na vhukwamani na mihasho ya muvhuso khathihi na vhunzhi ha vhashumisani vho teaho bva kha vhuimo ha lushaka ya kha ha mavundu.
tgt_text: Umbiko Ohlanganisiwe weNingizimu Afrika wesithathu kuya kowesithupha oya ku-UNCRC.

src_text: Muvhigo wo fhelelaho ḓo anḓadzwa kha webusaithi ya Muhasho wa Mveledziso ya Matshilisano ine ya vha: www.dsd.gov.za.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikugunyazile ukubekwa ezithebeni koMbiko wesithathu kuya kowesithupha ku-UNCRC.

src_text: Muvhigo wo Ṱanganywaho wa vhuraru swika kha wa vhurathi wa Afrika Tshipembe wa Misi nga Misi wo livhiswaho kha UNCRC.
tgt_text: Lo mbiko ulandela uMbiko wesibili owethulelwa i-UNCRC ngowezi-..     Umbiko uhlanganiswe ngokulandela iSihloko sama-44 se-UNCRC, futhi uqukethe okuboniwe kanye nezincomo ezenziwe kumbiko owedlule.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza ṋetshedzwa ha Muvhigo wa Misi nga misi wa vhuraru swika kha wa vhurathi kha vha UNCRC.
tgt_text: I-UNCRC yathumela lokho eyakuthola kanye nezincomo zezwe ngowezi-..     Ukuhlanganiswa kwawo kwenziwa ngokuxoxisana nayoyonke iminyango efanele kanye nababambiqhaza ezweni lonkana.

src_text: Muvhigo uyu khou vha hone nga murahu ha Muvhigo wa Misi nga misi wa vhuvhili we wa ṋetshedzwa kha vha UNCRC nga ṅwaha wa..  Muvhigo wo dzudzanywa ya nga Tshiteṅwa tsha vhu 44 tsha UNCRC nahone katela mawanwa na themendelo dze dza itwa bva kha muvhigo wa fhedzisela.
tgt_text: Umbiko ogcwele uzokhishelwa umphakathi uma usudlule ezithebeni ze-UNCRC.

src_text: Vha UNCRC vho rumela mawanwa na themendelo dzavho vha tshi itela shango nga ṅwaha wa..  Nzudzanyo ya muvhigo uyu yo itwa nga murahu ha vhukwamani na mihasho yoṱhe khathihi na vhashumisani vho teaho mona na shango.
tgt_text: Umbiko kazwelonke ngokuqaliswa koHlelo Olusha Lokuthuthukiswa Kwamadolobha i-New Urban Agenda.

src_text: Muvhigo wo fhelelaho ḓo anḓadzwa musi wo no ranga ṋetshedzwa kha vha UNCRC.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi igunyaze ukulethwa kombiko kazwelonke wokuqala waseNingizimu Afrika ngokuQaliswa koHlelo Olusha Lokuthuthukiswa Kwamadolobha oHlelweni Lokuhlaliswa Kwabantu lwe-UN (i-UN-Habitat).

src_text: Muvhigo wa lushaka nga ha thoma shumiswa ha Adzhena Ntswa ya Vhupo ha Dziḓoroboni.
tgt_text: I-UN-Habitat yamukela UHlelo lwayo Olusha Lokuthuthukiswa Kwamadolobha kwiNgqungquthela yayo Yokwakha kanye Nokuthuthukiswa Okusimeme Kwamadolobha ngoMfumfu ngowezi-.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza ṋetshedzwa ha muvhigo wa thoma wa lushaka wa Afrika Tshipembe wa nga ha thoma shumiswa ha Adzhenda Ntswa ya Vhupo ha Dziḓoroboni kha vha khetheanyo ya Mbekanyamushumo ya zwa Vhudzulo ha Vhathu ya UN (UN-Habitat).
tgt_text: Amazwe angamalungu ayelindeleke ukuthi alethe imibiko yenqubekelaphambili ngokuzithandela.

src_text: UN-Habitat yo ṱanganedza Adzhenda yayo Ntswa ya Vhupo ha Dziḓoroboni kha Muṱangano wayo wa nga ha Dzinnḓu na Mveledziso ya Vhupo ha Dziḓoroboni ha Tshifhinga Tshilapfu nga ṅwedzi wa Tshimedzi.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika yakweseka ukwamukelwa koHlelo Olusha Lokuthuthukiswa Kwamadolobha futhi yalandelisa ngokuqalisa ukulisebenzisa oHlakeni Oludidiyelwe Lokuthuthukiswa Kwamadolobha (i-IUDF).

src_text: Mashango ane vha miraḓo vha khou lavhelelwa ṋetshedza mivhigo ya nga ha mvelaphanḓa nga one aṋe nga tou funa hao.
tgt_text: I-IUDF ihlose ukuhlahla indlela ekuthuthukisweni kwezindawo zamadolobha ezifaka wonke umuntu, ezinamandla nekuphilekayo kuzona..     Umbiko wenqubekelaphambili wahlanganiswa ngokuxoxisana nezinhlaka zikahulumeni kuzwelonke, ezifundazweni nasemakhaya, kanye nama-NGO afanele.

src_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽo tikedza zwa ṱanganedzwa ha Adzhenda Ntswa ya Vhupo ha Dziḓoroboni ḽa dovha hafhu nga tshenetsho tshifhinga ḽa thoma i shumisa nga kha mbekanyamushumo ya Muhanga wa Mveledziso ya Vhupo ha Dziḓoroboni wo Ṱanganelaho (IUDF) wa shango ḽashu.
tgt_text: IQhingasu Elididiyelwe Lokuthuthukiswa Kwentsha (i-IYDS).

src_text: Heyi mbekanyamushumo ya IUDF ndi ine yo livhiswa kha tshimbidza mveledziso ya vhudzulo ha vhupo ha dziḓoroboni vhu katelaho vhoṱhe ha tshifhinga tshilapfu nahone vhune ha dzulea..  Uyu muvhigo wa nga ha mvelaphanḓa wo dzudzanywa nga murahu ha musi ho ranga vha na vhukwamani kha masia muvhuso wa lushaka, wa mavundu na muvhuso wapo hu tshi katelwa na dziNGO dzo teaho.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi igunyaze ukuqaliswa kwe-IYDS.

src_text: Puḽane ya Mveledziso ya Vhaswa yo Ṱanganelaho (IYDS).
tgt_text: Leli qhingasu lingumphumela weNqubomgomo Kazwelonke Yentsha yangowezi-2020 kuya kowezi-.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza zwa thoma shumiswa ha IYDS.
tgt_text: Icacisa izinyathelo, imiklamo kanye nezinhlelo okumele zithathwe ngababambiqhaza abehlukahlukene abaphuma ezinhlanganweni zentsha.

src_text: Heyi ndi yone puḽane yo itaho uri hu vhe na Mbekanyamaitele ya Vhaswa ya Lushaka ya miṅwaha ya vhukati ha 2020 swika bvisela khagala mishumo, thandela ya mbekanyamushumo dzine dza tea itwa nga vhoṱhe vha kwameaho nga fhambana havho bva kha madzangano vhaswa dovha hafhu ya sedza kha zwa fhungudza dovhololwa hu sa fheli ha maga u dzhenelela ha muvhuso khathihi na tsivhudza nga ha nḓila ine tshitshvha na sekhithara dza phuraivethe vha nga tikedza ngayo vhaswa kha uri vha kone swikela zwikhala zwine zwa vha hone.
tgt_text: Iphinde ibhekane nokunciphisa ukuphindaphinda izingenelelo zikahulumeni futhi iphinde ibe ngumhlahlandlela wokuthi umphakathi kanye nomkhakha ozimele ungabeseka kanjani abantu abasha ukuthi bafinyelele emathubeni.

src_text: Nzudzanyo puḽane iyi ndi ine ya katela mihumbulo yo fhambanaho ine ya bva kha sekhithara dza tshitshavha dzo fhambanaho.
tgt_text: Ukuhlanganiswa kwaleli qhingasu kubandakanya imibono eyehlukene ephuma kwimikhakha eyehlukene yomphakathi.

src_text: Mvetamveto ya Nḓivhadzamulayotibe wa nga ha Ndondolo ya mupo na Kushumisele kwa Tshifhinga Tshilapfu kwa Zwithu zwi Tshilaho nga Fhambana hazwo zwa fhano Afrika Tshipembe.
tgt_text: UMthetho Odingidwayo Osahlongozwa Ngokongiwa Kwemvelo kanye Nokusetshenziswa Okusimeme Kwezitshalo Nezilwane Eziphilayo eNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza mvetamveto ya Nḓivhadzamulayotibe wa nga ha Ndondolo ya mupo na Kushumisele kwa Tshifhinga Tshilapfu kwa Zwithu zwi Tshilaho nga Fhambana hazwo zwa fhano Afrika Tshipembe hu tshi itelwa uri hu vhe na vhupfiwa ha nnyi na nnyi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi igunyaze uMthetho Odingidwayo osahlongozwa Ngokongiwa Kwemvelo kanye Nokusetshenziswa Okusimeme Kwezitshalo Nezilwane Eziphilayo eNingizimu Afrika ukuthi umphakathi uphawule ngawo.

src_text: Zwithu zwi tshilaho zwa fhano Afrika Tshipembe zwi ṋetshedza mutheo wa ndeme wa nyaluwo na mveledziso ya ikonomi nahone ndi zwa ndeme kha matshilo vhathu..   Heyi Nḓivhadzamulayotibe bveledza themendelo dzo itwaho nga Phanele ya Vhaḓivhi vha Maimo Nṱha ye ya tholwa nga ṅwaha wa 2019 itela sengulusa mbekanyamaitele dzashu dzine dza vha hone zwazwino, milayo na maitele nga ha mafhungo elanaho na tshaka dza zwithu zwi tshilaho nga fhambana hazwo..   Muvhigo wo themendela uri hu bveledzwe mbekanyamaitelenyangaredzi ya nga ha ndondolo ya mupo na kushumisele kwa tshifhinga tshilapfu kwa zwithu zwi tshilaho zwa ḽino shango.
tgt_text: Izitshalo nezilwane eziphilayo eNingizimu Afrika kunikeza ngesisekelo esibalulekile ekukhuleni nasekuthuthukeni komnotho, futhi zibucayi kakhulu ezindleleni zokuziphilisa zabantu.

src_text: Mbekanyamaitele ḓo thoma shumiswa kha masia oṱhe muvhuso.
Ndondolo ya mupo ndi ya ndeme kha fulo ḽa shango ḽa ita hu vhe na nyaluwo ya ikonomi khathihi na sikwa ha mishumo nga ṱavhanya.
tgt_text: UMthetho Osadingidwa ungumphumela wezincomo ezenziwa iThimba Eliphezulu Lezingcweti elabekwa ngowezi-2019 ukubuyekeza izinqubomgomo zethu esinazo, imithetho kanye nemikhuba esenza ngayo ezindabeni ezihlobene nezitshalo nezilwane ezibalulekile.

src_text: Puḽane dza nga ha Ṋama ya Phukha.
Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza anḓadzwa ha mvetamveto ya Puḽane dza nga ha Ṋama ya Phukha hu tshi itelwa vhupfiwa ha nnyi na nnyi.
tgt_text: Umbiko ubeke isincomo sokuthuthukiswa kwenqubomgomo egcwele yokongiwa kwemvelo nokusetshenziswa okusimeme kwezitshalo nezilwane eziphilayo zakuleli lizwe.

src_text: Puḽane idzi ndi dze dza livhiswa kha ṱoḓa lingedza shandukisa na ita uri nḓowetshumo ya ṋama ya phukha vhe yo dzudzanyeaho.
tgt_text: Le nqubomgomo izoqalisa ukusebenza kuzozonke izinhlaka zikahulumeni.

src_text: Dzi dovha hafhu dza lingedza shela mulenzhe kha mveledziso ya zwiḽiwa nga nḓila ine ya nga vha ya tshifhinga tshilapfu.
tgt_text: Ukongiwa kwemvelo kubalulekile emkhankasweni wezwe wokuqhubela phambili ukukhula komnotho nokusungulwa kwemisebenzi.

src_text: Nḓowetshumo ya ṋama ya phukha kanzhi ndi nḓowetshumo ine yo ngo dzudzanyea nahone shuma nga nḓila ya zwipiḓapiḓa.
tgt_text: IQhingasu Ngenyama Yenyamazane.

src_text: Puḽane iyi ine ya khou dzinginywa ṋetshedza nḓila dza uri thome shumiswa dzine dza vha dzone dzine dza ḓo ita uri vhe yo dzudzanyeaho khathihi na khwaṱhisa sekhithara sa yone muṋetshedzi wa mveledziso ya zwiḽiwa khathihi na vha sekhithara ya nyaluwo ya ikonomi ine ya nga thusa kha sika zwikhala zwa mishumo  Milayotibe.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi igunyaze ukushicilelwa koMthetho Ohlongozwayo weQhingasu Ngenyama Yenyamazane ukuze umphakathi uzophawula ngawo.

src_text: Mulayotibe wa Khwiṋiso nga angaredza ya Mafhungo Sialala wa ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: Leli qhingasu lihlose ukufaka emthethweni futhi liguqule imboni yenyama yenyamazane.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza ṋetshedzwa ha Mulayotibe wa Khwiṋiso nga angaredza wa Mafhungo Sialala wa ṅwaha wa 2022 kha Phalamennde itela uri hu haseledzwe nga hawo.
tgt_text: Liphinde lihlose ukufaka igalelo ekutholakaleni kokudla ngendlela esimeme.

src_text: Khwiṋiso idzi dzo livhiswa kha shandukisa Mulayo wa zwa Sialala na Vhurangaphanḓa ha MaKhoi-San, wa ṅwaha wa 2019 (Mulayo wa vhu3 wa 2019), we wa thoma shuma bva nga ḽa 1 Lambamai.
tgt_text: Imboni yenyama yenyamazane ngokuvamile iyimboni engahlelekile esebenza ngokwehlukana phakathi.

src_text: Mulayotibe wa khwiṋiso ya Tsireledzo ya Dimokirasi kha Zwiito zwa Vhutherorisi na zwiṅwe zwi Elanaho Nazwo wa.
tgt_text: Iqhingasu elihlongoziwe lihlinzeka ngesu lokuliqalisa elizokwenza ukuthi umkhakha lo uhleleke futhi uqine njengomhlinzeki wokudla kanye nomkhakha okhulisa umnotho lokho okuzosiza ukusungula amathuba omsebenzi     IMithethosivivinywa.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza ṋetshedzwa ha Mulayotibe wa Khwiṋiso ya Tsireledzo ya Dimokirasi kha Zwiito zwa Vhutherorisi na zwiṅwe zwi Elanaho Nazwo wa ṅwaha wa 2022 kha Phalamenndeni itela uri hu haseledzwe nga hawo.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Wezezindaba Zendabuko wangowezi-.

src_text: Musi wo no ṱanganedzwa, Mulayotibe ḓo shandukisa Mulayo wa Tsireledzo ya Dimokirasi ya Ndayotewa Kha Vhuthororisi na Zwi elanao nadzo, 2002 (Mulayo wa vhu 22 wa 2004).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi igunyaze ukulethwa koMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Wezezindaba Zendabuko wangowezi-2022 ePhalamende ukuze kuzoqhutshekwa nokuthi udingidwe.

src_text: Mulayotibe uyu wo fhira nga fhasi ha maitele vhukwamani na tshitshavha angalalaho nga murahu ha musi wo ṱanganedzwa nga khabinethe nga ḽa 1 Lambamai.
tgt_text: Izichibiyelo zihlose ukubuyekeza uMthetho Wamasiko Nobuholi babaThwa, wangowezi-2019 (uMthetho wesi-3 wezi-2019), owaqala ukusebenza mhla lu-1 kuMbasa.

src_text: Tshanduko idzi ndi dzine dza khou ḓo lingedza ita uri hu vhe na elana vhukati ha zwishumiswa zwa fhano hayani zwa lwa na zwiito zwa vhutherorisi na maga ḽifhasi a vhetshelwa lwa na zwiito zwenezwo.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Wokuvikelwa kweNtando Yeningi Labantu Engumthethosisekelo kuMaphekula kanye nezenzo Ezihlobene nakho wangowezi-..     IKhabhinethi igunyaze ukulethwa koMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Wokuvikelwa kweNtando Yeningi Labantu Engumthethosisekelo kuMaphekula kanye nezenzo Ezihlobene nakho wangowezi-2022 ePhalamende ukuthi kuqhutshekwe udingidwe.

src_text: Tshanduko idzi dzo dovha hafhu dza sedza kha zwiteṅwa zwe zwa wanala zwi sa elani na ndayotewa nga Khothe ya Ndayotewa.
tgt_text: Uma sewamukelwe, lo Mthethosivivinywa uzochibiyela uMthetho wamanje Wokuvikelwa kweNtando Yeningi Labantu Engumthethosisekelo kuMaphekula kanye nezenzo Ezihlobene nakho, wangowezi-2004 (uMthetho wama-33 wangowezi-2004).

src_text: Sa ḽiṅwe ḽa mashango sainaho thendelano dza Khoro ya Tsireledzo ya UN, Afrika Tshipembe ḽi kombetshedzea shumisa milayo ya mashangoḓavha ine ya lingedza khwaṱhisa maga u fhelisa vhutherorisi ha ḽifhasi nga angaredza   Vhuṱambo vhu ḓaho.
tgt_text: Lo Mthethosivivinywa udlule emphakathini waphawula ngawo emva kokuthi wagunyazwa iKhabhinethi ngoNhlaba ngowezi-.

src_text: Muṱangano wa vhu14 wa mashango Brazili, Russia, India, China na Afrika Tshipembe (BRICS).
tgt_text: Izichibiyelo zihlose ukulinganisa izindlela zaleli lizwe zokulwa nobuphekula nezindlela zomhlaba ezibekiwe.

src_text: Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa vha ḓo ranga phanḓa shela mulenzhe ha Afrika Tshipembe kha Muṱangano wa Vharaphanḓa vha mashango BRICS wa vhu14 une wa ḓo farwa nga vidio ye ya tshimbidzwa nga vha muvhuso wa vhathu wa Riphabuḽiki ya China bva nga Ḽavhuṋa, ḽa 23 swika nga Ḽavhuṱanu, ḽa 24 Fulwi.
tgt_text: Ziphinde zaphendula iziqeshana iNkantolo Yomthethosisekelo ezithole ukuthi azihambisani nomthethosisekelo.

Njengezwe elisayine kuMkhandlu Wezokuvikela we-UN, iNingizimu Afrika ibophezelekile ukuthi ithathe imithetho yamazwe ngamazwe ekuhloswe ngayo ukuqinisa izindlela zokulwa nobuphekula emhlabeni iyisebenzise kuleli     Imicimbi Ezayo.

src_text: Zwa vha hashu muraḓo wa BRICS zwi khou bvela phanḓa na vhuedza shango ḽashu.
tgt_text: INgqungquthela ye-14 ye-Brazil, i-Russia, i-India, i-China neNingizimu Afrika (i-BRICS).

src_text: Ṅwaha wo fhelaho 17% ya thundu dzi vhambadzelwaho nnḓa dza Afrika Tshipembe dzo livhiswa kha mashango BRICS, ngeno 29% ya zwiṱunḓwa zwashu nga angaredza zwo vha zwi tshi bva kha mashango aya.
tgt_text: UMongameli u-Ramaphosa uzohola ukubamba iqhaza kweNingizimu Afrika kwiNgqungquthela Yabaholi ye-14 ye-BRICS ezobanjwa ngobuchwepheshe be-inthanethi ezosingathwa iRiphabhulikhi yaseShayina kusukela ngoLwesine, mhla wama-23 kuya kuLwesihlanu, mhla wama-24 kuNhlangulana.

src_text: Ndeme ya mbambadzo iyi khou bvela phanḓa na engedzea lwe thanganyelo ya mbambadzo yoṱhe ya ḽa Afrika Tshipembe na maṅwe mashango BRICS ya swika henefha kha R702 biḽioni nga ṅwaha wa 2021, zwine zwa vha engedzea bva kha R487 biḽioni ya ṅwaha wa.

tgt_text: Ubulungu bethu be-BRICS buyaqhubeka nokuzuzela izwe.

src_text: Tshumisano vhukati ha mashango ane vha miraḓo ya BRICS kha masia fhambanaho fana na mutakalo na khathihi na mbambadzo yo engedzeaho yo ita uri hu vhe na nyaluwo kha nḓowetshumo yashu yapo ya dovha ya ita uri hu vhe na vhuelwa kha miraḓo yoṱhe ya BRICS.
tgt_text: Ngonyaka odlule impahla engaphezu kwama-17% yaseNingizimu Afrika yathunyelwa kwamanye amazwe angamalungu e-BRICS, futhi impahla engaphezu kwama-29% evela kwamanye amazwe ibibuya kula mazwe.

src_text: Vhubindudzi hashu kha thandela dza mveledziso ya themamveledziso khathihi na nungo dzashu dza fhungudza vhukonḓi ha musi hu tshi itwa zwa mabindu ndi zwithu zwo livhiswaho kha lingedza engedza mbambadzelannḓa ya kha vhashumisani na riṋe vha BRICS.
tgt_text: Inani laloku kuhwebelana liyaqhubeka nokukhula, ngenani eliphelele lokuhweba kweNingizimu Afrika namanye amazwe elifika kwizigidigidi ezingama-R702 ngowezi-2021, lisuka kwizigidigidi ezingama-R487 ngowezi-.

src_text: Tshikolo tsha Ndangulo ya zwa Ikonomi tsha Vhuriha.

Tshikolo tsha zwa Mavhusele tsha Lushaka (NSG) tshi ḓo vha na vhuṱambo ha vhuraru ha Mbekanyamushumo ya Tshikolo tsha Ndangulo ya zwa Ikonomi hu tshi itela Vharangaphanḓa vha zwa Polotiki ngei Johannesburg bva nga ḽa 27 Fulwi swika nga ḽa 1 Fulwana.
tgt_text: Ukusebenzisana namalungu e-BRICS ezingxenyeni ezehlukene ezifana nezempilo kanye nokuhweba okuthuthukile kukhulise imboni yethu yasekhaya, futhi kwazuza wonke amalungu e-BRICS.

src_text: Vhuṱambo uho vhu ḓo dzhenelwa nga Dziminisṱa bva kha mashango ngaho Côte d'Ivoire, South Sudan na Afrika Tshipembe; hu tshi katelwa na vhalangivhahulu vha bvaho ngei Lesotho, Zambia, Riphabuḽiki ya Congo (DRC), Tanzania na Ghana.
tgt_text: Utshalomali lwethu kwimiklamo yokuthuthukiswa kwengqalasizinda nemizamo yokunciphisa ubungozi uma kuqhutshwa ibhizinisi luhlose ukukhuphula impahla ethunyelwa kozakwethu abaku-BRICS.

src_text: Vhoṋeḓorobo vha Afrika Tshipembe, khathihi na miraḓo ya komiti dza vhoṋeḓorobo na khorotshitumbe dza hone, na vhone vha ḓo dzhenela vhuṱambo uvhu..  Vharangaphanḓa vha zwa politiki bva kha mashango fhambanaho na vhone vha khou lavhelelwa uri vha ḓo kovhana mihumbulo na ngudo dzi bvaho kha nyimele dzo fhambanaho dze vha ṱangana nadzo kha mishumo yavho ya ḓuvha na ḓuvha.
tgt_text: Isikole Esifundisa Ngokuphathwa Komnotho.

src_text: NSG yo dzudzanya mbekanyamushumo ya ṅwaha hu tshi itelwa miraḓo ya khorotshitumbe nga ṅwaha wa 2020, sa tshipiḓa tsha thikhedzo yayo kha zwa vhuḓikumedzeli ha muvhuso ha fhaṱa shango ḽine ḽa khou shumaho zwavhuḓi dovha hafhu ya lingedza shomedza miraḓo ya khorotshitumbe kha masia mararu muvhuso nga vhurangaphanḓa ho khwaṱhaho na vhukoni ha zwa vhulavhelesi itela uri vha kone ṱola hafhu khaedu dza zwa mavhusele dzine dza khakhisa maitele zwa katelwa ha vhathu vhoṱhe khathihi na nyaluwo ya ikonomi ine ya vha ya tshifhinga tshilapfu.
tgt_text: ISikole Sikahulumeni Kuzwelonke (i-NSG) izosingatha uHlelo lwesithathu Lwesikole Sokufundiswa Ngokuphathwa Komnotho esizofundisa Abaphathi Bezepolitiki eGoli kusuka mhla wama-27 kuNhlangulana kuya kumhla lu-1 kuNtulikazi.

src_text: Ḓuvha ḽa Dzitshaka ḽa Vho Nelson Mandela.
tgt_text: Sizohanjelwa ngoNgqongqoshe base-Côte d'Ivoire; e-South Sudan naseNingizimu Afrika; kanye nabaQondisi-Jikelele abasuka e-Lesotho, e-Zambia, e-Democratic Republic of Congo, e-Tanzania nase-Ghana.

src_text: Ḓuvha ḽa Dzitshaka ḽa Vho Nelson Mandela ḽa houno ṅwaha ḽine ḽa ḓo vha nga Musumbuluwo, wa ḽa 18 Fulwana 2022 ḽi ḓo pembelelwa nga fhasi ha thero ya ḽifhasi ḽoṱhe ine ya ri: “Kha vha ite zwine vha nga kona nga zwine vha vha nazwo, henefho hune vha vha hone” tou vha khuwelelo re khagala ya uri vhathu vha tikedze khathihi na shela mulenzhe kha fulo iḽi nga ṋetshedza maga u dzhenelela tshifhinga tshilapfu ane ḓo fhedza nga vha na zwivhuya zwi sa gumi.
tgt_text: Osodolobha baseNingizimu Afrika, kanye namakomidi osodolobha nesigungu esiphezulu, nabo bazohambela lezi zifundo..     Abaphathi abaphezulu bezepolitiki abasuka emazweni ahlukene balindeleke ukuthi babelane ngemibono kanye nezifundo ezisuselwa ezigamekweni ezehlukene abahlangabezana nazo emsebenzini wabo wansuku zonke.

src_text: Maṅwe maga u dzhenelela ane nga vha tshifhinga tshilapfu ndi Mbekanyamushumo ya Nyambedzano dza Vhaswa ya Vho Nelson Mandela na Vhurangaphanḓa vhu re na Mikhwa ine yo sedzesa kha zwiteṅwa zwa ndeme zwi kwamaho vhaswa kha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe na mona na ḽifhasi ḽoṱhe.
tgt_text: I-NSG ihlanganisele amalungu eziphathimandla lolu hlelo lonyaka ngowezi-2020, njengengxenye yokweseka ukuzinikela kukahulumeni ekwakheni umbuso onekhono.

src_text: Khalaṅwaha ya Muthelo.
tgt_text: Phakathi kwezinye izinto, luhlose ukucijisa iziphathimandla ngaphakathi kwazo zontathu izinhlaka zikahulumeni ngobuholi obuthuthukisiwe kanye nangamakhono okwengamela ukuze zizokwazi ukuphinde zihlolisise izinselele ezibhekene nohulumeni ezicindezela ukubandakanywa kwawo wonke umuntu kanye nokukhula komnotho okusimeme.

src_text: Khalaṅwaha ya rumela muthelo ya ṅwaha wa 2022 ḓo vula bva nga ḽa 1 Fulwana swika 24 Tshimedzi.
tgt_text: USuku Lomhlaba Lokubungaza u-Nelson Mandela.

src_text: Vhatheli vha khou ṱuṱuwedzwa rumela maṅwalo avho zwa mithelo kha eFiling (www.sarsefiling.co.za) kana kha MobiApp ya vha Tshumelo dza Mbuelo dza Afrika Tshipembe (SARS..   Uno ṅwaha SARS ḓo bvela phanḓa na tsenguluso dza zwa muthelo dzine dza tou dzula dzo itwa nga khomphiyutha dza mutheli muṅwe na muṅwe, hedzi ndi fomo dza muthelo wa mbuelo dzine dza dzula dzo ḓadziwa itela leludza maitele u rumela fomo dza muthelo.
tgt_text: Kulo nyaka uSuku Lokubungaza u-Nelson Mandela, mhla ziyi-18 kuNtulikazi 2022  luzogujwa ngaphansi kwesiqubulo somhlaba wonke esithi: "Yenza lokho okwaziyo ukukwenza, ngalokho onakho, noma ikuphi lapho ukhona".

src_text: Nga ṅwaha wa 2021 vhatheli vha fhiraho miḽioni tharu vho swika he vha senguluswa nga nḓila yeneyi ine fomo dzavho dza dzula dzo ḓadzwa nga khomphiyutha.
tgt_text: Leli ikhwelo elicacile kubantu ukuthi beseke futhi babambe iqhaza emkhankasweni wokufaka igalelo kwizingenelelo ezisimeme ezizoba nomthelela oyohlale uhleli.

src_text: Zwa rumela fomo dza muthelo wa mbuelo nga tshifhinga nahone dzo dzudzanyea nga nḓila yo teaho zwi tou ita fhedzi uri mutheli wanale tshi khou tevhedza milayo yo teaho ya zwa muthelo, zwi dovha hafhu zwa thusa muvhuso kha ṋetshedza tshumelo kha vhadzulapo vha Afrika Tshipembe vhane vha dzi ṱoḓesa  Milaedza fhululedzaKhabinethe khou rumela milaedza ya fhululedza na tamela mashudu kha: Muhaṱuli Vho Owen Lloyd Rogers nga murahu ha tholwa havho sa Muhaṱuli wa Khothe ya Ndayotewa ya Afrika Tshipembe.Khabinethe khathihi na Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa khou rumela mulaedza wa tamela Phresidennde wa kale Vho Thabo Mbeki Ḓuvha Ḽavhuḓi ḽa Mabebo musi vha tshi khou fara miṅwaha ya 80, ḽe vha ḽi pembelela nga ḽa 18 Fulwana.
tgt_text: Esinye sezingenelelo saminyaka yonke iNkulumo-mpendulwano Yentsha ye-Nelson Mandela noHlelo Lokuhola Ngobuqotho olugxile ezihlokweni ezithinta abantu abasha eNingizimu Afrika nasemhlabeni jikelele.

src_text: Vho Mbeki vho vha na bono ḽa vhumatshelo havhuḓi nahone ha mvelaphanḓa kha vhathu vhoṱhe vha Afrika Tshipembe  tholwaU tholwa hoṱhe hu ḓo khunyeledzwa nga murahu ha khwaṱhisedzwa ha ndalukano na ṱanzwa madzina ho teaho.
tgt_text: Isikhathi seNtela.

src_text: Vhalangi vhane vha si vhe miraḓo ya khorotshitumbe vha Bodo ya Maanḓalanga Ndangulo ya zwa Vhufhufhi ha Muyani ya AfrikaTshipembe:Vho Ernest Khosa;Mufumakadzi Vho Bulelwa Koyana;Vho Surendra Sooklal; naMufumakadzi Vho Rejoice Edith Phewa..  Miraḓo ya Ofisi ya bula Zwikolodo zwa DzinnḓuMufumakadzi Vho Kenosi Pearl Louisa Selane (Mudzulatshidulo);Mufumakadzi Vho Catharina Maria Van der Sandt;Vho Errol Vincent Magerman;Muimeleli Vho Mandla Dludlu;Vho Matsobane Gabriel Mello;Mufumakadzi Vho Palesa Mawasha;Mufumakadzi Vho Penelope Anne Beck-Paxton;Mufumakadzi Vho Sphiwe Dorris Mayinga;Vho Tshifhiwa Victor Mphigalale; andVho Zuko Ncemane.
tgt_text: Isikhathi sentela sangowezi-2022 sizovulwa kusuka lu-1 kuNtulikazi kuya mhla zingama-24 kuMfumfu.

src_text: Maswa nga ha Dwadze ḽa Khoronavairasi (COVID-19).
tgt_text: Ezakamuva ngeSifo Segciwane le-Corona (i-COVID-19).

src_text: Khabinethe yo fhululedza vhadzulapo vhoṱhe vha Afrika Tshipembe vhe vha nanga haelwa khathihi na tevhedza milayo yoṱhe ya nga ha dwadze ḽa COVID-19 nga nḓila ye zwa fhedza zwi tshi khou ita uri shango ḽi kone fhelisa zwa engedzea ha tshivhalo tsha zwiwo zwiswa zwa kavhiwa nga tshifhinga tsha luṱa lwa vhuṱanu lwa dwadze iḽi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lincome bonke abantu baseNingizimu Afrika abaqoke ukuphuma bayogonywa futhi abayithobelayo yonke imigomo ye-COVID-19, osekuholele ekutheni izwe likwazi ukugwema ukukhula kwezigameko ezintsha zokutheleleka kwabantu ngegciwane ehlandleni lesihlanu lobhubhane..     Kepha-ke, akumele neze sidembesele njengoba i-COVID-19 iselokhu ikhona phakathi kwethu.
Nakuba kamuva nje izwe likuqedile ukugqokwa kwezifonyo okuphoqelelekile emphakathini, abantu abanezifo ezingamahlalakhona kanye nalabo abagulayo bayakhuthazwa ukuba baqhubeke nokugqoka isifonyo.

src_text: Naho zwo ralo ri tei ḓikanganyisa sa izwi dwadze ḽa COVID-19 ḽi tshi kha ḓi tou vha hone tshoṱhe henefha vhukati hashu.
tgt_text: Kumele futhi siqhubeke nokugeza izandla noma sizihlanze ngesibulalimagciwane futhi siqinisekise ukuqhelelana ngendlela efanele phakathi kwethu nabanye abantu, futhi siqinisekise ukuthi endaweni okuhleli kuyona abantu kungena umoya ohlanzekile owanele.

src_text: Naho hu na uri shango ḽi kha ḓi tou bva fhelisa zwa ambara maski nga khombekhombe musi muthu fhethu ha nnyi na nnyi, vhathu vhane vha vha na maṅwe malawadze nga thungo hu tshi katelwa na avho vhane vha khou lwala, vha khou ṱuṱuwedzwa uri vha bvele phanḓa na ambara maski yavho.

Ri tea dovha hafhu ra bvela phanḓa na ṱamba kana sanithaiza zwanḓa zwashu sia tshikhala tsho teaho vhukati hashu na vhaṅwe vhathu khathihi na vhona uri fhethu hune ra vha hone hu khou dzhena muya nga nḓila yo teaho.
tgt_text: Ukugonywa kusalokhu kuyiyona ndlela yokuzivikela ku-COVID-19 eqinisekisiwe ukuthi iyasebenza efakazelwa yisayensi futhi iKhabhinethi liyabakhuthaza bonke abantu abangakagonywa ukuba baphume ngokushesha bayogonywa, kanti ngokunjalo futhi abantu esebegonyiwe nabo kumele baphume bayothola umjovo oweseka futhi ulekele umgomo egazini mahhala esikhungweni sokugoma esiseduze nabo..     Isifo i-Monkeypox.
IKhabhinethi lithulelwe umbiko wakamuva mayelana nokusabalala kwesifo i-Monkeypox ezweni kulandela ukuqinisekiswa kamuva nje kwesigameko sesibili sokutheleleka komuntu kuleli.

src_text: Muhaelo kha ḓi vha wone philelo yo khwaṱhisedzwaho nga vhorasaintsi ya dwadze ḽa COVID-19 nahone Khabinethe khou ṱuṱuwedza vhathu vhoṱhe vhane vha athu haelwa uri vha ye vha haelwe hu si na tshilengo khathihi na uri vhathu vho haelwaho vha tea wana dziṅwe khaelo dzavho dza khwaṱhisedza henefho kha vhupo ha muhaelo vhu re tsinisa navho nga mahala.
tgt_text: Labo bantu abathelelekile bagonqile emakhaya futhi kulandelwa umkhondo wabo bonke abanye abantu abake basondelana nabo ukuze kuhlonzwe futhi kutholwe labo okungenzeka ukuthi nabo bathelelekile..     UMnyango Wezempilo kanye NeSikhungo Sikazwelonke Sezifo Ezithathelwanayo basebenzisana neNhlangano Yezempilo Emhlabeni ukubheka nokuhlola ubungozi bokusabalala nokutheleleka kwabantu ngalesi sifo ezweni ngokuhambisana neMithethonqubo Yezempilo Yamazwe Ngamazwe..     Igciwane le-monkeypox alisabalali kalula futhi lidluliseka kuphela emuva kokusondelana kakhulu kwabantu njengokuqabulana, ukwangana noma ukuthintana namalunga omzimba onezilonda ze-monkeypox.

Abantu abangenazo izimpawu ze-monkeypox abalidluliseli igciwane kwabanye abantu..     IKhabhinethi liluleke abantu abanezimpawu ezinjengemfiva, kanye nezimpawu ezijwayelekile zomkhuhlane ezilandelwa wukuqubuka okunamabhamuza ukuba baphuthume esikhungweni sezempilo esiseduzane ukuze baxilongwe futhi bathole ukwelashwa kusenesikhathi.

src_text: Maruḓa ṱhoho.
tgt_text: Isibhicongo esenzeke endaweni yokucima ukoma eMonti.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṋetshedzwa zwidodombedzwa zwiswa nga ha zwine zwa khou bvelela kha phanḓalala ha vhulwadze ha Maruḓa ṱhoho fhano shangoni nga murahu ha khwaṱhisedzwa ha zwenezwino ha tshiwo tsha vhuvhili tsha vhulwadze uvhu fhano shangoni.
