tgt_text: Isibhicongo esesabekayo esenzeke endaweni yokucima ukoma Enyobeni eMonti eMpumalanga Kapa ngeSonto, mhla zingama-26 kuNhlangulana 2022 esidlule nemiphefumulo yamabhungu namatshitshi angama-21, sishiye izwe lethu lonkana likhungathekile futhi lisosizini.

src_text: Vhathu vho kavhiwaho nga vhulwadze uvhu vha khou khethelwa thungo na vhaṅwe vhathu henefho mahayani avho nahone hu khou dovha hafhu ha ṱoḓuluswa na avho vhe vha vha na vhukwamani navho itela wanulusa vhaṅwe vhane na vhone vha nga vha vho swika he vha pfukelwa nga vhulwadze uvhu..     Vha Muhasho wa Mutakalo na vha Tshiimiswa tsha Malwadze Phirela tsha Lushaka vha khou vha na tshumisano na vha Dzangano ḽa Mutakalo ḽa Ḽifhasi itela ita ṱhoḓisiso nga ha khombo ya pfukiselwa ha vhulwadze uvhu fhano hayani hu tshi tevhedzwa Milayo ya zwa Mutakalo ya Dzitshaka.
tgt_text: Kunzima ngisho ukucabanga nokubona ngamehlo engqondo usizi nobuhlungu obesabekayo obubhekene nemindeni elahlekelwe yizingane zayo ngendlela ebuhlungu kangaka..     IKhabhinethi lizwakalise ukudabuka kwalo futhi ladlulisa namazwi enduduzo emindenini elahlekelwe yizingane zayo ezithandayo futhi lizwakalise amazwi okubonga kubo bonke labo abafake isandla ngokulekelela nokuhlinzeka ngosizo emindenini esemanzini kulesi sikhathi esinzima kangaka ebhekene naso..     Kuyinto ekhathazayo ukuthi izingane ezisencane kangaka, ngisho nalezo ezineminyaka yobudala eyi-13 imbala, zivunyeliwe ukuba zingene kule ndawo yokucima ukoma futhi zavunyelwa nokuphuza utshwala.

src_text: Vairasi ya maruḓa ṱhoho i tou phaḓalala nga tou ralo nahone kanzhi pfukela nga murahu ha musi ho vha na vhukwamani ha tsinisa vhukati ha vhathu vhavhili fana na mamana kuvhatedzana kana farafara zwipiḓa zwa muvhili zwine zwa vha na dzintho dza vhulwadze ha maruḓa ṱhoho.
tgt_text: Sinxusa imiphakathi ukuba idlale indima yayo ukugcina izingane zethu ziphephile ngaso sonke isikhathi..     Izingane ezineminyaka yobudala engaphansi kweyi-18 azivumelekile ukungena emathaveni, emashibhini, ezinkantini kanye nasemabhodlela-sitolo.

src_text: Vhathu vhane vha si vhe na tsumbadwadze dza vhulwadze ha maruḓa ṱhoho vha nga si swike hune vha nga phaḓaladza vairasi yeneyo kha vhaṅwe vhathu..     Khabinethe yo eletshedza vhathu vhane vha vha na tsumbadwadze dzi fanaho na mutetemelo, tsumbo dzi fanaho na mukhushwane nga angaredza dzine dza tevhelwa nga munyavhili une wa fana na mapone uri vha ḓivhonadze kha tshiimiswa tsha ndondolamutakalo tshi re tsinisa na ha havho itela uri vha kone ṱolwa khathihi na ilafhwa.
tgt_text: Abathengisi botshwala abayotholakala bephula noma yimiphi kule mithetho bayobekwa amacala futhi kuhoxiswe nezimvume zabo zokuthengisa utshwala..     Imiphumela Yengqungquthela Yabaholi Beqembu Lamazwe Ayisikhombisa (i-G7).
UMongameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa ubebambe iqhaza eNgqungqutheleni Yabaholi Bamazwe e-G7 ebibanjelwe e-Bavaria, kwelaseJalimane ngoMsombuluko mhla zingama-27 kuNhlangulana.

src_text: Tshiwo tsha makhaulambilu tshe tsha bvelela thaveni ya fhaḽa East London.
tgt_text: UMongameli – obambe iqhaza ezigcawini zokusebenza lapho kubhungwe khona ngezindaba eziphathelene nesimo sezulu, amandla kagesi, ezempilo, ukutholakala kokudla okwanele kanye nokulingana ngokobulili – ubemenywe ngumsingathi wengqungquthela uShansela Olaf Scholz..     I-G7 wumbimbi lwezepolitiki olubandakanya ohulumeni bamazwe ahlukahlukene olubandakanya i-Canada, France, Germany, Italy, Japan, United Kingdom kanye ne-United States     Izinqumo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Tshiwo tsha makhaulambilu shushaho vhukuma tshe tsha bvelela Thaveni ya Enyobeni ine ya vha fhaḽa ḓoroboni ya East London vunḓuni ḽa Kapa Vhubvaḓuvha nga Swondaha, ya ḽa 26 Fulwi 2022 he khatsho ha lovha vhaswa vha swikaho 21, tsho shusha shango ḽoṱhe.
tgt_text: Uhlaka Lwemithethomgomo Yomkhakha Wezomthetho (uHlaka lwe-LSC).

src_text: Zwi konḓa vhukuma lingedza humbula nga ha vhuṱungu vhune vha miṱa ye ya ṱutshelwa nga vhana nga nḓila yeneyi ya makhaulambilu ngaurali vha khou vhu pfa..     Khabinethe yo livhisa maipfi ayo ndiliso kha vha miṱa ye ya ṱutshelwa nga vhafunwa vhayo ya dovha hafhu ya livhuwa vhathu vhoṱhe kha thikhedzo yavho ya zwa vhuthu ye vha ṋetshedza kha miṱa iyi ine ya khou lila nga tshifhinga tshenetshi tshi konḓaho ngaurali zwi pfasesei zwavhuḓi uri ndi ngani fhethu afho ho vha ho tendelwa na vhana vhaṱuku vhukuma vhane vha vha na miṅwaha ya 13 uri vha dzhene vha nwe mahalwa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likugunyazile ukushicilelwa koHlaka lwe-LSC ukuze umphakathi uphawule ngalo.

src_text: Ri khou ita khuwelelo kha zwitshavha zwoṱhe ya uri zwi shele mulenzhe kha ṱhogomela vhana vhashu uri vha dzule vho tsireledzea misi yoṱhe.
tgt_text: Izinjongo zale mithethomgomo wukuletha uguquko emkhakheni wezomthetho ukuze kube nokumeleka ngendlela efanele kwabantu bonke bakuleli.
Imithethomgomo izoqinisekisa futhi nokusungulwa kwenhlangano ezokhiqiza abahlinzeki bezinsizakalo zomthetho abaqeqeshwe kahle futhi abawenza ngobunyoninco umsebenzi wabo.

src_text: Vhana vha miṅwaha re fhasi ha 18 vho ngo tendelwa dzhena ngomu dzithaveni, zwipotoni, phabuni na mavhengeleni u rengisa mahalwa.
tgt_text: Umsebenzi wokwakhiwa koHlaka lwe-LSC bewenganyelwe nguMkhandlu Womsebenzi Wezomthetho, okuyinhlangano esemthethweni esungulwe ngokweSigaba sesi-4 soMthetho Womsebenzi Wezomthetho, wonyaka wezi-2014 (uMthetho wama-28 wonyaka wezi-2014) futhi ngokuholwa nokuqondiswa nguMthetho Wezokufukulwa Nokuhlonyiswa Kwabantu Abamnyama Kwezomnotho (i-B-BBEE), wonyaka wezi-2013 (uMthetho wama-46 wonyaka wezi-2013).

src_text: Vharengisi vha mahalwa vhane vha ḓo wanala vha tshi khou pfuka muṅwe wa iyo milayo vha tea farelwa mulandu wa vhugevhenga nahone ha dovha ha dzhiwa na ṱhanziela dzavho dza rengisa.
tgt_text: UMthetho we-B-BBEE wonyaka wezi-2013 uhlinzekela ukuthi uNgqongqoshe Wezohwebo, Izimboni Nokuncintisana akhiphe imithethomgomo yenkambiso enhle okumele ilandelwe ekufukulweni nokuhlonyiswa kwabantu abamnyama kwezomnotho emikhakheni ethile ehlosiwe.
Amalungu omsebenzi wezomthetho njengamanje awanayo imithethomgomo eqondene nalo mkhakha ezowahola futhi iwaqondise ekubhekaneni ngqo nokungalingani okukhona emsebenzini wezomthetho.

src_text: Mvelelo dza Muṱangano wa Vharangaphanḓa vha Tshigwada tsha Mashango Sumbe (G7).
tgt_text: UHlaka lwe-LSC lwashicilelwa kuSomqulu Kahulumeni isikhathi esiyizinsuku ezingama-60 ukuze umphakathi ukwazi ukuphawula ngalo..     Imibiko Yenqubekelaphambili Yokusebenza Ekhishwa Kabili Ngonyaka.

src_text: Phresidennde Vho Cyril Ramaphosa vho shela mulenzhe kha Muṱangano wa Vharangaphanḓa vha Tshigwada tsha Mashango Sumbe (G7) we wa farelwa fhaḽa ḓoroboni ya Bavaria, kha ḽa Germany nga Musumbuluwo, wa ḽa 27 Fulwi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liyigunyazile imibiko yenqubekelaphambili yokusebenza ekhishwa kabili ngonyaka yesikhathi esifaka phakathi uMfumfu 2021 kuya kuNdasa.

src_text: Phresidennde – vhe vha shela mulenzhe kha madzulo u shuma he khaho ha vha hu tshi khou ambiwa nga mafhungo kwamaho kilima, fulufulu, mutakalo, vhubveledzi ha zwiḽiwa ḽifhasini ḽoṱhe nga angaredza khathihi na mafhungo zwa ndinganyiso ya mbeu, vho vha vho rambiwa nga murangaphanḓa wa shango ḽe vhuṱambo uvhu ha vha ho farelwa khaḽo, Mutshantseḽara Vho Olaf Scholz..     Muṱangano uyu wa G7 ndi foramu ya zwa polotiki ya vhukati ha mashango ngaho Canada, France, Germany, Italy, Japan, United Kingdom na ḽa United States     Tsheo dza Khabinethe.
tgt_text: Le mibiko iyingxenye yoHlaka Lwamaqhinga Esikhathi Esimaphakathi (i-MTSF) 2019-.

src_text: Khoudu ya Mvetamveto ya Sekhithara ya zwa Mulayo (Draft LSC).
tgt_text: I-MTSF 2019-2024 iwuhlelo lokuqalisa umsebenzi kanye nokusebenza kohlaka lokuqapha okuhloswe ngalo ukufezekisa izinto ezibekwe eqhulwini nguhulumeni wehlandla lokuphatha lesithupha ngaphansi kweNhlosombono yowezi-2030 yoHlelo Lokuthuthukiswa Kwezwe.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza anḓadzwa ha Khoudu ya Mvetamveto ya Sekhithara ya zwa Mulayo (Draft LSC) hu tshi itelwa uri hu kone vha na vhupfiwa ha tshitshavha.
tgt_text: Imibiko ibigxile ezintweni eziyisikhombisa ezibekwe eqhulwini nguhulumeni, okuyilezi (1) Uguquko kwezomnotho nokuvulwa kwamathuba omsebenzi; (2) Ezemfundo, amakhono kanye nezempilo; (3) Ukuqiniswa kwezibonelelo zikahulumeni nokubhekelelwa komphakathi kangcono ngokuthi kuhlinzekwe izidingongqangi ezithembakele ezitholakala ngendlela efanele ngaso sonke isikhathi futhi ezisezingeni elifanele; (4) Ukudidiyelwa ngendlela efanele kwezindawo okutholakala kuzona ingqalasizinda nezikhungo eziwusizo, izindawo zokuhlaliswa kwabantu kanye nohulumeni basekhaya; (5) Ubumbano lomphakathi kanye nemiphakathi ephephile; (6) Umbuso onekhono lokusebenza ngendlela efanele, olandela inkambiso elungileyo emsebenzini owenzayo futhi othuthukisayo; kanye (7) ne-Afrika nomhlaba ongcono, kanye nezinhlelo zokungenelela zikahulumeni wehlandla lokuphatha lesithupha ezihlobene nalokho..     IKhabhinethi liyamukele ngezandla ezimhlophe imikhakha okwenzeke kuyona inqubekelaphambili emigomweni obekuhloswe ukufinyelela kuyona kulesi sikhathi sokubika esibuyekezwayo.

src_text: Zwipikwa zwa idzi khoudu ndi ṱuṱuwedza tshanduko ya sekhithara ya zwa mulayo itela swikela zwa imelelwa ha vhathu vhoṱhe ya nga mirafho ya vhathu vha ḽino shango.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liyiphawulile futhi naleyo mikhakha edinga ukuthi kube nezinhlelo zokungenelela ukuze kulungiswe inkinga yokubambezeleka okwenzekile ngenxa yokukhahlamezeka okudalwe wubhubhane lwe-COVID-.

src_text: Khoudu iyi ḓo dovha hafhu ya ita uri hu vhe na mveledziso ya tshiimiswa tshine tsha ḓo bveledza vhaṋetshedzi vha tshumelo dza zwa mulayo vho pfumbudzwaho nga nḓila yavhuḓi nahone vha re na vhukoni.

tgt_text: ONgqongqoshe bazobamba izithangami nabezindaba kula maviki ezayo ukuze bakwazi ukwenaba kabanzi ngemibiko yabo ngokwehlukana kwabo futhi bachaze kabanzi nangalezo zindawo lapho kudingeka khona ukuba kuqiniswe isandla kusetshenzwe ngokuzikhandla     Umcimbi ozayo.

src_text: Zwa bveledzwa ha Mvetamveto ya Khoudu ya Sekhithara ya zwa Mulayo (Draft LSC) zwo vha zwo rangwa phanḓa nga vha Khoro ya Maitele zwa Mulayo, ine ya vha tshiimiswa tsha zwa mulayo tshe tsha vhumbwa hu tshi tevhedzwa Khethekanyo 4 ya Mulayo wa Maitele zwa Mulayo, wa 2014 (Mulayo 28 wa 2014) ya dovha ya ṱuṱuwedzwa nga Mulayo wa Maanḓafhadzwa ha Vharema ho Angalalaho kha zwa Ikonimi (B-BBEE), wa 2013 (Mulayo 46 wa 2013).
tgt_text: INgqungquthela Yosozimboni Abamnyama Abathumela Impahla Nemikhiqizo Emazweni Angaphandle (i-BIEC).

src_text: Mulayo wa B-BBEE wa 2013 na mbetshelwa ya uri Minisṱa vha Muhasho wa Mbambadzo, Nḓowetshumo na Muṱaṱisano vha kone ṋetshedza khoudu dza maitele avhuḓi dza nga ha maanḓafhadzwa ha vharema kha zwa ikonomi kha sekhithara dzo teaho.
tgt_text: I-BIEC yokuqala ngqa izobanjelwa e-Sandton International Convention Centre eGoli ngoLwesithathu mhla zingama-20 kuNtulikazi.

src_text: Miraḓo ya buḓo ḽa zwa mulayo swika zwino vha athu vha na khoudu ya sekhithara ine ya vha yone ine ya vha eletshedza kha zwa tandulula thaidzo dza sa eḓana na tshayandingano kha buḓo ḽa zwa mulayo.

tgt_text: Ingqungquthela ilandela ukwethulwa kweNethiwekhi Yosozimboni Abamnyama Yokuthunyelwa Kwempahla Nemikhiqizo Emazweni Angaphandle, phecelezi, i-Black Industrialists Export Network, ethulwe nguhulumeni ngasekuqaleni konyaka, esekela osozimboni abamnyama ukuze bakwazi ukungena ezimakethe ezintsha futhi bakwazi ukufinyelela kuxhasomali lokuthumela impahla nemikhiqizo emazweni angaphandle kanye namathuba nezindlela zokukhangisa nokwazisa ngempahla nemikhiqizo yabo     Imiyalezo.

src_text: Heyi Mvetamveto ya Khoudu ya Sekhithara ya zwa Mulayo (Draft LSC) ḓo anḓadzwa kha Gurannḓa ya Muvhuso lwa maḓuvha 60 itela uri hu kone vha na vhupfiwa ha nnyi na nnyi..     Muvhigo wa nga ha mvelaphanḓa ya mashumele ṅwaha nga ṅwaha.
tgt_text: Amazwi okuhalalisaIKhabhinethi lidlulise amazwi okuhalalisa kanye nezilokotho ezinhle kulaba: amaBhokobhoko, ngokunqoba kwawo ngomzuzu wokugcina emdlalweni wawo ne-Wales olethe injabulo enkulu kubalandeli, obekungumdlalo wokuzwana amandla wokuqala kwemithathu obubanjelwe enkundleni i-Loftus Versveld Stadium ePitoli ngoMgqibelo mhla zi-2 kuNtulikazi.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza muvhigo wa nga ha mvelaphanḓa ya ṅwaha nga ṅwaha ya tshifhinga tsha vhukati ha ṅwedzi wa Tshimedzi 2021 swika Shundunthule.
tgt_text: iBanyana Banyana, ngokunqoba kwayo ngamagoli amabili kwelilodwa emdlalweni wayo wokuvula obuphakathi kwayo ne-Nigeria weNdebe Yabesifazane Yamazwe ase-Afrika, esingethwe yi-Morocco, ngoMsombuluko mhla zizi-4 kuNtulikazi     Abaqashiwe    Bonke abaqashiwe kumele kuqinisekiswe iziqu zabo futhi bahlolwe ngokufanele.

src_text: Mivhigo iyi vhumba tshipiḓa tsha Muhanga wa Puḽane dza Tshifhinga tsha Vhukati ha Ṅwaha (MTSF) wa bva nga ṅwaha wa 2019 swika nga ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: UDkt Nyameko Barney Pityana oqokwe njengoSihlalo we-National Lotteries Commission..     U-Adv Rory Voller oqokwe njengoKhomishana we-Companies and Intellectual Property Commission.

src_text: Fulufulu.
tgt_text: Ezamandla.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza maga a ḓivhadzwa nga muvhuso u tandulula thaidzo dza fulufulu dzine shango ḽa khou ṱangana nadzo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lamukele izingenelelo ezethulwe nguhulumeni ukubhekana nenkinga kagesi ebhekene nezwe.

src_text: Maga aya angalalaho ngaurali ndi one ane ḓo vula nḓila dza fhungudza zwa khauwa ha muḓagasi shandukisa sekithara ya muḓagasi khathihi na swikela zwa nḓisedzo ya fulufulu lwa tshifhinga tshilapfu.
tgt_text: Lezi zinyathelo ezizohamba ibanga elide ekuhlahleni indlela yokunciphisa ukuncishwa kogesi ngenhloso yokuwonga, ukuletha uguquko emkhakheni kagesi kanye nokuqinisekisa ukutholakala kogesi isikhathi eside.

Ukuze seseke isizinda sikagesi futhi sisize izwe lethu ngokuthunyelwa kogesi olinganiselwe, sidinga ukunciphisa ukusetshenziswa kogesi njengezwe ngama-600 megawatts ezinyangeni ezintathu ezizayo..  Amakhaya angadlala indima yawo ekongeni ugesi ngokucisha zonke izibani ezingabalulekile kanye nezinto ezisebenzisa ugesi omningi ngezikhathi lapho ugesi usetshenziswa kakhulu khona.

src_text: Sa ndingedzo dzashu dza tikedza netiweke ya nḓisedzo ya muḓagasi khathihi na thusa shango ḽashu kha vhuleme vhune ḽa khou ṱangana naho kha zwa nḓisedzo ya muḓagasi, ri tea fhungudza tshivhalo tsha muḓagasi une shango ḽashu ḽa shumisa nga megawati dza 600 kha tshifhinga tsha miṅwedzi miraru ḓaho..   Miṱa nga shela mulenzhe kha vhulunga fulufulu nga dzima zwishumiswa zwoṱhe zwo fungwaho zwine zwa si vhe zwa ndeme khathihi na izwo zwi shumisesaho fulufulu nga zwifhinga zwa musi hu na ṱhoḓea khulwane ya muḓagasi.
tgt_text: Amabhizinisi ayagqugquzelwa ukuthi aqale ukusebenzisa ubuchwepheshe obonga ugesi emkhiqizweni yawo futhi azibandakanye emizamweni yokunciphisa ukudingeka kogesi..  Umkhankaso we-Operation Vulindlela.

IKhabhinethi lamukele inqubekelaphambili eyenziwe emkhankasweni we-Operation Vulindlela wokususa zonke izihibe emikhakheni yezamandla, owezokuxhumana, nowamanzi kanye nezokuvakasha ngenhloso yokuvuselela umnotho.

src_text: Fulo ḽa Vulindlela.
tgt_text: Izinguquko kwizakhiwo eziyisishiyagalolunye kwezingama-26 sezikhona, neziyi-11 nazo ziqhubekela phambili kahle kakhulu.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza mvelaphanḓa yo swikelwaho nga fhasi ha Fulo ḽa Vulindlela ḽo livhiswaho kha fhelisa vhukonḓi vhune ha vha hone kha sekhithara dza zwa fulufulu, vhudavhidzani ha ṱhingo, maḓi na zwa vhuendelamashango hu tshi itelwa vusulusa ikonomi.
tgt_text: Ukuphumelela kwalokhu kubandakanya ukwenyusa isilinganiso sokukhishwa kwemvume yokuphehlwa kogesi ovuselelekayo, ukuguqulwa kwe-Transnet National Ports Authority ibe yinkampani, ukukhishwa kohlu olubuyekeziwe lwamakhono abucayi kanye nokuqaliswa kohlelokusebenza lwe-e-Visa kumazwe ayi-14, kubandakanya nezimakethe zabavakashi ezinkulukazi ezintsha okuyi-China, i-India, i-Kenya ne-Nigeria..  Udlame Olubhekiswe Kwabobulili Obuthile Nokubulawa Kwabesifazane (i-GBVF).

src_text: Ho no swikelwa tshandukiso dza zwa milayo dza ṱahe kha dza 26, hune dziṅwe tshandukiso dza milayo dzi swikaho 11 dza khou vhonala hu tshi khou vha na mvelaphanḓa yavhuḓi khadzo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lizwakalise intukuthelo ngokudlwengulwa okunesihluku kwakamuva kwabesifazane abayisishiyagalombili e-Krugersdorp e-Gauteng.

src_text: Magundo no swikelwaho ndi ane katela zwa engedzwa ha vhuhulwane ha ḽaisentsi dza bveledza muḓagasi une wa ḓo dzheniswa kha netiweke khulwane ya nḓisedzo ya muḓagasi, zwa shandukiswa ha khamphani ya muvhuso ya Maanḓalanga Vhuimangalavha ha Lushaka ya Transnet ya kha vha khamphani ya zwa makwevho yo ḓiimisaho nga yoṱhe phaḓaladzwa ha mutevhe wo shandukiswaho wa zwikili zwa ndeme khathihi na thoma shumiswa ha sisteme ya e-Visa kha mashango 14, hu tshi katelwa na mimaraga miswa mihulwane ya zwa vhuendelamashango sa shango ḽa China, India, Kenya na Nigeria..   Khakhathi dzo ḓitikaho nga mbeu na Mabulayo Vhafumakadzi (GBVF).
tgt_text: Lezi zenzo ezimbi nokuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane kudicilela phansi isithunzi sethu emphakathini.

src_text: Khabinethe yo sumbedza vhaiswa nga zwiito zwa tshiṱuhu zwa tshipiwa ha vhafumakadzi vha malo zwine zwa kha ḓi tou bva itea ngei Krugersdorp kha ḽa Gauteng.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liphinde lancoma uPhiko Lwamaphoyisa eNingizimu Afrika ngokusheshe abophe abasolwa abaningana abasolwa ngalo bugebengu obunyantisayo..  IKhabhinethi linxuse imiphakathi ukuthi isebenzisane nabomthetho ngokunikezela ngolwazi noma ngokubika izenzo ezisolisayo.

src_text: Hezwi zwiito zwivhi ngaurali khathihi na tambudzwa ha vhafumakadzi ndi zwine zwa khakhisa vhudziki na vhuthihi vhune ha vha hone zwitshavhani zwashu.
tgt_text: Ngokusebenza ngokubambisana, singenza imiphakathi yethi iphephe kubantu besifazane nasezinganeni..  Wonke umuntu waseNingizimu Afrika unomsebenzi wokulwa nababhebhezeli bodlame ngokulandela umthetho.

src_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya fhululedza vha Tshumelo ya Mapholisa ya Afrika Tshipembe nge vha fara nga ṱavhanya vhunzhi ha vhahumbulelwa kha vhugevhenga uvhu ha tshiṱuhu ngaurali..   Khabinethe yo ita khuwelelo kha zwitshavha ya uri zwi shumisane na vha mazhendedzi zwa mulayo nga kovhana navho mafhungo maṅwe na maṅwe kana vhiga zwiito zwi soliseaho.
tgt_text: Bika zonke izigameko ezihlobene ne-GBVF esiteshini samaphoyisa esiseduze nawe noma ushayele inombolo yokunqanda ubugebengu ye-Crime Stop ku: 0860 01 0111, isikhungo i-National GBVF Command Centre ku: 0800 428 428 noma iNombolo Yosizo Yokunqandwa Kodlame Olubhekiswe Kubulili Obuthile ku: 0800 150. .

src_text: Nga tshumisano, ri nga ita uri zwitshavha zwashu zwi vhe fhethu ho tsireledzeaho kha vhana na vhafumakadzi..   Mudzulapo muṅwe na muṅwe wa Afrika Tshipembe na vhuḓifhinduleli ha lwa na vhaiti vha zwiito zwa dzikhakhathi nga fhasi ha mulayo.
tgt_text: INyanga Yabesifazane.

src_text: Kha vha vhige zwiwo zwoṱhe zwine zwa elana na GBVF kha tshiṱitshi tsha mapholisa tshi re tsini navho kana vha tou founela kha nomboro ya mahala ya Fhelisa Zwiito zwa Vhugevhenga ya: 0860 01 0111, Senthara ya Ndangulo ya Zwiito zwa GBVF ya Lushaka kha: 0800 428 428 kana kha Nomboro ya Luṱingo ya Thuso ya Fhelisa Khakhathi dza zwa Mbeu ya: 0800 150. .
tgt_text: INyanga Yabesifazane yaminyaka yonke ngoNcwaba ibungaza abesifazane ababa negalelo emzabalazweni wenkululeko nabobonke abesifazane emphakathini wakithi..  Kulo nyaka iNyanga Yabesifazane ibungazwa ngaphansi kwesiqubulo esithi: “Amalungelo Enhlalo-mnotho Nokuthuthukiswa Kwabesifazane: Sakha Kabusha Ukuthuthukisa Amandla Abesifazane”..  Abesifazane abangaphezu kwezi-20 000 abamashela eZindlini Zombuso ePitoli mhla we-9 kuNcwaba 1956 baba negalelo ekuqinisekiseni ukuthi ukulingana ngokobulili nokunithuthukiswa kuhlala kuseqhulwini eNingizimu Afrika yentando yeningi labantu.

src_text: Ṅwedzi wa Vhafumakadzi.
tgt_text: Isibindi sabo sagqugquzela abanye besifazane jikelele ukuthi nabo bathathe indawo yabo ePhalamende, kuhulumeni nasemphakathini, futhi siyaqhubeka nokwakhela phezu kwale ntuthuko kusukela sazuza inkululeko ngowe-.

src_text: Ṅwedzi wa Vhafumakadzi une wa pembelelwa ṅwaha muṅwe na muṅwe nga ṅwedzi wa Ṱhangule ndi une khawo ha fhululedzwa vhafumakadzi vhe vha shela mulenzhe kha nndwa ya mbofholowo khathihi na vhaṅwe vhafumakadzi vhoṱhe zwitshavhani zwashu.
tgt_text: Isikhumbuzo sase-Marikana.
NgoLwesibili, mhla we-16 kuNcwaba 2022, uhulumeni uhlanganyele nezwe lonkana ekukhumbuleni isibhicongo esenzeka e-Marikana eNyakatho Ntshonalanga ngowezi-.

src_text: Ṅwedzi wa Vhafumakadzi wa ṋaṅwaha ndi une wa khou fhululedzwa nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “Pfanelo dza Vhafumakadzi kha zwa Matshilisano na Ikonomi khathihi na Maanḓafhadzwa Fhaṱa hafhu nga nḓila ya Khwine hu tshi itelwa Konḓelela ho Khwinifhadzeaho ha Vhafumakadzi”..   Vhafumakadzi vha fhiraho 20 000 vhe vha gwalaba vho livha ngei Union Buildings, ḓoroboni ya Pretoria nga ḽa 9 Ṱhangule 1956 vho shela mulenzhe kha ita uri zwa ndinganyiselo nga mbeu na maanḓafhadzwa ha vhafumakadzi zwi dzulele vha tshone tshipikwa tshihulwane tsha muvhuso wa demokirasi wa Afrika Tshipembe.
tgt_text: Ubuhlungu obazwiwa ngabasebenzi, imindeni yabo kanye nesizwe sonke buzohlale buqoshiwe emlandweni wethu..  UHlelo Lokwakha Kabusha i-Marikana seluqaliwe ukuze kuzokwakhiwa kabusha futhi kwenziwe isimondawo esivumela ukuthuthukisa izimpilo zomphakathi wase-Marikana.
Ngonyaka owedlule uhulumeni wakhokha izigidi eziyi-R176 njengesinxephezelo emindenini yabagilwa futhi amacala asasele asaqulwa kulindeleke ukuthi aphothulwe uma kuphela uNcwaba ngowezi-.

src_text: Maga aya vhuhali vhafumakadzi avha vha dzhia ṱuṱuwedza vhunzhi ha vhaṅwe vhafumakadzi nga angaredza uri na vhone vha ḓiwane vha tshi khou dzhia maimo nṱha Phaḽamenndeni, kha muvhuso na ngomu kha zwitshavha zwa havho nahone rikhou bvela phanḓa na khwaṱhisa mvelaphanḓa iyi tou bva tshe ra wana mbofholowo nga ṅwaha wa.
Vhuṱambo ha tshihumbudzo tsha Marikana.
tgt_text: Izindlu eziningi ezilungisiwe noma ezintsha zidluliselwe kubafelokazi base-Marikana kanti ezinye zizoqedelwa kulo nyaka.

src_text: Nga Ḽavhuvhili, ḽa 16 Ṱhangule 2022, muvhuso khathihi na shango ḽoṱhe nga angaredza wo vha na ḓuvha ḽa humbula nga ha tshiwo tsha makhaulambilu tshe tsha bvelela fhaḽa Marikana kha ḽa North West nga ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: Umklamo wokwakhiwa kwezindlu wezigidi ezingama-R700 uzoholela ekuboneni abasebenzi basezimayini bethola izindlu ezisezingeni elihle.

src_text: Vhuṱungu he vhashumi vha vhu pfa, miṱa yavho khathihi na lushaka nga angaredza vhu ḓo dzulela vha tshipiḓa tsha ḓivhazwakale yashu swikela zwenezwo.
tgt_text: Ingqalasizinda ebucayi kwezenhlalo iyahlinzekwa ukwenza ngcono izimo zokuhlala emiphakathini yasezimayini..  Imbizo kaMongameli yoHlelo Lokuthuthukiswa Kwezifunda (i-DDM) e-Gauteng.

Kulandela impumelelo yeZimbizo zikaMongameli ezintathu ze-DDM ebezibanjwe eNyakatho Ntshonalanga, eFreyistata naseMpumalanga, uMasipala Wesifunda i-Sedibeng e-Gauteng usingathe imbizo yesine ngoLwesihlanu, mhla we-12 kuNcwaba..  Ngaphansi kwesiqibulo eithi: “Masingashiyi muntu ngemuva”, uMongameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa uhole ithimba lezikhulu eziphezulu kuzwelonke, kwisifundazwe kanye nakohulumeni basekhaya.

src_text: Mbekanyamushumo ya Mvusuluso ya Marikana yo no thoma shuma itela fhaṱa hafhu nga huswa khathihi na bveledza nyimele yavhuḓi itela khwinisa matshilo zwitshavha zwa fhaḽa Marikana.
tgt_text: Abantu baseNingizimu Afrika ngokwehlukahlukana kwabo banxenxwa ukuba basebenze ngokubambisana ukulwa namazinga akhulayo obubha kanye nobuphofu okudalwa izinselele zezimo zomnotho..  ISifunda i-Sedibeng senze inqubekelaphambili ekuqalisweni kohlelo lwe-Vaal River Special Economic Zone (i-SEZ), oluthembisa kakhulu ekuthuthukisweni kwezimboni zesifunda, zesifundazwe kanye nasezweni lonkana.

src_text: Ṅwaha wo fhelaho, muvhuso wo badela masheleni ndiliso linganaho R176 miḽioni kha miṱa ya zwipondwa ngeno hu na uri milandu yo salaho ine ya kha ḓi vha khothe tshi khou lavhelelwa khunyeledzwa mafheloni ṅwedzi wa Ṱhangule.
tgt_text: I-Vaal River SEZ ihlele ukubandakanya le mikhakha ebucayi elandelayo: iDolobha Elisha Lobuchwepheshe Besimanje e-Vaal River; Isiphehlimandla Esiphehla Ugesi Ngamanzi Nangomoya; isizinda esikhiqiza insangu; ukuthuthwa kwemikhiqizo yezolimo; idolobha elizungeze isikhumulo sezindiza; isikhumulo sezindiza esincane; ukuthuthwa kwempahla ngezindiza kanye nokuvuselelwa komkhakha okhiqiza insimbi.

src_text: Ho vha na nnḓu dza tshivhalo ntswa kana dze dza tou vusuluswa dze dza ṋetshedzwa kha tshilikadzi dza fhaḽa Marikana ngeno hu na dziṅwe dzine dza ḓo fhela fhaṱwa uno ṅwaha.
tgt_text: INgqungquthela kaMongameli Yomkhakha Wezenhlalo.

src_text: Thandela ya zwa dzinnḓu ya masheleni linganaho R700 miḽioni ḓo ita uri vhashumi vha migodini vha kone ṋetshedzwa madzulo khwine.
tgt_text: INgqungquthela kaMongameli Yomkhakha Wezenhlalo ebibanjwe Ekurhuleni, e-Gauteng kusuka mhla we-4 kuya mhla we-5 kuNcwaba 2022 ngaphansi kwesiqubulo esithi: “Sikhuthaza Ukubumbana Kwezenhlalo Ukuvumela Ukubamba Iqhaza kwiNhlalo-mnotho Emiphakathini”, iqoqele ndawonye ababambiqhaza ababuya kwizifunda ezehlukene ukuthi basebenze nohulumeni ukubhekana nezinselele zenhlalo-mnotho kanye nokunxenxa izinsiza zomphakathi, phakathi kwezinye izinjongo..  Ingqungquthela ibheke imibiko yezinkulumo-ngxoxo yezifundazwe eziyisishiyagalolunye kwizinselele lezi zifundazwe ezibhekene nazo, okufaka phakathi ukufinyelela kuxhaso-mali, izinkinga zokulawula, ukuguqulwa komkhakha wezenhlalo ngokombono wokuqinisa ubudlelwano phakathi kukahulumeni nemiphakathi ukuze kuzobhekanwa nezinselele ezihlobene nobubha, ukungalingani kanye nokuntuleka kwemisebenzi..  IKhabhinethi linxuse izinhlangano zomphakathi nezakhamuzi ukuthi badlale indima yabo ebonakalayo ekuqinisekiseni ukuthi sakha ikusasa elingcono, njengoba kucatshangiwe kuHlelo Lwentuthuko Lukazwelonke: NgokoMbono wezi-  Izinqumo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Hu khou ṋetshedzwa hafhu na themamveledziso ya zwa matshilisano ya ndeme ine ya ḓo thusa kha khwinifhadza nyimele dza kutshilele kwa zwitshavha zwa vhupo vhune ha vha na zwa migodi.
tgt_text: UHlelo-kusebenza Lwezimboni Zamasiko Nobuciko.
IKhabhinethi ligunyaze uHlelo-kusebenza Lwezimboni Zamasiko Nobuciko ukuthi luqaliswe ukusebenza.

src_text: Imbizo ya Phresidennde ya nga ha Ḽiedza ḽa Mveledziso ya Tshiṱiriki (DDM) kha ḽa Gauteng.
tgt_text: Lolu hlelo-kusebenza lugxile kubuciko obubonakalayo; imisebenzi yezandla nemiklamo; ubuciko obulalelwayo nobubukwayo kanye nobuciko obenziwa ngekhompyutha; izinsizakalo zokuklama nobuciko; ukudlala nokubungaza, kufaka phakathi umculo, ukuxhumana ngokubhaliwe nokushicilelwe phansi..  Uhlelo-kusebenza luzongenelela kule mikhakha ekwakheni umkhakha omusha oguqukile ozokwaziwa emhlabeni jikelele futhi uncintisane ezingeni.

src_text: Nga murahu ha tshimbila zwavhuḓi ha Imbizo dza Phresidennde dza nga ha DDM tharu dzo fhiraho dze dza farelwa fhaḽa North West, Free State na Mpumalanga nga fhambana hadzo, Masipala wa Tshiṱiriki tsha Sedibeng re kha ḽa Gauteng wone wo fara imbizo yawo nga Ḽavhuṱanu, ḽa 12 Ṱhangule..   Nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “A huna tsaleli”, Phresidennde Vho Cyril Ramaphosa vho ranga phanḓa vhurumelwa ha vhaofisiri vhahulwane vha bvaho kha mivhuso yapo, wa vunḓu na wa lushaka.
tgt_text: Luzosebenzela imboni yobuciko eNingizimu Afrika ukuthi ikwazi ukufinyelela ezimakethe zakuleli nasemhlabeni jikelele..  UHlaka Lwenqubomgomo Olubuyekeziwe Lokuboleka KoMasipala Nezimo Eziphuthumayo Zemali.

src_text: Vhadzulapo vha Afrika Tshipembe bva kha zwiimiswa na sekhithara dzavho dzo fhambanaho, vho swika he vha kuvhangana vha tshi itela uri vha kone lwa na engedzea ha tshikalo tsha vhushai khathihi na vhuheḓana vhune ha khou vhangwa nga nyimele dzine dza si vhe dzavhuḓi dza ikonomi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi libuyekeze ukuchitshiyelwa koHlaka lwenqubomgomo yamanje Yokuboleka Komasipala Nezimo eziphuthumayo Zemali.
Izichibiyelo lezi zibhekele kwisahluko sokuboleka salolu hlaka.

src_text: Tshiṱiriki tsha Sedibeng tsho vha na mvelaphanḓa khulwane ya ita uri Vhupo ha Ikonomi yo Khetheaho ha Vaal River (SEZ) vhu kone shuma, vhune ha vha vhupo vhu re na khonadzeo khulwane ya ita uri dzingu iḽi, vunḓu kana shango ḽi dovhe hafhu vha fhethu hune khaho ha nga itwa zwa nḓowetshumo.
tgt_text: Phakathi kwezichibiyelo eziphakanyisiwe ngokwethula isikhathi eside sokuboleka ukuze sizohambisana nesikhathi sokusebenza kwempahla esuke ibolekwa futhi ikhokhelwa nemali.

src_text: SEZ ya fhaḽa Vaal River khou dzudzanya uri hu vhe hone fhethu hune ha ḓo vha na sekhithara dza ndeme dzi tevhelaho: Vaal River Smart City ntswa; Green Hydrogen Innovation Hub; cannabis hub; agro-logistics; aerotropolis; aerodrome; air freight khathihi na sekhithara yo vusuluswaho ya bveledza tsimbi.
tgt_text: Izichibiyelo zibuye zicacise umsebenzi wezikhungo zokuthuthukiswa kwezimali endimeni yokweboleka yomasipala.

ISahluko sama-230 soMthethosisekelo waseRiphabhulikhi yaseNingizimu Afrika we-1996 unika amandla omasipala ukuthi baboleke imali ukuze bathole imali yokuqalisa ukusebenza noma ukukhokhela izindleko ezikhona.

src_text: Muṱangano wa Sekhithara ya zwa Matshilisano wa Phresidennde.
tgt_text: Uhlaka lokuqala lwagunyazwa yiKhabhinethi ngowezi-2000 ukuhlahlela indlela iSahluko se-6 nese-13 soMthetho Wezezimali Komasipala, wezi-2003 (Umthetho wama-56 wezi-2003).

src_text: 1   Muṱangano wa Sekhithara ya zwa Matshilisano wa Phresidennde we wa farelwa fhaḽa Ekurhuleni, kha ḽa Gauteng bva nga ḽa 4 swikela ḽa 5 Ṱhangule 2022 nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “U Ṱuṱuwedza Vhuthihi ha zwa Matshilisano hu tshi Itelwa Shela Mulenzhe kha zwa Matshilisano na Ikonomi nga Zwitshavha”, wo ṱanganya vhathu vhoṱhe vha kwameaho bva kha masia fhambanaho itela uri vha shumisane na muvhuso muhumbulo muhulwane wa tandulula khaedu dza zwa matshilisano na ikonomi khathihi na kuvhanganya zwishumiswa zwo teaho hu tshi itelwa miraḓo ya zwitshavha..    Muṱangano wo dzhiela nṱha mivhigo ya nyambedzano bva kha mavunḓu ṱahe ine ya amba nga ha khaedu dzine vha vha nadzo, dzi katelaho swikela masheleni, mafhungo zwa milayo, tshandukiso ya sekhithara ya zwa matshilisano muhumbulo wa ṱuṱuwedza vhushaka ha tshumisano vhukati ha muvhuso na vhadzulapo hu tshi itelwa tandulula khaedu dzi elanaho na vhushai, tshayandingano na shayea ha mishumo.
tgt_text: Izichibiyelo ezigunyaziwe zihlose ukukhuthaza ababolekisi abaningi ezimakethe zomasipala kodwa zibe ziqhubeka nokugcina izimiso ezingumongo eziyisisekelo sokuboleka komasipala..  Ukukhishwa ngaphambi kwesikhathi kwekhalenda ukuze lizoshicilelwa lezibalo zobugebengu zekota zangonyaka wezimali wezi-2022/.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ita khuwelelo kha madzangano vhadzulapo khathihi na vhadzulapo ya uri vha shele mulenzhe nga nḓila yo fhelelaho kha ita uri ri kone fhaṱa vhumatshelo ha khwine, sa zwine zwa khou lavhelelwa kha Puḽane ya Mveledziso ya Lushaka: Bono ḽa   Tsheo dza Khabinethe.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukukhishwa ngaphambi kwesikhathi kwekhalenda okuphakanyisiwe ukuze lizoshicilelwa lezibalo zobugebengu zekota zangonyaka wezimali wezi-2022/.

src_text: Mbekanyamushumo ya Nḓowetshumo ya zwa Mvelele na Vhusiki.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukukhishwa kwezibalo zobugebengu zekota.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Mbekanyamushumo ya Nḓowetshumo ya zwa Mvelele na Vhusiki uri thome shumiswa.
tgt_text: Lokhu kwenziwe ukuze kuzoshintshwa izikhathi zokukhishwa kwezibalo zobugebengu zonyaka ezedlule zezwe.

src_text: Mbekanyamushumo iyi yo sedzesa kha zwa vhutsila ha vhona nga maṱo, vhuvhaḓi na nyolo, ha vhona nga maṱo na thetshelesa nga nḓevhe khathihi na nyanḓadzamafhungo dza vhukati ha vhavhili; nyolo na tshumelo dza zwa vhusiki, mabepha na minyanya hu tshi katelwa na muzika, nyanḓadzamafhungo dza nyanḓadzo na khanḓiso.
tgt_text: Ikhalenda eliphakanyisiwe lezibalo zobugebengu nguNcwaba 2022 ukuthi kukhishwe elekota yokuqala bese kuthi ngoLwezi 2022 kukhishwe elekota yesibili.
Izibalo zobugebengu zekota yesithathu nekota yesine zizokhishwa ngoNhlolanja nangoNhlaba ngowezi-2023 ngokulandelana..  Ukuphela kweSimo Senhlekelele Kuzwelonke (i-NSoD).

src_text: Mbekanyamushumo iyi ḓo dzhenelela kha sekhithara dzenedzi ho livhiwa kha fhaṱa sekhithara ya zwa vhusiki yo shandukiswaho ine ya dzhielwa nṱha ḽifhasi ḽoṱhe nahone ya dovha ya vha ya maimo nṱha ḽifhasini ḓo dovha hafhu ya shuma yo livha kha ita uri nḓowetshumo ya zwa vhusiki ya Afrika Tshipembe kone swikela mimaraga yapo na ya dzitshaka.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukuphela kweSimo Senhlekelele Kuzwelonke (i-NSoD) esamenyezelwa emva kwezikhukhula ezadala umonakalo eMpumalanga Kapa naKwaZulu Natali..  I-NSoD iphele mhla we-18 kuNcwaba 2022 kulandela ukwelulwa mhla we-18 kuNtulikazi.

Ukwelulwa kwakungenxa yesidingo sokuqhubeka ngokwengeza izinyathelo eziphuthumayo ezikhona ezazithathwe yizinhlaka zikahulumeni ukuqeda nokubhekana nomphumela odalwe isimo esibi sezulu ezifundazweni ezithintekayo..  IKhabhinethi livumile ukuthi izimo zamanje azisafanele izinyathelo ezinqala njengezinhlaka zikahulumeni, umkhakha ozimele kanye nomphakathi sizoqhubeka siqinisekise usizo, ukuvuselela kanye nokwakha kabusha okuqhubekayo  Imithethosivivinywa.

src_text: Muhanga wa Mbekanyamaitele yo Dzudzanyululwaho ya Khadzimiso dza ha Masipala na zwa Masheleni Shishi.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Ukubhaliswa Komhlaba wezi-.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza khwinifhadzwa ha Muhanga wa Mbekanyamaitele ya Khadzimiso dza ha Masipala na zwa Masheleni Shishi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukulethwa koMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Ukubhaliswa Komhlaba wezi-2020 ePhalamende ukuze ucutshungulwe.

src_text: Khwinifhadzo idzi kanzhi ndi dze dza itwa kha khethekanyo ya zwa khadzimiso ya uno muhanga.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lagunyaza lo Mthethosivivinywa ngoNhlangulana wezi-2020 ukuthi kuxoxisanwe nomphakathi ngawo.

src_text: Dziṅwe dza khwinifhadzo dzine dza khou dzinginywa ndi ḓivhadzwa ha tshifhinga tsha khadzimiso dza masheleni dza tshifhinga tshilapfu tshine tsha ḓo elana na tshifhinga tsha shumisea ha dziṅwe dza ndaka dzenedzo dzine dza khou avhelwa masheleni ayo.
tgt_text: Izichibiyelo ezethuliwe zizobonisa ubunikazi bomhlaba obufakwe ngokomthetho kwiSahluko sama-25(6) soMthethosisekelo waseNingizimu Afrika we-.

src_text: Khwinifhadzo idzi dzi dovha hafhu dza bvisela khagala vhuḓifhinduleli ha zwiimiswa zwa masheleni mveledziso kha sia ḽa zwa khadzimiso dza masheleni dza mimasipala..   Khethekanyo 230 ya Ndayotewa ya Riphabuḽiki ya Afrika Tshipembe ya ṅwaha wa 1996 maanḓafhadza mimasipala uri ite khadzimiso dza masheleni hu tshi itelwa uri kone engedza masheleni ayo ane ya shumisa kha londa ndaka dzayo kana ane shumiswa kha mbadelo dza ḓuvha na ḓuvha.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa uhlinzeka ngokuqoqwa kwemininingwane ngokobuhlanga, ubulili, ubuzwe kanye nokuba isakhamuzi kwalabo abanamalungelo omhlaba eNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Muhanga wa thoma wo tendelwa nga Khabinethe nga ṅwaha wa 2000 hu tshi itelwa ṋea ṱhalutshedzo kha Ndima ya 6 na ya 13 ya Mulayo wa zwa Masheleni ha Masipala, wa 2003 (Mulayo 56 wa 2003).
tgt_text: Lokhu kuzoholela ekubeni nemibiko yokuhlolwa kwamabhuku eqondile kanye nocwaningo esikhathini esizayo olumayelana nokuguqulwa kobunikazi bomhlaba..  UMthethosivivinywa We-ejensi Kazwelonke Yengqalasizinda Yomthombo Wamanzi (i-NWRIA) wezi-.

src_text: Hedzi khwinifhadzo dzo tendelwaho ndi dzine dza ḓo vhuedza vhahadzimisi vhanzhi vhane vha hadzimisa mimasipala masheleni fhedzi dzi ḓo ḓi bvela phanḓa na tevhedza maitele ndeme ane langa khadzimiso dza ha masipala.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukushicilelwa koMthethosivivinywa we-NWRIA wezi-2022 ukuze umphakathi uphawule ngawo isikhathi esiyizinsuku ezingamashumi ayisishiyagalolunye (90).
UMthethosivivinywa uhlongoza ukubekwa kwe-NWRIA ukuthi umsebenzi wayo kube ngukuhlela, ukuxhasa ngezimali kanye nokuthuthukisa ingqalasizinda yamanzi kuleli lizwe.

src_text: Ṅwedzi wa rangela anḓadzwa ha mbalombalo dza zwa vhugevhenga dze dza rekhodiwa nga kotara ya ṅwaha wa muvhalelano wa 2022/.
tgt_text: Izophinde ibhekele ukunakekelwa kwengqalasizinda yamanzi ekhona njengamanje.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza ḓivhadzwa ha ṅwedzi wa rangela anḓadzwa ha mbalombalo dza zwa vhugevhenga dza ṅwaha wa muvhalelano wa 2022/.
tgt_text: I-ejensi izoqinisekisa ukuthunyelwa kwamanzi okusimeme, okulingene nokuthembakele okuzohambisana nezimiso zomthethosisekelo zokuba nelungelo lokufinyelela emanzini nokuhlala endaweni ephephile enempilo.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza bviswa ha mbalombalo dza zwa vhugevhenga dza kotara.
tgt_text: I-ejensi izokwakheka njengeNkampani Kahulumeni ngaphansi kweSahluko sesi-2 soMthetho Wokwenganyelwa Kwezimali Zikahulumeni, we-1999 (Umthetho woku-1 we-1999).

src_text: Hezwi zwo vha itela shandukisa maitele kale mbalombalo dza zwa vhugevhenga fhano shangoni dza vha dzi tshi bviswa nga ṅwaha.
tgt_text: I-ejensi izokwenza imisebenzi okwamanje eyenziwa i-Trans-Caledon Tunnel Authority..  UMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Ezamandla Ezimali Nemisebenzi Yomasipala wezi-.

src_text: oyu ṅwedzi une wa ḓo rangela bviswa ha mbalombalo dza zwa vhugevhenga une wa khou dzinginywa ndi wa Ṱhangule 2022 hu tshi itelwa kotara ya thoma na ṅwedzi wa Ḽara 2022 hu tshi itelwa kotara ya vhuvhili.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukulethwa ePhalamende koMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Ezamandla Ezimali nemisebenzi Yomasipala wezi-.

src_text: Mbalombalo dza zwa vhugevhenga dza kotara ya vhuraru na kotara ya vhuṋa dzi ḓo bviswa nga ṅwedzi wa Luhuhi na wa Shundunthule 2023 nga fhambana hazwo fhelelwa nga tshifhinga ha Tshiimo tsha Tshiwo tsha Lushaka (NSoD).
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa uchibiyela uMthetho Wamandla Ezimali Nemisebenzi Yomasipala, wangowezi-2007 (Umthetho we-12 wezi-2007).

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza fhelelwa nga tshifhinga ha Tshiimo tsha Tshiwo tsha Lushaka (NSoD) tshe tsha vha tsho ḓivhadzwa nga murahu ha miḓalo tshinyadzaho ye ya vha hone ngei vunḓuni ḽa Kapa Vhubvaḓuvha na ḽa KwaZulu-Natal..   Tshiimo tsha Tshiwo tsha Lushaka (NSoD) tsho fhelelwa nga tshifhinga nga ḽa 18 Ṱhangule 2022 nga murahu ha musi tsho swika he tsha engedzwa nga ḽa 18 Fulwi.
tgt_text: Izichibiyelo zilawula amandla omasipala ekufakeni intela ezindlekweni zentuthuko ngokwezicelo zokuthuthukiswa komhlaba ezilethwe komasipala.

src_text: Uhu engedzwa ha tshifhinga ho vha hone nga murahu ha musi ho ranga dzhielwa nṱha ṱhoḓea ya bvela phanḓa na engedza maga tshiimo tsha shishi ane vha hone zwazwino ane khou dzhiiwa nga zwiimiswa zwa muvhuso itela fhelisa na tandulula masiandaitwa mutsho wo kalulaho kha mavunḓu kwameaho.
tgt_text: Lezi zichibiyelo zizoqinisekisa ukuthi omasipala basebenzisa lezi zindleko ngeqiniso, obala futhi ngendlela eqondile.
IKhabhinethi lagunyaza lo Mthethosivivinywa ngowezi-2020 ukuze umphakathi uphawule ngawo..  UMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Izindaba Zezimali wezi-.

src_text: Khabinethe yo tenda zwauri nyimele ine ya vha hone zwazwino i tsha ṱoḓa uri hu vhe na maga songo ḓowelelaho sa izwi zwiimiswa zwa muvhuso, sekhithara dza phuraivethe na vhadzulapo zwi tshi ḓo bvela phanḓa na ita uri hu vhe na ṱhaḓulo ine ya khou bvela phanḓa, mbuedzedzo na phaṱhululo    ilayotibe.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukulethwa ePhalamende koMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Izindaba Zezimali, wezi-.

src_text: Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Redzhisiṱara ya zwa Vhuṋe ha mavu wa ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa uhlongoza ukuchibiyela iMithetho eyisikhombisa, okuyilena (1) uMthetho Wempesheni Yezikhungo Ezisebenzisanayo, we-1963 (Umthetho wama-41 we-1963); (2) uMthetho Wempesheni Womkhosi Wezempi, we-1976 (Umthetho wama-84 we-1976); (3) uMthetho Wempesheni Yabasebenzi Bakahulumeni we-1996; (4) uMthetho Wekhomishini Yezezimali, we-1997 (Umthetho wama-99 we-1997); (5) uMthetho weBhange Lokuthuthukiswa Komhlaba Nezolimo, wezi-2002 (Umthetho we-15 wezi-2002); (6) uMthetho Wabacwaningi-mabhuku wezi-2005 (Umthetho wama-26 wezi-2005) kanye (7) noMthetho Ochitshiyelwe Wabacwaningi-mabhuku wezi-2021 (Umthetho wesi-5 wezi-2021).

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza rumelwa ha Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Redzhisiṱara ya zwa Vhuṋe ha mavu wa ṅwaha wa 2020 ngei Phaḽamenndeni itela uri sedzuluswe hafhu.
tgt_text: Izichibiyelo ezihlongozwayo zibandakanya, ngaphansi koMthetho Wempesheni Yomkhosi Wezempi we-1996, ukubandakanywa kwabalingani kwizinzuzo kubuyelwa emuva kusuka ngama-27 kuMbasa.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza uyu Mulayotibe nga ṅwedzi wa Fulwi 2020 hu tshi itelwa uri hu vhe na vhuṅwe vhukwamani hafhu na tshitshavha khwinifhadzwa uhu hune ha khou dzinginywa hu ḓo ita uri hu kone swikelwa zwa vhuṋe ha mavu ho tsireledzeaho ya nga mulayo kha Khethekanyo 25(6) ya Ndayotewa ya Riphabuḽiki ya Afrika Tshipembe ya ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: Izichibiyelo zemithetho yempesheni zizovumela amakhosikazi nabayeni ukuthi bathole inzuzo yempesheni yabo masinya nje emva kokuhlakazwa komshado.

src_text: Mulayotibe uyu dovha hafhu wa vha na mbetshelwa dza kuvhanganywa ha mbalombalo ya nga murafho, mbeu, lushaka na vhudzulapo ha muthu onoyo ane vha na pfanelo dza zwa mavu fhano Afrika Tshipembe.
tgt_text: Ngaphezu kokucacisa umsebenzi kaNgqongqoshe Wezezimali nasekucwaningeni amabhuku, izichibiyelo ziphinde zilinganise amandla ekomidi eliqinisa umthetho lapho umcwaningi-mabhuku ethole khona kunecala.

src_text: Hedzi mbetshelwa dzi ḓo ita uri hu vhe na mivhigo ya muvhalelano wa zwa mavu ine ya vha ya vhukuma khathihi na ṱhoḓisiso dza tshifhinga tshi ḓaho dzine dza elana na zwa shandukiswa ha vhuṋe ha mavu.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa washicilelwa ngoNhlolanja wezi-2022 ukuthi umphakathi uphawule..  UMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Imithetho Engujikelele (Ukulwa Nokushushumbiswa Kwemali noKulwa Nokuxhasa Ngezimali Izenzo Zobudlova) wezi-.

IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukulethwa koMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Imithetho Engujikelele (Ukulwa Nokushushumbiswa Kwemali Nokulwa Nokuxhasa Ngezimali Izenzo Zobudlova) wangowezi-2022 ePhalamende ukuthi uzocutshungulwa.

src_text: Mulayotibe wa Zhendedzi ḽa Themamveledziso ya Zwiko zwa Maḓi ḽa Lushaka (NWRIA) wa ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: Lo Mthethosivivinywa unguMthethosivivinywa oyingxubevange ochibiyela iMithetho ekhona njengamanje okuyi  uMthetho Wesikhungo Sobunhloli Bezezimali, wezi-2001 (Umthetho wama-38 wezi-2001); (ii) uMthetho Wezinhlangano Ezingenzi Nzuzo, we-1997 (Umthetho wama-71 we-1997); (iii) uMthetho Wokulawulwa Kwempahla eku-Trust, we-1988 (Umthetho wama-57 we-1988); (iv) uMthetho Wezinkampani, wezi-2008 (Umthetho wama-71 we-2008) kanye  noMthetho Wokulawulwa Komkhakha Wezimali, wezi-2017 (Umthetho we-9 wezi-2017).

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza zwa anḓadzwa ha Mulayotibe wa NWRIA wa ṅwaha wa 2022 hu tshi itelwa vhupfiwa ha tshitshavha lwa tshifhinga tsha maḓuvha fuṱahe (90).
tgt_text: Izichibiyelo ziphendula ukuntula okubonakele ngesikhathi sokubuyekezana kwamazwe okwenziwa yithimba le-Financial Action Task Force (i-FATF).

src_text: Mulayotibe uyu khou dzinginya uri hu vhumbiwe NWRIA ine ya ḓo vha na vhuḓifhinduleli ha vhupuḽani, zwa masheleni khathihi na mveledziso ya themamveledziso ya zwa maḓi ya shango ḓo dovha hafhu ya vha na vhuḓifhinduleli ha ṱhogomela themamveledziso ya zwa maḓi ine ya vha hone zwazwino.
tgt_text: Umbiko wokuhlolwa ofanayo waqhamuka nezincomo ezingama-40 ezingasiza ekubekeni iNingizimu Afrika ukuthi ihambisane nezinyathelo zomhlaba zokulwa nokushushumbiswa kwemali kanye nokuxhasa ngezimali izenzo zobudlova..  INingizimu Afrika yatholakala ukuthi isemuva ezindaweni ezingama-.

src_text: Zhendedzi iḽi ḽi ḓo vhona uri hu khou vha na nḓisedzo ya maḓi ine ya nga bvela phanḓa lwa tshifhinga tshilapfu, yo linganaho nahone ine ya fulufhedzea zwi tshi elana na ṱhoḓea ya ndayotewa ya kona swikela wana maḓi khathihi na vhupo ho tsireledzeaho nahone vhu re na mutakalo.
tgt_text: Lo Mthethosivivinywa ubhekene nezindawo eziyi-14 zalezi zindawo ezibonakele.

src_text: Zhendedzi ḽi ḓo vhumbiwa sa Tshiimiswa tsha Muvhuso nga fhasi ha Sheduḽu ya 2 ya Mulayo wa Ndangulo ya zwa Masheleni Muvhuso, wa 1999 (Mulayo 1 wa 1999).
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika selokhu yaba yilungu le-FAFT kusukela ngowezi-.

src_text: Zhendedzi ḽi ḓo dzhia mishumo ine zwazwino ya itwa nga vha Maanḓalanga  Thaneḽe ya Trans-Caledon..   Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Maanḓa na Vhuḓifhinduleli ha Masipala kha zwa Masheleni wa ṅwaha wa.
Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza rumelwa Phaḽamenndeni ha Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Maanḓa na Vhuḓifhinduleli ha Masipala kha zwa Masheleni wa ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Ezezidakamizwa Nokushushumbiswa kwazo wezi-.

src_text: Mulayotibe uyu ndi une wa khwinisa Mulayo wa Maanḓa na Vhuḓifhinduleli ha Masipala kha zwa Masheleni, wa 2007 (Mulayo 12 wa 2007)..   Khwiniso iyi ndi ine ya ḓo langa maanḓa mimasipala musi tshi ta mithelo ya mveledziso musi zwi tshi ḓa kha khumbelo dza mveledziso ya mavu dze dza rumelwa kha mimasipala.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukulethwa ePhalamende koMthethosivivinywa Wokuchibiyela Ezezidakamizwa Nokushushumbiswa Kwazo wezi-2022 ukuthi ucutshungulwe.

src_text: Hedzi khwiniso dzi ḓo ita uri mimasipala thome badelisa mithelo iyi nga nḓila pfalaho re khagala nahone yo fhelelaho.
tgt_text: UMthetho Wezidakamizwa Nokushushumbiswa Kwazo, we-1992 (Umthetho we-140 we-1992) ukwenza kube licala ukukhiqizwa nokusatshalaliswa kwanoma isiphi isidakamizwa kwezibalulwe ngaphansi kweSahluko soku-1 neSahluko sesi-2 soMthetho..  Izichibiyelo zibhekana nokungasebenzi kweSahluko sama-63, okwatholakala ukuthi akuhambisani nomthethosisekelo uma uNgqongqoshe ezonikwa amalungelo okuchibiyela izahluko ngaphandle kokubandakanya inqubo yomthetho.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Mulayotibe uyu nga ṅwaha wa 2020 hu tshi itelwa uri hu vhe na vhukwamani na tshitshavha..   Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Mafhungo zwa Masheleni wa ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: Ngowezi-2020, iNkantolo Yomthethosisekelo yamemezela ukuthi iSahluko sama-63 esimayelana neZidakamizwa Nokushushumbiswa Kwazo we-1992 asihambisani nomthethosisekelo futhi yamisa ukungasebenzi kwaso ukuya mhla ziyi-17 kuZibandlela 2022 ukunikeza iPhalamende isikhathi sokulungisa leli phutha  Umcimbi ozayo.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza rumelwa ha Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Mafhungo zwa Masheleni, wa ṅwaha wa 2022 ngei Phaḽamenndeni.
tgt_text: Indebe yomhlaba i-Rugby World Cup Sevens.

src_text: Mulayotibe uyu dzinginya uri hu vhe na khwiniso ya Milayo ya sumbe, ine ya vha (1) Mulayo wa Tshikwama tsha Phentsheni ya Zwiimiswa zwi Elanaho, wa 1963 (Mulayo 41 wa 1963); (2) Mulayo wa Phentsheni dza Miraḓo ya Mmbi, wa 1976 (Mulayo 84 wa 1976); (3) Mulayo wa Phentsheni dza Vhashumeli vha Muvhuso wa 1996; (4) Mulayo wa Khomishini ya zwa Masheleni na Gwama, wa 1997 (Mulayo 99 wa 1997); (5) Mulayo wa Bannga ya Mveledziso ya Mavu na Vhulimi, wa 2002 (Mulayo 15 wa 2002); (6) Mulayo wa Mishumo ya zwa Muvhalelano, wa 2005 (Mulayo 26 wa 2005) na (7) Mulayo wa Khwiniso ya Mishumo ya Muvhalelano wa 2021 (Mulayo 5 wa 2021).
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika izosingatha imidlalo yendebe yomhlaba i-World Cup Sevens 2022 eKapa phakathi komhla we-9 nomhla we-11 kuMandulo.

src_text: Uhu khwiniswa hune ha khou dzinginywa hu katela, nga fhasi ha Mulayo wa Phentsheni dza Miraḓo ya Mmbi, wa 1996 katelwa ha muthu ane wa dzula nae lwa tshoṱhe kha mbuelo dza bva murahu nga ḽa 27 Lambamai.
tgt_text: Lo mcimbi wombukiso uzosingathwa okokuqala ezwenikazi i-Afrika futhi kuzobonakala amaqembu amadoda angama-24 nawesifazane ayi-16 aphuma emhlabeni jikelele encintisana  Imiyalezo.

src_text: Khwiniso dza milayo ya phentsheni dzi ḓo ita uri vhafarisi vha kone swikela mbuelo dzavho dza phentsheni na zwenezwo nga murahu ha musi mbingano yo no fhaladzwa ḓadzisa kha zwa bvisela khagala vhuḓifhinduleli ha Minisṱa wa Gwama na kha zwa muvhalelano, khwiniso idzi dzi dovha hafhu dza shandukisa maanḓa komiti ya khombetshedzo afho hune muṱolambalelano ṱanganedza uri ita vhukhakhi.
tgt_text: UkuhalalisaIKhabhinethi lihalalisela futhi lifisela okuhle kodwa laba: I-Banyana, ngokuqopha umlando benqoba indebe yokuqala ngqa yaseNingizimu Afrika ye-Women's Africa Cup of Nations (i-WAFCON), emdlalweni wamanqamu we-2022 WAFCON obudlalwa e-Rabat, e-Morocco ngoMgqibelo, mhla wama-23 kuNtulikazi.

src_text: Mulayotibe wo phaḓaladzwa hu tshi itelwa vhupfiwa ha tshitshavha nga ṅwedzi wa Luhuhi.
tgt_text: Ngokuphumelela kwabo, bazodlulela emincintiswaneni yeNdebe Yomhlaba Yabesifazane ye-FIFA ngonyaka ozayo ezobe isingathwe ngokuhlanganyela i-Australia ne-New Zealand kusuka mhla wama-20 kuNtulikazi kuya mhla wama-20 kuNcwaba.

IQembu laseNingizimu Afrika, ngokuhlabana ngezindondo ezingama-27 emidlalweni enhlobonhlobo ye-2022 Commonwealth Games ebidlalwa e- Birmingham, e-England kusuka mhla wama-28 kuNtulikazi kuya mhla wesi-8 kuNcwaba.

src_text: Milayo nga Angaredza (Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Lwa na Zwiito zwa Dzumbetshedza Masheleni ane si vhe Mulayoni na Fhelisa zwa Thuso ya Masheleni kha Zwiito zwa Vhutherorisi), wa.
tgt_text: Bathathe indawo yesishiyagalolunye ngezindondo eziyisikhombisa zegolide, eziyisishiyagalolunye zesiliva kanye nezili-11 zethusi.Iqembu Labesifazane lama-Springbok, ngokunqoba i-Spain emdlalweni wabo wokuqala kwemibili yokuzwana amandla ye-Women’s Winter Series e-Emirates Airline Park e-Johannesburg.Nks Ndavi Nokeri (23), ngokwethweswa isicoco sikaZime waseNingizimu Afrika wezi-.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza rumelwa ha Milayo nga Angaredza (Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Lwa na Zwiito zwa Dzumbetshedza Masheleni ane si vhe Mulayoni na Fhelisa zwa Thuso ya Masheleni kha Zwiito zwa Vhutherorisi), wa 2022 ngei Phaḽamenndeni itela uri dzudzanyiwe hafhu.
tgt_text: Nks Ashleigh Buhai, ngokuhlabana ku-2022 AIG Women’s Open waba ngowesifazane wesithathu waseNingizimu Afrika ukuhlabana ngendondo yegolide.

src_text: Mulayotibe uyu ndi Mulayotibe une wa vha na zwipiḓa zwinzhi une wa khou khwinisa Milayo ya zwino ine ya vha  Mulayo wa Senthara ya Vhusevhi ha zwa Masheleni, wa 2001 (Mulayo 38 wa 2001); (ii) Mulayo wa Madzangano sa Shumeli Malamba, wa 1997 (Mulayo 71 wa 1997); (iii) Mulayo wa Ndangulo ya Ndaka ya Vhufarandaka, wa 1988 (Mulayo 57 wa 1988); (iv) Mulayo wa Dzikhamphani, wa 2008 (Mulayo 71 wa 2008) na  Mulayo wa Milayo ya Sekhithara ya zwa Masheleni, wa 2017 ( Mulayo 9  2017).
tgt_text: Amazwi enduduzo         IKhabhinethi lidlulisa amazwi enduduzo emndenini nakubangani baka: ● Tokollo “Magesh” Tshabalala (46), umculi kanye nombhali wamaculo owadlondlobala waduma ngesikhathi yena nabangani bakhe ababili beqala iqembu lomculo we-kwaito ngowe-1996 elalibizwa nge-TKZee.

src_text: hwiniso idzi ndi dzine dza khou fhindula kha vhuṱudzeṱudze he ha bviselwa khagala nga tshifhinga tsha tsenguluso ya shango musi ḽi tshi vhambedzwa na maṅwe ye ya itwa nga vha Tshigwada tsha Shuma tsha Mishumo ya zwa Masheleni (FATF).

Muvhigo wa tsenguluso iyi ya vhoṱhe wo ita themendelo dza 40 dzine dza ḓo thusa kha ita uri Afrika Tshipembe ḽi shume nga nḓila ine ḽa khou tevhedza maga ḽifhasi u fhelisa zwiito zwa dzumbetshedzwa ha masheleni khathihi na ṋetshedza thuso ya zwa masheleni kha zwiito zwa vhutherorisi..   Afrika Tshipembe ḽo wanala ḽi tshe ḽo salela murahu kha masia   Hoyu Mulayotibe amba nga ha masia 14 kha ayo a bviselwa khagala.
tgt_text: Abaqashiwe.

src_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽo vha muraḓo wa FATF bva nga ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: Bonke abaqashiwe kumele kuqinisekiswe iziqu zabo futhi bahlolwe ngokufanele.
Nks Zenkosi Dumile Mhlongo njengePhini loMqondisi-Jikelele (i-DDG): Kwezocwaningo Lenqubomgomo Nomthethonqubo kuMnyango wezemisebenzi Kahulumeni Nengqalasizinda (i-DPWI).

src_text: Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Zwidzidzivhadzi na Vhambadzwa ha Zwidzidzivhadzi nga nḓila ine zwa si vhe Mulayoni wa ṅwaha wa.

Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza rumelwa ha Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Zwidzidzivhadzi na Vhambadzwa ha Zwidzidzivhadzi nga nḓila ine ya si vhe Mulayoni wa ṅwaha wa 2022 ngei Phaḽamenndeni hu tshi itelwa uri kone dzudzanywa hafhu.
tgt_text: Dkt Bongani Elias Sithole njenge-DDG: kwiSikhungo Sokulawulwa Kwesimo Senhlekelele kuMnyango Wezokubusa Ngokubambisana..  Mnu Adam Mthombeni njenge-DDG: KweZobudlelwano Phakathi Kukahulumeni e-DPWI.

src_text: Mulayo uyu wa Zwidzidzivhadzi na Vhambadzwa ha Zwidzidzivhadzi zwi siho Mulayoni, wa 1992 (Mulayo 140 wa 1992) ita uri magwa na phaḓaladzwa ha zwithu zwiṅwe na zwiṅwe zwe zwa bulwa nga fhasi ha Sheduḽu 1 na Sheduḽu 2 ya uno Mulayo zwi vhe vhugevhenga..   Khwiniso idzo dzi lavhelesa na kha sa tea ha Khethekanyo 63, ye ya wanala sa tshimbilelani na ndayotewa kha ḽa uri Minisṱa ṋewe pfanelo dza khwinisa sheduḽu hu songo vha na kwama maitele zwa mulayo.

Nga ṅwaha wa 2020, Khothe ya Ndayotewa yo ḓivhadza uri Khethekanyo 63 ya Mulayo wa Zwidzidzivhadzi na Vhambadzwa ha Zwidzidzivhadzi wa 1992 u khou tshimbilelana na ndayotewa ya fhedza nga imisa zwa sa tea hawo swika nga ḽa 17 Nyendavhusiku 2022 itela ṋetshela Phaḽamennde tshikhala tsha khakhulula vhuṱudzeṱudze uho    Vhuṱambo vhune ha khou ḓa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi livumelana nokuqashwa kwalaba abalandelayo:.

src_text: Mitambo ya ḽifhasi ya Rugby World Cup Sevens.
tgt_text: Dkt Zwanani Titus Mathe njengeSikhulu Esiphezulu Esiphethe eSikhungweni Sokuthuthukiswa Kwezamandla eNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽi ḓo fara mitambo ya ḽifhasi ya Rugby World Cup Sevens 2022 ngei Ḓoroboni ya Kapa vhukati ha ḽa 9 na ḽa 11 Khubvumedzi.
tgt_text: Amalungu angasebenzi ngokuphelele kuBalawuli Bezamandla Kuzwelonke eNingizimu Afrika  Mnu Thembani Bukula (uSihlalo)  Mnu Zandile Mpungose (iPhini likaSihlalo)  Nks Precious Sibiya  Nks Thembeka Semane; no-e. Mnu Fungai Sibanda (ophinde wabekwa).

src_text: Vhuṱambo uvhu ha misumbedzo vhu khou ḓo farelwa fhano kha dzhango ḽa Afrika lwa tou thoma nahone hu ḓo vha na thimu dza vhanna dza 24 na dza vhafumakadzi dza 16 bva ḽifhasini nga angaredza dzine dza ḓo vha dzi tshi khou ṱaṱisana kha vhuṱambo uvhu   Milaedza fhululedzaKhabinethe yo rumela mulaedza wayo wa fhululedza na tamela mashudu kha: ●  Thimu ya bola ya milenzhe ya vhafumakadzi, Banyana, nge vha ita ḓivhazwakale khathihi na fhenya kha muṱaṱisano wa tou thoma wa Afrika Tshipembe wa Tshiphuga tsha Afrika tsha Vhafumakadzi (WAFCON), kha mutambo wa bola ya milenzhe kha makhaulatshele WAFCON ya 2022 ye ya farelwa fhaḽa Rabat, kha ḽa Morocco nga Mugivhela, wa ḽa 23 Fulwi.
tgt_text: USihlalo kanye nelungu loMkhandlu WeBhodi Lezobuchwepheshe Bezezimbiwa  Dkt Thibedi Ramontja (uSihlalo); no-b.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza tsela fhasi zwiṱuku ha phimo ya vhushayamushumo ha shango, yo tsaho nga.
tgt_text: Umnotho.

src_text: 6% bva kha.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lamukele ukwehla kancane kwezinga labantu abangasebenzi kuleli lizwe, okwehle nge-.

src_text: 5% kha kotara ya thoma ya kha.
tgt_text: 6%, kusuka kuma-.

src_text: 9% kha kotara ya vhuvhili ya ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: 5% kwikota yokuqala kwaya kuma-.

src_text: Tshivhalo tsho ganḓiswaho kha Tsedzuluso ya zwa Vhashumi ya Kotara iṅwe na iṅwe bva kha vha Mbalombalo ya Afrika Tshipembe sumbedza uri mishumo minzhisa yo rekhodiwa kha Tshumelo dza Matshilisano na Tshitshavha (276 000), Mbambadzo (169 000), Masheleni (128 000) na zwa fhaṱa (104 000).
tgt_text: 9% kwikota yesibili ngowezi-.

src_text: Tshivhaloguṱe tsha vhathu vha shumaho tsho ima kha 15, 6 miḽioni kha kotara ya vhuvhili ya ṅwaha wa 2022, ngeno tsha vhathu vha sa shumiho tsho gonya nga 132 000 swika kha 8, 0 miḽioni kha kotara ya vhuvhili ya ṅwaha wa 2022 musi zwi tshi vhambedzwa na kotara yo fhiraho dzika uhu naho hu na mbuelo dzi takadzaho hu sumbedza uri vhuḓidini ho khwaṱhaho nga muvhuso na sekhithara dzoṱhe dzi shumisanaho na muvhuso alusa ikonomi na sika mishumo minzhisa ine ya khou ṱoḓea vhukuma vhu khou thoma aṋwa mitshelo.
tgt_text: Amanani ashicilelwe kuCwaningo Lwabasebenzi Lwekota ngabeZezibalo eNingizimu Afrika abonisa ukuthi imisebenzi eminingi ebe khona ibe semkhakheni wezoMphakathi Nezinsiza Zenhlalo (276 000), wezoHwebo (169 000), weZezimali (128 000) kanye nowoKwakha (104 000)..     Inani eliphelele labantu abaqashiwe lime kwizigidi eziyi-.

src_text: Hezwi ndi ṱhanzielo ya uri arali ri tshi shumisana roṱhe nga khwaṱhisa nungo dzashu dzoṱhe, ri nga kunda khaedu dzo livhanaho na ikonomi yashu.
tgt_text: 6 kwikota yesibili ngowezi-2022, kwathi inani labantu abangasebenzi lakhula ngezi-132 000 laya ezigidini eziyi-.

src_text: Khabinethe pfesesa dinalea ha Maafrika Tshipembe musi vha tshi khou kundelwa wana zwa ḓitshidza ḓuvha ḽiṅwe na ḽiṅwe nga vhanga ḽa ḓura ha zwithu na phimo ya vhushayamushumo re nṱha vhukuma.
tgt_text: 0 kwikota yesibili ngowezi-2022 uma kuqhathaniswa nekota eyedlule.

src_text: Sa muvhuso ṱhogomelaho, ri dzula ro ḓiimisela na ḓikumedzela kha shumisana na sekhithara dzoṱhe dzi shumisanaho na muvhuso itela fhaṱa vhumatshelo ha khwine ha muthu muṅwe na muṅwe.
tgt_text: Le mpumelelo engatheni kodwa ejabulisayo ibonisa ukuthi inhlanganisela yemizamo kahulumeni ekanye nozakwabo emiphakathini yokukhulisa umnotho nokusungula imisebenzi edingekayo isiqala ukuthela izithelo..     Lokhu kungubufakazi bokuthi uma sonke sisebenza ngokubambisana siphikelele phambili ngamandla ahlangene, singazinqoba izinselele ezibhekene nomnotho wethu..     IKhabhinethi liyakuqonda ukukhungatheka kwabantu baseNingizimu Afrika njengoba bethwele kanzima ukuphila nsuku zonke ngenxa yezindleko eziphezulu zempilo kanye nezinga eliphezulu labantu abangasebenzi.

src_text: Muvhuso dzula wo ḓikumedzela tikedza mabindu apo nga renga na shumisa thundu na tshumelo dzapo.
tgt_text: Njengohulumeni onakekelayo, silokhu sizimisele futhi sizinikele ekusebenzisaneni nozakwethu emiphakathini ukwakha ikusasa elingcono lawo wonke umuntu.

src_text: Themamveledziso ya Muvhuso.
tgt_text: Uhulumeni usalokhu ezinikele ekwesekeni amabhizinisi alapha ekhaya ngokuthenga impahla nokusebenzisa izinsiza zalapha ekhaya.

src_text: Khabinethe yo sasaladza tshinyadzwa ha themamveledziso nga vhadzuli vha Togaat ngei KwaZulu-Natal nga tshifhinga tsha migwalabo ya khaedu ya ṱhahelelo ya  maḓi.
tgt_text: Ingqalasizinda Yomphakathi.

src_text: Khabinethe ita khuwelelo ya vhudziki na vhukonḓeleli sa zwi mushumo kati wa vhuedzedza Tongaat Water Treatment Works..  Khabinethe khou pfesesa dinalela ha vhadzuli vhe vha ḓo tea shumisa mathannge maḓi lwa tshifhinga tshilapfu bva tshe ha vha na tshiwo tsha miḓalo mathomo uno ṅwaha.
tgt_text: Ikhabhinethi liyakugxeka kakhulu ukucekelwa phansi kwengqalasizinda ngabahlali basoThongathi KwaZulu Natali ngesikhathi bebhikishela amanzi.

src_text: Honeha, dzikhakhathi na zwiito zwi siho mulayoni zwi fhelisi thaidzo, nahone tshinyadza themamveledzido ya lushaka zwi kwamesa zwitshavha zwa tsinisa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi licela ukuthi kwehliswe amaphaphu futhi kubekezelwe njengoba umsebenzi usuqalile wokulungisa iSizinda Samanzi oThongathi.

src_text: Mulayo wa Khwiniso ya Sisiṱeme dza Masipala wa Muvhuso Wapo wa.
Khabinethe ṱanganedza sainwa vha mulayo ha Mulayo wa Khwiniso ya Sisiṱeme dza Masipala wa Muvhuso Wapo, wa 2022 (Mulayo 3 wa 2022) nga Phresidennde Vho Cyril Ramaphosa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liyakuqonda ukukhungatheka kwabahlali okufanele basebenzise izimoto zamathangi amanzi isikhathi esengeziwe selokhu kwaba nezikhukhula ekuqaleni kwalo nyaka.

src_text: Mulayo ṱoḓa khwinisa khaphasithi na phimo ya maitelendavhelelwa muvhuso wapo.
tgt_text: Noma kunjalo, udlame nesiphithiphithi akusona isixazululo, futhi ukucekelwa phansi kwengqalasizinda yomphakathi kulimaza imiphakathi esendaweni kuphela.

src_text: Mulayo vhumba tshipiḓa tsha ndingedzo dza muvhuso ita uri Tshumelo ya Tshitshavha shume nga vhukoni na khwaṱhisedza ṋetshedzo dzo khwaṱhaho dza tshumelo kha vhathu, sa pfanelo ya mutheo yo ṅwalwaho kha Ndayotewa ya Riphabuḽiki ya Afrika Tshipembe ya..  Mulayo ṱalusa maitele ane tea tevhelwa musi hu tshi tholwa vhathu kha poswo khulwane.
tgt_text: ISichibiyelo soMthetho Wezindlela Zokusebenza Zomasipala Bohulumeni Basekhaya sezi-.

src_text: Zwa zwino thivhela vhaofisiri vha tshitshavha vhahulwane uri vha vhe na vhuimo kha zwa poḽotiki kha mahoro zwa poḽotiki.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lamukele ukusayinwa kufakwe emthethweni iSichibiyelo Somthetho Wezindlela Zokusebenza Komasipala Bohulumeni Basekhaya, sezi-2022 (Umthetho wesi-3 wezi-2022) nguMongameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa.

src_text: Nga Mulayo uyu hafhu, poswo dza mulanguli wa masipala dzi lavhelelwa kungedzelwa kha lushaka lwoṱhe itela kunga vhunzhi ha vhonkhetheni vho teaho..  Khabinethe na fulufhelo uri tshanduko idzi dzi ḓo khwaṱhisedza uri avho vhane vha tholwa kana khethwa kha maimo aneo vha ḓo kona bveledza zwe vha fulufhedzisa itela uri ri swikelele ṋetshedzo ya vhutshilo ha khwine kha vhathu vhoṱhe.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho uhlose ukuthuthukisa ikhono kanye namazinga okuziphatha kohulumeni basekhaya.

src_text: Vhugevhenga.
tgt_text: Lo mthetho uyingxenye yemizamo kahulumeni yokusebenza ngokulandela umthetho Kwezemisebenzi Kahulumeni kanye nokuqinisekisa ukuhlinzekwa okusimeme kwezinsiza kubantu, njengelungelo elihamba phambili elilotshwe kuMthethosisekelo waseNingizimu Afrika wangowe-..

src_text: Khabinethe yo khoḓa vhashumi vha thelisaho zwiṱunḓwa vha Tshumelo ya Muthelo ya Afrika Tshipembe nge vha wana  785 kg ya zwidzidzivhadzi zwa crystal meth zwi linganaho R236 miḽioni ya thengiso siho mulayoni ngei OR Tambo International Airport nga Swondaha ya ḽa 28 Ṱhangule ṅwaha wa dzumbululwa ha zwidzidzivhadzi izwi zwo ḓo rumela mulaedza wa khaidzo kha zwigwada zwa vhugevhenga ho dzudzanywaho wa uri vhuimangalavha ha dzhena na bva ho tsireledzwa vhukuma nahone vhaofisiri vhashu vha khou shuma nga maanḓa fhelisa zwiito zwa vhugevhenga vhuṅwe na vhuṅwe  Tsheo dza Khabinethe.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho ucacisa inqubo okumele ilandelwe uma kuqashwa abantu ezikhundleni zokuphatha.

src_text: Muvhigo wa Khoro nga ha Ṱhoḓisiso ya Pfunzo ya Nṱha (CHE)  kha Miholo ya Ṱhoho dza zwa Pfunzo na Ndaulo Dziyunivesithi (Vice Chancellors) na Vhalanguli vha Vhahulwane Afrika Tshipembe.
tgt_text: Manje usuvimbela izikhulu eziphethe kuhulumeni ukuthi zibe nezikhundla emahhovisi amaqembu epolitiki.

src_text: Khabinethe yo nyeṱulelwa nga ha mvelelo dza ṱhoḓisiso ya CHE ye ya tiwa nga ṅwaha wa 2020 nga Minisṱa wa Pfunzo ya Nṱha, Saintsi na Vhutumbuli, Dokotela Vho Blade Nzimande ṱola ḽeveḽe dza muholo na maitele fanaho zwa khorondangi dza yunivesithi kha miṅwaha fhiraho 15 bva nga ṅwaha wa 2005 swika wa..  Ṱhoḓisiso yo vha ya wana nḓila yo khwaṱhaho konadzeaho na mveledziso ya dziyunivesithi kana sekhithara ya pfunzo ya nṱha kha shango.
tgt_text: Ngalo Mthetho futhi, izikhundla ezingenabantu zabaphathi bomasipala kulindeleke ukuthi zikhangiswe kuzwelonke ukuze kuzohehwa abantu abaningi abafanelekile abangafaka izicelo zalezi zikhundla..     IKhabhinethi liyazethemba ukuthi lezi zinguquko zizoqinisekisa ukuthi labo abaqashwayo noma abakhethwayo kulezi zikhundla bazokwazi ukugcina izethembiso zabo ukuze sizokwazi ukuba nempilo engcono yawo wonke umuntu.

src_text: Muvhigo uyu sumbedzisa mawanwa mahulwane khathihi na themendelo  dza ndulamiso dzo dzinginywaho.
tgt_text: Ubugebengu.

src_text: Themendelo dzi ṋetshedza, vhukati ha dziṅwe, maitele miholo khwaṱhaho nahone ane vha khagala thomiwa ha tshiimiswa tsha vhulavhelesi tsho imaho nga tshoṱhe tsha nga nnḓa ingamela maitele u dzhia tsheo dza miholo dovha ya ṋetshedza khwaṱhiswa ha sisiṱeme dza ela kushumele kha zwiimiswa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lincome izikhulu ezisebenza ngentela eSikhungweni Esiqoqa Intela eNingizimu Afrika ngokushaqa izidakamizwa ze-crystal meth ezingama-785 kg ezingabiza inani eliyizigidi ezingama-R236 esikhumulweni sezindiza i-OR Tambo International Airport ngeSonto, mhla wama-28 kuNcwaba.

src_text: Ngudo yo dovha ya dzhiela nṱha vhuhulu ho fhambanaho ya zwiimiswa izwi na dovha ita ndinganyiso na maitele dzitshaka.
tgt_text: Ukushaqwa kwalezi zidakamizwa kuzothumela isexwayiso kuzigelekeqe sokuthi imingcele yethu engenayo nephumayo ivikelwe kakhulu futhi amahhovisi ethu asebenza ngokuzikhandla ukuqeda nya ubugebengu     Izinqumo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Minisṱa wa Pfunzo ya Nṱha, Saintsi na Vhutumbuli vha khou lavhelelwa haseledza nga ha muvhigo uyu na vhurangaphanḓa ha yunivesithi sa ḽiga ḽa khwaṱhisa zwiimiswa zwa pfunzo izwi.
tgt_text: UMbiko Womkhandlu Wezemfundo Ephakeme (i-CHE) Wophenyo lokuKhokhelwa kwamaPhini oShansela Emanyuvesi kanye Nabaphathi Abakhulu eNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Muvhigo ḓo anḓadzwa nga murahu kha webusaithi ya Muhasho wa Pfunzo ya Nṱha na Vhutumbuli: www.dhet.gov.za.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi litshelwe kafushane ngemiphumela yophenyo lwe-CHE eyayijutshwe ngowezi-2020 nguNgqongqoshe Wezemfundo Ephakeme, Ezesayensi Nokuqamba Kabusha, uDkt u-Blade Nzimande, ukuthi iphenyisise ngezigaba zokukhokhelwa nokuhola kwezikhulu eziphezulu emanyuvesi esikhathini seminyaka eyi-15 kusukela ngowezi-2005 kuya kowezi-..     Uphenyo lwalusungulelwa ukuthola ukusimama, ukusebenza kahle kanye nokuthuthukiswa komkhakha wamanyuvesi noma wemfundo ephakeme kuleli lizwe.

src_text: Tshanduko Ṱavhanyedzaho ya Khaphasithi ya Ṱhoḓisiso na Pfunzo  kha Sekhithara ya Pfunzo ya Nṱha.
tgt_text: Lo mbiko ucacisa lokho okutholiwe kanye nezincomo ezethuliwe zokulungisa isimo..     Izincomo lezi ziphakamisa, phakathi kokunye, inqubo yokukhokhelwa eqinile nengafihli lutho.

src_text: Khabinethe tikedza themendelo ya risetshe mbili dzo itwaho eletshedza nga ha maga ane fanela dzhiwa itela ṱavhanyisa tshanduko ya risetshe na khaphasithi ya funza kha zwiimiswa zwa ngudo dza nṱha.
tgt_text: Ukusungulwa kwethimba langaphandle futhi elizimele ukuqapha inqubo yokuthathwa kwezinqumo ngamaholo.

src_text: Muvhigo wa thoma wo itwa nga Tshigwada tsha Mushumo tsha Dziminisṱa ṱoḓisisa zwithivheli zwi thivhelaho mushumo wa thola fara vhashumi na mvelaphanḓa ya  vhorapfunzo vha vharema Afrika Tshipembe.
tgt_text: Uphinde waphakamisa ukuqiniswa kwezindlela zokuhlola ukwenziwa komsebenzi ezikhungweni.

src_text: Muvhigo wa vhuvhili – wo itwa nga Muhasho wa Saintsi na Vhutumbuli na Tshiimiswa tsha Ṱhoḓisiso tsha Lushaka – wo itwa nga Yunivesithi dza Afrika Tshipembe, vhuimeli ha tshiimiswa ho angaredzaho ha yunivesithi dza muvhuso dza 26 kha shango.
tgt_text: Ucwaningo luphinde labhekisisa ubukhulu balezo nalezo zikhungo futhi wabe sewenza isilinganiso esihambelana nesamazwe ngamazwe.

src_text: Mivhigo heyi yoṱhe dzinginya zwiṱirathedzhi zwa thusedzo ṱavhanyisa tshanduko kha masia maṱanu ṱanḓavhuwaho, ane vha kha postgraduate pineline; vhudzheneli nga vhashumi; mvelele ya tshiimiswa na maitele; mbekanyamushumo na tshiṱirathedzhi, na zwiko zwi si zwinzhi.
tgt_text: UNgqongqoshe Wezemfundo Ephakeme, Ezesayensi Nokuqamba Kabusha ulindeleke ukuthi axoxisane ngalo mbiko nobuholi basemanyuvesi njengesinyathelo sokuqinisa lezi zikhungo zemfundo.

src_text: Pfano ya Dzitshaka nga ha Zwiko zwa Dzhenetiki zwa Zwimela zwa Zwiḽiwa na Vhulimi (Pfano).
tgt_text: Umbiko uzobe emva kwalokho sewuchicilelwa kwiwebhusayithi yoMnyango Wezemfundo Ephakeme Nokuqeqeshwa ethi: www.dhet.gov.za.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza rumelwa ha Pfano Phalamenndeni uri sainwe sa thendelano.
tgt_text: Uguquko Olusheshisiwe Lwezocwaningo kanye Nekhono Lokufundisa Emkhakheni Wezemfundo Ephakeme.

src_text: Hezwi zwi ḓo ita uri Afrika Tshipembe ḽi vhe tshipiḓa tsha madzangano a Pfano, ine ya eletshedza mashango ane vha muraḓo ambedzana na vhona uri hu na tshumiso yo khwaṱhaho ya zwiko zwa dzhenetiki zwa zwimela zwa zwiḽiwa na vhulimi saina Pfano iyi zwi ḓo dovha zwa khwaṱhisa vhuḓikumedzeli ha shango kha ndondolo na kushumisele ko khwaṱhaho kwa zwiko zwa dzhenetiki zwa zwimela, na ṋetshedza thikhedzo kha zwitshavha zwa mahayani.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi leseke izincomo zocwaningo olubili obelwenzelwe ukweluleka ngezinyathelo okumele zithathwe ukuze kuzosheshiswa uguquko kwezocwaningo kanye nekhono lokufundisa ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme.

src_text: Muhanga wa Tshanduko ya Ikonomi Katelaho vhoṱhe (Just Transition) ya Afrika Tshipembe.
tgt_text: Umbiko wokuqala wenziwa iThimba LikaNgqongqoshe elaliphenya imigoqo evimbe ukuqashwa, ukugcinwa emsebenzini kanye nenqubekelaphambili ezifundisweni zabantu abamnyama eNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Muhanga wa Tshanduko ya Ikonomi Katelaho vhoṱhe uri thome shumiswa.
tgt_text: Umbiko wesibili - owayalelwa nguMnyango Wezesayensi Nokuqamba Kabusha kanye neNhlangano Kazwelonke Yezocwaningo - yenziwa yibhodi i-Universities South Africa, okuyibhodi eliyinhlanganisela elimele amanyuvesi angama-26 kuleli lizwe.

src_text: Muhanga ṋetshedza bono ḽi fanaho ḽa Afrika Tshipembe ḽi linganaho na ḽi konḓelelaho kilima ṱalutshedza masia milayo na mbekanyamaitele zwa swikelela izwi.
tgt_text: Yomibili le mibiko iphakamisa amaqhingasu okungenelela ukuze kuzolethwa ngokushesha uguquko emikhakheni emihlanu ebanzi, okubalwa kuyo umkhakha wasebeneziqu; ukubamba iqhaza kwabasebenzi; usikompilo nemikhuba yesikhungo; inqubomgomo neqhingasu, kanye nezinsiza-kusebenza ezinganele.

src_text: Muhanga wa tshanduko ḓo kwama muthu muṅwe na muṅwe Afrika Tshipembe, na ṋetshedza tshikhala tsha tandulula vhushayandingano ha tshifhinga tsho fhiraho khathihi na sika ikonomi vhuedzaho vhoṱhe.
Khomishini ya Kilima ya Phresidennde yo tshimbidza maitele vhukwamani vhuhulwane na vhashumisani vha wana thikhedzo yo ṱanḓavhuwaho ya muhanga.
tgt_text: ISivumelwano Samazwe Ngamazwe Ngemithombo Yofuzo Lwezitshalo Zokudla Nezolimo (iSivumelwano).

src_text: Khabinethe yo khwaṱhisedza uri tsudzuluwo ya kha ikonomi sa shumisi khaboni nga ṅwaha wa 2050 fanela tikedza dzangalelo ḽa lushaka, hu tshi katela na mishumo ya khwine ya vhoṱhe,  khwiniso ya vhudzheneli ha tshitshavhani na pheliso ya vhushai.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukungeniswa kweSivumelwano ePhalamende.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ita khuwelelo kha vhashumisani na muvhuso tikedza na ṱanganedza muhanga uyu.
tgt_text: Lokhu kuzovumela iNingizimu Afrika ukuthi ibe ingxenye yamazwe ahambisana nalesi Sivumelwano, esikhomba indlela amazwe angamalungu ekugcineni nasekuqinisekiseni ukusetshenziswa okusimeme kwemithombo yofuzo lwezitshalo ukuze kuzokhiqizwa ukudla nezolimo.

src_text: Pulane yo dodombedzwaho ya thoma shumisa muhanga ḓo bveledzwa, nahone ḓo dzheniswa kha vhupulani ha muvhuso na maitele mugaganyagwama.
tgt_text: Ukungena kulesi Sivumelwano kuzophinde kuqinise ukuzinikela kwaleli lizwe ekugcineni nasekusebenziseni ngokusimeme imithombo yofuzo lwezitshalo, kuphinde kweseke imiphakathi yasemakhaya.

src_text: Garaṱa dza Ḽaisentsi ya reila Ntswa dza Afrika Tshipembe.
tgt_text: UHlaka Loguquko Lwesimo eNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza ḓo thoma shumiswa ha Garaṱa ya Ḽaisentsi ya reila ntswa ine ya vha na zwidodombedzwa zwa tsireledzo zwa khwine fhira ine ya vha hone zwino.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze uHlaka Loguquko Lwesimo ukuthi luqale ukusebenza.

src_text: Sisiṱeme ya zwino yo shumiswa bva kha ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: Uhlaka lolu luletha umbono owodwa weNingizimu Afrika elinganayo, nemelana nesimo sezulu.

src_text: Thekhinoḽodzhi bva zwenezwo yo no shanduka nahone zwi vho ḓura ṱhogomela themamveledziso ya ḽaisentsi dzine ndi kale ri khou shumisa dzone kha tshifhinga tsha zwino.
tgt_text: Licacisa izimiso nenqubomgomo ezoholela kulokhu.

src_text: Garaṱa ntswa yo dzinginywaho ḓo ita uri ḽaisentsi ya reila kone shuma na International Information Technology Personal Identification Compliant Driving Licence (ISO18013).
tgt_text: Uhlaka loguquko luzothinta wonke umuntu eNingizimu Afrika, futhi lunika ithuba lokubhekana nokungalingani kwangesikhathi esedlule futhi lwakha umnotho okuzozuza kuwona wonke umuntu.

src_text: Mbekanyamaitele ya Mbekanyamushumo dza Mishumo ya Tshitshavha dzo Engedzwaho (EPWP).
tgt_text: IKhomishini KaMongameli Eqaphe Isimo Sezulu yaqhuba inqubo ejulile yokuxoxisana nokusetshenzisanwa nabo emphakathini futhi yathola ukwesekwa okukhulu ngalolu hlaka.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza ḓivhadzwa kha  gazethe mvetomveto ya Mbekanyamaitele ya EPWP itela vhukwamani na tshitshavha.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likuqinisekisile ukuthi ukuguqukela emnothweni ongenayo ikhabhoni ngowezi-2050 kumele kweseke izifiso zentuthuko zezwe, kubandakanya imisebenzi engcono yawo wonke umuntu, ukubandakanywa komphakathi kanye nokuqedwa nya kobubha.

src_text: EPWP ndi iṅwe ya mbekanyamushumo khulwane dza muvhuso yo livhiswaho kha ṋetshedza ṱhaḓulo ya muholo na kha vhushai nga sika zwikhala zwa mushumo wa tshifhinga nyana, nga maanḓa kha vhaswa na vhafumakadzi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi selicele bonke okusetshenziswana nabo emphakathini ukuthi beseke futhi bamukele lolu hlaka.

src_text: Mvetomveto ya mbekanyamaitele ntswa khwaṱhisa mbekanyamushumo na ṋea ṱhaluso kha masia fanaho na zwa miholo, modele wa ndambedzo na tsireledzo ya matshilisano, na livhanyisa EPWP na maitele zwa mushumo ano maḓuvha ṱuṱuwedza vhushumisani vhukati ha muvhuso na sekhithara ya phuraivethe kha khwaṱhisedza uri  EPWP shela mulenzhe zwihulwane vhukuma kha tsiko ya mishumo yavhuḓi na fhungudza vhushai.
tgt_text: Uhlelo olunemininingo lokuqalisa lolu hlaka luzokwenziwa, futhi luzohlanganiswa nezinhlelo zikahulumeni kanye nesabelomali.

src_text: Mbekanyamaitele iyi ḓo ṱuṱuwedza vhutumbuli kha mathomo mbekanyamushumo ya mishumo ya tshitshavha mona na shango.
tgt_text: Ikhadi Elisha Lelayisensi Yokushayela eNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Khwiniso kha Tshigwada tsha Vhuṋa tsha Khoini ya Tshifumi ya Afrika Tshipembe.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukushintshwa kweKhadi Lelayisensi Yokushayela lamanje kube yileli eliklanywe lafakwa izici zokuphepha..     Indlela yamanje selokhu yasetshenziswa kusukela ngowe-.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza muelo, dizaini na bveledzwa ha Tshigwada tsha Vhuṋa tsha Khoini ya Tshifumi ya ṅwaha wa 2023 ya Afrika Tshipembe.
tgt_text: Ubuchwepheshe buyaguquguquka futhi sekuyizindleko ukugcina ingqalasizinda ekhona njengamanje.

src_text: (Fourth Decimal Coin Series).
tgt_text: Ikhadi elisha eliphakanyisiwe lizokwenza ukuthi ilayisensi yokushayela kuleli lizwe ihambisane nobuchwepheshe be-International Information Technology Personal Identification Compliant Driving Licence (i-ISO18013).

src_text: Yo ṱanganedza sisiṱeme ya sielisana nga ṅwaha nga ṅwaha shumisa nyambo dza tshiofisi kha tshigwada tsha vhuṋa tsha khoini ya tshifumi.
tgt_text: INqubomgomo Yohlelo Olweluliwe Lwezemisebenzi Kahulumeni (i-EPWP).

src_text: Ipfi ‘Afrika Tshipembe’ ḽi ḓo dzheniswa kha lurumbu luthihi lwa dzikhoini khathihi na ganḓiswa nga nyambo dza tshiofisi dzoṱhe.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukufakwa kusomqulu kweNqubomgomo ye-EPWP ehlongozwayo ukuze kubonisanwe ngayo emphakathini.

src_text: Nyambo tharu dzi ḓo shumiswa kha khoini ya R5; nyambo mbili kha dzikhoini dza R2; 50c, 20c na 10c, R1 ḓo vha nga luambo luthihi.
tgt_text: I-EPWP ngenye yezinhlelo ezingumongo zikahulumeni okuhloswe ngazo ukuletha usizo ekubhekaneni nobubha kanye nosizo lwemalingena ngokusungula amathuba emisebenzi yesikhashana, ikakhulukazi entsheni nakwabesifazane..     Inqubomgomo entsha ehlongozwayo izoqinisa uhlelo futhi icacise ngodaba lwamaholo, uxhasomali kanye nokuvikeleka komphakathi, futhi luzolinganisa i-EPWP nezindlela zesimanje zokusebenza.

src_text: Nyambo dzoṱhe hedzi dzi ḓo shumiswa nga sielisana nga ṅwaha nga ṅwaha  kha miṅwaha ya 10 ḓaho.
tgt_text: Izogqugquzela ubudlelwano phakathi kukahulumeni nomkhakha ozimele ekuqinisekiseni ukuthi i-EPWP inegalelo elikhulu ekwakheni imisebenzi engcono nokuqedwa kobubha.

src_text: Mvetomveto ya Mbekanyamitele yo Ṱanganelaho ya Ndangulo ya Khwaḽithi ya Maḓi (IWQM)  ya ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: Le nqubomgomo izophinde igqugquzele ukuqamba kabusha ekuqalisweni kwezinhlelo zemisebenzi kahulumeni kulolonke izwe..     Izichibiyelo zoChungechunge Lwesine Lwezinhlamvu Zemali eNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza anḓadzwa kha gazethe ha Mvetomveto ya Mbekanyamaitele ya IWQM itela vhukwamani na tshitshavha.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ububanzi, umklamo kanye nokuhlanganiswa koChungechunge Lwesine Lwezinhlamvu Zemali eNingizimu Afrika Lwangowezi-.

src_text: Mbekanyamaitele yo dzinginywaho ḓo dzhena vhudzuloni ha Mbekanyamaitele ya WQM yo thomiwaho nga ṅwaha wa 1991 ine zwazwino yo fhelelwaho nga tshifhinga na tshiṱirathedzhi tshayo tshe tsha thoma shuma nga ṅwaha wa..  Mbekanyamaitele iyi sumbedzisa zwigwada zwa milayo zwine zwa ḓo vhumba mutheo wa ndangulo ya khwaḽithi ya maḓi ṋetshedza ndivhanyiso kha milayo yoṱhe elanaho na zwa maḓi khathihi na vhuḓikumedzeli ha ḽino shango kha khaedu ya ḽifhasi kha zwa ṋetshedzo na ndondolo ya maḓi sa tshiko tshi shaeaho.
tgt_text: Ligunyaze uhlelo lokusebenza lokushintshanisa njalo ngonyaka ukusetshenziswa kwezilimi ezisemthethweni kulolu chungechunge lwesine lwezinhlamvu zemali.

src_text: Mvetomveto ya Mbekanyamaitele ya Sipekiṱiramu tsha Firikhwentsi ya Radio tsha Murafho tevhelaho.
tgt_text: Igama elithi "iNingizimu Afrika" lizofakwa ngakwelinye icala lohlamvu futhi lizobhalwa ngazo zonke izilimi ezisemthethweni.

src_text: (Draft Next Generation Radio Frequency Spectrum Policy).
tgt_text: Izilimi ezintathu zizofakwa kuhlamvu luka-R5; izilimi ezimbili ku-R2; bese kuthi izinhlamvu zika-50c, 20c no-10c kanye no-R1 kufakwe ulimi olulodwa.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza khanḓiso ya Mbekanyamaitele ya Sipekiṱiramu tsha Firikhwensti ya Radio tsha Murafho tevhelaho itela wana mahumbulwa nga tshitshavha.
tgt_text: Zonke lezi zilimi zizosetshenziswa ngokushintshana njalo ngonyaka isikhathi esiyiminyaka eyishumi ezayo.

src_text: Tshipekiṱiramu tsha firikhwentsi ya Radio ndi tshiko tsha mupo tshi sa vusuledzwi tshine tsha vha tsha vhuṱhogwa kha nyaluwo ya ikonomi ya didzhithala na themamveledziso ya zwa vhudavhidzani.
tgt_text: INqubomgomo Ehlongozwayo Ngokuphathwa Kwezinga Lamanzi (i-IWQM) yangowezi-.

src_text: Mbekanyamaitele iyi yo dzinginywaho yo itelwa tikedza khovhelo ya sipekiṱiramu na ṋea ḽaisentsi ya ṱhingothendeleki dzi shumaho nga netiweke, khasho; ngudo ya saintsi ya zwa vhufhufhi na zwa maḓini; ṱhoḓisiso na mveledziso; tswikelelo ya tshitshavha, na dziṅwe nḓowetshumo dzi elanaho na zwenezwi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukufakwa kosomqulu kweNqubomgomo Esahlongozwa ye-IWQM ukuze kuzoxoxisanwa nomphakathi.

src_text: Mbekanyamaitele iyi dovha hafhu ya ṱuṱuwedza khovhelo linganaho na ndi nganyiso kha vhushelamulenzhe kha tshanduko ya sekhithara na tswikelelo ya ṱhumo ya didzhithala na kha zwipiḓa zwa nnḓa zwa shango.
tgt_text: Inqubomgomo ehlongozwayo izongena esikhundleni seNqubomgomo ye-WQM yowe-1991 ephelelwe isikhathi kanye neqhingasu layo elabekwa ngowezi-.

src_text: Fulo ḽa nanga Nkhetheni wa Afrika Tshipembe wa Khoro ya Dzitshaka ya Mbumbano ya Vhudavhidzani ha kule (ITU)  na Bodo ya Milayo ya Radio.
Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza nkhetheni nangiwaho wa Afrika Tshipembe Vho Mandla Samuel Mchunu kha Bodo ya Milayo ya Radio ya ITU (Region .
tgt_text: Inqubomgomo icacisa iqoqwana lezimiso ezizokwakha isisekelo sokulawulwa kwezinga lamanzi.

src_text: Vho Mchunu zwa zwino vha khou shuma sa muraḓo wa bodo.
tgt_text: Ihlinzeka ukuhambisana kuyoyonke imithetho efanele ehambisana namanzi kanye nokuzinikela emhlabeni kwaleli lizwe ukuhlinzeka nokugcina amanzi njengensiza eyingcosana.

src_text: Ho khou dzingingwa ḽa uri vha dovhe vha khethiwe kha Khoro ya ITU kha themu ya ṅwaha wa 2023 swika..  Khetho dzi ḓo vha hone nga tshifhinga tsha Khonferentsi ya Vhuimeli ha mashango (Plenipotentiary) ha ITU ine ya ḓo farelwa ngei Bucharest, kha shango ḽa Romania bva nga ḽa 26 Khubvumedzi swika nga ḽa 14 Tshimedzi.
tgt_text: Inqubomgomo Ehlongozwayo Ngokusakaza Ngamagagasi Omoya.

src_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽi dzula ḽo ḓikumedzela kha zwipikwa na ndivho ya ITU ya vala mukano wa zwa didzhithala na ṱumanya vhathu vhoṱhe vha ḽifhasi  Vhuṱambo vhu khou ḓaho.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukushicilelwa kweNqubomgomo ehlongozwayo Ngokusakaza Ngamagagasi Omoya ukuze umphakathi uzobeka imibono.

src_text: Ṅwedzi wa Vhufa.
tgt_text: Ukusakaza ngamagagasi omoya kungumthombo wemvelo obaluleke kakhulu ekukhuleni komnotho wedijithali eNingizimu Afrika kanye nengqalasizinda yezokuxhumana.
