src_text: Ṅwedzi wa Vhufa nga Khubvumedzi uno ṅwaha ḓo pembelelwa nga fhasi ha thero: “U pembelela Ifa ḽa Vho Solomon Linda na Muzika wa Mvelele wa Afrika Tshipembe”.
tgt_text: Inqubomgomo ehlongozwayo ihlose ukweseka ukwabiwa kwamagagasi omoya kanye nokukhishwa kwamalayisensi ezimboni zomakhalekhukhwini; zokusakaza; zezindiza nezasolwandle; zocwaningo nokuthuthukisa; ukufinyelela emphakathini, kanye nezinye izimboni ezifanele.

src_text: Khabinethe ṱuṱuwedza Maafrika Tshipembe vhoṱhe pembelela vhufa ha mvelele yashu ho pfumaho na phambano zwine zwa vha na maanḓa u ri ṱanganya sa lushaka.
tgt_text: Inqubomgomo iphinde igqugquzele ukwabelwa okulinganayo nokuneqiniso ukuze kuzofakwa igalelo ekuguqulweni kwalo mkhakha kanye nokufinyelela ekuxhumaneni ngokwedijithali ngisho ezingxenyeni ezingaphandle kwezwe.

src_text: Ri fanela ḓikumedzela roṱhe kha shumisana itela fhelisa phambano na vhushayavhulamukanyi zwa tshifhinga tsho fhiraho khathihi na ṱuṱuwedza vhuḓipfi ha muhumbulo wa ḓihudza nga vha Muafrika Tshipembe  Milaedza fhululedzaKhabinethe yo rumela maipfi u fhululedza na tamela mashudu kha:Vhathu vhoṱhe vho winaho, vho thubaho mimedala na vhaṱaṱisani vhe vha dzhenela kha 95th Comrades Marathon, une wa ḓivheswa nga pfi “Ultimate Human Race”, nga Swondaha, ya ḽa 28 Ṱhangule.
tgt_text: Ukukhethwa Kozomela iNingizimu Afrika kumkhandlu woMfelandawonye Wezokuxhumana Wamazwe Ngamazwe (i-ITU) kanye neBhodi Lokulawulwa Komsakazo..     IKhabhinethi ligunyaze ukukhethwa komele iNingizimu Afrika uMnu Mandla Samuel Mchunu kwiBhodi Lokulawulwa Komsakazo (iSifunda .

src_text: Mbambe ya vhanna yo winwa nga Tete Dijana (awara dza 5, minetse ya 30, na mithethe ya 38) ane bva Mahikeng ngei Vhukovhela ha Devhula ngeno mugidimi wa shango ḽa Russia Alexandra Morozova (awara dza 6, minetse ya 17, na mithethe ya 47) wina mbambe ya vhafumakadzi.
tgt_text: UMnu Mchunu njengamanje usebenza njengelungu lebhodi.
Uphakanyiselwe ukuthi aphinde akhethwe kuMkhandlu we-ITU wesikhathi sangowezi-2023 kuya kowezi-.

src_text: NdilisoKhabinethe yo rumela maipfi ndiliso kha vha muṱa na dzikhonani dza:Mama Vho Rita Alice Ndzanga (88), Mulwelambofholowo wa kale na mutshimbidzi wa dzangano ḽa vhashumi vhe vha dovha vha vha muṱanganedzi wa National Order of Luthuli nga ṅwaha wa 2004 kha “vhushelamulenzhe ha vhutshilo havho hoṱhe kha nndwa ya lwela pfanelo dza vhashumi na swikelelwa ha Afrika Tshipembe ḽa demokirasi ḽi sa khethululi nga muvhala, nga mbeu nahone ḽo vhofholowaho ”.Vhaofisiri vha Tshumelo ya Mapholisa ya Afrika Tshipembe (SAPS)  vhe vha vha vhe vhaṋameli kha bupo ḽa SAPS ḽe ḽa wa ngei Rand Airport, Germiston nga Ḽavhuvhili, ḽa 30 Ṱhangule.
Vha SAPS vha khou ita ṱhoḓisiso ya tshivhangi tsha wa ha bupo iḽo.
tgt_text: Ukhetho luzokwenzeka ngesikhathi seNkomfa Yamanxusa e-ITU ezobanjwa e-Bucharest, e-Romania kusuka mhla wama-26 kuMandulo kuya mhla ziyi-14 kuMfumfu.

src_text: Khabinethe tamela mashudu mutshimbidzabupo huvhalesaho uri fhola nga ṱavhanya  tholwa tholwa hoṱhe hu ḓo khunyeledzwa nga murahu ha senguluswa ha ndalukano khathihi na ṱanzwiwa madzina ho teahoa.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika isalokhu izinikele ngezinjongo ze-ITU zokuvala igebe kwezedijithali ixhumanise bonke abantu emhlabeni     Imicimbi Ezayo.

src_text: Mufumakadzi Vho Gugulethu Abigail Thimane sa Muthusa Mulangi (DDG): Vhuvheaiṱo kha Sekhithara ya Muvhuso na Mveledziso ya Khaphasithi kha Muhasho wa Vhupulani, Vhuvheaiṱo na ela  Mufumakadzi Vho Kwena Komape sa DDG: Mveledziso ya zwa Ikonomi, Mbambadzo na Vhuvhambadzi kha Muhasho wa Vhulimi, Mvusuludzo ya Mavu na Mveledziso ya Mahayani  Dokotela Vho Bongani Elias Sithole sa DDG: Senthara ya Ndangulo ya Tshiwo tsha Lushaka kha Muhasho wa Vhuvhusi ha Tshumisano.
tgt_text: INyanga Yamagugu.

src_text: Fulufulu.
tgt_text: Ezamandla.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ḓivhadzwa nga ha vhukoni ha Eskom ha fhungudza zwa khauwa ha muḓagasi zwine zwa khou dzulela itea tshifhinga tshoṱhe nga Minisṱa wa Mabindu Muvhuso khathihi na ṱanganedza muvhigo wa nga ha mvelaphanḓa yo no itwaho swika zwino bva kha Komiti ya zwa Thekiniki ine ya vha nga fhasi ha Komiti ya Lushaka ya nga ha Thaidzo dza Fulufulu.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lethulelwe umbiko nguNgqongqoshe Wezamabhizinisi Kahulumeni u-Pravin Gordhan mayelana namandla enkampani yakwa-Eskom okunciphisa ukucinywa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga okwenzeka ngezikhathi ezithile ezibekiwe, futhi liwutholile nombiko wenqubekela phambili esiyenziwe ovela eKomidini Lobungoti Bomsebenzi leKomidi Likazwelonke Elijutshwe Ukubhekana Nenkinga Yamandla Kagesi..     Ezinye izimemezelo zizokwenziwa emuva kokuphothulwa kwezingxoxo zokudingidwa ngokujulile kwale mibiko.

IKhabhinethi lizwakalise ukudabuka kwalo ngokuphazamiseka kanye nobunzima obubangelwa wukucinywa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga emabhizinisini kanye namakhaya, ikakhulukazi okwenzeka esikhathini lapho uhulumeni ematasa nemizamo yokungenelela eyamenyezelwa nguMongameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa ngoNtulikazi.

src_text: Hu ḓo dovha hafhu ha vha na dziṅwe nḓivhadzo dzine dza ḓo itwa nga murahu ha khunyeledzwa ha nyambedzano dzo khwaṱhaho dza nga ha mivhigo iyi.

Khabinethe yo ṱahisa vhaisala hayo nga thithisea na kanganyisea hune ha khou vhangwa nga khauwa ha muḓagasi kha vhoramabindu na ngomu miṱani, nga maanḓa musi zwi tshi khou bvelela nga tshifhinga tshine muvhuso wa khou ḓidzhenisa kha maga u tandulula thaidzo iyi a ḓivhadzwa nga Phresidennde Vho Cyril Ramaphosa nga ṅwedzi wa Fulwana.
tgt_text: Utshalomali.

src_text: Vhubindudzi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likwamukele ngezandla ezimhlophe ukwethulwa kwesizinda sokukhiqiza esisha i-Sandvik Khomanani Manufacturing Site e-Kempton Park, esiyingxenye yotshalomali oluyizigidi ezingama-R350 olwathenjiswa eNgqungqutheleni Yotshalomali yaseNingizimu Afrika (i-SAIC) eyayibanjelwe e-Sandton Convention Centre eGoli mhla zingama-24 kuNdasa..     Lesi sizinda esisha esingamamithasikwele ayizi-62 000 sihlanganisa ndawonye imisebenzi ngaphambilini ebeyenziwa ezizindeni ezinhlanu ezihlukene futhi sizokwazi ukwamukela abasebenzi abalinganiselwa kuma-.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza rwelwa ṱari ha Ḽimaga ḽiswa ḽa zwa Vhumagi ḽa Sandvik Khomanani, fhaḽa Kempton Park, ḽe ḽa vha tshipiḓa tsha pfulufhedziso dza zwa vhubindudzi ha masheleni linganaho R350-miḽioni dze dza itwa nga tshifhinga tsha Muṱangano wa zwa Vhubindudzi wa Afrika Tshipembe (SAIC) we wa farelwa fhaḽa Sentharani ya Miṱangano ya Sandton, ḓoroboni ya Johannesburg nga ḽa 24 Ṱhafamuhwe..     Tshifhaṱo itshi tshiswa tsha muelo linganaho 62 000 square-metre ndi tshine tsha ṱanganyisa fhethu huthihi mishumo ye kale ya vha tshi itwa kha mamaga maṱanu fhambanaho nahone tshi na vhashumi vha swikaho.
tgt_text: Lesi singesinye sezizinda zabakwa-Sandvik ezinkulukazi futhi ezithuthuke kakhulu emhlabeni wonke jikelele, futhi sinamandla okukhiqiza imishini yokulayisha esebenza ngaphansi komhlaba equkethe umkhiqizo ongaphezu kwama-60% waseNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Ndi ḽiṅwe ḽa mamaga ha Sandvik mahulwanesa nahone musalauno ḽifhasini ḽoṱhe ḽine ḽa vha na vhukoni ha bveledza magandakanda u shuma migodini hu tshi shumiswa 60% ya zwibveledzwa zwa fhano Afrika Tshipembe..     Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ṱanganedza madalo zwa vhulavhelesi nga Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa ngei KwaZulu-Natal nga tshifhinga tsha musi hu tshi rwelwa ṱari tshiimiswa tsha zwa vhumagi tsha Hesto Harnesses fhaḽa Stanger, hune ha vha KwaDukuza nga ḽa 13 Khubvumedzi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lilwamukelile futhi nohambo lokuhlola lukaMongameli u-Ramaphosa lapho ebevakashele khona esifundazweni saKwaZulu-Natali ngenkathi kwethulwa isikhungo sokukhiqiza, i-Hesto Harnesses, e-Stanger, KwaDukuza mhla ziyi-13 kuMandulo.

src_text: Hetshi tshiimiswa ndi tshiṅwe tsha thandela ṱhanu khulwane dzine dza vha tshipiḓa tsha pfulufhedziso dzi linganaho  4-biḽioni dze dza itwa nga vha ha Metair Investments Limited itela tikedza zwa engedzwa na fhaṱwa ha mimoḓoro miswa ya Ford Ranger fhano hayani.
tgt_text: Lesi sikhungo singomunye wemiklamo emihlanu emikhulukazi yotshalomali oluyingxenye yalolo oluyizigidigidi ezingama-R. 4 olwathenjiswa yinkampani yakwa-Metair Investments Limited ukweseka umsebenzi wokwelulwa komklamo kanye nokukhiqizwa kohlobo olusha lwe-Ford Ranger kuleli lizwe.

src_text: Phresidennde vho dovha hafhu vha dzhenela vhuṱambo ha vulwa ha thandela ya vusuluswa na engedzwa ha ḽimaga ḽa Sappi Saiccor Mill ḽine ḽa ḓura masheleni linganaho R7,7 biḽioni fhaḽa Umkomaas, zwine hezwi zwo livhiswa kha engedza vhukoni khathihi na vhea khamphani iyi kha maimo nṱhesa ḽifhasini ngeno nga thungo hu tshi khou sikwa zwikhala zwa mishumo ya tshifhinga tshipfufhi na ya tshifhinga tshilapfu.
tgt_text: UMongameli wahambela futhi nomcimbi wokuvulwa komklamo wokukhuliswa nokwelulwa kwesigayo i-Sappi Saiccor Mill okungumklamo wezigidigidi ezingama-R. 7 osendaweni yaseMkhomazi okuhloswe ngawo ukukhulisa amandla kanye nekhono lenkampani lokuncintisana nezinye izinkampani emhlabeni wonke jikelele futhi kusenjalo kuvulwe namathuba omsebenzi esikhathi esifushane kanye nawesikhathi eside..     Lolu tshalomali luyingxenye yotshalomali olwathenjiswa ngosozimboni engqungqutheleni i-SAIC.

src_text: Hovhu vhubindudzi vhu vhumba tshipiḓa tsha pfulufhedziso dze dza itwa nga vhoranḓowetshumo nga tshifhinga tsha muṱangano wa SAIC.
tgt_text: Lonke utshalomali olusha olungena ezweni lethu luyalekelela ekwakheni kabusha nokuvuselela umnotho wethu, futhi lokhu kuyaqhubeka nokukhangisa nokubonisa ngokusobala ukuthi iNingizimu Afrika iyizwe eliyintandokazi kubatshalizimali.

src_text: Vhubindudzi vhuṅwe na vhuṅwe vhuswa kha shango ḽashu vhu thusa kha vusuluswa na vhuedzedzwa ha ikonomi yashu khathihi na vhea shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe sa fhethu havhuḓi ha zwa vhubindudzi..     Mveledziso ya themamveledziso.
tgt_text: Ukuthuthukiswa kwengqalasizinda.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza vulwa ha tshipiḓa tshiswa tsha bada ya Musina Ring Road ngei Limpopo ine ya ḓo leludzela vhathu uri vha kone enda zwavhuḓi mona na ḓorobo ya Musina khathihi na ita uri hu vhe na engedzea ha mbambadzo na miṅwe mishumo ya zwa ikonomi vhukati ha shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe khathihi na maṅwe mashango Tshitshavha tsha Mveledziso tsha Tshipembe ha Afrika.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likwamukelile ukuvulwa kwesigaba esisha somgwaqo i-Musina Ring Road eLimpopo ozokwenza kube lula ukuhamba eMusina namaphethelo, futhi okungumgwaqo ozovumela ukukhuliswa kohwebo kanye nemisebenzi yezomnotho phakathi kweNingizimu Afrika namazwe eNhlangano Yokuthuthukiswa Kwamazwe aseNingizimu ne-Afrika.

src_text: Thandela ya masheleni swikaho R640-miḽioni yo sika mishumo ya tshoṱhe linganaho 275 hu tshi itelwa vhadzulapo vha vhupo honoho khathihi na ṋetshedza zwikhala kha zwitshavha zwapo hu tshi katelwa na mabindu maṱuku vhukati na mahulwane (SMMEs)..     Uhu fhaṱwa ha bada ya Musina Ring Road ndi tshipiḓa tsha muvhuso tsha mbekanyamushumo ya themamveledziso ya muvhuso, hu tshi shumiswa ERRP ine muhumbulo wayo muhulwane wa vha bveledza nyaluwo katelaho vhoṱhe khathihi na zwikhala zwa mishumo kha sekhithara dzoṱhe dzo fhambanaho na zwitshavha nga angaredza..     Tshiwo tsha fhaḽa Jagersfontein.
tgt_text: Lo mklamo wezigidi ezingama-R640 uvule amathuba kubantu basendaweni abasebenza ngokugcwele abangaphezu kwama-275 futhi uhlinzeke ngamathuba emiphakathini yendawo kanye namabhizinisi asafufusa (ama-SMME)..     Ukwakhiwa komgwaqo i-Musina Ring Road kuyingxenye yohlelo lwengqalasizinda lukahulumeni, ngokusebenzisa uHlelo Lokwakhiwa Kabusha Nokuvuselelwa Komnotho (i-ERRP), okuhloswe ngalo ukwakha ukukhula okubandakanyayo namathuba omsebenzi emikhakheni yonkana nemiphakathi ehlukahlukene.
Inhlekelele yase-Jagersfontein.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṋetshedza mapifi ayo ndiliso kha vha miṱa ya avho vhe vha lovha  musi masalela mugodi wo ṱutshelwaho henefho kha vhupo honoho ha Jagersfontein vhu re vunḓuni ḽa Gauteng tshi swika hune pwashea, ha fhedza ho vha na lurofhe lwa khombo lwe lwa elela henefho musi ḓuvha ḽi tshi thoma bva nga matsheloni Swondaha, ya ḽa 11 Khubvumedzi.
tgt_text: 1    IKhabhinethi lizwakalise ukudabuka kwalo okukhulu futhi ladlulisa amazwi enduduzo emindenini yalabo abalahlekelwe yimiphefumulo yabo emuva kokuqhuma nokubhidlika kwezindonga zedamu lemfucuza yemikhiqizo emayini yendawo e-Jagersfontein eFreyistata futhi okudale izikhukhula zodaka ezidale umonakalo omkhulu entathakusa ngeSonto mhla ziyi-11 kuMandulo.

src_text: Tshiwo itsho tsho dovha hafhu tsha sia themamveledziso ya kha vhupo honoho, ndaka dza vhathu zwavho fana na zwiendedzi khathihi na miṱa minzhi zwo tshinyadzwa vhukuma.
tgt_text: Le nhlekelele idale umonakalo omkhulukazi nakwingqalasizinda yendawo kanye nempahla yabantu enjengezimoto kanye namakhaya amaningana.. 2    Ngenkathi evakashele indawo yenhlekelele ngoMsombuluko mhla ziyi-12 kuMandulo 2022 uMongameli u-Ramaphosa udlulise amazwi okubonga imizamo eyenziwayo endaweni yokutakula kanye nokuvuselela.
Uthembisile futhi ukuthi uhulumeni uzohlinzeka ngosizo oludingekayo kubahlali base-Jagersfontein abakhahlamezekile.
IKhabhinethi likhuthazekile ngokuthi abanikazi bemayini bathe bona sebemi ngomumo kakade ukuhlinzeka ngosizo futhi basekele uhulumeni uma lokho kucelwa nguMkhandlu Wezimbiwa waseNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Nga tshifhinga tsha madalo avho henefho kha vhupo he tshiwo itshi tsha bvelela hone nga Musumbuluwo, wa ḽa 12 Khubvumedzi 2022, Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa vho sumbedza takalela mushumo wa phuluso na mbuedzedzo une wa khou itwa henefho kha vhupo honoho.
tgt_text: 3    Imboni yezimayini isalokhu iyimboni enohlonze efaka isandla esikhulu emnothweni ngokuhlinzeka ngqo ngamathuba omsebenzi, futhi ihlinzeke nangamanye amathuba okuqashwa kwabantu avuleka emikhakheni esebenzisana nale mboni, ifaka isandla futhi kwingenisomali etholakala ngokuthengiswa kwemikhiqizo emazweni angaphandle, kanye nakutshalomali olungena ngqo kuleli oluvela emazweni angaphandle futhi le mboni idlala indima esemqoka kakhulu ekwenzeni ngcono izimpilo zabantu emiphakathini eyakhelene nezimayini.

src_text: Vho dovha hafhu vha ṋea pfulufhedziso ya uri muvhuso ḓo ṋetshedza thikhedzo yo teaho kha vhadzulapo vha Jagersfontein vho kwameaho.
tgt_text: 4    Uhulumeni kanye nezinhlangano ezingenzi nzuzo ezithile sebengenelele ngokushesha ngokuthi bahlinzeke ngendawo yokukhosela nokufihla ikhanda okwesikhashana, usizo lokwelulekwa kwabahlali ngokwengqondo ukuze bakwazi ukubhekana nenhlekelele ebavelele, omatalasi kanye nezijumbana zokudla.

src_text: Khabinethe khou dovha hafhu ya ṱuṱuwedzea vhukuma nga fhungo ḽa uri vhaṋe vha mugodi uyu vho amba uri vho ḓiimisela ṋetshedza thuso na thikhedzo ya zwa thekiniki kha muvhuso arali hu tshi nga vha na khumbelo yo raloho nga vha Khoro ya zwa Minerala ya Afrika Tshipembe.
tgt_text: Sekubuyiseliwe esimweni esijwayelekile ukuphakelwa kwamanzi nogesi endaweni.
5    Uma seyikhucululiwe indawo yenhlekelele, ongoti kulindeleke ukuba bahlole umonakalo owenzeke ezindlini.

src_text: Nḓowetshumo ya zwa migodi kha ḓi vha yone shelaho mulenzhe zwihulwane kha ikonomi nga kha mishumo yo tou livhanaho nayo na miṅwe ya nga thungo, mbuelo dzi bvaho kha thundu dzi rengiselwaho nnḓa khathihi na vhubindudzi ho tou livhaho bva mashangoni nnḓa nahone dzi shela mulenzhe muhulwane kha khwinifhadza matshilo vhathu vha re kha zwitshavha zwine migodi yeneyo ya wanala khazwo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi libonge abezimo eziphuthumayo, izinhlangano zomphakathi wonkana kanye namalungu omphakathi ngeminikelo nosizo olubonisa ububele obukhulu.
Umnotho.

src_text: Muvhuso khathihi na maṅwe madzangano ane si vhe muvhuso wo dzhenelela nga ṱavhanya nga ṋetshedza vhudzulo ha shishi, thuso ya muhumbulo musi ho vha na tshiwo tsha ḽikhaulambilu khathihi na tshomedzo dza ndeme dzi fanaho na mabai, maṱirasi na zwiputo zwa zwiḽiwa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi libhungile ngesimo somnotho ezweni kulandela izibalomanani zakamuva ezikhishwe yiNhlangano Yezibalomanani yaseNingizimu Afrika (i-Stats SA) ezibonise ukuthi isambamkhiqizo (i-GDP) sekota yesibili yowezi-2022 sehle ngo-.

src_text: Nḓisedzo ya maḓi na muḓagasi kha vhupo uho yo vhuyelela ngonani swika zwino.

tgt_text: Izimo ezibe nomthelela kulokhu kwehla kwesambamkhiqizo zibandakanya ukucishwa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga, udweshu phakathi kwe-Russia ne-Ukraine, kanye nokudlondlobala kwezindleko zokuphila nokwehla kwamandla emali.

Izinhlelo zokungenelela ezenziwe ngaphansi kwe-ERRP zibe wusizo olukhulu ekuvikeleni izwe ezivunguvungwini zamazwe ngamazwe, futhi ziyivikelile imisebenzi ngokunjalo futhi zavikela nezindlela abaziphilisa ngazo abantu.

src_text: Musi vhupo uho he tshiwo itshi tsha bvelela khaho ho no fhela kunakiswa hafhu, vhorathekiniki vha khou lavhelelwa uri vha ite tsenguluso ya zwifhaṱo zwa dzinnḓu.
tgt_text: Izinhlelo ezinohlonze zikahulumeni zokungenelela emnothweni seziqalile ukuthela izithelo ezinhle, njengalokhu kubonakala emiphumeleni yoCwaningokuhlola Lokubheka Inani Labasebenzi Abakhona Kuleli Olwenziwa Njalo Emuva Kwezinyanga Ezintathu yi-Stats SA olubonise ukuthi kuvuleke imisebenzi eyevile ezi-648 000 phakathi kwekota yokuqala nekota yesibili yowezi-     Izinqumo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Khabinethe yo livhuwa tshumelo dza shishi, madzangano vhadzulapo khathihi na miraḓo ya tshitshavha kha thuso yavho khathihi na mpho dze vha dzi ṋetshedza..     Ikonomi.
tgt_text: Uhlaka Lokuqapha Nokuhlola (i-M&E) lweNqubomgomo Kazwelonke Yentsha (i-NYP).

src_text: Khabinethe yo ambedzana nga ha tshiimo tsha ikonomi kha shango ḽashu nga murahu ha musi mbalombalo dza zwenezwino dza vha tshiimiswa tsha zwa Mbalombalo dza Afrika Tshipembe (Stats SA) dzo sumbedzisa uri zwibveledzwa zwoṱhe zwa shango (GDP) kha tshifhinga tsha kotara ya vhuvhili ya ṅwaha wa 2022 zwo tsela fhasi nga 0,7%.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lilugunyazile uhlaka lwe-M&E oluzovumela ukuqapha okusebenza kahle kanye nokuhlolwa komthelela wezinsika ze-NYP yowezi-2020-.

src_text: Zwiitisi zwe zwa ṱuṱuwedza uhu tsela fhasi ndi zwi fanaho na khauwa ha muḓagasi, khakhathi dza vhukati ha shango ḽa Russia na ḽa Ukraine hu tshi katelwa na ḓura ha zwirengwa khathihi na tshanduko ya mitengo.
tgt_text: Lolu hlaka luhlinzeka ngezinkombakusebenza ezinhlanu ezisezingeni eliphezulu ezihambelana nezinsika ze-NYP.

src_text: Maga a dzhiiwa nga Pulane ya Mvusuludzo na Mbuedzedzo ya Ikonomi (ERRP) thusa shango vhukuma kha thaidzo dza ikonomi dze dza vha dzi tshi khou bvelela kha ḽifhasi ḽoṱhe dovha hafhu tsireledza mishumo khathihi na nḓila dza ḓitshidza ngadzo.
tgt_text: Izinkombakusebenza zenziwa ngokubambisana nababambiqhaza abafanele abanentshisekelo ekuthuthukisweni nokufukulwa kwentsha ezweni.

src_text: Maga muvhuso khwaṱhaho zwa ikonomi khou thoma aṋwa mitshelo sa zwe zwa vhonala kha mvelelo dza zwenezwino dza Ṱhoḓisiso dza zwa Vhashumi dza nga Kotara dza vha tshiimiswa tsha Mbalombalo tsha Afrika Tshipembe (Stats SA) dze dza sumbedzisa uri ho vha na mishumo miswa swikaho 648 000 ye ya sikwa vhukati ha kotara ya thoma na ya vhuvhili ya ṅwaha wa     Tsheo dza Khabinethe.
tgt_text: Ukuqoqwa kwemininingwane kuzohlukaniswa ngokweminyaka yobudala, ubulili, ukukhubazeka, uhlanga lomuntu kanye nendawo okwenzelwa kuyona lezi zinhlelo zokungenelela..     Umsebenzi wokuqapha uzokwenziwa kuyo yonke imikhakha kahulumeni, izikhungo zikahulumeni kanye nomkhakha ozimele.

src_text: Muhanga wa Vhulavhelesi na Vhusengulusi (M&E) wa Mbekanyamaitele ya Vhaswa ya Lushaka (NYP).
tgt_text: Imibiko izokhiqizwa njalo ngekota yonyaka bese ishicilelwa kabili ngonyaka..     Uhlaka Lwenqubomgomo Yokuhlela Okudidiyelwe.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza muhanga wa M&E une wa ḓo thusa kha ita uri hu vhe na vhulavhelesi ho khwaṱhaho khathihi na tsenguluso ya masiandaitwa thikho dza NYP ya ṅwaha wa 2020-.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lilugunyazile uHlaka Lwenqubomgomo Yokuhlela Okudidiyelwe kuhulumeni, okuhloswe ngalo ukuvala amagebe ahlonziwe ekuhlelweni kwenqubomgomo ohlelweni lokuhlela okuyilona olukhona nolusebenzayo njengamanje.

src_text: Muhanga uyu ṋetshedza zwilinganyi zwiṱanu zwa maimo nṱha zwine zwa elana na thikho dza NYP.
tgt_text: Izinhlelo zokungenelela ezihlongozwayo, phakathi kokunye, zizobhekana nokungabi khona kokuhlela okuhambelanayo emikhakheni yomithathu kahulumeni.

src_text: Zwilinganyi izwi zwo bveledzwa nga tshumisano na vhashumisani vho teaho vhane vha vha na dzangalelo kha zwa mveledziso na maanḓafhadzwa ha vhaswa fhano shangoni.
tgt_text: Izinhlelo zokungenelela zizokwethula indlela yokuqapha esekelwe phezu kobufakazi.

src_text: Zwa kuvhanganywa ha zwidodombedzwa zwi ḓo khethekanywa hu tshi tevhelwa miṅwaha, mbeu, vhuholefhali, tshigwada tsha murafho na vhupo vhune maga aya khou itwa khaho.
tgt_text: Uhlaka lwenqubomgomo lwethula futhi nesimo sokubikezela kalula esihambisana nokuhlelela isikhathi esimaphakathi kanye nesikhathi esifushane kuhulumeni wonkana.

Luzosebenzela ekwethulweni kwezinguquko zomthetho ukuze kwenziwe ngcono ukusebenza ngendlela ehambelanayo futhi ebikezelekayo emsebenzini kahulumeni wokuhlela nokuqapha..     Ukugunyazwa ngokusemthethweni kweSivumelwano Sokusungulwa Kwenhlangano Yezemithi yase-Afrika (i-AMA).

src_text: Zwa vhulavhelesi zwi ḓo itwa kha masia oṱhe muvhuso, zwiimiswa na kha sekhithara ya phuraivethe.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likugunyazile ukusayinwa kweSivumelwano Sokusungulwa kwe-AMA kanye nokuthunyelwa kwaso ePhalamende ukuze sigunyazwe ngokusemthethweni.

src_text: Mivhigo ḓo bveledzwa nga kotara nahone ya anḓadzwa luvhili nga ṅwaha..     Muhanga wa Mbekanyamaitele ya Vhupulani ho Ṱanganelaho.
tgt_text: Lokhu kuzoqalisa ukusebenza kwesivumelwano esamukelwa ngokusemthethweni eMhlanganweni weNhlangano Yamazwe ase-Afrika ngowezi-.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Muhanga wa Mbekanyamaitele ya Vhupulani ho Ṱanganelaho kha muvhuso, une wa khou lingedza tandulula thaidzo dzo ṱaluswaho dza zwa vhupulani ha mbekanyamaitele kha sisteme ya zwa vhupulani ya zwino.
tgt_text: Isivumelwano sisungula ngokusemthethweni i-AMA eqondene nezwekazi.

src_text: Maga ane khou dzinginywa ḓo dovha hafhu sedzesa kha zwa sa elana ha vhupulani kha masia mararu muvhuso.
tgt_text: Le nhlangano izolawula imikhiqizo yokwelapha, futhi yenze ngcono ukuphepha nokusebenza kahle kwemikhiqizo yokwelapha kuleli zwekazi.

src_text: Maga aya ḓo thoma shumisa maitele zwa vhulavhelesi ḓitikaho nga vhuṱanzi.
tgt_text: Ukusayinwa nokugunyazwa ngokusemthethweni kwalesi sivumelwano kuzothuthukisa ukuzibophezela kweNingizimu Afrika emazweni omhlaba kanye namazwe ezwekazi ekusebenzeleni ukuqinisa ukusebenza kohlelo lokulawula lwezwekazi phezu kwemikhiqizo yayo yezempilo..     Umbiko maqondana nokuSebenza Kohlelo Lwesikhuthazo-ntela Socwaningo Nokuthuthukisa (i-R&D) – wezi-2019/20 kanye nezi-2020/.

src_text: Muhanga wa mbekanyamaitele dovha hafhu wa thoma shumisa nḓila yo leluwaho ya khumbulelo ine ya vha na vhupulani ha tshifhinga tshilapfu ya kha tsha vhukati na ha tshifhinga tshipfufhi kha mihasho ḓo dovha hafhu wa shuma wo livha kha bveledza maga u shandukisa milayo hu tshi itelwa khwinifhadza zwa elana na humbulela kha zwa vhupulani na vhulavhelesi ha muvhuso.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likugunyazile ukwethulwa ePhalamende koHlelo Lwesikhuthazo-ntela Socwaningo Nokuthuthukisa lweminyaka emibili edlule (owezi-2019/20 kanye nowezi-2020/21).

src_text: Khwaṱhisedzo ya Thendelano ya Thomiwa ha Zhendedzi ḽa zwa Mishonga ḽa Afrika (AMA).
tgt_text: Lokhu kuhambisana nesigaba 11D (17) soMthetho Wezentela Yengenisomali, we-1962 (uMthetho wama-58 we-1962), odinga ukuthi le mibiko yethulwe ePhalamende.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza sainwa ha Thendelano ya thomiwa ha AMA khathihi na ṋetshedzwa hayo kha Phalamennde uri kone khwaṱhisedzwa.
tgt_text: Uhlelo lwesikhuthazo-ntela luhlose ukugqugquzela izinkampani ezizimele ukuthi zitshale izimali ku-R&D ukuze kukhuthazwe ukukhula kotshalomali.

src_text: Hezwi zwi ḓo ita uri thendelano dze dza ṱanganezwa nga Guvhangano ḽa Mbumbano ya Afrika nga ṅwaha wa 2019 dzi thome shuma.
tgt_text: Luvumela ukuthuthukiswa kwezesayensi nokuqanjwa nokusungulwa kwezinto ezintsha ngenhloso yokukhulisa umnotho futhi kugqugquzelwe nokuncintisana.

src_text: Thendelano idzi ndi dzine dza ḓo ita uri hu mbo ḓi thoma vhumbwa AMA ya dzhango ḽa Afrika lwa tshiofisi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liyakuthokozela ukuthi umbiko ubonisa ukuthi izinkampani ezintsha zisifakile isicelo sesikhuthazo-ntela.

src_text: Zhendedzi iḽi ḽi ḓo langa zwibveledzwa zwa mishonga khathihi na khwinifhadza tsireledzea na shuma zwavhuḓi ha zwibveledzwa zwa mishonga kha dzhango.
tgt_text: Liyazikhuthaza nezinye izinkampani ukuthi zingene kulolu hlelo njengengxenye yokukhulisa utshalomali lwazo ngokwehlukana kwazo futhi ngalokho kukhuthazwe ukukhula komnotho.

src_text: Uhu sainwa na khwaṱhisedzwa ha thendelano idzi hu ḓo engedza vhuḓiimiseli ha shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe ḽifhasini na kha dzhango ḽa Afrika ho livhiswaho kha khwaṱhisa sisteme ya zwa milayo ya dzhango kha zwibveledzwa zwaḽo zwa mishonga..     Muvhigo nga ha Mashumele Mbekanyamushumo ya Magavhelo Muthelo wa zwa Ṱhoḓisiso na Mveledziso (R&D) – wa 2019/20 na 2020/.
tgt_text: Izinkampani ezine ezihamba phambili ezinkampanini esezisitholile isikhuthazo-ntela zisemkhakheni wezokulungiswa kwemikhiqizo yezolimo; owokulungiswa kwemikhiqizo yezimayini ngaphakathi kuleli lizwe ukuze kuhlomule kakhulu abantu bakuleli; owamakhemikhali, owezimonyo, owemithi yokwelapha, owemikhiqizo yobuchwepheshe besimanjemanje kanye nowezoBuchwepheshe Bolwazi okuyimikhakha egunyazwe yiKhabhinethi njengemikhakha eseqhulwini oHlelweni Lokusebenza Lwenqubomgomo Yezimboni.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza zwa ṋetshedzwa ngei Phalamenndeni ha Mbekanyamushumo ya Magavhelo Muthelo wa miṅwaha mivhili yo fhelaho (2019/20 na 2020/21).
tgt_text: Umbiko ophelele uyatholakala kuwebhusayithi yoMnyango Wezesayensi Nokuqanjwa Kwezinto Ezintsha: www.dst.gov.za..     Isithangami Somthetho Wokukhula kanye Namathuba e-Afrika (i-AGOA) – sowezi-.

src_text: Hezwi zwi khou elana na khethekanyo 11D (17) ya Mulayo wa Muthelo wa Mbuelo, wa 1962 (Mulayo 58 wa 1962), une wa lavhelela uri hu ṋetshedzwe mivhigo iyi ngomu Phalamenndeni.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likugunyazile ukusingathwa kweSithangami se-AGOA ngowezi-.

src_text: Mbekanyamushumo ya magavhelo muthelo ndi ine ya khou lingedza ṱuṱuwedza khamphani dza phuraivethe uri dzi ite zwa vhubindudzi kha R&D hu itela ṱuṱuwedza nyaluwo ya vhubindudzi dovha hafhu ya ita uri hu vhe na mvelaphanḓa ya zwa saintsi na vhukoni yo livhiswaho kha nyaluwo ya ikonomi khathihi na ṱuṱuwedza mashumele maimo nṱha.
tgt_text: I-AGOA ngumthetho owashaywa yizwe laseMelika (i-USA) ngowezi-2000 ukuhlinzeka ngokubhekelelwa kangcono nokucatshangelwa kwamazwe aseNingizimu nogwadule i-Sahara maqondana nezohwebo kanye nokufinyelela ezimakethe zangaphakathi e-USA.

src_text: Khabinethe yo takadzwa nga fhungo ḽa uri muvhigo sumbedza uri khamphani ntswa dzo ita khumbelo dza magavhelo muthelo khou dovha hafhu ya ṱuṱuwedza uri khamphani dzi swikele tshikimu itshi nga vhunzhi sa tshipiḓa tsha engedza vhubindudzi nga fhambana hadzo khathihi na ṱuṱuwedza nyaluwo ya ikonomi.
tgt_text: Izimpahla ezithunyelwa ngaphandle yiNingizimu Afrika ngaphansi kwe-AGOA zibandakanya izithelo ezidliwayo, amantongomane, izimoto, izingxenye zezimoto, insimbi, imikhiqizo esansimbi kanye nemikhiqizo yamakhemikhali.
Usuku nendawo okuzobanjelwa kuyo lesi sithangami kusazomenyezelwa.

src_text: Khamphani nṋa khulwane dze dza swikela aya magavhelo muthelo ndi dzine dza vha kha sekhithara ya dzudzanya zwibveledzwa zwa vhulimi; ya shandukisa zwibveledzwa zwa migodini; ya dzikhemikhaḽa; ya lunako; ya mishonga na ya shumisa muḓagasi kha zwa thekhinoḽodzhi khathihi na sekhithara dza Thekhinoḽodzhi ya Mafhungo dze khabinethe ya dzi khwaṱhisedza sa dza ndeme kha Pulane ya Shuma ya Mbekanyamaitele ya zwa Nḓowetshumo.
tgt_text: INgqungquthela yoNgqongqoshe Yeqembu Eliqondene Nokubheka Nokuqoqa Ulwazi Ngomumo-Jikelele Womhlaba (i-GEO) – yowezi-.

src_text: Muvhigo wo fhelelaho nga kona swikelwa nga kha webusaithi ya Muhasho wa Saintsi na Vhukoni ine ya vha: www.dst.gov.za..     Foramu ya Mulayo wa Nyaluwo na Zwikhala wa Afrika (AGOA) –.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likugunyazile ukuthi iNingizimu Afrika isingathe iNgqungquthela yoNgqongqoshe ye-GEO eKapa ngowezi-.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza zwa ḓo farwa ha Foramu ya AGOA nga ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: I-GEO yinhlangano yohulumeni abahlukahlukene eyasungulwa ngowezi-2003 emuva kokubanjwa kweNgqungquthela Yomhlaba Yentuthuko Esimeme.

src_text: AGOA yo phasiswa nga shango ḽa Amerika (USA) nga ṅwaha wa 2000 hu tshi itelwa ṋetshedza tswikelo kha mbambadzo ine wa tou funa nga iwe muṋe kha vhunzhi ha mashango tshipembe ha soga ḽa Sahara khathihi na maraga wa ngomu ha shango ḽa USA.
tgt_text: Lokhu kuyisigcawu esibandakanya ohulumeni bamazwe ahlukahlukene lapho amazwe efaka isandla ngokuzithandela kwawo ekufezekiseni inhloso eyodwa futhi efanayo yokwakha izinhlelo ze-GEO.

src_text: Zwibveledzwa zwa Afrika Tshipembe zwine zwa rengiselwa kha mashango nnḓa nga fhasi ha AGOA ndi zwine zwa katela mitshelo, nḓuhu, dzigoloi, zwipiḓa zwa dzigoloi, tsimbi khathihi na zwibveledzwa zwa khemikhaḽa.
tgt_text: Njengamanje i-GEO inohulumeni bamazwe abangaphezu kwe-113, futhi abangama-30 kulaba ngohulumeni abavela emazweni ase-Afrika kanye nezinhlangano ezilinganiselwa kwi-140, futhi eziyi-11 kulezi yizinhlangano ezivela kwelase-Afrika.

src_text: Datumu ya fhedzisela na fhethu hune foramu ya ḓo farelwa hone kha ḓi ḓo ḓivhadzwa.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika ibilokhu iyilungu elibambe iqhaza ngenkuthalo eKomidini Lesigungu Esiphezulu kusukela ngowezi-2005 futhi njengamanje ososayensi bethu babambe iqhaza emiklamweni yocwaningo eminingana eholwa yi-GEO.

src_text: Tshigwada tsha nga ha Vhulavhelesi ha Ḽifhasi (GEO) Muṱangano wa Dziminisṱa –.
tgt_text: UNcwaba Inyanga Yezokuthutha (i-OTM) –.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza zwauri Afrika Tshipembe ḽi vhe hone fhethu hune ha ḓo farelwa Muṱangano wa Dziminisṱa wa GEO fhaḽa ḓoroboni ya Cape Town nga ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likugunyazile ukwethulwa komkhankaso we-OTM ngoMgqibelo mhla lu-1 kuNcwaba 2022 ngaphansi kwesiqubulo esithi: “Sishov’ingolovane: ngokubambisana sakha ingqalasizinda yezokuthutha eyakha futhi isimamise izindlela zokuziphilisa”.

src_text: GEO ndi tshiimiswa tsha vhukati ha mivhuso tshe tsha vhumbwa nga ṅwaha wa 2003 nga murahu ha Muṱangano wa Ḽifhasi wa nga ha Mveledziso ya Tshifhinga Tshilapfu wa ṅwaha wa shuma sa yone nḓila ya masia manzhi ine khayo mashango shela mulenzhe nga tou funa ho livhiwa kha swikela tshipikwa tshithihi tsha bveledza sisteme dza GEO.
tgt_text: I-OTM yaminyaka yonke isetshenziselwa ukuqwashisa ngezokuthutha njengenye yezinto ezisemqoka kakhulu ekukhuliseni umnotho kanye nokuthuthukiswa kwezindawo zokuhlala nokuziphilisa.

src_text: GEO zwazwino na mashango ane vha miraḓo linganaho 113, hune khao 30 ndi fhano Afrika khathihi na madzangano ane khou shela mulenzhe linganaho 140, hune 11 hone bva fhano kha ḽa Afrika.
tgt_text: Kunemicimbi eminingana ezobanjwa ngenhloso yokubonisa izinto ezisemqoka ezihlukahlukene zengqalasizinda yezokuthutha emkhakheni wezokuthutha ngezindiza, ngemikhumbi, owezokuthuthwa komphakathi kanye nemigwaqo.

src_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽo ḓi dzulela vha muraḓo wa Khorotshitumbe fhelelaho bva tsha ṅwaha wa 2005 nahone vhorasaintsi vhashu zwazwino vha khou shela mulenzhe kha mishumo minzhi ya zwa ṱhoḓisiso ine ya khou rangwa phanḓa nga GEO.
tgt_text: Imicimbi izoqwashisa futhi nangokuphepha nokuvikeleka emgwaqeni.

src_text: Ṅwedzi wa zwa Vhuendi wa Tshimedzi (OTM) –.
tgt_text: Kuzobanjwa futhi nezingxoxo zokubonisana nababambiqhaza ukuze kubhungwe ngezinselele ezihlukahlukene ezikhona emkhakheni wezokuthutha.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza rwelwa ṱari ha fulo ḽa OTM nga Mugivhela, wa ḽa 1 Tshimedzi 2022, nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “Sishov’ingolovane fhaṱisana themamveledziso ya zwa vhuendi ine ya fhaṱa na bveledza nḓila dza ḓitshidza ngadzo dza tshifhinga tshilapfu”.
tgt_text: Uhulumeni usalokhu ezibophezele ekwenzeni ngcono ingqalasizinda yezokuthutha, ezindaweni zasemakhaya ngokunjalo futhi nasezindaweni ezisemadolobheni, ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuthuthwa kwezimpahla nabantu ngendlela efanele..     UMhlangano weNhlangano Yezizwe (i-UN) woHlelo Lokuhlaliswa Kwabantu (i-UN-HABITAT).

src_text: OTM ya ṅwaha nga ṅwaha shumiswa kha tsivhudza vhathu nga ha vhuendi sa tshiṅwe tsha zwiteṅwa zwa ndeme tsha nyaluwo ya ikonomi na mveledziso ya fhethu.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likugunyazile ukusingathwa komhlangano wamalungu e-UN-HABITAT eGoli mhla ziyi-16 kanye nomhla ziyi-17 kuMfumfu.

src_text: Hu ḓo vha na mishumo minzhi ine ya ḓo itwa itela ṱana zwithu zwo fhambanaho zwa themamveledziso ya vhuendi, zwa kha vhuendi ha muyani, ha lwanzheni, vhuendi ha nnyi na nnyi na dzibada.
Mishumo iyi ḓo dovha hafhu ya ṋea tsivhudzo nga ha tsireledzo na vhutsireledzi ha zwishumiswa zwa vhuendi.
tgt_text: UMnyango Wezokuhlaliswa Kwabantu yiwona ozohlela futhi ulawule lo mhlangano wezinsuku ezimbili ozokwethanyelwa yizingqwele zezepolitiki, ongoti abangabasebenzi bomkhakha kanye nabacwaningi, kubandakanya namalungu asemqoka eKomidi Lamanxusa le-UN-HABITAT elizinze e-Nairobi, kwelase-Kenya.

src_text: Nyambedzano na vhoṱhe vha kwameaho na dzone dzi ḓo vha hone itela davhidzana nga ha khaedu dzo fhambanaho dzine dza vha hone kha sekhithara ya zwa vhuendi.
tgt_text: Izindaba ezisemqoka okuzobhungwa ngazo zibandakanya ukuzama ukuthola izinhlelo zokungenelela ezizoletha uguquko ezindaweni zokuhlaliswa kwabantu nezindawo eziyimijondolo.

src_text: Muvhuso kha ḓi vha wo ḓiimisela khwinifhadza themamveledziso ya zwa vhuendi ya shango ḽashu, kha vhupo hoṱhe, ha mahayani na ha dziḓoroboni itela uri hu kone vha na enda ha vhathu na thundu nga nḓila yo leluwaho.
tgt_text: Imiphumela yalezi zingxoxo izoholela ekwethulweni koHlaka Lohlelo Lokusebenza Lomhlaba Wonke, oluzokwethulwa eMhlanganweni Wesigungu se-UN-HABITAT ngowezi-2023 ukuze lugunyazwe ngokusemthethweni     Imithethosivivinywa.
UMthethosivivinywa Womkhandlu Kazwelonke Wezodlame Olweyamene Nobulili kanye Nokubulawa Kwabantu Besifazane (i-GBVF) wezi-.

src_text: Muṱangano wa nga ha Mbekanyamushumo ya Vhudzulo ha Vhathu (UN-HABITAT) ya Dzangano ḽa Vhuthihi ha Dzitshaka (UN).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likugunyazile ukwethulwa ePhalamende koMthethosivivinywa woMkhandlu Kazwelonke we-GBVF wezi-2021 ukuze ucutshungulwe.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza zwa farwa ha muṱangano wa miraḓo ya UN-HABITAT fhaḽa ḓoroboni ya Johannesburg nga ḽa 16 na 17 Tshimedzi.
tgt_text: Lo Mthethosivivinywa uhlinzeka ngohlaka lomthetho lokusungulwa kwenhlangano eyakhiwe ngokomthetho wePhalamende ezogxila ngokuphelele ekubhekaneni ne-GBVF.

UMthethosivivinywa uhlinzekela futhi nokusungulwa kweBhodi loMkhandlu elizohlinzeka ngobuholi obukhethekile obunobuqhinga futhi lengamele ukuqaliswa koHlelo Lobuqhinga Lukazwelonke oluqondene ne-GBVF, olwagunyazwa yiKhabhinethi ngoMfumfu 2020 ukuze luqaliswe.

src_text: Muhasho wa Vhudzulo ha Vhathu ḓo vha wone une wa ḓo tshimbidza hoyu muṱangano wa maḓuvha mavhili une wa ḓo dzhenelwa nga mazhakanḓila zwa polotiki, vhaḓivhi na vhaṱoḓisisi, hu tshi katelwa na miraḓo mihulwane ya Komiti ya Vhaimeleli vha Tshoṱhe vha tshiimiswa tsha UN-HABITAT tshine tsha vha fhaḽa ḓoroboni ya Nairobi, kha ḽa Kenya.
tgt_text: Ibhodi lizoba nabameleli abangama-51% abavela ezinhlanganweni zomphakathi wonkana bese futhi kuba nabangama-49% abavela kuhulumeni.

src_text: Mafhungo ndeme ane ḓo ambiwa nga hao ḓo katela wana maga tshandukiso ya vhudzulo ha mikhukhuni na mishasha.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa usudlulile kakade esigabeni sokufakana imilomo nomphakathi..     UMthethosivivinywa Wokulawulwa Kwemikhiqizo Kagwayi kanye Nogwayi Obhenywa Ngamadivayisi Obuchwepheshe Besimanjemanje wezi-.

IKhabhinethi likugunyazile ukwethulwa ePhalamende koMthethosivivinywa Wokulawulwa Kwemikhiqizo Kagwayi kanye Nogwayi Obhenywa Ngamadivayisi Obuchwepheshe Besimanjemanje wezi-2018, ohlose ukuqeda ukusebenza komthetho okhona njengamanje uMthetho Wokulawulwa Kwemikhiqizo Kagwayi, we-1993 (uMthetho wama-83 we-1993), njengoba uchitshiyeliwe.

src_text: Mvelelo dza nyambedzano idzi ndi dzone dzine dza ḓo itisa uri hu vhe na rwelwa ṱari ha Muhanga wa Pulane ya Mashumele ya Ḽifhasi, ine ya ḓo ḓivhadzwa kha muṱangano wa Guvhangano ḽa UN-HABITAT hu tshi itelwa uri dzi khwaṱhisedzwe nga ṅwaha wa     Milayotibe.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa uhlose futhi ukuqinisa izinyathelo zezwe zokubhekelela impilo yomphakathi futhi zihanjelaniswe neSivumelwano Sohlaka lweNhlangano Yezempilo Emhlabeni esiqondene noKulawulwa Kukagwayi.

src_text: Mulayotibe wa nga ha Khakhathi dzo Ḓitikaho nga Mbeu khathihi na Mabulayo Vhathu vha Tshifumakadzi wa Khoro ya Lushaka (GBVF) wa ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa uphakamisa, phakathi kokunye, ukuthi kungavunyelwa nakancane ukubhenywa kukagwayi ezindaweni ezingaphakathi kwezakhiwo kanye nasezindaweni ezithile ezingaphandle kwezakhiwo; ukunqatshelwa kokudayiswa kukasikilidi kusetshenziswa imishini ethengisa ugwayi, futhi uqinisa ukuqashelwa kwendlela opakishwa ngayo usikilidi kanye nokufakwa kwezimpawu ezixwayisayo.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza ṋetshedzwa ha Mulayotibe wa GBVF wa Khoro ya Lushaka wa ṅwaha wa 2021 ngei Phalamenndeni itela uri kone dzudzanywa.
tgt_text: UMthethosivivinywa usudlulile ezigabeni zokubonisana okunzulu nababambiqhaza abahlukahlukene, kubandakanya imboni kagwayi, izinhlangano zomphakathi wonkana kanye neminyango kahulumeni efanele     Imicimbi Ezayo.

src_text: Mulayotibe uyu ṋetshedza muhanga wa zwa milayo ya vhumbiwa ha tshiimiswa tsha mulayo hu tshi itelwa maga u dzhenelela nga nḓila yo khwaṱhaho kha nndwa ya lwa na zwiito zwa GBVF dovha hafhu wa vha na mbetshelwa dza vhumbiwa ha Bodo ya Khoro ine ya ḓo ṋetshedza vhurangaphanḓa ha ndeme khathihi na vhona uri hu khou thoma shumiswa Maga Khwaṱhaho Lushaka u Lwa na Zwiito zwa GBVF a ṱanganedzwa nga Khabinethe nga ṅwedzi wa Tshimedzi 2020 hu tshi itelwa uri thome shumiswa.
tgt_text: Isigcawu sama-77 SesiGungu-Jikelele se-UN (i-UNGA77).

src_text: Bodo ḓo vha na vhuimeleli ha 51% bva kha vhadzulapo ngeno ha 49% vhu tshi ḓo bva kha muvhuso.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika ibambe iqhaza ku-UNGA77 ebanjelwe eNhlokohhovisi ye-UN e-New York City kwelase-USA kusukela mhla zingama-20 kuya kumhla zingama-27 kuMandulo 2022 ngaphansi kwesiqubulo esithi: “Umzuzu oyingqophamlando: Sivula izixazululo eziguqulayo zokusombulula izinselele ezixhumene”.

src_text: Mulayotibe wo no ḓi fhira nga fhasi ha maitele vhukwamani na vhadzulapo..     Zwibveledzwa zwa Mafola na Mulayotibe wa Ndangulo ya Sisteme dza Nḓisedzo ya Eḽekhiṱhironiki wa ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: Emazweni omhlaba aseNingizimu, umthelela wobhubhane lweSifo Segciwane le-Corona (i-COVID-19) emnothweni nenhlalomnotho unokungalingani okuthile kanye nokungahambelani nemizamo yokuvuselelwa kokusimama kwalawa mazwe uma eqhathaniswa namazwe aseNyakatho futhi lokhu kudinga umzamo wokusebenzisana kwawo wonke amazwe ngendlela ebumbene ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuthi alikho izwe elisala ngemuva..     Ngaphambi kokuba kubanjwe iNgxoxonkulumo-Jikelele ye-UN, uNobhala-Jikelele we-UN, uMnu António Guterres, uzobiza ingqungquthela eqondene “Nokulethwa Koguquko Kwezemfundo” futhi asingathe nomhlangano osezingeni eliphezulu ogxile eziNjongweni Zentuthuko Esimeme (ama-SDG).

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza ṋetshedzwa ha Mulayotibe wa Zwibveledzwa zwa Mafola na Ndangulo ya Sisteme ya Nḓisedzo ya Eḽekhiṱhironiki wa ṅwaha wa 2018 kha Phalamennde, une wa vha wone une wa khou ḓo phumula Mulayo wa Ndangulo ya Zwibveledzwa zwa Mafola, wa 1993 (Mulayo 83 wa 1993) une wa vha hone zwazwino ya nga he wa khwinifhadzwa ngaho.
tgt_text: Umhlangano wama-SDG kulindeleke ukuthi ubukisise izindlela okungabuyiswa ngazo umfutho futhi kusheshiswe nokuqaliswa kwama-SDG.

src_text: Mulayotibe khou dovha hafhu wa ṱoḓa khwaṱhisa maga zwa mutakalo wa tshitshavha shango khathihi na ita uri elane na Thendelano dza Muhanga wa Dzangano ḽa Mutakalo ḽa Ḽifhasi kha zwa Ndangulo ya Mafola.
tgt_text: Usuku Lwamagugu.

src_text: Zwiṅwe zwa zwine mulayotibe uyu wa khou dzinginya zwone, ndi vhupo ha nga nnḓa kana ha nga ngomu ha zwifhaṱo vhune khaho ha sa tendelwe zwa daha mafola nga nḓila yo fhelelaho;  nyiledzo kha zwa rengiswa ha sigareṱe hu tshi shumiswa mitshini ine ya vha yone ṋetshedzaho sigareṱe dzenedzo khathihi na khwaṱhisa zwa tswayo dza tsivhudzo kha phakhethe dza sigareṱe.
tgt_text: UMongameli u-Ramaphosa uzokwethula inkulumo yosuku emcimbini wokubungaza uSuku Lwamagugu Lukazwelonke lowezi-2022 ozobanjelwa eZindlini Zombuso ngoMgqibelo mhla zingama-24 kuMandulo.

src_text: Mulayotibe wo pfukha nga fhasi ha maitele khwaṱhaho zwa vhukwamani na vhoṱhe vha kwameaho nga fhambana havho, hu tshi katelwa na vha nḓowetshumo ya mafola, madzangano vhadzulapo khathihi na mihasho ya muvhuso kwameaho     Vhuṱambo vhune ha khou ḓa.
tgt_text: Lo mgubho uzobanjwa ngaphansi kwesiqubulo esithi: “Sibungaza Ifa lika-Solomon Linda kanye noMculo Wesintu waseNingizimu Afrika”..     INyanga Yamagugu yalo nyaka igxile emculweni wesintu waseNingizimu Afrika ikakhulukazi umculo weSicathamiya kanye negalelo lawo elikhulukazi kwezemidlalo, ubuciko, amasiko kanye namagugu kuleli.

src_text: Dzulo ḽa vhu77 ḽa Guvhangano ḽa Nnyi na Nnyi ḽa Dzangano ḽa Vhuthihi ha Dzitshaka (UNGA77).
tgt_text: Isiqubulo siwuphawu lokuhlonipha nokubungaza iminyaka engama-60 kwashona umculi, umhlabeleli kanye nomqambi wezingoma u-Solomon Popoli Linda (1909-1962), owabe aziwa futhi ngelika-Solomon Ntsele, futhi edume kakhulu njengomqambi wengoma esihloko sithi, “iMbube”.

src_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽi khou shela mulenzhe kha dzulo ḽa UNGA77 ḽine ḽa khou farelwa fhaḽa musanda wa UN une wa vha Ḓoroboni ya New York kha ḽa Amerika bva nga ḽa 20 swika ḽa 27 Khubvumedzi 2022 nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “Tshikhala tsha ndeme vulela thandululo dza ḓisa tshanduko dza valela khaedu”.
tgt_text: Umcimbi Ozokwenzeka Ngesikhathi Esifanayo Wosuku Lomhlaba Lwezithuthi Zasolwandle lowezi-2022 .

src_text: Kha sia ḽa Tshipembe ha ḽifhasi ḽoṱhe, masiandaitwa kha zwa ikonomi na kha ikonomi na matshilisano ḓiswaho nga Dwadze ḽa Khoronavairasi (COVID-19) ḓi wanala sa lingani musi ho sedzwa luvhilo lwa mbuedzedzo musi tshi vhambedzwa na re kha sia ḽo bvelelaho ḽa Devhula nahone hezwi zwi ṱoḓa uri hu vhe na farisana vhukati ha tshaka dzoṱhe itela uri hu si vhe na ane salela murahu.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika izosingatha uMcimbi Ozokwenzeka Ngesikhathi Esifanayo Wosuku Lomhlaba Lwezithuthi Zasolwandle lowezi-2022 eThekwini kusukela mhla ziyi-12 kuze kube ngumhla ziyi-14 kuMfumfu.
Lo mcimbi uzosingathwa ngesikhathi esifanayo lapho kubungazwa i-OTM, futhi uzoba yingxenye yokuqwashisa ngomkhakha wezithuthi zasolwandle.

src_text: Phanḓa ha Nyambedzano dza Nnyi na Nnyi dza UN, Muṅwaleli Muhulwane wa UN, Vho António Guterres, vha ḓo vhidza muṱangano wa nga ha “Tshandukiso ya Pfunzo” nahone vha ḓo dovha vha tshimbidza muṱangano wa vhurumelwa ha maimo nṱha une wa ḓo vha wo lavhelesa nga maanḓa kha Zwipikwa zwa Mveledziso ya Tshifhinga Tshilapfu (SDGs).
tgt_text: Lo mcimbi uzohlanganisa izithunywa ezivela emazweni ahlukahlukene ezizozibonela ngawazo imboni yaseNingizimu Afrika yezithuthi zasolwandle.

src_text: Hoyu muṱangano wa SDG khou lavhelelwa uri ḓo sedzesa kha zwa wana hafhu nḓila dza vhuisa nungo khathihi na engedza luvhilo lwa ita uri tshanduko idzi dza pfunzo dzi thome shumiswa.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika selokhu yaba yilungu leNhlangano Yamazwe Ngamazwe Yezithuthi Zasolwandle kusukela ngowe-1995, okuwuphiko olukhethekile lwe-UN olwengamele ukulawulwa komsebenzi wokuthutha ngemikhumbi.

src_text: Ḓuvha ḽa Vhufa.
tgt_text: INyanga Yezokuvakasha.

src_text: Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa vha ḓo ṋetshedza tshipitshi tshavho tshihulwane kha vhuṱambo ha pembelela Ḓuvha ḽa Vhufa ḽa Lushaka ḽa ṅwaha wa 2022 fhaḽa Union Buildings nga Mugivhela, wa ḽa 24 Khubvumedzi.
tgt_text: Kulo nyaka, iNyanga Yezokuvakasha izogujwa ngaphansi kwesiqubulo soSuku Lwezokuvakasha Lomhlaba (okungumhla zingama-27 kuMandulo) esithi “Sicabanga Kabusha Ngezokuvakasha”.

src_text: Vhuṱambo vhu ḓo farwa nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “U pembelela Vhufa ha Vho Solomon Linda na Muzika Wapo wa Afrika Tshipembe”..     Ṅwedzi wa Vhufa wa uno ṅwaha wo sedzesa kha muzika wapo wa fhano Afrika Tshipembe, nga maanḓa ho lavheleseswa kha muzika wa Isicathamiya khathihi na nḓila ye wa shela ngayo mulenzhe kha mitambo yashu, vhutsila, mvelele na vhufa.
tgt_text: Ezokuvakasha ngaphakathi kuleli zibaluleke kakhulu ekuvuseleleni nokusimamisa umkhakha wezokuvakasha, okuwumkhakha onegalelo elikhulukazi ku-GDP yeNingizimu Afrika kanye nokuvulwa kwamathuba omsebenzi.

src_text: Thero iyi fhululedza miṅwaha ya 60 nga murahu ha lovha ha ramuzika, muimbi na muṅwali wa muzika Vho Solomon Popoli Linda (1909-1962), vhe vha vha vha tshi ḓivhiwa hafhu sa Vho Solomon Ntsele, vhane vha ḓivhea vhukuma sa ene muṅwali wa luimbo lu no pfi, “Mbube”.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likuthokozele ukubona ukuthi umkhakha wezokuhlaliswa nokunakekelwa kwabavakashi uqophe ukukhula kwenani labavakashi esikhathini esilandela ukudamba kwe-COVID-.

src_text: Vhuṱambo ha nga Thungo ha Ḓuvha ḽa zwa Lwanzheni ḽa Ḽifhasi ha ṅwaha wa 2022  .
tgt_text: Izinkambo zokuvakasha ngaphakathi kuleli eziyizigidi eziyi-.

src_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽi ḓo vha ḽi tshi khou fara Vhuṱambo ha nga Thungo ha Ḓuvha ḽa zwa Lwanzheni ḽa Ḽifhasi ha ṅwaha fhaḽa ḓoroboni ya Durban bva nga ḽa 12 swika 14 Tshimedzi.
tgt_text: 2 ezenzeke ngesigamu sokuqala sowezi-2022 zibonise ukukhula okungama-114% uma kuqhathaniswa nesikhathi esifanayo ngowezi-.

src_text: Vhuṱambo uvhu vhu ḓo farwa nga tshifhinga tsha OTM, ine na yone ya ḓo vha tshipiḓa tsha tsivhudza vhathu nga ha sekhithara ya zwa lwanzheni.
tgt_text: Lokhu kubonise ukukhula okuphawulekayo impela uma kuqhathaniswa nesikhathi esifanayo ngowezi-2019, lapho ziyizigidi eziyi-.

src_text: Vhuṱambo uvhu vhu ḓo kuvhanganya vhurumelwa bva kha mashango fhambanaho vhane vha ḓo vha na tshikhala tsha kona vhona nḓowetshumo ya zwa lwanzheni ya ḽa Afrika Tshipembe.
tgt_text: 6 izinkambo zokuvakasha ezenzeka.

src_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽo vha muraḓo wa Dzangano ḽa zwa Lwanzheni ḽa Ḽifhasi bva tsha ṅwaha wa 1995, ḽine ḽa vha zhendedzi ḽo khetheaho ḽa UN ḽine mushumo waḽo wa vha langa matshimbilele zwikepe.
tgt_text: Njengengxenye yokugubha iNyanga Yezokuvakasha, iKhabhinethi likhuthaza abantu baseNingizimu Afrika ukuba benze izinkambo zokuvakasha ezibizwa phecelezi ngama-‘Shotleft’ ngokuthi bavakashele izifundazwe zethu ezihlukahlukene.

IKhabhinethi lisamukele ngezandla ezimhlophe futhi nesinqumo senkampani yezindiza i-Air Belgium sokuqalisa izinkambo zezindiza eziza eNingizimu Afrika ngezikhathi zonyaka ezithile, kusukela kule nyanga (uMandulo), okuyinto ezokhuthaza ezokuvakasha futhi iqinise isimo sethu njengezwe eliyintandokazi kubavakashi.

src_text: Ṅwedzi wa zwa Vhuendelamashango.
tgt_text: Lokhu kuzobandakanya izinkambo zezindiza eziya eKapa kanye naseGoli njalo ngeviki     Imiyalezo.

src_text: Ṅwedzi wa zwa Vhuendelamashango wa uno ṅwaha khou pembelelwa nga fhasi ha thero ya Ḓuvha ḽa zwa Vhuendelamashango ḽa Ḽifhasi (27 Khubvumedzi) ine ya ri “U humbula hafhu zwa Vhuendelamashango nga huswa”.
tgt_text: Amazwi okuhalalisaIKhabhinethi lidlulise amazwi okuhalalisa kanye nezilokotho ezinhle kulaba: UMongameli u-William Samoei Ruto weRiphabhulikhi yase-Kenya, ogcotshwe ngoLwesibili mhla ziyi-13 kuMandulo 2022, kulandela ukhetho lukazwelonke olunokuthula olwabanjwa mhla ziyisi-9 kuNcwaba.

src_text: Vhuendelamashango ha fhano hayani ndi ha ndeme kha vusuluswa ha sekhithara ya zwa vhuendelamashango ine ya shela mulenzhe zwihulwane kha GDP ya Afrika Tshipembe khathihi na sika mishumo.
tgt_text: IPhini likaMongameli u-David Mabuza ubewuthamele lo mcimbi egameni likaMongameli u-Ramaphosa kanye nohulumeni nabantu beRiphabhulikhi yaseNingizimu Afrika.

src_text: Khabinethe yo takadzwa vhukuma nga fhungo ḽa uri sekhithara ya zwa vhuḓimvumvusi yo rekhoda nyaluwo kha tshivhalo tsha vhaeni kha tshifhinga tsha nga murahu ha dwadze ḽa COVID-.
tgt_text: INhlangano Yezebhola Lombhoxo yaseNingizimu Afrika kanye neDolobha laseKapa ngokusingatha ngempumelelo umqhudelwano wehlandla lesishiyagalombili weNdebe Yomhlaba Yebhola Lombhoxo Yamaqembu Anabadlali Abasiyisikhombisa obubanjwe phakathi komhla ziyisi-9 nomhla ziyi-11 kuMandulo.

src_text: Nyendo dza ngomu shangoni dzi linganaho.
tgt_text: Bekungokokuqala ngqa ukuba le ndumezulu yomqhudelwano ohlonishwa kakhulu usingathwe yizwe lase-Afrika futhi izinkulungwane ngezinkulungwane zabalandeli ababehambele lo mqhudelwano bazitika ngedili lemidlalo yebhola lombhoxo esezingeni eliphezulu futhi bathokozela nempatho yodumo efudumele yeNingizimu Afrika yokuphatha nokusingatha izivakashi..     Amazwi enduduzo IKhabhinethi lidlulise amazwi enduduzo emindenini kanye nabangani balaba: izingane zesikole eziyi-18 kanye nabantu abadala ababili abashone engozini enyantisayo eyenzeke endaweni yasoPhongolo, KwaZulu-Natali ngoLwesihlanu mhla ziyi-16 kuMandulo 2022 emuva kokuba iloli elikhulu elithwala impahla lishayisane mahlanze neveni ebelithwele izingane zesikole     Abaqashiwe.

src_text: 2 miḽioni dze dza farwa kha tshifhinga tsha hafu ya thoma ya ṅwaha wa 2022 dzo sumbedza nyengedzedzo ya 114% musi dzi tshi vhambedzwa na tshifhinga tshenetsho tshithihi nga ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: Bonke abaqashiwe kumele kuqinisekiswe iziqu zabo futhi bahlolwe ngokufanele     Mnu Makgothi Samuel Thobakgale oqashwe njengoMqondisi-Jikelele (u-DG): WeHhovisi likaKhomishana Kazwelonke Womnyango Wezokuhlunyeleliswa Kwezimilo     Dkt Malixole Percival Mahlati oqashwe njengePhini lika-DG: Ophikweni Lwezinsizakalo Zezempilo Ezisezingeni Eliphezulu Ezihlinzekwa Ezibhedlela kanye Nokuthuthukiswa Kwabasebenzi eMnyangweni Wezempilo     Mnu Siyabonga Blessing Mdubeki oqashwe njengoMklami-Jikelele Omkhulu eMnyangweni Wezolimo, Izinguquko Kwezomhlaba kanye Nokuthuthukiswa Kwezindawo Zasemakhaya     Mnu Phaswa Phineas Mamogale oqashwe njengoMphathi Omkhulu Wezimali eMnyangweni Wezempilo..     IKhabhinethi livumelene nokuqokwa kwalaba abalandelayo     Mnu Tshediso Matona njengoKhomishana weKhomishani Yezokufukulwa Nokuhlonyiswa Kwabantu Abamnyama Kwezomnotho     Amalungu esiGungu Sokudluliswa Kwezikhalazo seBhodi Lezamafilimu Nokushicilela: Mnu Siyazi Tyamtyam (uSihlalo); Nks Sohani Natasha Chundhur;Nks Sisanda Nkoala;Nks Shandukani Mulaudzi;Nks Nomaswazi Rachel Shabangu-Mndawe;Dkt Litheko Modisane;Mnu Phuti Nehemia Phukubje;Mnu James Shikwambana; kanye noNks Manko Thalitha Bufffel (oqokwe kabusha).

src_text: Nḓisedzo ya maḓi.
tgt_text: Ukuvikelwa kokutholakala kwamanzi.

src_text: Khabinethe yo livhuwa vhadzulapo vha Afrika Tshipembe kha tevhedza havho nyiledzo dza kushumisele kwa maḓi dze dza vha hone kha vhuṅwe vhupo ha ḓorobo ya Johannesburg, Tshwane na Ekurhuleni itela dzikisa tshikalo tsha maḓi madamuni.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi libonge abantu baseNingizimu Afrika ngokuthobela kwabo imikhawulo yokusetshenziswa kwamanzi ebekiwe ezingxenyeni ezithile zedolobha laseGoli, e-Tshwane kanye nase-Ekurhuleni ngenhloso yokuletha uzinzo emandleni ezigcinamanzi.

src_text: Madamu na fhethu ha vhulungela hone maḓi zwi kha ḓi vha fhasi ha mutsiko nga mulandu wa thempheretsha dzi re nṱhesa kha vunḓu ḽa Gauteng ngeno ṱhoḓea ya maḓi ine ya khou dzulela engedzea yo kombetshedza uri vha ha Rand Water vha fhungudze vhukuma nḓisedzo ya maḓi kha mimasipala.
tgt_text: Amadamu kanye nezigcinamanzi kusalokhu kungaphansi kwengcindezi ngenxa yamazingakushisa aphakeme e-Gauteng, futhi isidingo esikhulayo samanzi sesiphoqe inkampani yakwa-Rand Water ukuba inciphise kakhulu ukuphakelwa kwamanzi komasipala.

src_text: Itshi tshiimiswa tsha zwa maḓi tshi ṋetshedza vhunzhi ha maḓi kunaho kha vhathu vha fhiraho 11 miḽioni vhane vha vha vhadzulapo vha vunḓu ḽa Gauteng, zwipiḓa zwa vunḓu ḽa Mpumalanga, Free State na ḽa Devhula Vhukovhela.
tgt_text: Le nkampani yamanzi iphakela ngamanzi okuphuza ahlanzekile kubantu abangaphezu kwezigidi eziyi-11 e-Gauteng, nasezingxenyeni ezithile zesifundazwe saseMpumalanga, eFreyistata kanye naseNyakatho Ntshonalanga.

src_text: Hedzi nyiledzo dze dza vha dzi sa tinyei, dzo livhiswa kha ita uri hu vhe na nḓisedzo yavhuḓi ya maḓi nahone dzi ḓo bvela phanḓa vhuya swikela tshiimo tshi tshi khwinifhadzea.
tgt_text: Le mikhawulo engenakugwemeka ihlose ukuvikela ukuphakelwa kwamanzi futhi izoqhubeka isebenze kuze kufike isikhathi lapho sesingcono isimo.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ita khuwelelo kha miraḓo ya tshitshavha uri vha bvele phanḓa na tevhedza nyiledzo dza maḓi khathihi na shela mulenzhe nga shumisa hetshi tshiko tshi konḓaho wanala ngaurali nga nḓila yavhuḓi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi linxuse umphakathi ukuba uqhubeke nokuthobela imikhawulo ebekiwe yokusetshenziswa kwamanzi futhi udlale indima yawo ekusebenziseni le nsiza eyingcosana ngokuyonga.

src_text: Tshiṱereke tsha fhaḽa Transnet.
tgt_text: Isiteleka sakwa-Transnet.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza thendelano ya zwa miholo ya miṅwaha miraru ye ya swikelwa vhukati ha vha ha Transnet na vha Mbumbano ya Vhuthihi ha zwa Vhuendi ya Lushaka (UNTU), ḽine ḽa vha dzangano ḽa vhashumi, ine thendelano yeneyo ya ḓo thoma shuma vhukati ha tshifhinga tsha bva nga ḽa 1 Lambamai 2022 swika ḽa 31 Ṱhafamuhwe.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lisamukele ngezandla ezimhlophe isivumelwano samaholo seminyaka emithathu okufinyelelwe kusona phakathi kwenkampani yakwa-Transnet nenyunyana yabasebenzi i-United National Transport Union (i-UNTU), esizosebenza esikhathini esisukela mhla lu-1 kuNhlaba 2022 kuze kube ngumhla zingama-31 kuNdasa.

src_text: Vha Khomishini ya Vhupfumedzani, Vhuṋenḓila na Vhulamukanyi ndi vhone vho swikelaho vhupfumedzani ha miholo iyi, zwe zwa fhedza nga fhelisa tshiṱereke tshine tsha vha hone zwazwino tsha miraḓo ya UNTU nga ṱavhanya.
tgt_text: IKhomishana Yokubuyisana, Ukuxazulula Nokwahlulela iyona ebilawula izingxoxo eziholele kulesi sivumelwano esiqede ngokushesha isiteleka samanje samalungu e-UNTU.

src_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ṱanganedza tsheo nga vha Dzangano ḽa Vhashumi vha zwa Vhuendi na Sekhithara dzi Elanaho ḽa Afrika Tshipembe (SATAWU) ya fhelisa tshiṱereke.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lisamukelile futhi nesinqumo senyunyana i-South African Transport and Allied Workers Union (i-SATAWU) sokuqeda isiteleka.

src_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ṱanganedza vhuḓiimiseli ha vha Transnet ha sedzesa kha fhungudza mishumo yo salelaho murahu ye ya vha hone kha sisteme yoṱhe ya vhuimangalavha na zwiporo nga tshifhinga tshenetsho tsha tshiṱereke tshe tsha kwama ikonomi khathihi na dziṅwe sekhithara dzine dzo ḓitika kha tshumelo yayo nga nḓila ine ya si vhe yavhuḓi..   Khabinethe yo livhuwa thikhedzo na tshumisano ye ya ṋetshedzwa nga vha mabindu nga tshifhinga tshenetshi tsha tshiṱereke.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lisamukelile isibophezelo se-Transnet sokugxila ekuqedeni ukusalela emuva komsebenzi okwenzeke ohlelweni lonkana lokuthuthwa kwempahla emachwebeni ngemikhumbi kanye nezitimela ngenkathi kuqhubeka isiteleka, okuyinto ebe nomthelela omubi kakhulu emnothweni nasemikhakheni ethembele ezinsizakalweni zalolu hlelo..   IKhabhinethi lizwakalise ukubonga kwalo ukwesekwa nokubambisana okuboniswe ngabamabhizinisi ngenkathi kuqhubeka isiteleka.

src_text: Yo dovha hafhu ya ṱuṱuwedza vhushaka vhune ha khou bvela phanḓa vhukati ha vha ndangulo ya Transnet na madzangano vhashumi vhune ha ḓo vhuedza khamphani yeneyi ya Transnet khathihi na ikonomi ya shango.
tgt_text: Likhuthaza ukuthi kube nobudlelwano obuhle obuqhubekayo phakathi kwabaphathi be-Transnet nabasebenzi ukuze kuhlomule inkampani kanye nomnotho wezwe.

src_text: Vhushaka vhukati ha shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe na ḽa Saudi Arabia.
tgt_text: Ubudlelwano phakathi kweNingizimu Afrika ne-Saudi Arabia.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Madalo u Shuma a tshimbila zwavhuḓi nga Phresidennde Vho Cyril Ramaphosa ngei kha shango ḽa Saudi Arabia nga ḽa 15 na ḽa 16 Tshimedzi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi lilwamukele uhambo lokuvakasha ngokomsebenzi lukaMongameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa lapho ebevakashele ezweni lase-Saudi Arabia mhla ziyi-15 nomhla ziyi-16 kuMfumfu.

src_text: Nga tshifhinga tsha madalo aya, mashango aya vhuvhili hao saina Memorandamu dza Thendelano (MoUs) ya 17 kha masia fhambanaho fanaho na zwa vhulimi, vhufuwakhovhe, migodi, fulufulu ḽi vusuluseaho, vhutsireledzi, vhuendi na vhufuwivhulimi ha zwifuwo na zwimela zwa maḓini.
tgt_text: Ngenkathi kuqhubeka lolu hambo, lawa mazwe amabili asayine iZivumelwano Zokusebenzisana (ama-MoU) ayi-17 emikhakheni ehlukahlukene, njengezolimo, ezokudoba, ezezimayini, ezamandla kagesi ovuselelekayo, ezokuvikeleka, ezokuthutha kanye nomkhakha wemboni yezitshalo nezilwanyana zasemanzini.

src_text: Dziṅwe MoU dze dza sainwa ndi dza thomiwa ha Khoro ya zwa Mabindu yo Ṱanganelaho, tshumisano kha sia ḽa nḓowetshumo dza zwa mmbi na zwa renga thundu na tshumelo khathihi na tshumisano kha sia ḽa ṱhoḓisiso dza zwa tshivhumbeo tsha shango.
tgt_text: Amanye ama-MoU asayiniwe aphathelene nokusungulwa koMkhandlu Wokusebenza Ngokuhlanganyela Kwezebhizinisi, ubambiswano emkhakheni wezimboni zezempi nokuthengwa kwemikhiqizo nezinsizakalo ezihlobene nalokhu kanye nesivumelwano sokubambisana kwizingcwaningo zomkhakha wezomumomhlaba, ezejiyoloji.

src_text: Phresidennde vho shumisa madalo avho kha ramba vhoramabindu vha shango ḽa Saudi Arabia uri vha dzhenele muṱangano wa zwa vhubindudzi wa vhuṱanu wa shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe une wa ḓo farwa nga ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: UMongameli usebenzise lolu hambo ukumema amabhizinisi ase-Saudi Arabia ukuba eze kuleli azokwethamela ingqungquthela yotshalomali yaseNingizimu Afrika yesihlanu ezobanjwa ngowezi-.

src_text: Shango ḽa Saudi Arabia ndi muvhambadzelani na ḽa Afrika Tshipembe wa vhuvhili nga vhuhulwane kha mashango oṱhe Vhubvaḓuvhakati ḽa dovha hafhu ḽa vha ḽone tshiko tshihulwanesa tsha thundu dzi ṱunḓwaho kha dzingu ḽoṱhe.
tgt_text: I-Saudi Arabia iyizwe lesibili ngobukhulu emazweni ahwebelana neNingizimu Afrika esifundeni esiseMpumalanga Emaphakathi futhi ingumthombo omkhulu kunayo yonke eminye wezimpahla ezingena kuleli ezivela kulesiya sifunda.

src_text: Vhushaka ha dzitshaka vhukati ha mashango aya mavhili ho itisa uri hu vhe na masiandaitwa avhuḓi kha maitele zwa mbambadzo na vhubindudzi.
tgt_text: Ubudlelwano phakathi kwamazwe womabili sebuholele ekutheni kube nomthelela omuhle kwezohwebo nasekutshalweni kwezimali.
Ukutshalomali lwengqalasizinda.

src_text: Vhubindudzi kha zwa themamveledziso.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likwamukelile ukugunyazwa komsebenzi wokwakhiwa kwefemu kanokusho yesimanjemanje ezokhiqiza imikhiqizo kapulastikhi yinkampani yamazwe ngamazwe engumkhiqizi ohamba phambili i-ALPLA Group, e-Lanseria e-Gauteng.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza thendelo ya thomiwa ha ḽimaga ḽa maimo nṱha ḽa bveledza puḽasitiki nga vhamagi vha puḽasitiki vha ḓivheaho ḽifhasini vha ḓivhiwaho sa ALPLA Group, fhaḽa Lanseria kha ḽa Gauteng.
tgt_text: Lokhu kwengeza phezu kwesibophezelo sikaMongameli u-Ramaphosa sokusebenzisa ukuthuthukiswa kwengqalasizinda njengendlela yokufukula umnotho kanye nokukhulisa amathuba omsebenzi..   Lolu tshalomali olubalelwa ezigidini ezingama-50 zamadola aseMelika luwutshalomali olusemqoka kakhulu olufakwa kuhlelongqangi lokwakhiwa kwedolobha likanokusho lesimanjemanje i-Lanseria Smart City oluzoqhuba futhi lukhuthaze ukusimama kanye nokusetshenziswa kwemikhiqizo kabusha futhi ngokunjalo ludale futhi lusekele ngokuqhubekayo amathuba omsebenzi angama-.

src_text: Hezwi zwo engedza vhuḓiimiseli ha Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa ha vhea zwa mveledziso ya themamveledziso sa tshone tshithu tshi ṱuṱuwedzaho ikonomi khathihi na engedza sikwa ha mishumo..   Uvhu vhubindudzi vhu linganaho US$50 miḽioni vhu ḓo shela mulenzhe zwihulwane kha pulane khulwane ya Lanseria Smart City ine ya ḓo ita uri zwithu zwi tshimbile nga nḓila yavhuḓi nahone lwa tshifhinga tshilapfu khathihi na vusulusa hafhu zwithu zwo no shumaho hu tshi katelwa na sika mishumo ya tshifhinga tshilapfu Iinganaho.
tgt_text: Okubandakanyiwe kulokhu wuhlelo lokuqeqeshelwa emsebenzini lonjiniyela bemishini yobuchwepheshe besimanjemanje kanye nochwepheshe bezokusetshenziswa kwemikhiqizo kabusha abangama-36 abazosebenza ezinkampanini ze-ALPLA Group esifundeni esiseningizimu ne-Afrika sonkana.

src_text: Nga ngomu henefho ho katelwa na mbekanyamushumo ya vhugudisamishumo kha vhainzhiniere vha zwa thekiniki na lugisa vha linganaho 36 khathihi na vhorathekiniki vha zwa vusulusa hafhu zwithu zwo no shumaho ya mishumo ya vha khamphani ya ALPLA Group mona na mashango tshipembe ha Afrika.
tgt_text: Uhlelo lokuqeqeshelwa emsebenzini luzoqala ngowezi-2023, lapho kuzoqeqeshwa khona abantu baseNingizimu Afrika abafundela umsebenzi bokuqala abayi-12 abavela emiphakathini yendawo.

src_text: Mbekanyamushumo ya zwa vhugudisamushumo ḓo thoma nga ṅwaha wa 2023, hune vhagudi vha mishumo vha thoma vha Afrika Tshipembe vha linganaho 12 vha ḓo vha vha tshi bva kha zwitshavha zwapo..   Zwa migodi siho mulayoni.
tgt_text: Ukumbiwa kwezimbiwa okungekho emthethweni.

src_text: Zwa migodo siho mulayoni zwi vhaisa zwitshavha khathihi na ikonomi, nahone zwi fhedza nga ita uri hu vhe na ndozwo ya mbuelo kha muvhuso khathihi na kha sekhithara ya zwa migodi..   Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza zwa dzhiiwa ha muvhuli wa zwiṱhavhane khathihi na fariwa ha vhahumbulelwa vha swikaho 20 vhane vha ṱumanywa na zwiito zwa bwa migodi zwi siho mulayoni nga tshifhinga tsha fulo ḽe ḽa vha hone kha mulonga wa mugodi wa fhaḽa Stilfontein vunḓuni ḽa Devhula Vhukovhela.
tgt_text: Ukumbiwa kwezimbiwa okungekho emthethweni kulimaza imiphakathi kanye nomnotho wethu, futhi kuholela ekulahlekeni kwengenisomali kuhulumeni ngokunjalo futhi nasemkhakheni wezimayini..   IKhabhinethi likwamukelile ukushaqwa kwenqwaba yezibhamu ebezifihliwe kanye nokuboshwa kwabasolwa abangama-20 abeyamaniswa nokumbiwa kwezimbiwa okungekho emthethweni ngenkathi kubanjwe umkhankaso ongukhukhulelangoqo emgodini wemayini e-Stilfontein eNyakatho Ntshonalanga.

src_text: Khabinethe khou ita khuwelelo kha vhadzulapo vha Afrika Tshipembe ya uri vha bvele phanḓa na shumisana na vha mazhendedzi zwa mulayo itela vhona uri hu vhe na mvelaphanḓa kha mafulo u lwa na zwiito zwa vhugevhenga ḓaho.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liyabanxusa abantu baseNingizimu Afrika ukuba baqhubeke nokusebenzisana nabomthetho ukuqinisekisa ukuphumelela kwemikhankaso yokulwisana nobugebengu esikhathini esizayo.

src_text: Hezwi zwi ḓo rumela mulaedza wo khwaṱhaho wa uri vhugevhenga nangoho vhu badeli, khathihi na uri zwigevhenga zwi ḓo farwa nahone zwa dovha zwa sengiswa hu si na nyofho kana dzhia sia..   Fulufulu.
tgt_text: Lokhu kuzothumela umyalezo oqinile wokuthi ubugebengu abukhokheli, nokuthi izigebengu zizoboshwa futhi zishushiwe ngaphandle kovalo nokwenzelela..   Amandla kagesi.

src_text: Eskom kha ḓi tou bva saina thendelano dza ḽisi ya miṅwaha ya 30 na vhabindudzi vha mveledziso ya muḓagasi vho ḓiimisaho nga vhoṱhe vha swikaho vhaṋa dza fhaṱa fhethu huswa ha bveledza fulufulu ḽo kunaho fhaḽa kha tshiṱitshi tsha Majuba na tsha Tutuka tshi re fhaḽa Mpumalanga.
tgt_text: Inkampani yakwa-Eskom isanda kusayina izivumelwano zokuqasha zeminyaka engama-30 nabatshalizimali abane abangabakhiqizi bamandla kagesi abazimele, ukuze kwakhiwe isikhungo esisha esizoba namandla okukhiqiza amandla kagesi ohlanzekile eziteshini eziphehla ugesi iMajuba kanye neTutuka esifundazweni saseMpumalanga.

src_text: Hedzi ḽisi dza mavu dzi ḓo kunga vhubindudzi vhune ha khou humbulelwa ḓo swika henefha kha R40 biḽioni.
tgt_text: Lezi zivumelwano zokuqashwa komhlaba zizoheha utshalomali olulinganiselwa ezigidigidini ezingama-40 zamarandi.

src_text: Avha vhabindudzi vhaṋa, vhane vha vha vha ha HDF Energy South Africa, Red Rocket SA, Sola Group na Mainstream Renewable Power Developments South Africa, vha ḓo engedza 2 000 megawatts kha sisteme ya muḓagasi ya lushaka.
tgt_text: Laba batshalizimali abane – okuyi-HDF Energy South Africa, i-Red Rocket SA, i-Sola Group kanye ne-Mainstream Renewable Power Developments South Africa – bazofaka okungenani ugesi ongamamegawathi ayizi-2 000 esikhungweni sikagesi sikazwelonke.

src_text: Uvhu vhukoni vhuswa ha bveledza muḓagasi vhu khou lavhelelwa uri vhu ḓo ṱumanywa na sisteme ya nḓisedzo ya muḓagasi kha tshifhinga tsha vhukati ha miṅwedzi ya 24 ya kha ya 36 bva musi ho no tevhedzwa milayo yoṱhe ya zwa thendelano dza zwa masheleni khathihi na dziṅwe thendelano dza zwa milayo ya nga ha mupo, kukhethekanyelwe kwa mavu ya nga kushumisele kwao na miṅwe milayo yo teaho.
tgt_text: Lezi zikhungo ezintsha zokukhiqiza ugesi kulindeleke ukuthi zixhunywe kwisikhungo sikagesi sikazwelonke ezinyangeni ezingama-24 kuya kwezingama-36 kusukela esikhathini okuphothulwe ngaso imidanti nemicikilisho yezivumelwano eziphathelene nezimali zokuxhaswa komklamo, futhi uma sekutholakale izimvume eziphathelene nezemvelo, ukuklanywa komhlaba kanye nezinye izimvume zokulawula.
Ukutholakala kokudla okwanele.

src_text: Mveledziso ya zwiḽiwa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likwamukelile ukusingathwa kweNgqungquthela ye-Agri SA yowezi-2022 ePitoli mhla ziyi-13 nango mhla ziyi-14 kuMfumfu 2022 ngaphansi kwesiqubulo esithi: “Ukulinywa Kokudla Endaweni”.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza farwa ha Guvhangano ḽa vha ha Agri SA ḽa ṅwaha wa 2022 ngei ḓoroboni ya Pretoria nga ḽa 13 na ḽa 14 Tshimedzi 2022 nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “U lima fhano hayani”.
tgt_text: Ingqungquthela ibhunge ngezindaba ezinjengokwakhiwa kwezinhlelongqangi zezolimo ezenzelwe abalimi bendawo; ingqalasizinda esimeme yokudla okulinywe endaweni; ukwenza isimo semvelo sendawo esisimeme esikulungele ukukhiqizwa kokudla endaweni kuya phambili esikhathini esizayo, kanye nokuqiniswa kwamandla abakhiqizi bokudla okulungisa imikhiqizo elinywe endaweni.

src_text: Guvhangano iḽi ḽo amba nga ha mafhungo fanaho na ita uri pulane khulwane dza zwa vhulimi dzi thome shumela vhalimi vha fhano hayani; themamveledziso ya tshifhinga tshilapfu hu tshi itelwa zwiḽiwa zwo liṅwaho fhano hayani ita uri vhupo honoho ha fhethu afho vhu tsireledzee lwa tshifhinga tshilapfu hu tshi itelwa mveledziso ya zwiḽiwa yapo yo livhaho kha vhumatshelo khathihi na khwaṱhisa vhukoni ha vhabveledzi vha zwiḽiwa ha shandukisa zwibveledzwa zwa vhulimi zwo ṱavhiwaho fhano hayani..   Sa nḓila ya dovha hafhu dzhiela nṱha mveledziso ya zwiḽiwa, Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ṱanganedza thomiwa ha Senthara ya Mveledziso ya Zwibveledzwa zwa Vhulimi ya Lushaka nga kha Mbekanyamushumo ya Vhushaka ha Tshandukiso ya Zwibveledzwa zwa Vhulimi ya Muhasho wa Saentsi na Tshandukiso vha tshi shumisana na vha Yunivesithi ya Pretoria.
tgt_text: Ngenhloso yokuqhubeka nokubeka eqhulwini ukutholakala kokudla okwanele, iKhabhinethi likwamukelile futhi nokwethulwa kwesizinda sikazwelonke sokuvinjelwa kwamagciwane abanga izifo ezithathelwanayo, i-National Biosecurity Hub, esingaphansi kohlelo i-Agricultural Bio-economy Innovation Partnership Programme, okuwuhlelo loMnyango Wezolimo Nokuqanjwa Kwezinto Ezintsha oluqhuba ngokubambisana neNyuvesi yasePitoli.

src_text: Senthara iyi ḓo tikedza zwa thivhelwa fhungudzwa na ndangulo ya malwadze zwiliṅwa na zwifuwo, zwine hezwi zwa ḓo shela mulenzhe kha engedzea ha mveledziso, vhubveledzi ha zwiḽiwa khathihi na mveledziso ya vhupo ha mahayani ine ya nga vha ya tshifhinga tshilapfu   Tsheo dza Khabinethe.
tgt_text: Lesi sizinda sizokweseka ukuvinjelwa, ukuncishiswa kanye nokulawulwa kwezifo zezitshalo nezilwane, okuyinto ezolekelela ekukhuliseni imikhiqizo, ukutholakala kokudla kanye nentuthuko esimeme ezindaweni zasemakhaya   Izinqumo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Tsaino ya Thendelanomviswa ya Phaḓaladzo ya Mbumbano ya Afrika (AU).
tgt_text: Ukugunyazwa ngokusemthethweni koMqulu weNhlangano Yamazwe ase-Afrika (i-AU) Wokudluliswa Nokwabiwa Kwamagunya Okulawula.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza zwa ṋetshedzwa kha Phaḽamennde ha Thendelanomviswa ya AU ya nga ha Milayo na Maitele Phaḓaladzo, Muvhuso Wapo na Mveledziso Yapo uri sainiwe.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likugunyazile ukwethulwa ePhalamende koMqulu we-AU Wamagugu Nemigomo Yokudluliswa Nokwabiwa Kwamagunya Okulawula, Ukuphathwa kanye Nokuthuthukiswa Kwezindawo ukuze ugunyazwe ngokusemthethweni.

src_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽo saina iyi thendelanomviswa nga ṅwedzi wa Ṱhangule.
tgt_text: INingizimu Afrika yawusayina ngoNcwaba 2021 umqulu.

UMqulu Wokudluliwa Nokwabiwa Kwamagunya Okulawula uhlinzeka ngohlaka kuyo yonke imibuso engamalungu olungumbhalo ongumhlahlandlela maqondana nokudluliswa nokwabiwa kwamandla kanye nemisebenzi kusuka kuhulumeni kazwelonke kudluliselwa kweminye imikhakha nezinhlaka zikahulumeni.

src_text: Thendelanomviswa ya Phaḓaladzo ṋetshedza muhanga kha mashango oṱhe ane vha miraḓo une wa vha ḽiṅwalo ḽi sumbedzaho nḓila nga ha phaḓaladzwa ha maanḓa na mishumo bva kha mivhuso ya vhukati ya kha maṅwe masia muvhuso.
tgt_text: Umqulu ubhekene ikakhulukazi nokudluliswa nokwabiwa kwamagunya nemisebenzi, uhlaka lokuphatha kanye nokuthuthukiswa kwezindawo.

src_text: Iyi Thendelanomviswa ambesa nga maanḓa nga ha phaḓaladzwa ha maanḓa na vhuḓifhinduleli, muhanga wa mavhusele apo khathihi na mveledziso yapo..   Muṱangano wa vhu32 wa Khoro ya zwa Vhutsireledzi ha Zwiporo ya Dzitshaka (IRSC) wa ṅwaha nga ṅwaha.
tgt_text: Umhlangano Wama-32 Waminyaka Yonke Womkhandlu Wamazwe Ngamazwe Wezokuphepha Kwezokuthutha Ngezitimela (i-IRSC).

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza farwa ha Muṱangano wa vhu32 wa IRSC wa Ṅwaha nga Ṅwaha ngei Johannesburg bva nga ḽa 1 swika ḽa 6 Tshimedzi 2023 nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “U fhaṱa hafhu zwiporo nga huswa kha Ḽifhasi ḽi sa fulufhedzisi”.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likugunyazile ukusingathwa koMhlangano Wama-32 Waminyaka Yonke we-IRSC eGoli kusukela mhla lu-1 kuya kumhla ziyisi-6 kuMfumfu 2023 ngaphansi kwesiqubulo esithi: “Sibumba kabusha ezokuthutha ngezitimela emhlabeni ongenakho ukuqiniseka”.

src_text: IRSC ndi muṱangano wa dzitshaka une wa kuvhanganya vhaḓivhi vha zwa vhutsireledzi ha zwiporo bva kha ḽifhasi ḽoṱhe uri vha kovhane nḓivho hu tshi itelwa khwinifhadza vhutsireledzi kha zwiporo..   Sa muraḓo wa IRSC, vha Vhulangi ha Vhutsireledzi ha Zwiporo ha Afrika Tshipembe vho fara muṱangano uyu lwa fhedzisela nga ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: I-IRSC iyisithangami samazwe ngamazwe esiqoqela ndawonye ongoti bezokuphepha kwezokuthutha ngezitimela abaqhamuka kuwo wonke amagumbi amane omhlaba ukuze bazocobelelana ngolwazi mayelana nezimo abadlule kuzona kanye nalezo abahlangabezana nazo emsebenzini wabo wansuku zonke, ngenhloso yokwenza ngcono ukuphepha kwezokuthutha ngezitimela.

src_text: Luṱa lwa 2 lwa Mvetamveto ya Pulane ya Themamveledziso ya Lushaka ya 2050 (NIP 2050).
tgt_text: Njengelungu le-IRSC, uMlawuli Wezokuphepha Kwezokuthutha Ngezitimela waseNingizimu Afrika wayegcine ngowezi-2015 ukusingatha lesi sithangami.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza zwa ganḓiswa kha gurannḓa ya muvhuso ha mvetamveto ya Luṱa lwa 2 lwa NIP 2050 hu tshi itelwa zwa vhukwamani na miraḓo ya tshitshavha.
tgt_text: Uhlaka Lohlelo Lukazwelonke Lwengqalasizinda lowezi-2050 (i-NIP 2050) Isigaba sesi-.

src_text: Pulane iyi sumbedzisa nḓila kha zwa khwaṱhiswa na engedzwa ha thandela dza muvhuso dzo ṱanganelaho nahone dza ndeme..   Lu dovha hafhu lwa ṱalusa thandela dza ndeme dza zwa vhudzulo ha vhathu; muḓagasi wa ha masipala; maḓi; mathukhwi omaho; vhuendi ha hwala vhaṋameli; themamveledziso ya pfunzo na mutakalo; themamveledziso ya didzhithala, vhugevhenga na zwiito zwa vhuaḓa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likugunyazile ukushicilelwa kuSomqulu kahulumeni kohlaka lwe-NIP 2050 Isigaba sesi-2 ukuze kuboniswane nomphakathi ngalo.

src_text: Tshivhumbeo tsha pulane tshi ṋetshedza bono ḽa masia ane khou tea lavheleswa khao, tsha dovha hafhu tsha ṋetshedza tsenguluso ya tshiimo tsha zwino, tsha bvisela khagala nyimele dza ndeme dzine dza ḓo ita uri hu vhe na shuma zwavhuḓi khathihi na sumbedzisa zwine zwa tea itwa itela swikela bono ḽeneḽo.
tgt_text: Lolu hlaka luhlinzeka ngesiqondiso ekuqiniseni nokwengeza emiklamweni edidiyelwe yamasu akhethekile kahulumeni..   Luhlonza imiklamo ekhethekile okuhloswe ngayo ukufeza ngempumelelo izinjongo zikahulumeni maqondana nezokuhlaliswa kwabantu; ugesi kamasipala; amanzi; imfucuza; ezokuthutha abagibeli; ingqalasizinda yezemfundo nezempilo; ingqalasizinda yobuchwepheshe besimanjemanje, kanye nobugebengu nenkohlakalo.

src_text: Tshi dovha hafhu tsha dzinginya maitele u thoma shumiswa ha pulane iyi ane ḓo itwa nga vhukati ha tshifhinga tsha miṅwaha miraru ya pulane ya kushumele..   Muhanga wa shuma wa Lushaka ho livhiwa kha ita uri Tshumelo dza Muvhuso dzi vhe dza Mishumogudwa.
tgt_text: Isimosakhiwo sohlelo sihlinzeka ngenhlosombono yendima okumele kubhekwane nayo ngqo, sihlinzeka ngolwazi olutholakale ekuhlolweni kwesimo samanje, sichaza kabanzi ngezimo ezisemqoka ezidingekayo ukuze kuzuzwe impumelelo futhi sibalula lokho okudingeka ukuthi kwenziwe ukufezekisa inhlosombono.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Muhanga wa thoma shuma ha Lushaka ho livhiwa kha ita uri Tshumelo dza Muvhuso dzi vhe dza Mishumogudwa.
tgt_text: Siphakamisa inqubo yokuqaliswa kokusebenza kohlelo okumele ilandelwe emjikelezweni weminyaka emithathu yohlelo lokusebenza.

src_text: Muhanga uyu wo anḓadzwa hu tshi itelwa uri hu vhe na vhukwamani nga ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: Uhlaka Lukazwelonke Lokuqalisa Ukusebenza okuhloswe ngalo ukufezekisa Ukusebenza Ngobungcweti Emkhakheni Wezemisebenzi Kahulumeni.
IKhabhinethi lilugunyazile uHlaka Lukazwelonke Lokuqalisa Ukusebenza okuhloswe ngalo ukufezekisa Ukusebenza Ngobungcweti Emkhakheni Wezemisebenzi Kahulumeni.

src_text: Muhanga uyu dovha hafhu wa ṋetshedza thikho ṱhanu dza nga ha maga u ita uri Tshumelo dza Muvhuso dzi vhe dza mishumogudwa.
tgt_text: Uhlaka lwashicilelwa ngowezi-2021 ukuze kuboniswane nomphakathi ngalo..   Uhlaka luhlinzeka ngezinsika ezinhlanu maqondana nezinhlelo zokungenelela okumele zisetshenziswe ekwenzeni umkhakha wezeMisebenzi Kahulumeni usebenze ngobungcweti.

src_text: Thikho idzi dzi katela maitele ane vha u ranga musi hu tshi ṱoḓa kungwa vhashumi khathihi na u nanga vhashumi vho teaho henefho kha Tshumelo dza Muvhuso pfumbudzwa na ṱanganyiswa na vhaṅwe vhashumi; ndangulo ya vhupulani na mashumele; vhugudi vhune ha khou bvela phanḓa, khathihi na mveledziso ya mishumogudwa hu tshi katelwa aluwa kha zwa mishumo khathihi na zwiwo zwa mishumo.
tgt_text: Lezi zinsika zibandakanya ukuqashwa kwabasebenzi abasha kuhulumeni; ukuhlinzekwa kwabasebenzi abasha ngolwazi oluphathelene nomsebenzi wesikhungo kanye nokujwayezwa kwabo umsebenzi; ukuhlela kanye nokuphathwa kwensebenzo; ukufunda okuqhubekayo nokuthuthukiswa kobungcweti bomsebenzi, nenqubekela phambili emsebenzini kanye nezigameko eziphathelene nomsebenzi.

src_text: Tshanduko kha nyimele dza kutholelwe kwa Vhalangi Vhahulwane (DGs).
tgt_text: Izinguquko ezimweni zokuqashwa kwaBaqondisi-Jikelele (o-DG).

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza muvhigo une wa khou dzinginya maga u khwaṱhisa vhukoni na zwikili zwa dziDG kha Tshumelo dza Muvhuso.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liwugunyazile umbiko ophakamisa izinyathelo zokuqinisa amandla okusebenza o-DG kanye nobungcweti babo bokwenza umsebenzi ngempumelelo.

src_text: Muvhigo wo ṋetshedza makumedzwa fhambanaho, hu tshi katelwa na themo ya shuma ya dziDG khathihi na ndangulo ya vhurumelwa nga vha Khorotshitumbe ya muvhuso kha vhaofisiri vho ṋewaho maanḓa..   Muvhigo uyu dovha hafhu wa dzinginya uri DG Ofisini ya Phresidennde ḓo ḓivhiwa sa Ṱhoho ya Ndangulo ya Muvhuso.
tgt_text: Umbiko wenze iziphakamiso eziningana kubandakanya ubude besikhathi esizohlalwa ngo-DG ezikhundleni zabo kanye nokuphathwa kokudluliswa nokwabiwa kwamandla yiSiphathimandla Esiphezulu siwadlulisela ezikhulwini eziphendulayo..   Umbiko uphakamisa ukuthi u-DG oseHhovisi likaMongameli anikezwe isikhundla sokuba yiNhloko Yophiko Lokuphathwa Kwemisebenzi Kahulumeni.

src_text: Kha mavunḓu, hoyu mushumo ḓo ṋetshedzwa kha dziDG kha ofisi dza Vhalangavunḓu.
tgt_text: Ezifundazweni, lo msebenzi uzonikezwa o-DG abasebenza emahhovisi oNdunankulu.

src_text: Muvhigo wo dovha hafhu wa dzinginya maga u eletshedza mihasho nga ha kulangelwe kwa khonṱhiraka dza dziDG.
tgt_text: Umbiko uphakamise futhi nezinyathelo zokuqondisa iminyango maqondana nokuphathwa kwezinkontileka zo-DG.

src_text: Sisteme ya Ndangulo ya Mashumele dziDG yo senguluswaho khou dovha ya senguluswa hafhu nga huswa itela uri elane na tshanduko dzo tendelwaho.
tgt_text: Uhlelo Olubuyekeziwe Lokuphathwa Kokusebenza ko-DG luyabuyekezwa njengamanje ukuze luhanjelaniswe kahle nezinguquko ezigunyaziwe.

src_text: Minisṱa vha Tshumelo dza Muvhuso na Ndangulo vho tou Farelaho, Vho Thulas Nxesi, vha ḓo vhidza muṱangano wa vhoramafhungo vhege ḓaho une khawo vha ḓo bvisela khagala Muhanga wa shuma wa Lushaka wo livhiswaho kha ita uri Tshumelo dza Muvhuso dzi vhe dza Mishumogudwa khathihi na bvisela khagala tshanduko dzo tendelwaho dza nga ha nyimele dza shuma dza dziDG.
tgt_text: 4   Ibamba likaNgqongqoshe Wezemisebenzi Kahulumeni Nokuphathwa Kwayo, uMnu Thulas Nxesi, ngeviki elizayo uzobiza isithangami sabezindaba lapho ezochaza khona ngoHlaka Lukazwelonke Lokuqalisa Ukusebenza okuhloswe ngalo ukufezekisa Ukusebenza Ngobungcweti Emkhakheni wezeMisebenzi Kahulumeni futhi achaze kabanzi nangezinguquko ezigunyaziwe maqondana nezimo zokuqashwa nokusebenza ko-DG.

src_text: Muvhigo wa Vhuṱanu wa Mvelaphanḓa ya nga ha thoma shuma ha Nḓivhadzamulayotibe ya nga ha Pfanelo dza Vhathu vhane vha vha na Vhuholefhali (WPRPD) wa ṅwaha wa 2020-.
tgt_text: Umbiko Wesihlanu Wenqubekela Phambili esiyenziwe Ekuqalisweni Kokusebenza Komthetho Odingidwayo Oqondene Namalungelo Abantu Abanokukhubazeka (i-WPRPD) wezi-2020-.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Muvhigo wa Vhuṱanu wa Mvelaphanḓa ya nga ha thoma shuma ha WPRPD, ine ya vha yone ṋetshedzaho maswamaswa nga ha thoma shuma ha WPRPD.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi liwugunyazile uMbiko Wesihlanu Wenqubekela Phambili esiyenziwe Ekuqalisweni Kokusebenza kwe-WPRPD, ohlinzeka ngolwazi lwakamuva maqondana nokuqaliswa kokusebenza kwe-WPRPD.

src_text: Muvhigo katela na vhupfiwa bva kha mihasho ya muvhuso wa lushaka na wa mavunḓu dovha hafhu wa bvisela khagala zwiswa nga ha thoma shuma ha mbekanyamaitele ine ya katela mikovho ya migaganyagwama..   Muvhigo wa thoma wa nga ha mvelaphanḓa wa ṅwaha nga ṅwaha wo anḓadzwa nga ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: Umbiko uqukethe imibono evela eminyagweni kazwelonke kanye neyezifundazwe.

src_text: Muvhigo wa vhuṱanu wa nga ha mvelaphanḓa wo ṱanganedzwa uri ḓo ḓivhadzwa kha gurannḓa ya muvhuso nahone wa dovha wa anḓadzwa nga vha Muhasho wa Vhafumakadzi, Vhaswa na Vhathu vha re na Vhuholefhali..   Khwiniso ya Tshiteṅwa tsha 20(1) tsha Thendelano dza nga ha fheliswa ha Zwiito zwoṱhe zwa Khethululo Itelwaho Vhafumakadzi (CEDAW).
tgt_text: Uhlinzeka ngolwazi lwakamuva maqondana nokuqaliswa kokusebenza kwenqubomgomo okubandakanya nokwabiwa kwezabelomali..   Umbiko wokuqala waminyaka wonke wenqubekela phambili esiyenziwe washicilelwa ngowezi-.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza ṋetshedzwa ngomu Phalamenndeni ha khwiniso ya Tshiteṅwa tsha 20(1) tsha CEDAW itela uri sainiwe.
tgt_text: Umbiko wenqubekela phambili wesihlanu usugunyaziwe ukuthi usungashicilelwa kuSomqulu Kahulumeni futhi ushicilelwe nanguMnyango Wezabesifazane, Intsha kanye Nabantu Abanokukhubazeka.

src_text: Khwiniso idzi dzi ṋetshedza tshikhala tsho engedzwaho tsha miṱangano ya komiti ine ya shuma na mivhigo ya mashango ane vha miraḓo.
tgt_text: Ukuchitshiyelwa Kombhalo wama-20(1) Wesivumelwano Esiqondene Nokuqedwa Kwazo Zonke Izinhlobo Zokucwaswa Okubhekiswe Kwabesifazane (i-CEDAW).

src_text: Afrika Tshipembe ḽo saina hedzi thendelano nga ṅwaha wa 1993 he ḽa dovha ḽa tendelana nadzo nga ṅwedzi wa Nyendavhusiku.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi likugunyazile ukuthunyelwa ePhalamende kwezichibiyelo zoMbhalo wama-20(1) we-CEDAW ukuze zigunyazwe ngokusemthethweni.
